dhāvitā api te dantāḥ śyāmā mugdhe mudhā śramaḥ |
mukhābjasaurabhākṛṣṭapratibimbitaṣaṭpadāḥ ||
vidagdhamadhurasnigdhamugdhasambhrāntalocanam |
lalitabhrūlatollāsahāsahāri mukhaṃ tava || ityaparamudāharaṇatrayam ||
kāntaṃ vibhajaya[31a]nnāha—

sarvasya vaidarbhasyetarasya vā jagato janasya kāntaṃ manoharaṃ yat tat kāntaṃ vijñeyamitividhiḥ kuta evamityāha—laukikārthānatikramāditi | lokavidito 'rtho laukikam | tasya laukikasyārthasyābhidheyasyānatikramāt anuvṛtteḥ kāraṇāt | laukikārthānuvṛtterhi kāvyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ sarveṣāṃ kāntaṃ bhavati | tasya viniyogaviṣayaṃ darśayannāha—taccetyādi | tacca kāntam | arthāntarasamuccaye cakāraḥ | tadāha—vārtābhidhāneṣu pravṛttinivedaneṣu varṇanāsvapi vastuguṇodbhāvinīṣu ca dṛśyate prayujyate ||
tadudāharati—

kenacit tapodhanena kaścid gṛhamedhī svagṛhāgatena vārtāpṛṣṭaḥ san abhidhatte gṛhāṇi gehāni nāma tānyevocyante 'rthato nāmataśca nānyāni | ata eva nāmetyuktam | saṃbhāvanāyāṃ vā nāmaśabdaḥ | katamāni ? yāni gṛhāṇi evamāgamanotsavena pādapāṃsubhiścaraṇareṇubhiḥ pāvanaiḥ pavitraiḥ jāhnavījalairiva saṃbhāvayati mānayati punāti bhavādṛśaḥ tvadvidhaḥ taporāśiḥ sākṣāddharmasañcayaḥ | tathābhidhaṃ vārtābhidhānaṃ sarvajagatkāntaṃ laukitvāt tādṛśasyārthasya | uktaṃ ca—
agnicit kapilā sa[trī] rājā bhikṣumahādadhiḥ |
[31b] dṛṣṭā mātā punantyete tvaṃ punaḥ smaraṇādapi || iti |

anavadyāṅgi sarvāṅgasundari ! anayāḥ tava stanayoḥ jṛmbhamāṇayoḥ parivarddhamāṇyoḥ bāhulatāntaraṃ hṛdayaṃ paryāptaḥ paripūrṇaḥ avakāśaḥ sthānaṃ, [na] bhavati | svalpametatsthānaṃ yat bāhulatāntaraṃ nāma | atimātrastanaunnatyād ityayamapi laukika evārthaḥ | [ tataḥ sarvajagatkāntamīdṛśaṃ varṇanamiti ||
kīdṛśaṃ sambhāvyate yena sarvajagatkāntaṃ syāditi cedāha—

iti parata idamevaṃvidhaṃ viśeṣākhyānasaṃskṛtaṃ saṃbhāvyaṃ naiva loke na sambhāvyata eva laukikārthānusāreṇa prayuktatvāt | prakṛtāpekṣayā tayorviśeṣaḥ pādapāṃsūnāṃ ca pāvanatvaṃ stanayośca tādṛśavijṛmbhanaṃ viśeṣo 'tiśayaḥ tasyākhyānenodbhāvanenāsaṃskṛtaṃ vyutpannam | viśeṣo vā ākhyāyate yena tadeva saṃskṛtaṃ suprayuktatvāt | kāvyaṃ sambhāvyamiti prakṛtam | tataśca lokayātrānuvartinaḥ lokārthānusāriṇaḥ sarvavidagdhasyetarasya vā janasya kāntaṃ manoharam, tādṛśaṃ kāvyaṃ bhavati jāyate |

adya jātā vayaṃ deva prāptāḥ sarvāśca siddhayaḥ |
yadevaṃ puṇyayā spṛṣṭā dṛṣṭyā smitaprasannayā ||
[pra]paśyātmānametasminnujjvale gaṇḍamaṇḍale |
darpaṇānayanaśrāntyā tanvi kiṃ dūyase mudhā || iti a[32a]paramudāharaṇayugalam ||
gauḍābhimataṃ vārtābhidhānaṃ varṇanaṃ ca darśayannāha—

lokātīto 'laukika iva lokarañnāt | vyutpannāstu rajyante | ata eva ivaśabdaprayogaḥ | yo 'rtho 'tyarthamatimātramadhyāropyate parikalpyate, yathā ca sarvajagatkāntaṃ kāvyaṃ jāyate | adhyāropamātraṃ tu pūrvasminnapi vidyate iti atyarthamityuktam | vivakṣitaḥ prayuktaḥ kāvyarūpeṇa tena tathāvidhenārthena abhidheyena tathāvidhārthānuvartinā kāvyeneti yāvat | vidagdhā vyutpannā atituṣyanti anurajyante sutarāṃ tathāvidhoktyā, ahatabuddhitvāt | itare 'vidagdhā nātituṣyanti, tādṛśāmabhāvitasvabhāvatvāt | asaṃbhāvyametadatiprasaṅgo 'yamiti nānurajyante ityarthaḥ | ata, eva sarvajagatkāntaṃ na bhavati, vidagdhānāmeva rañjanāt | yathetyudāharati—

devāyatanamiva yathā adya prabhṛti etaddinamārabhya no 'smākaṃ gṛhamidamārādhyamupāsyaṃ yūjanīyaṃ kṛtam | yuṣmākaṃ pādayoścaraṇapadmayo rajasāṃ reṇūnāṃ pātena saṃsargeṇāghamarṣaṇena dhautamapanītaṃ niḥśeṣa samastaṃ kilviṣaṃ pāpaṃ yasmistathā | yata evaṃ tasmādārādhyamitiḥprakṛtam | vārtābhidhānamātramīdṛśamalauki kārthameva | tataśca sarvajagatkāntamiti ||

idaṃ pratyakṣam evaṃvidhamatiśayaṃ bhavatyāḥ tava stanayājṛ mbhaṇaṃ vyāpana bhāvi bhaviṣyatkālāpekṣayā anālocyādṛṣṭvaivālpaṃ saṃkīrṇaṃ yathā na mātaḥ stanau, ākāśaṃ vyoma nirmitaṃ vihitaṃ vedhasā vidhinā yadyālocayiṣyannaivaṃ stokamākāśaṃ niramāsyat prathamaṃ tāvat jātavedā iti varṇanamasaṃskṛtameva || nedṛśaṃ sarvajagatkāntaṃ laukikārthātikramāt ||
kiṃ tarhīdamucyata iti āha—

idamīdṛśamanantaroktaṃ kāvyamatyuktirityuktamākhyāyate tajjñairiti atyuktirnāmedamityarthaḥ | etadidamanantaroktaṃ gauḍaiḥ paurastyairupalālitamiṣṭamatyantaṃ na vaidarbhasaṃmatamityāha—prasthānamityādi | prākpraṇītaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ gṛhāṇi nāmetyādi prasthānaṃ prakāraḥ sāraṃ jīvitamanyasya vaidarbhasya vartmano mārgasya | tādṛśaṃ dākṣiṇātyaiḥ prayu[jya]ta iti yāvat ||
samādhimadhikṛtyāha—

lg.l: samyagādhīyate yatra sa samādhiḥ smṛto yathā || 93 ||

div.p: anyasya vastunaḥ prakṛtāpekṣayā | dharmaḥ guṇaḥ prasiddhastatastasmānmukhyādanyatra gauṇaviṣaye samyak sādhu | lokasīmānuvartitvameva samyaktvamiha draṣṭavyam | ādhīyate 'dhyāropyate yatra | kena ? lokasīmānurodhinā lokapratītyanuvartinā kavinā | yathā lokapratītiḥ samāda[33a]dhīta nānyathetyarthaḥ | sa evaṃvidho dharmaḥ samādhirnāma kāvye smṛto vijñeya iti vidhiḥ | samādhīyate 'dhyāropyate yasminniti samādhiḥ samāropaviṣaya ucyate | yadyapi samādhīyamānāddharmādanyo nāsti samādhiḥ tathāpi sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena bhedavivakṣayā yatrānyadharmaḥ samādhīyate tat samādhirityuktam | gauṇaśabdavyavahāraḥ kāvyopayogī samādhiriti yāvat | yathetyudāharati ||

kumudāni kairavā nimīlanti nimiṣanti kamalāni padmāni unmiṣanti cetyatra katamo dharmaḥ samāhitaḥ ityāha—netretyādi | netrasya kriyā nimeṣonmeṣalakṣaṇā prasiddho dharmaḥ tasmāttato 'nyatra kumudādiṣu adhyāsāt samādhānāt samāropāt kāraṇāt | tadvācinī netrakriyābhidhāyinī śrutirnimīlantītyādikā labdhā prāptā prayukteti yāvat | arthānugāmitvācchabdasya ityevaṃbhūto bhāktaḥ śābdo vyavahāraḥ kāvye samādhināmnā khyāyate ||
kaściddharmaḥ gauṇaviṣaya eva śobhate kāvye na mukhyagocara iti daśayannāha—

niṣṭhyūtaṃ vāntam, udgīrṇaṃ ca | ādiśabdena riktādiparigrahaḥ | tadīdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ gauṇī pradhā[33b]netarā nirūḍha़viṣayādviṣayāntaraparigrahalakṣaṇavṛttiprayogarūpā vyapāśrayo yasya tattathā | gauṇamiti yāvat | atisundaramatyantamanoharamalaṃkārarūpatvāt | anyattu itarat punaḥ gauṇavṛttyavyapāśrayāt mukhyamiti yāvat | grāmyakakṣām asabhyapadavīṃ vigāhate pratipadyate | grāmyamahṛdyamiti kāvye tadukteranucitatvāditi bhāvaḥ ||
tadudāharati—

pāvakavipruṣaḥ tejaḥkaṇikāḥ arkāṃśubhirādityakiraṇairniṣṭhyūtā nirastāḥ pītvā bhūyo 'tyartham | ataśca vamantīva udgirantīva padmānītyutprekṣate mukhairudgīrṇā muktāḥ aruṇā lohitāḥ reṇavaḥ parāgā yairiti vigrahaḥ | utprekṣābījamanena sūcitam | sūryodaye hi vikasanti padmāni tejaḥkaṇān pivantīva lakṣyante raktānparāgānmuñcanti ca pītānagnikaṇān vamantīva dṛśyante | niṣṭhīvanādikaṃ hi sacetanakartṛkaṃ śleṣmādikarmakam | mukhyakāvye ca tādṛśamanucitam | iha tvarkāṃśupadmamukhakartṛkaṃ tejo reṇukarmakaṃ prayuktamiti atisundaram | sacetanakarmakamapi yadi gauṇakartṛkaṃ prayujyeta tadā na grāsyam | yathā—niṣṭhyatamiti [34a] nāma bhāṣase hṛdayagatāṃ mudamudniranniti ||

itīdṛśaṃ gauṇaṃ hṛdyam atisundaram | ahṛdyaṃ tu grāmyaṃ punarucyate—niṣṭhīvati vadhūriti sacetanāyāḥ ṣṭhīvanaṃ mukhyaṃ prasiddhameva | ekadharmasamādhirayaṃ darśitaḥ | yugapat
ekakālam naikeṣāṃ bahūnāṃ dharmāṇā kriyādirūpāṇāmadhyāsaḥ samādhiśca mata iṣyate | cakāra uktasamuccaye | yathetyudāharati |
gurugarbhetyādi—

gururgṛhītasāratvāt garbho 'ntarbhāgaḥ sa eva bharo bhāraḥ durvahatvāt tasya vā bharo 'vasādaḥ | tena lkāntā glānāḥ stanantyaḥ lkāntyanurūpaṃ śabdaṃ kurvāṇāḥ meghapaṅktayaḥ payodamālā imā etā acalasya parvatasya adhityakāyāḥ uparibhūmerutsaṅgaṃ samadhiśerate 'dhyāsate ||
kiyanto 'tra dharmā adhyastā iti darśayannāha—

lg.l: utsaṅge śayanaṃ sakhyāḥ stananaṃ gauravaṃ klamaḥ |

div.p: sakhyāḥ kasyāścit utsaṅge śayanaṃ stananamārtarutaṃ gauravaṃ garbhakṛta[durbharatvā]dilakṣaṇaṃ tatkṛtaśca lkamaḥ glānirityete garbhiṇyā antarvatnyā dharmāḥ prasiddhā bahavo 'neke anyatra meghapaṅktiṣu.........darśitā adhyastā ityayamanekadharmasamādhiḥ ||
samādhiḥ so 'yaṃ vyāpakaḥ subhagaśceti [34b] praśaṃsāmukhena nigamayannāha—

tadetadanantaroktaṃ kāvyas yathoktasya gadyapadyamiśrātmakasya sarvasvaṃ sāraṃ tatparāyaṇatvātkāvyasyeti sāmānyoktiriyam | kiṃ taditi nirminatti | samādhirnāma yo guṇa iti yo 'yamanantaraṃ vibhaktaḥ samādhirnāma samādhisamākhyo guṇo dharmastataśca samagraḥ sarvo 'pi naika eṃva, kavisārthaḥ kavijanaḥ tamenaṃ prakṛtaṃ samādhimanugacchati samāśrayati prayuṅkta iti yāvat | tataścobhayorapi vartmanorayaṃ sādhāraṇa itīdamapi prāyo guṇeṣu saṃgṛhītaṃ dṛṣṭamiti ||
tadevaṃ prasphuṭāntaratvaṃ mārgayoryathāpratijñātaṃ prasādhya nigamayannāha—

lg.l: tadbhedāstu na śakyante vaktuṃ pratikavi sthitāḥ || 101 ||

div.p: iti yathoktena prakāreṇa mārgadvayaṃ vaidarbho gauḍīyaśca mārgaḥ bhinnaṃ prasphuṭāntarama | kutaḥ ? tasya mārgadvayasya svarūpam aviparītasvabhāvaḥ, śleṣādisvarūpaṃ vidarbhamārgasya tadviparyayasvarūpaṃ gauḍīyasya | tasya nirūpaṇāt vivecanāt yathāvihitād hetoḥ | yadi mārgadvayaṃ vivicyate yathāvat tato labhyate parisphuṭamantaram | ye tu na vijānanti tairekīkṛtametat | tataścābhedo 'tra samāropitaḥ | bhedastu vāstava ityākūtam | yathoktaṃ prāk | kiyantastarhi prabhedā vaidarbhamārgasya kiyanto vā [35a] gauḍīyasya yataḥ parisphuṭamantaraṃ bhedasāmānyapraviśeṣamidaṃ taditi gamyata ityāha—tadbhedāstvityādi | tuśabdo 'rthāntaravivakṣāyām | tasya mārgadvayasya bhedā avāntarāḥ prakārāḥ | yathoktasāmānyalakṣaṇanyastā anantāḥ gavāśvaprabhedavat, kimāśrayāḥ ? pratikavi sthitāḥ kaviṃ kaviṃ prati pratikavi | ye kecidiha kavayaḥ sambhavanti mārgadvayānusāriṇaste tadāśrayā itastato vyavasthitāḥ | na tu kvacidekatra parisaṃkhyātāstiṣṭhanti | tasmāt vaktuṃ sākalyena vivarītuṃ na śakyante ānantyāditi bhāvaḥ ||
yadi tāvatsanti kiṃ na vaktuṃ śakyante ? vaktumaśakyāstu na santyeva te | tataśca yathoktamapi bhedasāmānyamasadiva |
nirviśeṣaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ bhavecchaśaviṣāṇavat | ityeva śaṅkānaikāntikametat | sato 'pi kathañcid vaktumaśakyasya darśanāditi pratipādayannāha—

ikṣukṣīraguḍadrākṣādīnāṃ madhuradravyāṇāṃ mādhuryasya sāmānyadharmasya pratidravyaṃ viśeṣātmanā antaraṃ bhedo mahat parisphuṭam | tathāpi tadantaraṃ sarasvatyāpi vāgadhidevatayāpi ākhyātuṃ vaktuṃ vibhāgenāsyedṛśaṃ mādhuryamasyedṛśamiti na śakyate | prāgevānyena | kevalamanubhavagamyaṃ tat | sāmānyaśabdena madhuramiti tu vyapadiśyate | yadyapīkṣo
ranyādṛśaṃ mādhuryaṃ kṣīrasyānyādṛśamityādi kathyate tathāpi na tathā śabdād gamyate yathānubhūyate parisphuṭaṃ tadantaram | na caitāvatā tadasadevānubhava[35b]siddhasya durapahna[va]tvāt | tathā mālatīmallikācampakapāṭalādīnāṃ saurabhyasya mahadantaraṃ tathāpi na tattathā vaktuṃ śakyate, yathānubhūyate | tathāvidhā hi vācikā śaktiḥ sāmānyaikatā nāma | ko nu paryanuyujyatām ? yathoktamācāryadharmakīrtinā sakalavidvajjanacūḍāmaṇinā—
tadrūpaṃ sarvato bhinnaṃ tathā tatpratipādikā |
na śrutiḥ kalpanā [vā]sti sāmānyenaiva vṛttitaḥ | iti || [pramāṇavarttike 3.90]

yathā surabhikusu[māntarbhūtaṃ] pārijātaṃ syāt | yaduktaṃ sarasvatyāpi ca vaktuṃ na śakyata iti, [tat sādhu,] tayāpi vācakaśabdaśakteranyathā kartṛmaśakyatvāt | tadevaṃ mārgadvayasya prabhedāḥ yadyapi pratikavi sthitā vidyante vastutastathāpi vaktumāna[ntyā]t...... atiprasaṅgācca na śakyante viśeṣeṇa pratyekam | naitāvatā na santyeva | sāmānyena tu mārgadvayasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśitameva vyaktam | prativyakti tu vaktuṃ ko nāma śaknuyāt | sarvatraiva lakṣaṇaśāstre sarvabhedavyāpi sāmānyalakṣaṇamucyate | na tu tadbhedāḥ parisaṃkhyāyante | atrāpi saiva vyavasthā kāvyalakṣaṇaśāstratvādasya | na tu yathoktaṃ sāmānyaṃ bhedalakṣaṇaparisphuṭābhamanusaradbhirabhiyuktaiste bhedā mārgadvayasaṃbhavino vivecayituṃ śakyante | yathedṛśaṃ nīlamīdṛśaṃ pītamiti vyutpādite[36a]na bhedalakṣaṇena vyaktamubhayasambhavinaḥ pratibhedā yathādarśanaṃ vibhajyante ityalaṃ vistareṇa ||
seyaṃ kāvyalakṣaṇaprayojanasvabhāvā kāvyaguṇadoṣavivekarūpā vyutpattiryāmabhisandhāya kriyāvidhiṃ nibabandhuḥ sūrayaḥ, tasya kiṃ prayojanamitīdānīmavasaraṃ prāpya prayojanaṃ varṇyannāha—

lg.l: naisargikī ca pratibhā śrutaṃ ca bahu nirmalam |

div.p:
naisargikī svābhāvikī janmāntarābhyāsa[sa]mbhavinī | sahajeti yāvat | pratibhā heyopādeyaparicchedalakṣaṇā | sā ca prakaraṇāt kāvyaviṣayā | sahajā śaktiriyam | utpādyāṃ darśayannāha—śrutaṃ cetyādi | śrutaṃ kāvyāṅgavidyāśravaṇaṃ śrutamayaṃ tacca
vyākaraṇakriyākalpachandovicityādyanekavidyāviṣayatvāt, anekaśaḥ pravṛttatvācca bahu paryāptaṃ nirmalaṃ pariśuddham, āmnāyaviśuddhyā sandehaviparyāsavirahāt | evaṃ śrutamayaṃ jñānaṃ paripūrṇamabhidhāya cintāmayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ ca darśayannāha—amandaścābhiyoga iti | śrutasya cintanamūhāpohamukhena yathāmnāyamaviparītārthaniścayanam | niścitasya ca bhāvanamabhyāsaḥ āvṛttiḥ sthirīkaraṇamiti dvividho 'bhiyogaḥ abhyāsaḥ | sa cāmandaḥ paryāptaḥ yāvadbhāvitatvāt | tadetattrayarūpā kāvyaviṣayā vyu[tpa][36b]ttiḥ | evaṃ hi kāvyaṃ vyutpannaṃ bhavati yadi tadaṅgaṃ vidyāsthānaṃ śrutaṃ cintitaṃ bhāvitaṃ ca yathāvad bhavet | anyathā kīdṛśī kāvyavyutpattiḥ sarvatropāyavyutpattilakṣaṇatvādupeyavyutpatteḥ | [tadṛte co]peyavyutpattirasūtrapaṭāt na hīyate | abhimānamātraṃ tu vijṛmbhatām | kastasya niṣeddhā ? tadevaṃvidhāḥ kāvyavyutpattiḥ kāraṇaṃ kāvyasampadaḥ kāvyaracanāyā niravadyāyāḥ hetuḥ | asyāḥ prastutāyā yadarthā kāvyavyutpattiḥ | parakīyakāvyaparijñānaṃ tu sulabhamevedṛśīṃ kāvyavyutpattimāśritavatā | tataśca kīrtilābhaḥ satkāraḥ anyo vā puruṣārtha iti gamyata eva | vakṣyati ca kīrtimīpsubhiḥ [1. 105] iti ||
nanu kecideva sahajaśaktiyuktāḥ | tatkimidānīṃ mā bhūdanyeṣāmiha pravṛttiḥ ? yenocyate naisargikī ca pratibhetyatra āha—

pūrvavāsanā janmāntarābhyāsāhitaḥ saṃskāraḥ abhyāsānubandhitvāt | yathoktamācāryaśūreṇa—
abhyāsayogena śubhāśubhāni karmāṇi sātmyaiva bhavanti puṃsām |
tathāvidhānyeva yadaprayatnā- jjanmāntare svapna ivācaranti || iti |
[jātakamālāyām pṛḥ 95]

pūrvā cāsau pūrvajanmabhāvitatvāt, vāsanā ceti vigrahaḥ | saiva guṇo viśeṣaḥ, sadbhiḥ stutatvāt | [37a] tasyā vā guṇaḥ yathāpratyayaṃ prabodhaḥ svānurūpakāryajananābhimukhalakṣaṇo viśeṣastaṃ hetubhāvena anubadhnāti, apekṣata iti pūrvavāsanāguṇānubandhi | pratibhānaṃ prajñā tacca prakaraṇāt kāvyaviṣayakam | adbhutamāścaryaṃ lokasya kathamīdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ yatheti vismayajanakatvād durlabhaṃ vādbhutam | naisargikī pratibheti yāvat | yadyapina vidyate yeṣāṃ tairapi kāvyābhyāsaḥ karaṇīyaḥ | evaṃ nāsau niṣphalā bhaviṣyatītyāha—śrutenetyādi | śrutena kāvyāṅgavidyāviṣayeṇa śravaṇena bahunā nirmalena | yathoktaṃ prāk | yatnena cābhiyogena amandena yathoktaṃ pūrvam | karaṇena hetunā puruṣeṇopāsitā samārādhitā abhyasteti yāvat | vāk kāvyāṅgakriyākalpādividyālakṣaṇaviśiṣṭā arthātprakaraṇādvā tadanyathānupapattyā kāvyasampado 'rthaḥ sāmarthyam | kāvyavyutpattiprastāvaḥ prakaraṇam | yathoktam—
arthaḥ prakaraṇaṃ liṅgaṃ śabdasyānyasya sannidhiḥ |
sāmānyavāciśabdānāṃ viśeṣasthitihetavaḥ || iti | [tula॰ vākyapadīyam]

aparanyāyo yathāsambhavamiha sarvo 'nusartavyaḥ sāmānyoktibhūyastvāt | kamapi kañcit sahajaśaktyavirahe yādṛśaṃ tatkalpamanugrahaṃ kāvyaracanāsāma[rthyadāna]lakṣaṇam | dhruvamavaśyaṃ karo[37b]tyeva upāsituḥ puruṣasya | nātra sandehaḥ | tasmānnaisargikī pratibhā nāsti mameti nopāsitavyaiva sarasvatī | kāmadhenuravaśyamevānugrahīṣyatīti [dhyeyam] ||

yata evaṃ na niṣphalaṃ vāgupāsanaṃ tattasmāt kāraṇāt astatandrairanalaso bhūtvā aniśam anavaratam abhiyogāvicchedāt kramāt śrutacintābhāvanākrameṇa sampradāyasādguṇyārthavartinā yathoktaṃ prāk | upāsyā samārādhyā | abhyasanīyā yāvatprasīdati | yathoktamācāryamātṛceṭena—

sarasvatī kāvyāṅgavidyālakṣaṇā prakaraṇāderyathoktaṃ prāk | khalu [ai]kāntena asaṃśayam vā | kīrtiḥ pariśuddhakāvyakriyālakṣaṇā pūrvoktā, kāvyasampadaḥ ekāntena kīrtihetutvāt | āvartate sa evārthaḥ punararthāntarāśrayāditi nyāyāt | tatsambhavā khyātirvā, guṇebhya eva prabhavanti kīrtaya iti vacanāt | tāmanaśvarīṃ satpuruṣatanumaśeṣajanasubhagāṃ vyāpinīṃ guṇādhirājavaijayantīmīpsubhi[ravāptu]kāmaiḥ pu[38a]ruṣaiḥ | upāsyeti prakṛtam | tathā lābhasatkārādikamapi draṣṭavyam | na tu [sā vāsanā] mama nāstīti ālasyamālambanīyaṃ tasyānarthahetutvāt | yathoktamācāryāśvaghoṣeṇa—

atha kathañcit svayaṃ kāvyakriyālasaścetat tādṛśaḥ tathāpi parakāvyakovidaḥ svayaṃ ca kiñcitkaraḥ tadvidāmādeyo bhaviṣyatīti sarvathāvaiphalyaparihāramāha—kṛśa ityādi | kavitve svayaṃ kāvyakaraṇe kṛśe mande 'pi sati sargabandhādyanirvahaṇāt | kṛśe vā asati kavitve 'pi muktakāderapi akaraṇāt | tathāpi darśanāt | bhinnā hi śaktiḥ puṃsām | yathoktam—

kṛtaśramā yathāvidhānamupāsitavāco janāḥ puruṣāḥ kṛto 'nuṣṭhitaḥ śramaḥ śravaṇādilakṣaṇo vyavahāro yairiti [38b] vigrahaḥ, parakāvyakovidatvāt | vidagdhagoṣṭhīṣu vihartumīśate | vidagdhāḥ kavayaḥ teṣāṃ goṣṭhīṣu kāvyālāpeṣu vidyāramaṇīmekhalānūpura[śiñjiteṣu] sakalakalānadīviśrāmasamudreṣu nānārasabhāvābhinayamahānaṭeṣu śabdapārāyaṇamahārṇavaratnāṅkureṣu śāstrapariśramaphalodayamahotsaveṣu kavisāgarāmṛteṣu budhajanamanastaskareṣu vividhālaṅkārahāriṣu vandanīyeṣu vidagdhatābhūmisīmānteṣu vidvatsaraṇiprapābhūtātiśayeṣu svayaṃkṛteṣu adhyātmaśāstrakalākauśalavarṇaneṣu satāmuciteṣu tadekarūpeṣvapi pratipuruṣamapūrvapariṇāmitayā paramātmadeśīyeṣu sarasvatīprasādamahāvareṣu lakṣmīpūjābhājaneṣu nirudvegasukhasvabhāvatvāt kaivalyakalpeṣvatalabhāvagambhīratvāt parārthaprasattiguṇayogācca sāgareṣviva mahāhradeṣu satpuruṣacaritādarśabhittiṣu yaśaḥkusumāmodasurabhiṣu mahākavikīrtistambheṣu kiṃ bahunā saṃsārasārasandoheṣu |

taduktam—
saṃsāraviṣavṛkṣasya dvayamevāmṛtaṃ phalam |
subhāṣitarasāsvādaḥ sadbhiśca saha saṅgatam || iti ||
vihartumabhijñātatayā 'ntarbhavitumīśa[39a]te kalpante | akṛtaśramāṇāṃ tu pallavagrāhiṇāmavalepināmanātmavidāṃ vidagdhagoṣṭhīvihāra upahāsa eva syāt | yathoktamācāryamātṛceṭena—
varamevamanadhītavidyo na pu[na]rdu radhītavidyaḥ | yathoktamācā[39b]ryakambalena—
svayamevamupahataṃ tapasvinamaparāparadūṣaṇecchā bādhate | seyamanyā viḍambanā | yathoktamācāryamātṛceṭena—
div.q:
samātiriktavyasanī ya eṣa san parān parāhantyabhihatya vākśaraiḥ |
sa pūtināsā kupitendriyaḥ svayaṃ vṛṇoti durgandhabhayena nāsikām ||
parāpacāreṣvatitīkṣṇacakṣuṣo nimīlitākṣaśca yatheṣṭaceṣṭite |
rajasvalāḥ santa ime svayaṃ kathaṃ kiranti lokasya rajāṃsi sūca[kāḥ] ||
yathātathā śa[kya]midaṃ titikṣituṃ sadāgaso yaddhi tudantyaruntudāḥ |
aduṣṭasandūṣaṇa[vaiśasaṃ tu] yat tadāsu[raṃ] kamya mano na kampayet ||
sataḥ prakāśānapi nekṣate guṇān kuto 'pi doṣānasato 'vagacchati |
kutastadīdṛṅnayanaṃ samudgataṃ yadīkṣate 'sat sati na pravartate ||
tadapyalaṃ soḍhamapaṇḍitājjanā- danīkṣamāṇo hi [karoti duḥsaham] |
guṇāntarajñastu jano 'tidurjanaḥ vahanti sādhūṃstadupekṣyatāṃ katham ||
guṇaughapuṇyasya tu pattanaṃ paraṃ guṇāntarajño jana eva kevalaḥ |
tato 'pi yadyāpadiyaṃ samu[tthi]tā kva tarhi gacchantu parāyaṇā guṇāḥ ||
[40a]kiyadasaccaritamalena jihvāṃ limpāmaḥ | seyaṃ pūyatāmatyantaśīte[na] prasannena surabhiṇā bhuvana[pāvanena] saccaritapuṇyodakena |
ṛjusvabhāvo 'pi badhyate śaṭhai- rna doṣavinnaiva na cāpyaruntudaḥ |
nato na sarvatra gato na dīnatā- maho vicitrāḥ purūṣasya nītayaḥ ||
﻿
parāpavādeṣu nirātmavarṇavān gato niyuktānyaguṇeṣu vāgmitām |
ripūnapi śreyasi dhātumīhate manasvinaśceyamalaukikī sthitiḥ ||
yathā yathā dūṣaṇatatparaḥ [para]- stathā tathā tadguṇalāpalālasaḥ |
nitāntadākṣiṇyamahāmahodadhe- rmanasvinaḥ keyamatīva vāmatā ||
priyaṃvadaḥ kṣepakṛte kṣamāparaḥ [na kupyati] prāṇahare 'pi dakṣiṇaḥ |
alaukikaṃ sarvamitīdamīdṛṣaṃ mahānubhāvaḥ kuta eṣa śikṣitaḥ ||
prasannavākkāyamanaḥkriyāpathaḥ punāti sākṣādiva dharmasañcayaḥ |
śruto 'tha dṛṣṭaḥ samudāharan giraḥ sunītagarbhāḥ sujanaḥ smṛto 'pi vā ||
sa eṣa sādhurbhuvanaikapāvanaḥ prasannamṛgyaḥ kvacidatra dṛśyate |
api sthirāṃ prītimi[māṃ] na saṃharet kalerguṇonmūlanadharmavarmitaḥ ||
punastathaiva sthitirūrjitāśrayā guṇotsavānāmapi nāma sambhavet |
guṇaiśca yeṣāmiva sūryaraśmibhi- rnyalīyatādo[40b]ṣavipakṣavikramaḥ ||
nivṛttaniḥśeṣaviśeṣaviplavaṃ parasparaṃ sadguṇalolupaṃ jagat |
yaśaskarīṃ tāṃ dhuramādipauruṣāṃ punaḥ pravṛttāṃ vidadhātu śāśvatīm ||
nirastadaurgatyasamṛddhiśīkaraḥ śubhodayāttṛptasamastasajjanaḥ |
punastathā sadvaraśāstrasaṃkathā- vinodaramyaḥ sama[yaḥ] pravartatām ||
div.p: prakṛtamidānīṃ samāpyatām | tadevaṃ kāvyaracanākīrtaye kāvyavyutpattaye ca kāvyalakṣaṇaśāstrasya prayojanamiti |
div.trailer:
ācāryadaṇḍikṛtau kāvyalakṣaṇe mārgavibhāgaparicchedaṭīkā ratnaśrīrnāma samāptā ||kṛtiriyaṃ siṃhalācārya ratnaśrījñānasya ||
saujanyaguṇadhoṣasya ghoṣalīgrāmasadmanaḥ |
bhadantabuddhadevasya sānāthyamidamīdṛśam ||
ghoṣalīgrāmakāyasthadevadattakṛtātmanā |
kṛtametanmayā yatnādīdṛśaṃ sadṛśaṃ dhiyaḥ ||

div.p: tadevaṃ bhārgavibhāgaṃ [paricchidya saṃpratyartha]laṅkāraṃ sarvamārgasādhāraṇaṃ śāsitumupakramate—

lg.l: te cādyāpi vikalpyante kastān kārtsnyena vakṣyati || 1 ||

div.p: kāvyasya padyagadyamiśrātmakasya yathoktasya śobhāṃ saundaryaṃ kurvanti ye dharmā guṇāstān | anuvādo 'yam | alaṅkārān pracakṣate kathayanti | tadvida iti vidhiḥ | ye kecit kāvyaśobhākarā viśeṣāste alaṅkārā vijñeyā iti yāvat | alaṃkriyate śobhāṃ nīyate kāvyamebhiḥ śarīraniṣṭhahārādibhirityalaṅkārāḥ | evaṃlakṣaṇā alaṅkārāḥ, kiyantasta ityāha—te cetyādi | te cālaṅkārāḥ kimapi dīrghaṃ kālamārabhyādyāpi idānīṃ yāvadvikalpyante prabhidyante, abhiyuktairayamayamiti pratipuruṣamaparāparoktiviśeṣānivṛtteḥ, na tviyattā labhyate | tataśca tānevamanantālaṅkārān kārtsnyena lakṣitān kṛtsnān ko nāma puruṣo 'rvāgdarśī idānīntanadarśī vakṣyati vaktuṃ śaknuyāt | naiva niravaśeṣamabhidhātumīdṛśaḥ kaścidīṣṭa ityarthaḥ ||
yadyevamānantyāt kārtsnye na vaktuṃ na śakyante, kimidānīṃ kriyatāmityāha—

lg.l: kiṃ tu bījaṃ vikalpānāṃ pūrvāṃcāryaiḥ pradarśitam |

div.p:
kiṃ tvapi tvityarthāntaravivakṣāyāṃ tadāha—bījamityādi | vikalpānāmalaṅkāraprabhedānāṃ jātyupamārūpakādīnāṃ bījaṃ pratiniyataṃ sakalavyaktivyāpi sāmānyaṃ rūpam | yataḥ prabhedā vividhāstadanusṛtāḥ pravartante | pūrvācāryaiścirantanaiḥ kāvyalakṣaṇakāraiḥ medhāviśyāmavādi[prabhṛti]bhiḥ pradarśitam nirdiṣṭaṃ yattadeva nānyat | pratisaṃskartuṃ saṃkṣepeṇa
parisphuṭaṃ yathāvadabhidhātumayaṃ prakṛtaḥ asmākaṃ pariśramo yatno vartate, natu sarvamalaṅkāramabhidhātum | ānantyādaśakteśca | kiṃ tu parimitāḥ kecidalaṅkārāḥ pūrvācāryopadiṣṭāḥ pratisaṃskriyante | tathā ca vakṣyati—
panthāḥ sa eṣa vivṛtaḥ parimāṇavṛtyā |
saṃkṣipyavistaramanantamalaṃkriyāṇām || [2. 267] ityādi
pūrvaṃ śleṣādayaḥ śabdālaṅkārā mārganiyatāḥ kathitāḥ | idānīṃ sarvamārgasādhāraṇā alaṃkārā ucyanta iti darśayannāha—

kāścidalaṃkriyāḥ kecidalaṅkārāḥ śleṣaprasādādayaḥ na sarvāḥ, prāgapi prathame paricchede 'pi uktāḥ śliṣṭā[dayaḥ] na kevalamidānīmucyante | prāk kimarthamuktā ityāha—mārgavibhāgārthamiti | mārgayārvaidarbhagauḍa़īyayorvibhāgo vivekaḥ uktalakṣaṇaḥ arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasmin vacana iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | śleṣādiṣu hi kathiteṣu tatsvabhāvo vaidarbhamārgaḥ pratīyate | tadviparyayasvabhāvaśca goḍa़īya iti śleṣādyalaṅkāravacanāt mārgavibhāgo jāyate | nānyayeti śleṣādivavanaṃ mārgavibhāgārthaṃ sampadyate | kimidānoṃ vācyamityāha—sādhāraṇamityādi | vaidarbhādiṣu sarvamārgeṣu sādhāraṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ na prāgivāsādhāraṇam | alaṅkārajātam arthālaṅkāravṛndam anyat idānīṃ nirūpyate śiṣyata iti ||
yathoddeśaṃ nirdidikṣustāvadalaṅkārānuddiśati—

dīpakamāvṛtirāvṛttiśca auṇādika ikāraḥ | samāsaśca samāsoktiḥ | atiśayaśca atiśayoktiḥ utprekṣā ca | udāttam, apahnutiḥ, śliṣṭam, viśeṣaśca | virodho 'prastuta stotraṃ ca | vyājastutiḥ nidarśanaṃ ca, parivṛttirāśīḥ saṃkīrṇaṃ ca | atha bhāvikaṃ ca ityete yathoktāḥ alaṅkārāḥ uktalakṣaṇāḥ smaryante āmnāyante pūrvasūribhiḥ ādyairācāryaiḥ rāmaśarmādibhiḥ kāvyālaṅkārakāraiḥ | kasyetyāha—vācāmiti | kāvyānāṃ sambandhinaḥ ||
tatra svabhāvoktiṃ tāvannidarśayannāha—

padārthānāṃ vastūnāṃ jātikriyāguṇadravyāṇāṃ rūpaṃ svabhāvam | kiṃviśiṣṭam ? nānāvasthaṃ nānā vicitrā na tvekaiva kācit, avasthā daśā yasya tādṛśamanekaprakāraṃ sākṣāt añjasā abhidhānavyāpāreṇa na tu sāmarthyāt | vivṛṇvatī prakāśayantī satī yā pravartate sā tādṛśyalaṃkṛ[42b]tiḥ | ādyā prathamā alaṅkāreṣviha svabhāvoktirnāma veditavyā, jātirnāma vā | anena saṃjñādvayena ayamalaṅkāro vyavahniyate | svabhāvaṃ padārthānāṃ vicitraṃ vaktīti svabhāvoktiḥ | jāteḥ padārthasvarūpasya tathā tathā pratipādakatvena tādarthyājjātiḥ | yathetyudāharati | yathedaṃ tathānyadapi tādṛśaṃ sarvameva draṣṭavyam | na tvidamevetyarthaḥ | evamuttaratrāpyanugantavyam ||

ete pratyakṣavartinaḥ śukāḥ tuṇḍaiḥ cañcubhiḥ ātāmraiḥ lohitaiḥ, kuṭilaiḥ vakraiśca, pakṣaiśca haritavarṇaiḥ, komalaiḥ mṛdubhiḥ kaṇṭhaiśca, tribhirvarṇaiḥ sitāsitalohitaiḥ rājibhiḥ lakṣitāḥ | mañjarmadhurā gīḥ śabdo yeṣāṃ te mañjugiraḥ | iyaṃ śukajāteḥ padārthasya vicitraṃ svarūpaṃ vaktīti jātisvabhāvoktirīdṛśī draṣṭavyā ||

viśālāḥ śroṇiṣu kṣāmā madhye dīrghā vilocane |
payodharairasaṃkṣiptaistāstu ramyā varastriyaḥ || ityaparamudāhaṇam ||
[kriṃ]yāsvabhāvoktimudāharannāha—

pārāvataḥ priyāṃ pārāvatīṃ cumbati riraṃsū rantukāmaḥ parikṣipya paribhramya kalamavyaktamadhuraṃ kvaṇitaṃ śabdo garbho 'ntarvartī yasmin tena kaṇṭhena lakṣitaḥ | ādhūṇite bhramite īkṣaṇe netre yasya sa tathā | iha kvaṇanāghūrṇanādeḥ kriyāpadārthasya svabhāvaḥ prakāśyata iti kriyāsvabhāvoktirevaṃvidhā vijñeyeti |

vepate śvasiti kā[myatyalaṃ] paśyati roditi |
bibheti harati svāṅgaṃ bālā navasamāgame || ityaparamudāharaṇam ||
guṇasvabhāvoktiṃ nidarśayannāha—

priyāyāḥ praṇayinyāḥ sparśo guṇaḥ pṛthivyādibhūtāśrayatvāt | sa pravartate | katham ? aṅgeṣu priyasya gātreṣu romāñcaṃ romaharṣaṃ badhnan utpādayan manasyantarātmani nirvṛtiṃ kurvannānandamamandaṃ sandadhānaḥ | netre ca priyatamasya dṛśau harṣabharasañcare āmīlayan mukulayanneva | eṣa ityapi pāṭhaḥ | pravartatāmiti prakṛtam | atra sparśākhyasya guṇapadārthasya svarūpaṃ romāñcādi vicitraṃ [43a]nirvṛttamiti guṇasvabhāvoktiriyamevaṃrupāanusartavyeti |

akṣṇorāghūrṇanaṃ vākyaṃ skhaladrāgaṃ kapolayoḥ |
madaḥ karoti nārīṇāṃ bhruvorvalgu ca valgitam || ityaparamudāharaṇam ||
dravyasvabhāvoktimudāharati—

vṛṣadhvajaḥ śaṅkaraḥ āvirāsīt prakāśībabhūva | kaṇṭhe kālaḥ kālakūṭalakṣaṇo yasya kaṇṭhekālo vā saptamyā aluk | indurardhacandraḥ śekhara uttaṃso yasya | karasthena hastavartinā kapālena bhikṣāpātreṇa snigdhābhiraparuṣābhistāmrābhiḥ pāṭalābhirjaṭābhiśca lakṣita iti yojyam | śaṅkarākhyasya dravyasya nānāprakāraṃ svarūpamiṃhopavarṇitamiti dravyapadārthasvabhāvoktiritthambhūtā boddhavyeti |

svedabindumadudbhinnapulakaṃ lolamākulam |
taddarśanādabhūdaṅgamaṅgaṃ tasyā natabhruvaḥ || ityaparamudāharaṇam ||
evaṃ svabhāvoktiṃ pratipādya nigamayannāha—

jātiḥ kriyā guṇo dravyaṃ ca teṣāṃ svabhāvo lakṣaṇaṃ nānāvasthastasyākhyānamākhyāyate 'nenetīdṛśamevaṃjātīyaṃ draṣṭavyamiti śeṣaḥ | kvāsya viniyoga ityāha—śāstreṣvityādi | śāstreṣu ānvīkṣiṃkyādiṣu vidyāsthāneṣu | asyaiva svabhāvākhyānasyālaṅkārasya nānyasyopamādeḥ sāmrājyaṃ prādhānyam, tasyaiva tatra prāyaḥ prayogāt | kāvyeṣvapi sargabandhādiṣvetat svabhāvākhyānamīpsitamiṣṭam, tatrāpi yathāvasaraṃ prayuktasya śobhākaratvāt | apiśabdānna kevalaṃ śāstreṣvityācaṣṭe ||
svabhāvoktyanantaroddiṣṭatvāttannirdeśānantaramupamāṃ vivṛṇavannāha—

lg.l: upamā nāma sā tasyāḥ prapañco 'yaṃ pradarśyate || 14 ||

div.p:
evamuttaratrāpyanusartavyam | yatra viṣaye sādṛśyaṃ padārthayoḥ kayościtsāmyaṃ yathākathañcit yena kenacit prakāreṇa, guṇādinā sarvathā sāmyasya durlabhatvāt | tattve[caikya]-
prasaṅgāt | pratīyate gamyate śabdādarthato vā yathāsambhavam | nanu rūpake 'pi sādṛśyaṃ pratīyata iti lakṣaṇasaṃkara iti cedāha—udbhūtamiti | vyaktam, bhedasya parisphuṭatvādupamānopame[43b]yayoḥ | rūpake tu tattvāropa ityasaṅkaraḥ | ata eva vakṣyati—upamaiva tirobhūtabhedā rūpakamiṣyate || [2.66] iti | sā sādṛśyoktirupamānāmālaṃkriyā veditavyā | upamitiḥ sādharmyakathanamupameti kṛtvā | tasyā evaṃlakṣaṇāyāḥ ayaṃ prastutaḥ prapañcaḥ vicitraḥ prabhedaḥ pradarśyate udāhriyate ||

mugdhe bāle ! priyāmantraṇa[metat |] tava karatalaṃ hastoparibhāgaḥ ātāmramaruṇam | kimiva ? ambhoruhamiva kamalamiva itīyamevaṃjātīyā dharmopamā jñeyā | kutaḥ ? karatalāmbhoruhayordvayoḥ samānasya dharmasya guṇasyātāmralakṣaṇasya nidarśanāt pratipādanāt kāraṇāt | katham ? sākṣādvācakavyāpāreṇātāmrapadaprayogāt, na tvarthāt | tataḥ śabdopāttatvāt sādhāraṇasya dharmasya | tenaiveyaṃ vyapadiśyate nānyathā, tathā vivakṣitatvāt ||

lg.l: rājīvamiva te vaktraṃ netre nīlotpale iva |

div.p: te tava vaktraṃ mukhaṃ rājīvamiva padmamiva, netre cakṣuṣī nīlotpale iveti evaṃvidhā yā sā vastūpamaiva | dharmiṇa eva sākṣādādānāt | tenaivaṃ vyapadiśyate | na dharmeṇa tasya sākṣādagrahaṇāt | kathaṃ tarhi tadavasāya ityāha—pratīyamānetyādi | pratīyamānasya upāttasya vastuno rājīvādestadavyabhicārādarthād gamyamāna ekaḥ samāno dharmaḥ kāntyādilakṣaṇo guṇo yasyāḥ | seyamīdṛśī vastūpameti prakṛtam ||

unnidraṃ vikasitamaravindaṃ padmaṃ tavānanaṃ mukhamivābhūt | īdṛśī yā sādṛśyoktiḥ sā viparyāsopameṣyate kavibhiḥ | padmamupamānamupameyaṃ mukhamiti yā prasiddhiḥ nirụdhistasyāḥ viparyāsād vaiparītyāt kāraṇāt | padmasyopameyīkaraṇāt vaktrasyopamānīkṛteḥ tato viparyāsopamaivedṛśī draṣṭavyā | kāntyādiviśeṣaścānanamyātra kaścid vivakṣita iti gamyate | anyathā kiṃ viparyāseneti ||

tavānanamivāmbhojaṃ padmam | ambhojamiva te tava mukhamiti | evaṃ jātīyā anyonyopameṣyate | anyonyasya parasparasya mukhasyāmbhojasya cānyonyena tenaiva dvayena upamānāt sāmyakathanāt | sā ceyamanyonyasya mukhasyāmbhojasya cotkarṣaṃ viśeṣaṃ kāntyādilakṣaṇaṃ śaṃsati prakāśayati | anyonyenaivetad dvayaṃ samānaṃ [44a]nānyena kenaciditi dvayoratiśayaḥ kaścidavasīyata iti | anena
upamānopameyatvaṃ yatra paryāyato bhavet |
upameyopamāṃ nāma bruvate tāṃ yathoditām || [kāvyālaṅkāre 3.37] iti pareṣṭopameyopamā pṛthagupamāyāmantarbhāvitā ||

tava mukhaṃ kamalenaiva tulyam | nānyena kenacit kamalavyatiriktena vastuneti | evaṃvidhā yā sādṛśyoktiḥ seyaṃ niyamopamā kathyate | niyamasya sākṣādupādānāt | yadāha—anyasāmyavyāvṛtteriti | kamalādanyena kenacidvastunā sāmyasya sādṛśyasya vyāvṛttervyavacchedāt kāraṇāt | tenaiva ca niyamena vyapadiśyate, nānyatheti ||

tava mukhaṃ katṛ padmaṃ karmabhūtam | anvetyanugacchati padmena tulyaṃ tāvat | etanniścitam | vācoyuktau vā | anyaccāparamapi kiñcidvastu tādṛśaṃ padmasamam | tatkāri tvanmukhānvayakāri tvadānanasyopamānamasti cet yadi bhavet, astu bhavatu na vāryata iti evaṃrūpā yāsau tādṛśī aniyamopamā smaryate tajjñaiḥ | padmenaiva tulyamityasya niyamasyānapekṣaṇāt, anyasyāpi tādṛśasyābhyanujñānāditi ||

kvacidekatra kriyādāvanekapadārthātisarjanaṃ samuccayaḥ | tanmukhenopamā samuccayopamāpyasti vakṣyamāṇā, na kevalaṃ pūrvāktāḥ | kīdṛśī ? tava mukhaṃ kartṛbhūtamindumanvetyanugacchati | na kāntyaiva na saumyatvena guṇena kevalena, kiṃ tu hlādanākhyena prīṇanena ca karmaṇā kriyayā anveti īdṛśī evaṃprakārāvasthayā hlādanamityākhyā saṃjñā yasya karmaṇa iti vigrahaḥ | kāntyā hlādakatvena ca tvanmukhamindunopamīyata ityartha iti ||

lg.l: tvayyeva tvanmukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate divi candramāḥ |

div.p: tava mukhaṃ tvayyeva bhavatyāmeva dṛṣṭam, na divi | candramāścandrastu divi nabhasyeva dṛśyate, na tvayi | iyatyeva parimāṇabhinnāśrayatāmātralakṣaṇā bhidā bhedo vidyate nānyā kācid etadvyatiriktā | anyathā sarvathā sāmyamevānayorityanekabhedasambhave api atiśayasyedṛśasya vivakṣayā kavinānayoḥ sāmyakathanātiśayaparatvenātiśayopamā ākhyāyata iti ||

yasyā mṛgadṛśo mukhaśrīrvadanakāntirmayyeva vartate, nānyatretyevaṃrūpairvikatthanaiḥ ślāghayā 'lam | kṛtamindoścandrasya | [44b] na vikatthanīyamitthamindunā | kimiti ? yad yasmāt | sā mukhaśrīḥ padme 'pi na kevalamindau | astyeva na nāsti | ityutprekṣayā asato 'pi tathāvikatthanasyādhyāsena vadanamindunopamīyata iti | utprekṣitopamaivāsau tādṛśī veditavyeti ||

uddhṛte bhruvau vibhrānte ca locane yasmin | tattādṛśaṃ kiñcit kimapi yadi bhavet kvacit tadīdṛśaṃ te tava sundari mukhaśriyaṃ dhattāṃ na niṣidhyate | kiṃ tvāścaryamidaṃ durlabhamīdṛśamiti | abhūtodbhāvanena vadanapadmenopamīyata iti | asāviyamevaṃbhūtā adbhutopamā jñātavyeti ||

tanvaṅgīti priyāmantraṇam | ayamasau śaśī candra iti tava mukhamutprekṣya adhyavasāya candrabuddhyānudhāvāmi | na kevalameṣā bhrāntiḥ | kiṃ tu tvanmukhāśayā tavānanamidamiti tvadvadanabuddhyā indumapyanudhāvāmīti anugacchāmi | ayamaparo viparyāsaḥ | ityevaṃ mohena bhrāntyā candramukhayorupamānopameyabhāvapratītiriti | eṣā iyamīdṛśī mohopamākhyāyata iti ||

lg.l: kiṃ padmamantarbhrāntāli kiṃ te lolekṣaṇaṃ mukham |

div.p: antarbhrāntau alo bhramarau yasmin tadīdṛśaṃ padmaṃ kimidam | lole cale īkṣaṇe locane yasmin tādṛśaṃ vā tavedaṃ mukham | iti mama cittaṃ mano dolāyate dolevācarati | evaṃ padmadvayaparigrahāt saṃśeta ityarthaḥ | itīyamīdṛśī saṃśayāveśena padmamukhenaupamyāvagamāt saṃśayopamā pratīyata iti ||

padmasya dyutiḥ kāntiḥ indorlajjākarī na bhavati | nenduṃ hnepayatītyarthaḥ | kiṃ viśiṣṭasya indunā nigrāhyasya abhibhavanīyasya | tadudaye saṅkocāt | idamatra kāraṇam yadi tu padmamidamabhaviṣyat, nendumahrepayiṣyat | hrepayati ca | atovasīyate tava mukha-
mevedaṃ tasyaiva tādṛśatvāt na padmamiti | asāviyamevaṃvidhā nirṇayopamā vijñāyate mukhamidaṃ na padmamiti niścayamukhenopamāvagamāditi ||

tava vaktramambhojamiva śiśirāṃśoścandrasya prati[45a]dvandvi pratyanīkaṃ mukhasya tatsamānakāntitvāt | ambhojasya ca tadudaye saṅkocabhajanāt | śabdaśleṣaḥ | śrīmat kāntiyuktaṃ mukhamambhojaṃ ca śrīrdevatā tatra vasatīti śruteḥ | ayamapi śabdaśleṣaḥ | ubhayorapi kāntiyogādarthaśleṣo vā | surabhiriṣṭo gandho 'syeti surabhigandhi dvayamapītyarthaśleṣaḥ | cakāraḥ samuccaye | ityevaṃ śleṣaparigrahaṇe candravaktrayorupamāprayogāt śleṣopamaivedṛśī mateti |

iyamudyānamālā pramadavanarājirbāleva strīva | kathaṃ ? sālakānanaśobhinī | bālā tāvat sahālakena keśasanniveśaviśeṣeṇa vartate yat sālakamānanaṃ tena śobhate sālakānanaśobhinī | udyānamālāpiṃ sālānāṃ vṛkṣaviśeṣāṇāṃ kānanena vanena śobhate | evaṃrūpā yā sā tādṛśī samānopamā samākhyāyate | kutaḥ sarūpeṇa sadṛśena svarūpato nārthataḥ tasya bhedāt, yathoktamanantaram | śabdena sālakānanaśobhinītyevaṃvidhena vācyatvāt, prakāśyatvāt tasyā iti gamyate | yatheti nidarśane | nanu śleṣopamaiveyaṃ, sālakānanaśobhinīti śabdaśleṣāt | sā ca pūrvamuktā, tatkimanayā ? ko vā tayorbhedaḥ ? ucyate | pūrvaṃ śleṣāprayoge 'pyupamā gamyate | ambhojamiva te vaktramiti śleṣānuvedhādṛte vyāpadiśyate | iha tu śleṣānutprekṣāyāmupamaiva nāvasīyate | bālevodyānamāleti | śleṣābhidhāna eva kevalamavagamyate sālakānanaśobhinīti | atastādṛśena śabdeneyamucyate | ata evāha—sarūpaśabdavācyatvāditi | tataḥ samānopamaiveyamākhyāyate, na śleṣopametyalaṃ prapañcena ||

bahūni rajāṃsi pāṃsavo yasmin iti | candraḥ kṣayī kṣayo 'pacayo 'syeti | tābhyāmevaṃbhūtābhyāṃ padmacandrābhyāṃ kāntyādinā samānaṃ tulyamapi sattavānanaṃ sotsekamutkarṣayuktaṃ prativiśiṣṭaṃ vartate | rajaḥśabdasya doṣe 'pi vṛtteḥ | bahurajastvasya śabdalakṣaṇena doṣarūpasya kṣayitvasya ca tatrābhāvāt, evaṃvidhā nindopamā matā smṛtā | kathañciṃnninditena padmā[45b]dinopamāvastuna ānanasya vivakṣitotkarṣatvāt ||

yo viśvaṃ sṛjati tasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ sraṣṭurudbhavatyasmādityudbhavaḥ padma ityatiśaye apiśabdaḥ | nārāyaṇanābhinalinayoniḥ pitāmaha [iti] śruṃteḥ | candraḥ śambhoḥ śaṅkarasya śirasā maulinā dhṛtaḥ | tāvevaṃ ślāghanīyau padmacandrau tava mukhena tulyau kāntyāpi sādharmyeṇa tābhyāṃ tasyopamitestena tulyau bhavataḥ | evaṃvidhā yā sā praśaṃsopameṣyate, yathoktaviśeṣayogena praśaṃsāspadābhyāṃ padmacandrābhyāmānanasyopamānāditi ||

lg.l: sa guṇo vāstu doṣo vetyācikhyāsopamā matā || 32 ||

div.p:
tava mukhaṃ candreṇa tulyamityevamākhyātumicchati mama manaḥ kartṛ | nanu candraḥ kṣayādidūṣitaḥ, mukhaṃ tvakhaṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ tatkimevamucyata iti cet—satyaṃ yadāha—sa ityādi | so 'yaṃ, candramukhayostulyatāvādaḥ guṇo vāstu [ucito] vā bhavatu, doṣo vāstu anucito vā bha[vatu] | nedṛśaṃ vimarśamapekṣate me, manaḥ | kevalamabhidhātumabhilaṣatīti | evamācikhyāsāmukhena, sādṛśyaprakāśanādācikhyāsopametīdṛśī mateṣṭeti | nindopamādyudāharaṇena cānena
yaduktaṃ triprakāratvaṃ tasyāḥ kaiścinmahātmabhiḥ |
nindāpraśaṃsācikhyāsābhedāt tatrābhidhīyate ||
sāmānyaguṇanirdeśāt trayamapyuditaṃ nanu |
mālopamādi tatsarvaṃ na jyāyān vistaro vṛthā || [kāvyālaṅkāra 2. 37-38]
iti matāntaraṃ nirastam | evaṃ hi—
samānavastunyāsena prativastūmapeṣyate |
yathevānabhidhāne 'piṃ guṇasāmyapratītitaḥ || [kāvyālaṅkāre 2. 34] ityādinā pratiṃvastūpamādirapi kathaṃ na vṛthā syāt, sāmānyaguṇanirdeśenaiva gatārthatvāt ? arthaprapañcārthametadiṣyate [cet,] tadiṃhāpi samānamiti yatkiñcidetat ||

śatapatraṃ padmaṃ śaradi candraḥ tavānanamityetad vastutrayaṃ trayo 'vayavā asyeti | paraspareṇānyonyena saha parasparasya vā virodhiṃ pratidvandvi samānaguṇatvāt, kāntyādiviśeṣaṇayogāt | ityevaṃvidhā yā sā virodhodbhāvanena sādharmyavarṇanād virodhopamā mateti ||

tava mukhena saha pratigarjituṃ sparddhāṃ kartumindoḥ | na jātu na ka[46a]dācidapi śaktiḥ sāmarthyamasti | kalaṅkino jaḍasya kalaṅkitvāt jaḍatvāccetyarthaḥ | kalaṅko mṛgalāñchanalakṣaṇo doṣaḥ | jāḍyaṃ śaityamakauśalaṃ ceti śabdacchalena doṣoktiḥ | mukhaṃ tu niṃṣkalaṅkaṃ vidagdhaṃ ceti | kathamanena [sa]dṛśaṃ iti niṣedhadvāreṇa sādharmyāvagamāt | pratiṣedhopamaiva sā yā īdṛśīti ||

tanvi ! tava vaktraṃ mṛgasyekṣaṇamekadeśo 'tyantasāmyenābhedavivakṣayā aṅkaścihnaṃ yasya tattathā | śaśī tu mṛgeṇaiva sakalenāṅkito lakṣitaḥ tataścādhikyaṃ śaśinaḥ prāptaṃ tathāpi nādhikaḥ | notkarṣī | kiṃ tu sama eva mukhenāsau śaśī | ityevaṃ caṭunā priyālāpaprakāreṇedṛśena sādṛśyaprakāśanāt caṭūpamedṛśī draṣṭavyeti ||

lg.l: na padmaṃ mukhamevedaṃ na bhṛṅgau cakṣuṣī ime |

div.p: padmamukhayorbhṛṅgacakṣuṣośca vispaṣṭaṃ parisphuṭaṃ yatsādṛśyaṃ kāntiṃcañcalatvādilakṣaṇaṃ, tasmādabhedaśaṅkāpūrvakamevaṃvidhamucyate | na padmametat kiṃ | tu mukhamevedam | etau cātra [na] bhṛṅgau, kiṃ tarhi ? cakṣuṣī ime | ityevaṃrūpā yā sā tattvākhyānopamā khyātā | padmādīnāmaviparītasya rūpasya paridīpanena sāmyāvasāyāt |

nirṇayopamāyā asyāśca ko bheda ? ubhayatrāpi tattvaniścayāviśeṣāt | yadyapi tattvaniścayastulyaḥ, tathāpi saṃśayacchedena niścayaḥ, iha tu viparyāsanirāseneti mahān bhedaḥ | anyatrāpyevaṃ kvacit kathañcit apekṣāviśeṣād vyākhyeyo bheda iti ||

candrasyāravindasya ca kakṣyāṃ padavīṃ tulyatām atikramya avadhūya tayoravakarṣāt | ātmanā svarūpeṇaiva tulyam abhavat, ananyasāmānyaguṇayogāt | ityevaṃrūpāsādhāraṇatābhidhānadvāreṇa sādṛśyapratīteḥ asādhāraṇopamā nigadyata iti ||

kvacit ekatrasthāne samāhṛtaḥ pracitaḥ sarveṣāṃ padmānāṃ prabhāsvabhāvaḥ sāro hṛdayamiva tavānanaṃ vibhātītyevaṃ bhūtā yā tāmabhūtopamāṃ viduḥ smaranti tadvidaḥ | abhūtenāsanā kvacit samāhṛtena sarvapadmaprabhāsāreṇa ānanasyopamiteriti ||

mañjubhāṣiṇi ! itaḥ tava vaktrāt ekāntamadhurāt vāka bhāratī paruṣā niṣṭhurā niṣkrāmati candrabimbāt amṛtamayāt viṣamiva candanācca ekāntaśiśiṃrāt pāvakaḥ
agniriva | naitatsaṃbhāvyata iti asambhāvanābhiprāyeṇa sārūpyanirūpaṇāt asambhāvitopamaivedṛśī dṛśyeti ||

varāṅgi ! tava sparśaḥ spṛśyate 'sāviti candanodakaṃ candrāṃśuḥ candrakāntaśca maṇiviśeṣaḥ | ādigrahaṇena anyasyāpi himādeḥ śītavastunaḥ parigrahaḥ | tadvat śītalaḥ śiśira ityevaṃ bahubhirupamānāt bahūpameyamīdṛśī | nanvekenāpi śaityapratīteḥ kiṃ bahubhirityāha—atiśayaṃ prathayantīti | atiśayaṃ priyāsparśasya śaityagatamutkarṣaṃ kamapi prakāśayantī pravartate | tato bahūpādānamīdṛśaṃ vivakṣitamiti bahūpamopakalpyata iti ||

tanvaṅgi ! tava vadanam indubimbādutkīrṇam nirmāyotkṣiptamiva, padmagarbhāt ambhoruhakuharāt uddhṛtamiva, sṛṣṭidvāreṇa utkīrṇamiva kāntisarvasvamayatvāt | ityevaṃrūpā yā asau tādṛśī vikriyopamā iṣyate | candrādivikāraviśeṣaparigraheṇa upamānopameyabhāvodbhāvanāditi ||

pūṣṇi sūryātapaḥ prakāśaviśeṣo yathā lakṣmīmadhāt, sa ca pūṣā vāsare yathā, so 'pi vāsaro yathā vyomni ākāśe lakṣmīmadhāditi prakṛtaṃ, tathā tvayi rājani vikramaḥ śauryaṃ lakṣmīṃ śriyamadhāt akṛta | ityevamupamāvastūnāṃ paurvāparyeṇa ghaṭanāt mālopamāyāḥ kramaḥ prakāro 'yamīdṛśaḥ pratipattavya iti ||

vākyasyārthaḥ kriyākārakasambandhaviśeṣaḥ | tenaiva padārthamātreṇa vākyārtha uktalakṣaṇaḥ ko 'pi vivakṣitaḥ kaścit yadyupamīyate sadṛśaḥ kathyate, sā sādṛśī vākyārthopamā matā | sā ca dvidhā bhidyate | katham ? eko 'nekaśca ivaśabdaḥ sādṛśyasūcako yatra tadbhāvastattvaṃ tasmin | kāraṇāttasmāditi gamyate ||

tvadā[47a]nanam adhīre lole akṣiṇī yatra | āvirbhṛtā daśanadīdhitayo dantakāntayo yasmin tadīdṛśaṃ bhātīti | evaṃ tāvad vākyamupameyabhūtam | kimivetyāha—bhramantau bhramarau yasminnālakṣyāṇi [īṣat]prakaṭāni kesarāṇi yatra tādṛśaṃ paṅkajamiveti dvitīyaṃ vākyamupamābhūtamiyamekevaśabdā vākyārthopamā boddhavyeti ||
anekevaśabdānnidarśayannāha—

tasyāstanvaṅgyāḥ kasyāścidiṣṭāyā ānanaṃ pāyaṃ pāyam abhīkṣṇaṃ pītvā niṣevya mayā aramyata krīḍa़itamiti upameyārthamekaṃ vākyaṃ tāvannalinyā iva padmamiva madhuvrateneveti dvitīyamupamārūpaṃ vākyamiyamanekevaśabdā vākyārthopamā jñātavyeti ||

kiñcid vivakṣitaṃ puruṣādi vastu upakṣipya upanyasya tenopanyastena vastunā sadharmaṇastulyasya vastuno 'nyasya nyasanāt abhidhānāddhetoḥ sāmyasya tayordvayoḥ sādṛśyasya pratītiḥ avasāyo 'sti iti hetoḥ prativastūpamā īdṛśī iṣyate, prativastunā tathāvidhena arthāntareṇa prastutasya vastunastulyatāpratipatteḥ | yathetyudāharati ||

jagati ciramārabhya jāyamāneṣu rājasu madhye tvādṛśaḥ tvamiva guṇavān eko 'pi rājā, prāgevānekaḥ | adyāpi na vidyate na kevalaṃ prāk, ityevaṃ tāvad vastūpanyastametat | nanvityādinā prativastūpanyāsaḥ | nanvityanumatau | pārijātasya divyavṛkṣaviśeṣasya dvitīyaḥ samānaḥ pādapo nāstyeva | yathā pārijāta eko vṛkṣajātiṣūttamaḥ tathā tvaṃ rājasviti dvayoḥ sāmyapratītirastīti yojyam ||

lg.l: yad bruvanti smṛtā seyaṃ tulyayogopamā yathā || 48 ||

div.p: adhikena kenacit jātyādinā hīnaṃ kiñcidekasyāḥ kriyāyā vidhau sampādane samīkṛtya samānīkṛtya bruvanti prayuñcate kavayo yat | sāmānyoktiriyaṃ yaditi | yadvedṛśaṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ tat ? seyamīdṛśī tulyayogopamā smṛteti viśeṣaḥ | ekakriyāsambaddhasya dvayoḥ sādhāraṇatvāt taddvāreṇa upamā tulyayogopamā | yathetyudāharati ||

pulomāriḥ devarājaḥ pramādanidrāvigamāt jā[47b]garti kāryeṣvavadhatte | kimartham ? divaḥ svargalokasya rakṣāyai paripālanārtham | bhuvaḥ pṛthivyā rakṣāyai bhavān vivakṣitaḥ kaścinnareśvaro jāgartītyutprekṣyam | tena pulomāriṇā sāvalepā dṛptā asurā hanyante, tvayā ca nṛpāḥ sāvalepā hanyante | atra devarājasya adhikasya nṛpasya ca kasyacit tadapekṣayā jātyādinā hīnasya rakṣādyekakriyāyogastulya iti taddvāreṇa tayoḥ sāmyāvagatestulyayogopamā īdṛśī draṣṭavyeti ||

lg.l: kāntyā candramasaṃ dhāmna sūryaṃ dhairyeṇa cārṇavam |

div.p: rājannityāmantraṇam | kāntyā saumyatayā candramasam anukaroṣi | tena tulyo 'sītyarthaḥ | dhāmnā tejasā sūryamanukaroṣi | dhairyeṇa sthityā arṇavaṃ sāgaramanukaroṣi | evaṃvidhā yā saiṣā tādṛśī hetūpamā smṛtā tajjñaiḥ | kāntyādihetūpanyāsena sāmyapratīteriti ||

kathamatra vyavasthā ? kimavaśyamupamānopameyayorekaliṅgatvam, abhinnavacanatā
ca ? anyathāpītyatrāha—

lg.l: na liṅgavacane bhinne na hīnādhikatāpi vā |

div.p: liṅgamidaṃ prasiddhamaṅgasanniveśādilakṣaṇaṃ strītvādi | vacanamekavacanādi | te dve bhinne vijātīye | hīnatopamāvastuno jātyādinā adhikatāpi vā | sarvametat upamāyāṃ dūṣaṇāya virodhārthaṃ nālaṃ na samarthamityutsargaḥ | tatrāpavādamāha—yatretyādi | yatra kvacid viṣaye dhīmatāṃ kavīnāmudvego 'prītirasammatirna bhavati tādṛśi prahate prayogamārge nāyaṃ doṣaḥ | yastvaprahato 'śiṣṭo viṣayaḥ tatrāyaṃ doṣa ityarthāduktaṃ bhavati | taṃ ca darśayiṣyatīti ||
tadudāharati—

lg.l: strīva gacchati ṣaṇḍo 'yaṃ vaktyeṣā strī pumāniva |
prāṇā iva priyo 'yaṃ me vidyā dhanamivārjitā || 52 ||

div.p: ayaṃ ṣaṇḍaḥ ṣaṇḍakaḥ strīva gacchati tacceṣṭānuvṛtteḥ | eṣā strī pumāniva puruṣa iva vakti tādṛśaprāgalbhyayogāt | atra liṅganānātvamupamānopameyayoḥ | ayaṃ vivakṣitaḥ kaścinmama priya iṣṭaḥ prāṇā iva | vidyā vyākaraṇādayaḥ arjitā dhanamiveti vacanabhedaḥ | evaṃvidhe samucite viṣaye liṅgavacanabhedo nopamāṃ dūṣayati | pratyuta rasāvaha iti ||
hīnādhikatāmudāharannāha—

mahīpāletyāmantraṇam | bhavāniva devarājo virājata iti | hīnenādhika[48a]upamīyate | ayaṃ nṛpo vivakṣitaḥ kaścit | aṃśumataḥ sūryasya kakṣāṃ padavīṃ samatām ārọdhumalaṃ śaktaḥ | tejasā hetuneti | adhikena hīna upamitaḥ | atyantabhadratāmekāntatejasvitāṃ ca pratītāmāśritya ayamevaṃvidhaḥ prayogaḥ | tathā bhāvanāyāṃśobhata ityavaseyam ||
tadīdṛśaṃ sarvaṃ sundaramiti darśayati—

lg.l: asti ca kvacidudvegaḥ prayoge vāgvidāṃ yathā || 54 ||

div.p: ityevamanantaroktaṃ lakṣmamādiryasyānyasyāpi tajjātīyasya lakṣyajātasya tad [varṇanaṃ] na jātucit na kadācidapi saubhāgyaṃ śobhāṃ jahāti tyajatyeva | sadaiva subhagamīdṛśamityarthaḥ | bhinnaliṅgavacanādi kiñcidudvegakaraṃ vipaścitāmiti kathayatikvacit prayoge lakṣye na sarvatra | udvege vaimukhyamanādaraḥ | asti, ca na kevalaṃ nāsti | vāgvidāṃ śabdahṛdayajñānāṃ kavīnām | yathetyudāharati ||

lg.l: bhartṛbhakto bhaṭaḥ śveva khadyoto bhāti bhānuvat || 55 ||

div.p: haṃsīva dhavalaścandra iti liṅgabhedaḥ | sarāṃsīvāmalaṃ nabha iti vacanabhedaḥ | bhartṛbhakto bhaṭaḥ śveveti hīnena jātyādinā adhika upamitaḥ | khadyoto jyotiriṅgaṇaḥ bhāti bhānuvat ityadhikena hīna upamīyata iti ||
evaṃvidhaṃ heyamiti darśayati—

lg.l: īdṛśaṃ varjyate sadbhiḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra cintyatām |

div.p: īdṛśam itthaṃmūtaṃ sadbhiḥ kavibhirucitavidvadbhiḥ varjyate nādriyate | niyataṃ tāvadetat | kiṃ kāraṇamiti cet ? atredṛśasya varjane kāraṇaṃ tu nimittaṃ punaḥ kiñcit svayameva cintyatāṃ nirūpyatām | nātrāsmākamabhiniveśaḥ | ayamāśayaḥ | īdṛśamaśiṣṭeṣṭamapratītaṃ na saubhāgyabhājanam | ataścodvegakaratvād varjyate | na ca te paryanuyogamarhanti, pramāṇatvāt sarvathā teṣām | kevalaṃ tatprayogamārgaḥ prakṛtisubhago 'smābhiranugamyate | yadi punastairādriyeta, ke vayaṃ varjayitum ? subhagameva tadedṛśaṃ tallakṣaṇatvādiha saubhāgyasyeti | tathā ca va[kṣya]te śiṣṭeṣṭastu na duṣyatīti [3.148] | itthaṃ caitadudvejanīyam |

lg.l: candro haṃsa ivābhāti nabhaḥ sara ivāmalam |
bhaṭo bandhuriva snigdha khadyoto bhāti dīpavat ||

div.p:
pratītamīdṛśaṃ sadā tatsamucita[manu]dvejanīyameva, tadviparyayāttu pūrvakamarañjakam | anena [48b] ca sarveṇa—
hīnatā 'sambhavo liṅgavacobhedau viparyayaḥ |
upamānādhikatvaṃ ca tenāsadṛśatāpi ca ||
ta eta upamādoṣāḥ sapta medhāvinoditāḥ | [kāvyālaṅkāre 2. 39–40] iti matāntaramanaikāntīkṛtam |
yadyapyupamānopameyabhūtaṃ vastu candramukhādiśabdavācyam, tathāpi ivādiśabdavyatirekeṇa sādṛśyamabhivyakti na yātīti tadabhivyañjakān śabdān vyavahāraṃ vyutpattaye darśayannāha—

lg.l: tasya muṣṇāti saubhāgyaṃ tasya kāntiṃ vilumpati |
tatpadavyāṃ padaṃ dhatte tasya kakṣāṃ vigāhate |

div.p: ivaśca vacca yathā ca te śabdāśceti vigrahaḥ | samānanibhasannibhāḥ pūrvavaccārthaḥ | śabdā iti vakṣyamāṇamapekṣya puṃstvamiti || tulyādiṣvapyanantaro[kteṣu tathaiva] vācyamiti | sadṛśādikamapi pūrvavat sugamamiti || salakṣaṇādīnāmapi saiva rītiḥ || ādiśabdena bahujādiparigrahaḥ |

ayaṃ kuṇālo bahusāgaraḥ priyaḥ [?] ityādi ca lakṣyamālakṣyamiti || savarṇetyādi | ye cānyūnaṃ samamarthaṃ vadanti sadharmasādhāraṇasacchāyādayo 'nuktāḥ te 'pi śabdāḥ sādṛśyasūcina ityavekṣaṇīyam | śaśāṅka iva vadanaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā | ādi śabdenotpalākṣyādiparigrahaḥ | teṣu prayogeṣu samāsaśca bahuvrīhiranyapadārthaḥ | sādṛśyasūcaka ityapekṣamiti || sparddhata ityādi sugamamiti | ete sarve śabdā yathoktāḥ sādṛśyam upamānopameyayoḥ sāmyaṃ sūcayanti vyañjayantīti sādṛśyasūcinaḥ pratipattavyā iti upamāprapañcaḥ ||
rūpakaṃ nirūpayannāha—

upamaiva yathoktalakṣaṇā rūpakamiṣyate tajjñaiḥ | na kaścit tarhi viśeṣaḥ tayornāmamātraṃ bhidyata ityāha—tirobhūtabhedeti | tirobhūto 'prakaṭo bhedo nānātvam upamānopa-
meyayorabhedāropaṇāt yasyāṃ tathābhūtā satī rūpakaṃ nāma alaṅkāraḥ kalpyata iti bhedodbhavābhibhavaprabhāvitaṃ nānātvam anayorvyañjanena śabdābhedamātraṃ rūpayati | upamā[nopameyayo]rabhedamāropayati iti rūpakam | yathetyudāharati—bāhurlatātulyo latārūpeṇa nirūpyate ityabhedāropaḥ | tirohito bhedaḥ | natūdbhedaḥ | bāhurlate eveti [49a] | pāṇireva padmaṃ caraṇa eva pallavamityabhedādhyāsaḥ pūrvavaditi ||

he vasantaśrīḥ kusumāgamalakṣmīḥ ! tvaṃ bhavatī naḥ asmākam pratyakṣe 'rthasākṣātkāriṇi jñāne carasi pratibhāsi | na parokṣavartinī | pratyakṣaṃ yathā bhavati tathā carasīti kriyāviśeṣaṇopapadādvā kriyārthādvidhiḥ | kathayāmi tāvat pallavāni kisalayasampadastāni tāmratādestavāṅgulya āsan abhūvan adṛśyanta iti yāvat | yāni cemāni pallavasaṅgatāni kusumāni tāni tava nakhārciṣaḥ kararuharucayaḥ śauklyādinā, late ca dve vivakṣiṃte kecit tava bāhu[bhūte] mārdavādeḥ | iti pratyakṣāṅgatvāt tvaṃ naścākṣuṣī | yadvā, varāṅgi ! pra[tyakṣa]cāriṇī vasantaśrīstvamevāsmākam, kimanyayā apratyakṣayā | yāstavāṅgulya[stāḥ] pallavānyāsan | nakhārciṣaśca kusumāni | bāhū te late | tatastvaṃ naścākṣuṣī pratyakṣā vasantaśrīḥ | śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ||
kiṃ nāmedaṃ vyavahriyata ityāha—

ityetadīdṛśam asa[ma]stamityākhyā saṃjñā yasyetyasamastākhyaṃ vyastaṃ nāma rūpakaṃ pratipattavyam, upamānopameyarorakṛtasamāsatvāt | yatra samāsaḥ | tat kimākhyāyate ? pūrvarūpakaṃ bāhū latetyādi | kṛtasamāsaṃ prathamamudāharaṇam | samastaṃ tādṛśaṃ veditavyam, samāsayogāt | mukhamivendurmukhenduriti samastam | smitaṃ līlāhasitaṃ jyotsnā candriketi vyastam | ataśca samastaṃ tad vyastaṃ ceti samastavyastaṃ nāmedṛśaṃ rūpakamavagantavyamiti ||

rājan, bhavataścaraṇa eva paṅkajaṃ bhūpālaiḥ dhriyate dhāryate mūrdhni śirasi | kimbhūtam ? tāmrāṅgulayo dalaśreṇiḥ patrapaṃktiryasya | nakhānāṃ dīdhitayaḥ kiraṇāḥ kesarāṇi yatra tādṛśaṃ dhriyate iti prakṛtam ||
katamadetadrūpakamityāha—

etadanantaroktamīdṛśaṃ sakalarūpakam ākhyāyate | sakalasyāṅginaḥ pādasyāṅgasya cāṅgulyādīnāṃ rūpaṇāt | aṅgulirādiryasyā nakhadīdhitestatra dalamādiryasya kesarasya tasya bhāvaḥ tattvaṃ tadāropya ityaṅgarūpa[49b]ṇamuktam | pāde ca padmatāmāropya upacaryeti aṅgirūpaṇaṃ tasyedṛśasya padmasya yogyamucitam | sthīyate iti sthānam ādhāro mūrddhā tatra vinyāsāt niveśanāt | sakalarūpakametaditi prakṛtam ||

caṇḍi kopane ! te tava mukhaṃ sphuritādharapallavaṃ sphuritaḥ kopakampanaḥ adharaḥ tāmratādeḥ pallavo yasyeti | gharmāmbhaḥkaṇāḥ praṇayakopajanmānaḥ svedabindava eva mañjayaḥ kusumastabakāḥ śauklyādinā | yadāha—muktāruca iti | muktānāṃ rucayo dīptayo yāsāṃ tā dhatte | akasmādeva vinā vyalīkena kenacit tādṛśena, ko 'yamasthānakopa iti ||
kataradetat rūpakamityāha—

dharmāmbu mañjarītvena parikalpya | adharaṃ caikadeśaṃ pallavīkṛtya pallavo 'yamiti rūpayitvā | āsyaṃ mukham aṅgi anyathā naḥkṛtam | padmāditvena na rūpitamatra prayoge |
ataḥ kāraṇādavayavarūpakamīdṛśamavayavasyādharāde rūpaṇāditi ||

valgite ārecite bhruvau | galacca gharmajalam | ālohite ca īkṣaṇe yatra tadidaṃ vadanaṃ paṅkajaṃ madasya madhupānajanitasya harṣaviśeṣasya avasthām īdṛśavikāralīlājanitalakṣaṇāṃ daśāṃ vivṛṇoti prakāśayatīti ||
kimetad rūpakamucyate ityāha—
mukhasya aṅginaḥ aṅgāni avayavān netrādīn avikṛtya rūpayitvā mukhamevāṅgi aravindatāṃ gamitamāsīt padmatvena rūpitam | atra lakṣye | ato 'vayavirūpakamidamīdṛśam, avayavina eva rūpitatvāditi ||

lg.l: mukhena mugdhe ! so 'pyeṣa jano rāgamayaḥ kṛtaḥ || 75 ||

div.p: madena pāṭalau gaṇḍau kapolau rakte ca netre utpale yatra tena te mukhena so 'pyeṣa jano yaḥ tvatprasādaikavṛttiḥ paramukhenātmānamāha kaścitkāmuko rāgamayo rāgavikāraḥ kimapi raktaḥ kṛtaḥ na kevalaṃ svayaṃ raktamityapi śabdaḥ | mugdha ityāmantraṇam iti ||

etacca ekāṅgarūpakam ekasyaiva netralakṣmasyāṅgasya rūpaṇāt | evam anena prakāreṇa dviprabhṛtīnyapi na kevalamekam | dve trīṇi catvāri iti yathāsambhavamaṅgāni avayavān rūpayanti yathāyogamarthāntararūpeṇa āropya prayuñjate kavayaḥ | atrāṅgarūpaṇe yogaḥ saṅgatiḥ aṅgānāmayogaśca virodhaḥ | bhidākarau rūpakabhedavyavasthāpakau | yogāyoga[50a]bhedenaitadrūpakaṃ vyavahniyate | na tu pūrvavat saṃkhyābhedenetyarthaḥ ||

smitaṃ puṣpaṃ śauklyādinā tena ujjvalaṃ subhagaṃ lole netre bhṛṅgau cañcalatvādinā yasya mukhasyetīdṛśam [yukta]rūpakamākhyāyate | nanu katham ? puṣpāṇāṃ dvirephāṇāṃ ca saṅgatyā parasparasambandhāditi ||
idaṃ mukham ārdraṃ snigdhaṃ smitaṃ jyotsnā, snigdhe netre utpale [ca] yasya ityevaṃvidhamayuktaṃ nāma rūpakam | kutaḥ jyotsnayā utpalasya ayogāt virodhāt, jyotsnāyāmutpalasya saṅkocāditi ||

lg.l: rūpakaṃ viṣamaṃ nāma lalitaṃ jāyate yathā || 79 ||

div.p: aṅgino 'vayavinaḥ rūpaṇāt yathāyogam arthāntarīkaraṇāt | aṅgānāṃ rūpaṇamarūpaṇaṃ ca tayorāśrayaṇam [tasmād][ā]śrayāt apekṣaṇādrūpaṇādarūpaṇāccetyarthaḥ | tato viṣamaṃ rūpakaṃ lalitaṃ cārujāyate | yathetyudāharati ||

bhuvanatrayaṃ mardituṃ jetum alam samartho manmathaḥ | kena ? madena raktau kapolau yasya nartite bhruvau late lolatādinā yena tena tava mukhena indunā karaṇena ca mukhasyāṅgino rūpaṇaṃ bhrūlakṣaṇasya ca tadaṅgasya rūpaṇameva | kapolarūpasya tvaṅgasyārūpaṇamiti ||

harerviṣṇoḥ vikramamāṇasya pādo jayati vipakṣamabhibhavati | śirasyagre bhāge 'ṅgulīdeśe lagnamavasthitaṃ jahnukanyājalam | brahmaṇā kila tadānīm arghīkṛtaṃ gāṅgam
udakam | aṃśukaṃ patākārūpaṃ yatra sa tathā | asurebhyo harinirjitebhyo niḥśaṃkā nirbhayāstadupakramaśaṅkāvigamāt | ye surāḥ, teṣāmānandaḥ prītirutsavo mahastatrocchrito dhvajaḥ keturiti |
kimidaṃ rūpakaṃ vyavahriyata ityāha—

viśeṣaṇena upādhinā patākotsavasambhavarūpeṇa samagrasya sūktasya ketordhvajasya yadīdṛśasya anantaroktaprakāraṃ rūpaṃ svabhāvaḥ tasyārpaṇādāropāt pāde vaiṣṇave 'yaṃ dhvaja iti etadīdṛśaṃ saviśeṣaṇaṃ nāma rūpakaṃ vyapadiśyata iti ||
tava mukham induḥ, padmāni na mīlayati na saṃkocayati [50b] nabho 'pi nāvagāhate | kiṃ tarhi karoti ? mama asūnāṃ prāṇānāṃ haraṇāyaiva vyavasyati prayatate | kimidamiti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

candrakāryāṇāṃ padmanimīlanādīnām akriyā akaraṇam | anyasya śastrāderyat kāryaṃ prāṇaharaṇaṃ tasya kriyā atra prayoge sandarśyate pratipādyate yasmāt, ato viruddhaṃ nāmedṛśaṃ rūpakamavagantavyam iti ||
gāmbhīryeṇānuttānacittatayā samudro 'si | gauraveṇa guṇalakṣaṇena parvato 'si | lokānāṃ kāmam iṣṭaṃ dadāsīti kāmadatvācca kalpapādapo 'si iti kaścit stūyat iti ||
kimidaṃ rūpakamityāha—

atra prayoge gāmbhīryaṃ pramukhamādi yeṣāṃ gauravādīnāṃ taiḥ hetubhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ kaścit vivakṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ sāgaraḥ kriyate, giriśca kalpadrumaśca kriyate rūpyate yataḥ, tat tasmāt idam evaṃvidhaṃ heturūpakam avaseyam | tadidamanantaroktaṃ heturūpakamiti yojyam ||

sakhi, tava vaktrāmbujamidaṃ cāru [rāja]haṃsopabhogārham | padmaṃ tāvat rājahaṃsaiḥ pakṣiviśeṣaiḥ upabhogaṃ niṣevaṇam arhati, tadupabhogyamiti yāvat | tava vaktrāmbujaṃ tu rājahaṃsaiḥ nṛpavaraiḥ upabhogamarhatīti śabdaśleṣaḥ | ubhayamapi bhramaraiḥ prārthyam abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ saurabhaṃ gandhaviśeṣo 'syeti bhramaraprārthyasaurabhamityarthaśleṣaḥ | īdṛśaṃ śliṣṭarūpakamiṣṭam, śleṣānuviddhatvāt iti ||

upamārūpakaṃ vyatirekarūpakamiti rūpakadvitayamidamaparamiṣṭaṃ śiṣṭaiḥ | upameti vyatireka iti vā ākhyā saṃjñā tadekadeśatvādyasyeti vigrahaḥ kṛtaḥ | gauṇasya āropitasya mukhasya ca pradhānasyānupacitasya sādharmyaṃ sāmyaṃ vaidharmyam asāmyaṃ ca tayordaśanāt prakāśanāt kāraṇāt | yatheti udāharati—

ayaṃ mukhacandramāḥ, ālohitā chāyā prabhā yasya sa tathā | kena ? madena hetunā sannaddho 'vasthitaḥ udayakālabhāvī rāgo yasya tasya candrasya pratigarjati tenopamīyate | gauṇamukhyayoriha raktatāsādharmyādupamārūpakamīdṛśaṃ dṛśyamiti ||

[51a] candramā mukhyaḥ pīyate devairamṛtamayatvāt paryāyeṇa suraiḥ candraḥ pīyate yataḥ krameṇāpacīyata iti śruteḥ | ata evāsamagro 'pyasau mukhyaścandraḥ | na kevalaṃ samagra evetyapiśabdaḥ | mayā tava mukhacandramāḥ pīyate niṣevyate | tathāpyayaṃ tava mukhacandramāḥ āpūrṇamakhaṇḍaṃ maṇḍalaṃ yasyetyāpūrṇamaṇḍalaḥ śaśvat anavarataṃ na kadācit anyatheti gauṇamukhyayorvaidharmyāt vyatirekarūpakamidamīdṛśamiti ||

sundari ! tava mukhacandrasyetthamevamiti ātmasaṃvedyatāmupatāpasya darśayati | anyamimaṃ janamupatāpayataḥ | paramukhena ātmānamāha—candratvaṃ na saṃvādi na yathārthamekāntaśītatvāccandrasyāsya ca tadviparītatvāt | itīdṛśaṃ candratvaniṣedhādākṣeparūpa[ka]mavaseyamiti ||

lg.l: mukhendurapi te caṇḍi ! māṃ nirdahati nirdayam |

div.p: caṇḍi nirdaye ! ekāntaprītikaraḥ tava mukhenduḥ atinirdayam atyarthaṃ māṃ nirdahati | naitadyujyata ityayogamapiśabdaḥ sūcayati | na kevalam induriṃti vā [api] śabdaḥ samuccinoti | athavā kiṃ na yujyate ? saṃbhāvyate sarvamīdṛśamapi bhāgyaparāvṛttau, yadāha—bhāgyadoṣo mamaiva iti mamaivāyaṃ bhāgyadoṣaḥ abhāgyaṃ yadevaṃ bhavati | na tava mukhacandrasyāyaṃ doṣaḥ | ityevaṃrūpaṃ yat tadīdṛśaṃ samādhānarūpakamitthaṃ samādhānābhidhānāditi ||

sundari ! tava bhrūlatā lolatādinā | sā ca nartakī cittaharatvādinā līlāpradhānaṃ śṛṅgāramayaṃ nṛttaṃ varṇitarūpaṃ karoti | kutra ? mukhaṃ paṅkajaṃ kāntyādinā tacca raṅgo
nṛtyabhūmiḥ | tatrāsminnitiṃ pratyakṣavartini | īdṛśaṃ rūpakarūpakaṃ ramyaṃ manojñaṃ latīkṛtāyāḥ bhruvo nartakīkaraṇāt paṅkajīkṛtasya ca mukhasya saṅgīkṛteriti ||
tava etat mukhaṃ na bhavati | kiṃ tarhi padmam idam | ete ca atra netre na bhavataḥ | kiṃ tarhi ? bhramarāvimau | etāśca dantārciṣo na bhavanti kiṃ tu kesarāṇyetāni iti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

mukhamādiryasya netrādeḥ tasya bhāvaḥ | tattvam | tad vinivartyaiva apahṛtyaiva | na tu mukhādikamevaitat padmādikamiti tattvam [51b] apalāpyate [ata]evākṣeparūpakavilakṣaṇametat | padmamādiryasya bhramarādeḥ tasya, bhāvaḥ tena lakṣitasya rūpaṇāt parikalpanāt | mukhāderiti gamyate | tattvāpahnavarūpakamīdṛśaṃ tattvasya vasturūpasya apahnavena rūpakamiti | kimevamāviṣkṛtaṃ syādityāha—udbhāvitaḥ prakāśitaḥ | guṇasya kāntyāderutkarṣā[ti]śayo yena yatra vā tattathoktamiti ||
ki[mi]yanta eva rūpa[ka]bhedāḥ ? netyaparyavasāyena upamāsāmānyena nigamayannāha—

rūpakasyopamāyāśca vikalpāḥ prabhedāḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇavyāptāḥ | teṣāṃ paryanto 'vasānaṃ nāsti yatastataḥ kāraṇāt, diṅmātraṃ sarvavikalpavyāpakasāmānyalakṣaṇānugataviśeṣarūpaṃ kiyadapi lakṣyaṃ śeṣavikalpānugamadvāraṃ darśitam uktaṃ dhīraiḥ kavibhiriti paramukhenācaṣṭe | śeṣamatidiśati—anuktamihānupāttaṃ vikalpajātaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣa
lakṣaṇātmakaṃ tādṛśamuktavikalpānusāreṇānumīyatām ūhyatām | tasyāpyevaṃprakāratvāt śakyamanayā diśā tadapyavasātumabhiyuktairiti ||

tadyathā—
tava tanvaṅgi ! vadanamindunā tulyamityayam |
abhidhattāṃ jano nāhamutsahe vaktumīdṛśam || anutsāhopamā |
guñjadbhṛṅgamivāmbhojaṃ saśītkāraṃ mukhaṃ tava |
iti vaktumanutsāho na yuktaḥ kalabhāṣiṇi || ayuktopamā |
payodharayuge tanvi ! tava cakrāhvayadvayam |
avibhaktamivābhāti bhāsuraṃ kuṅkumaśriyā || viśeṣopamā |
evamanyepyupamāvikalpā abhyūhyāḥ |

mukhendāveva te tanvi ! rāgapakṣmavicakṣaṇam |
kāmaḥ kevalamādhatte dhanuḥ kusumasāyakam || niyamarūpakam |
aṅganāsarasīṃ ramyāmunnidramukhapaṅkajām |
śamanāsādya [?] santāpaṃ kathameṣa gamiṣyati || āśaṃsārūpakam |
anicchayaiva te tanvyāstasyā vadanapaṅkajam |
virahayya vimūḍha़ādya manaḥ kimanutapyase || anuśayarūpakam |
evamapare 'pi rūpakavikalpā ūhitavyāḥ | iti rūpakaprapañcaḥ ||
dīpakaṃ paridīpayannāha—

[52a] jātivācinā kriyābhidhāyinā guṇaprakāśinā dravyābhilāpinā vā śabdena vākyāvayavabhūtena kenacit ekatra vākyasyādau madhye 'nte vā vartamāne[na] kartṛbhūtena sarvasyābhimatasya kasyacid vākyasya kriyākārakasambandhābhidhāyinaḥ
padasantānasyārthadvāreṇa sā[dhana]saṃbhavādupakāraḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvena tadapekṣālakṣaṇaścet yadi bhavati tadevaṃrūpaṃ dīpakamāhuḥ upadiśanti tadvidaḥ | sarva vākyaṃ dīpayatyupakarotīti dīpakam | yathetyudāharati ||

lg.l: pavano dakṣiṇaḥ paṇeṃ jīṇeṃ harati vīrudhām |

div.p: pavano dakṣiṇo malayānilaḥ | vīrudhāṃ latānāṃ gulmānāṃ vā sambandhi paṇeṃ śīrṇaṃ harati kṣipati, natāṅgīnāṃ mānavatīnāṃ navāya pratyagrāya mānasya viṣayasya vāmatāviśeṣasya bhaṅgāya vigamārthaṃ ca kalpate saṃpadyate | kim ? pavano dakṣiṇa ityapekṣate | iha pavanajātivācinādivartinā sarvametat vākyamupakriyata iti jātyādidīpakamīdṛśamavaseyam ||

te tava dantino jayakuñjarāḥ caturṇāṃ pūrvādīnām ambhodhīnāṃ velodyāneṣu velāyāṃ velārūpāṇi vā udyānānīti samāsaḥ | caranti krīḍanti cakravālādrerlokālokācalasya kuñjeṣu siddhādhyāsiteṣu pradeśeṣu kundasyeva bhāso dīptayo yeṣāmiti kundabhāso viśadāḥ, tava guṇāśca tyāgasatyaśauryādayaḥ | kim ? caranti śrutipathamavataranti udadhivāsināmiti kaścit rājā stūyate | atra carantīti kriyāvācī prathamaprayuktaḥ sarvametadvākyamupakarotīti kriyādīpakamevaṃjātīyaṃ vijñeyamiti ||

prāvṛṣeṇyābhiḥ varṣāsamayavartinībhiḥ jīmūtapaṃktibhiḥ meghamālābhiḥ diśaḥ śyāmalāḥ nīlāḥ vartante | sukumārābhiḥ śādvalarājibhiḥ śaṣpodgamaiḥ | bhuvaśca bhūmayaḥ kim ? śyāmalā ityapekṣate | iha śyāmalā iti pūrvavartinā guṇavācinā sarvamidaṃ vākyamupakriyate iti guṇādidīpakamitthaṃbhūtaṃ vibhāvyamiti ||

vikramasthena balibandhasaṃnaddhena vikramamāṇena dānavānāṃ vibhūtayaḥ śriyaḥ | kvāpi kvacit idantayā anirdeśye sthāne nītāḥ | [52b] nāśitā iti yāvat | devatānāmṛddhayo vibhūtayaḥ | kuto 'pi sthānādavyapadeśyāt | ānītā āsan | abhūvan | utpāditā iti yāvat | iha viṣṇunā iti dravyaśabdo 'yaṃ sarvametadvākyamupajīvayatīti dravyādidīpakamevaṃvidhaṃ boddhavyamiti ||
katamānyetāni dīpakānītyāha—

ityevaṃrūpāṇi vākyādau prayuktānyādidīpakānyuktāni jātyādibhedena catvāri veditavyāni | evamanena prakāreṇa tāni dīpakāni kā[ni]cit katipayāni na sarvāṇi vākyayoḥ vākyadvayasya kāvyarūpasya madhye 'nte ca darśayiṣyāma udāhariṣyāmaḥ | tad yatheti nidarśayanti ||

lg.l: ba nanti ca payodeṣu dṛśo harṣāśrugarbhiṇīḥ || 103 ||

div.p: kalāpino mayṛrā nṛtyanti gāyanti ca niculānām abhiṃnavamañjarīpuñjarañjitānām utsaṅge viṭaparūpe payodeṣu jaladharotsavajanmaharṣāśru garbho 'ntarvarti yāsāṃ tā dṛśaścakṣūṃ ṣi badhnanti niyacchanti ca | kalāpina ityapekṣate | iha kalāpina ityanena jātivācinā vākyamadhyavartinā sarvametadvākyamupakriyata iti jātimadhyadīpakam īdṛśaṃ dṛśyamiti ||

mando gandhavaho mṛduḥ pavanaḥ pravāsināṃ virahiṇāṃ kṣāro jāyate, vyathāhetu
tvāt | induśca vahniḥ agniḥ jāyate, dāhakatvāt | carcārūpaśca sthāsakasvabhāvaḥ candanasya pāto 'nulepaśca śastrapāto 'sipāto jāyate, duḥkhajanakatvāt | iha jāyata iti kriyāpadena madhyavartinā sarvavākyopakāra iti kriyāmadhyadīpakamīdṛśaṃ veditavyamiti | guṇadīpakaṃ dravyadīpakaṃ ca madhyavarti nodāhṛtam | ata eva kānicidityuktam | tattu yathā—
dahatyapi narendrāṇāṃ manāṃsi tava vakramaḥ |
nirvāpayati cetāṃsi sudṛśāṃ saṃśayaḥ śriyaḥ ||
kṛto [jñāna]mayaḥ śrīmān prakāśaḥ sarvadarśinā |
hṛtaṃ ca sarvadigvyāpiṃ durjayaṃ jagatāṃ tamaḥ || iti ||

lg.l: calaṃ ca taḍa़itāṃ dāma balaṃ kusumadhanvanaḥ || 105 ||

div.p: jaladharaiḥ udgīrṇaṃ vimuktaṃ jalaṃ gṛheṣu śikhaṇḍināṃ kulaṃ vṛndaṃ taḍitāṃ ca dāma guṇaḥ calaṃ sarvametat vastu manojñaṃ kusumadhanvanaḥ kāmasya balam anīkaṃ jagadvijayinaḥ ātmodayānuguṇatvāt | iha balamātraṃ jaladharodgīrṇajalādibhedatrayānugata[mapoḍhapratyeka]viśeṣaṃ vivakṣiṃtamiti jātyantadīpakametat, tena sarvavākyopakārāditi ||

varāṅgi, tvayā karṇe karṇotpalam avataṃsakuvalayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadā tadaiva smareṇa śarāsane dhanuṣi kṛtam astraṃ śaraḥ, mayā ca rāgavegamūrcchitena maraṇe daśamyāṃ daśāyāṃ cetaḥ kṛtamityetattrayam | tribhirebhirasmābhireteṣu triṃṣu samaṃ yugapat kṛtamiti kriyāntadīpakamidaṃ kṛtamityantavartinā kriyāvacanena sarvavākyopakṛteriti ||

ihāpi guṇadravyalakṣaṇamantadīpakadvayaṃ na nidarśitaṃ tadapi yathā—
sambhāramakarodvodhestattvajñānamajīnat |
ujjahāra jagad duḥkhānmunīndra bhavataḥ kṛpā ||
digantabaddhanirghoṣaṃ mamantha kṣīrasāgaram |
vigalanmathanāyāsaṃ lebhe lakṣmīmadhokṣajaḥ || iti ||

lg.l: śuklaḥ śvetārciṣo vṛddhyai pakṣaḥ pañcaśarasya saḥ |
sa ca rāgasya rāgo 'pi yūnāṃ ratyutsavaśriyaḥ || 107 ||

div.p: śuklaḥ pakṣaḥ śvetārciṣaḥ candrasya vṛddhyai upacayārthaṃ pravartate | sa śvetārciḥ pañcaśarasya vṛddhyai | sa pañcaśaro yūnāṃ rāgasya vṛddhyai | rāgo 'pyasau ratyutsavaśriyo vṛddhyai kalpate | ratiḥ sambhoga evotsavaḥ prītilakṣaṇatvāt | tasya śrīḥ utkarṣaḥ sa eva vā śrīḥ vibhūtirūpatvāt yojyam ||
kimidaṃ dīpakamityāha—

ityevaṃvidhaṃ yattanmālādīpakaṃ matam iṣṭam | nanu kriyādidīpakametad vṛddhyai iti kriyāvācinādivartinā sarvavākyopakārādityāha—ādidīpakatve 'pīti | yadyapyādidīpakametattathāpi viśeṣāpekṣayā mālādīpakamucyate | kaḥ punarasau viśeṣaḥ yenaivaṃ vyapadiśyata ityāha—pūrvetyādi | vākyānāṃ śvetārciṣo vṛddhyai śuklaḥ pakṣo bhavati, sa ca pañcaśarasya vṛddhyai bhavatītyevamādīnāṃ mālā paṃktiḥ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ yathoktena vidhinā apekṣamāṇā prayukteti | ayamatra viśeṣo 'pekṣitaḥ | tasmānmālādīpakamīdṛśamākhyāyate, nādidīpakamiti ||

anaṅgasya avalepaṃ darpaṃ vardhayanti upacinvanti balāhakāḥ | mārutoddhūtaśīkarāḥ
[53b] mārutairuddhūtā vikīrṇāḥ śīkarā jalakaṇā yeṣāṃ yeriti vā vigrahaḥ | ghamesya tu nidāghasya punaḥ avalepaṃ karṣayanti kṛ[śaṃ kurva]nti iti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

avalepapadena vyāpyabhūtena balāhakapadena kartṛvācinā saha viruddhe parasparavyāhate kriye varddhanakarṣaṇe saṃprayukte sambaddhe avalepaviṣayatvāt, balāhakakartṛkatvācca bhavataḥ yataḥ tattasmāt viruddhārthadīpakamīdṛśamidam | yadvedṛśaṃ tad viruddhārthadīpakamiti yojyat ||
āśānāṃ diśām ābhogaṃ vistāraṃ harati gṛhṇāti | jyotiṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ gaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti harati | yo 'hamevaṃ virahavidhuraḥ, tasya me mama prāṇān ādatte gṛhṇāti | asau iyaṃ jaladharāvalī meghapaṃktiriti ||
tad vivṛṇoti—
anekasya haratyādeḥ śabdasya kriyāpadasya paryāyarūpasya upādānāt prayogeṇa ekaivāpaghātalakṣaṇā kriyā dīpyate upakriyate jaladharāvalyā kartṛbhūtayā yataḥ tasmādekārthadīpakamīdṛśamavaseyamiti ||

lg.l: divi bhramanti jīmūtā bhuvi caite mataṅgajāḥ || 113 ||

div.p:
jīmūtā meghāḥ divi nabhasi bhramanti amī | mataṅgajā hastinaśca ete bhuvi bhramanti | hṛdyo manoharo gandhavahaḥ pavano yeṣām jīmūtānāṃ te, tathā hṛdyaṃ gandhaṃ
madamayaṃ vahanti kṣipanti samantāditi hṛdyagandhavahāḥ mataṅgajā iti śabdaśleṣaḥ | hṛdyo vā madamiśraḥ gandhavahaḥ pavano yeṣāmityarthaśleṣaḥ | tuṅgā mahāntaḥ tamālavat śyāmalā nīlā [tviṭ kāntiryeṣāṃ te |] ubhaye 'pītyarthaśleṣaḥ ||
tad vibhajate—

atra prayoge dharmairhṛdyagandhavahatvādibhiḥ guṇairabhinnānāṃ samānāmabhrāṇāṃ hastināṃ ca bhrameṇaiva ekena karmaṇā dīpakena sambandhaḥ sādhyasādhanalakṣaṇaḥ pratīyata iti hetoḥ śliṣṭārthadīpakamīdṛśam, śleṣānugatatvāt iti ||
[54a]anuktān dīpakavikalpān atidiśannigamayati—

anenava anantaroktena prakāreṇa vidhinā dīpake dīpakaviṣayāṇāṃ śeṣāṇāmanuktānāmapi vikalpānāṃ bhedānāmanugatiravabodhaḥ | vidhātavyā kriyatāṃ vicakṣaṇaiḥ kavibhiriti || sā cānugatirevaṃ vidhātavyā—
adharastava tanvaṅgi ! rāgaḥ sākṣādivekṣyate |
hṛdayaṃ rañjayatyeṣa prāṇān harati yanmama || upamādīpakam |
haranti hariṇākṣīṇāṃ dṛṣṭayo rāgalālasāḥ |
vadantīva janānmukterāyatā vayamargalāḥ || utprekṣādīpakam |
na khaṅgadhārā niśitā niśātā nāpi sāyakāḥ |
haranti [ca] mama prāṇān mṛgākṣi tava vibhramāḥ || ākṣepadīpakam |
evamanye 'pi dīpakavikalpā anugantavyā iti ||
āvṛttimadhikṛtyāha—

arthasya abhidheyasya āvṛttiḥ punaḥ punarudbhāvanam | padasya śabdasya āvṛtiḥ bhūyaḥ samuccāraṇam | ubhayasyārthasya padasya cāvṛttirapyāvṛttiśceti | evaṃlakṣaṇam alaṅkāratrayam āvṛttiviśeṣātmakamiṣṭaṃ dīpakasya sthāne viṣaya eva nānyatra | dīpakenāpi tādṛśārthapratītisambhavāt nārthataḥ tayoḥ bheda iti dīpakasthāna eveṣṭamityuktam | anye tvekatra dīpakasthāna iti viśeṣeṇa vyācakṣate tadasāram | evaṃ hi arthāvṛttireva dīpakasthāne syāt, na śeṣamāvṛttidvayam | āvṛttitrayamapi ca dīpakasthāna ityuktaṃ śāstrakṛtā dīpakasthāna eveṣṭamalaṅkāratrayamiti sākṣādamidhānāt | tataḥ śāstraviruddhameva vyākhyānam | tasmāddīpakāvṛttyoḥ samāno viṣayaḥ, ubhayathāpi tadarthāvagamasambhavāt | prayogatastvanayorbhedaḥ | na caivamavagantavyam- yadi so 'rtho dīpakenāpi gamyate kimanayeti dīpakasamānatvādasya paryanuyogasya | dīpakavaccāsyāpi śiṣṭairiṣṭatvāt kathamiyamatiricyate ? teṣāṃ sarvatheha pramāṇatvāt | kathaṃ na diṣṭātikramaḥ ? tasmāt arthābhede 'pi dīpakavadiyamapyanugamyate, dvayorapyalaṅkāratayeṣṭatvāt | ata evoktam— dīpakasthāna eveṣṭamiti | śiṣṭairitigamyate | tasmādabhinnasthānatve 'pi prayogabhedā[54b]dubhayamapīṣṭaṃ śiṣṭairityalamativimardena iti ||

lg.l: unmīlanti ca kandalyo dalanti kakubhāni ca || 117 ||

div.p:
kadambāni mukulāni vikasanti | kuṭajānāṃ kuṭajarūpā vā udgamāḥ kuḍmalāni sphuṭanti vikasanti | kandalyaśca kusumānyunmīlanti vikasanti | kakubhāni korakāṇi ca dalanti vikasanti | ityarthāvṛttiriyamudāhṛtā | vikāsalakṣaṇasyaikasyārthasyānekaiḥ paryāyairabhīkṣṇamāviṣkaraṇāditi | dīpakenāpyayamarthaḥ prakāśyate | tadyathā—
vikasanti kadambāni tathaiva kuṭajodnamāḥ |
sugandhayaśca kandalyaḥ kalāni kakubhāni ca || ﻿ iti |

kalāpināṃ vargamutkaṇṭhayati udgrīvayati meghānāṃ mālā yūnāṃ ca mānasaṃ makaradhvajaḥ utkaṇṭhayati paryutsukayati adya prāvṛṣi | padāvṛtteridamudāharaṇam | padasyaivotkaṇṭhayatītyasyāvṛtteḥ | arthasya tu bhedādayamapyartho dīpakena paridīpyate | tadyathā—
utkaṇṭhayati meghānāṃ mālā vargaṃ kalāpinām |
yūnāṃ ca rāgasarvasvaṃ mānasaṃ makaradhvajaḥ || iti ||

viśvaṃ jagat jitvā atra mahīmaṇḍale adya ca adhunā avarodhanaiḥ antaḥpurasundarībhiḥ saha bhavān viharati ramate | tava ripuvargo divaṃ svargaṃ tavāsidhārāpathena gataḥ saha apsarobhiḥ divyāṅganābhiḥ saha viharati ityubhayāvṛttirnidarśitā, viharati ityarthasya padasyāvṛtteriti ||

idamapi dīpakasya sthānam | tadyathā—
jitvā viśvaṃ bhavānatra viharatyavarodhanaiḥ |
ramyābhirapsarobhiste ripuvargo divaṃ gataḥ || iti |
ata eva dīpakasthāna eveṣṭamalaṅkāratrayamiti sāmānyenoktam ||
ākṣepamupakṣipannāha—

pratiṣedhasyoktirvacanamityanūdya ākṣepa iti vidhīyate | sa ca tridhā tribhiḥ prakāraistāvad bhidyate | katham | trayo 'tītānāgatavartamānāḥ kālāstraikālyam | tasyā pekṣayā
āśrayaṇena hetunā bhūtākṣepaḥ, bhaviṣyadāpekṣaḥ, vartamānāpekṣa iti | atra tridhābhedānantaramasyākṣepasya anantatā anavasitabhedatā | kutaḥ ? ākṣepasya niṣedhasyārthasā[55a]mānyasya bhedāḥ vikalpā ākṣeparūpā vā bhedāḥ | teṣāmānantyādaparyavasānāt kāraṇāditi ||

pauṣpaiḥ puṣpamayaiḥ ekāntamṛdubhistairapi pañcabhiḥ svalpairiṣumiḥ śaraiḥ sa pañceṣuranaṅgaḥ viśvaṃ jagat sarvaṃ vyajayata vijitavāniti asambhāvyamayuktametat | kathamasyāḥ sāmagryāḥ kāryamīdṛśaṃ saṃbhāvyate ? athavā kiṃ na sambhāvyate ? yato vastūnāṃ padārthānāṃ śaktayaḥ vicitrā nānāprakārā acintyāstadeṣāmapi tādṛśī śaktirbhavet | na kiñcidvādhakamiti ||
ko 'yamākṣepa ityāha—

ityevamanantaroktasya anurūpasya ca hetoḥ kāraṇasya pauṣpapañcaśaratvādeḥ | balāt sāmarthyāt pravṛttā bhūtaivānaṅgajayāyogabuddhiḥ | anaṅgasya jayo viśvavaśīkaraṇam | tasyāyogo 'sambhāvanā tatra buddhiḥ anaṅgo vyajayatetyasambhāvyamityevākārākṣiptā niṣiddhā | hetubalādityatrāpyapekṣaṇīyam | bhāvavadabhāvasyāpi sahetukatvāt | hetubalaṃ cātra vicitravastuśaktidarśanam | yad yataḥ tat tasmāt īdṛśaḥ evaṃprakāro vṛttasyākṣepo bhūtakālākṣepo 'vaseya iti ||

kalabhāṣiṇi mañjuvacane ! priyāmantraṇam | karṇe kuvalayam avataṃsotpalam kutaḥ kasmāt karopi ? vṛthaiva tat kriyate, apāṅgena karṇapūrakāryācaraṇādityāhakimityādi | apāṅgaṃ nayanopāntam asmin prastute karmaṇi karṇāvataṃsotpalakṛtye
aparyāptam asamartham manyase ? kimiti kṣepe praśne vā | naivaṃ mantavyaṃ paryāptamidamasmin karmaṇīti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

so 'yamīdṛśo varta[mā]nasya karaṇasya ākṣepaḥ | vartamānakālaviṣayo niṣedhaḥ | katham ? kācit priyā karṇe svasmin asitotpalamindīvaraṃ kurvatī kurvāṇeva, na kṛtavatī kariṣyantī vā | rudhyate ākṣipyate priyeṇa cāṭukāreṇa priyācaraṇacatureṇa | evamanantaroktena prakāreṇa yatastasmādvartamānākṣepo 'yamiti nigamanīyam iti ||

lg.l: satyaṃ bravīmi na tvaṃ māṃ draṣṭaṃ vallabha ! lapsyase |

div.p: [55b]vallabha ! satyaṃ niyatamidam ahaṃ tvāṃ bravīmi mā anyathā maṃsthāḥ | kiṃ tadityādi | netyādi | anyathā pratiyoṣitā anyasyā vā vilāsalākṣārāgarañjitādharapallavayā | cumbanāt vaktrayogāt saṃkrāntaḥ saṃcarito lākṣārāgo yatra tena cakṣuṣā māṃ draṣṭuṃ tvaṃ na lapsyase nāhamīdṛśaṃ vyatikaramapareva sọdhuṃ śaknomi | tadaiva me lokāntaraprasthānam | īdṛśīyaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ kiṃ karavāṇīti ||
tad vivṛṇoti—

yad yasmāt atimanasvinī sarvathā doṣamarṣaṇaparāṅmukhasvabhāvā kācit praṇayinī kadācidasya punaraparādho vyalīkaṃ bhāvī bhavediti śaṅkamānā prāgevānāgatavidhāyitayārundhda ākṣipat | evamanantaroktena prakāreṇa | tasmātso 'yamīdṛśaḥ bhaviṣyadākṣepo bhaviṣyata eva darśanalābhāderākṣepāditi ||

lg.l: yadi satyaṃ mṛdūnyeva kimakāṇḍe rujanti mām || 127 ||

div.p: tanvaṅgi ! tavāṅgeṣu mārdavaṃ saukumāryaṃ mithyaiva asatyamapi rūḍha़ṃ prasiddhamāsīt | mithyāprasiddhireveyaṃ yat tavāṅgāni mṛdūni iti yāvat | tathāhi yadi satyaṃ paramārthato mṛdvaṅgāni bhaveyuḥ, nopacāramātram | satyamiti bhavanakriyāviśeṣaṇam | māṃ kiṃ kasmāt rujanti pīḍayanti | akāṇḍe akasmāt | krūrakāryaṃ hi pīḍanam | tatkathaṃ mādave yujyata iti ||
katamo 'yamākṣepa ityāha—

yad yasmāt atra prayoge kāmukena kenacit cāṭukāreṇa kartṛbhūtena tadvirodhinā pratidvandvinā karmaṇā[na]ṅgarujārūpeṇa karaṇabhūtenāṅganāyā gātreṣu mārdavamevamuktena prakāreṇākṣiptaṃ niṣiddham | tasmādayamīdṛśo dharmasyākṣepa iti ||

lg.l: sundarī sā na vetyeṣa vivekaḥ kena jāyate |
prabhāmātraṃ hi taralaṃ dṛśyate na tadāśrayaḥ || 129 ||

div.p: sā vivakṣitā kācit sundarī bhavatīti tāvanniścayarūpo vivekaḥ vibhāgapratipattiḥ | na vā sā bhavatītyabhāvanirṇayalakṣaṇo vivekaḥ | eṣo 'yaṃ kena hetunā jāyate ? na kenacidityarthaḥ | kiṃ kāraṇamityāha— prabhetyādi | hiryasmādarthe | tatra tasyāṃ taralam ujjvalam prabhā kāntiḥ dharma eva mātraṃ na dharmī dṛśyate gṛhyate | yadāha—nāśraya iti | prabhānāmno dharmasya āśrayaḥ adhikaraṇaṃ dehe na dṛśyate | [56a] tatkathamayaṃ viveka iti prakṛtamupasaṃhāryamiti ||
tadvibhajate—

yad yasmāt atra viṣaye rūpaṃ varṇasaṃsthānātmakaṃ bhūtaguṇam atyāścaryam atyantādbhatam, evaṃ nāmedaṃ prativiśiṣṭaṃ yadāśrayo 'pi tatra lāvaṇyarāśau nimagno na
dṛśyate iti vaktum icchatā cāṭukāreṇa kenacidākṣipto dharmī āśrayaḥ | dharmaṃ guṇaṃ prabhāhvayaṃ kāntyabhidhānama[nu]jñāya anākṣipya | prabhetyāhvayo nāma yasyeti vigrahaḥ | tasmāddharmiṇa ākṣepo nirāśaḥ ||

lg.l: bhruvau ca bhugne na tathāpyaduṣṭasyāsti me bhayam || 131 ||

div.p: caṇḍi ! cakṣuṣī tava ime rajyete roṣarāgamāgacchataḥ | adharaśca pallavo 'yaṃ sphurati kopakampamanugacchati | bhruvau ca ime bhugne jihmabhāvamābhajataḥ | kāmaṃ tathāpi | aduṣṭasyānirāgaso me mama bhayaṃ trāso nāsti | sāparādho hi bibhīyāt | kimahamavācyo bibhemīti ||
tadvivṛṇoti—

lg.l: sa eṣa kāraṇākṣepaḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhiyaḥ |

div.p: yad yasmāt paṭīyasā doṣaparihāracatureṇa priyeṇa bhiyo bhayasya pradhānam ucitaṃ kāraṇam anyad bhavadapi anucitaṃ svasya svo vā aparāvo doṣo niṣiddhaḥ atra prayoge | tasmāt sa eṣa īdṛśaḥ kāraṇasya [ā]kṣepo vijñeya iti ||

lg.l: dṛṣṭāśca phullā niculā na mṛtā cāsmi kiṃ nvidam || 133 ||

div.p: priyatamo dūre preṣito vartate | yo 'sau virahiṇīprāṇaprayāṇasamayaḥ so 'yaṃ jaladāgamo 'pyāgataḥ | phullā niculā vañjulā mañjumañjarījālajaṭilaśiraso dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭikaṭavaḥ | evaṃ [sannihita]samagramaraṇakāraṇā sāhaṃ na ca mṛtāsmi | kiṃ nvidaṃ vidhivilasitaṃ dīrghaduḥkhabhājanatāṃ nītā vayam amunā dagdhadaiveneti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

tasya maraṇasya kāraṇaṃ dāruṇam atiduḥsahaṃ jaladāgamamutphullaniculaṃ priyaviyogasacivamupanyasya pratipādya kāryasya maraṇasya nivartanāt na mṛtāsmīti so 'yamīdṛśaḥ kāryasyākṣepaḥ pratipattavya iti ||

lg.l: na ciraṃ tāpāya tava yātrā bhaviṣyati |

div.p: vallabha ! tava yātrā gamanaṃ ciraṃ dīrghaṃ mama tāpāya duḥkhārthaṃ na bhaviṣyati | svalpo 'pi tāpastvayā vinā mṛtāyā na me sambhavati | jīvantī hi tamanubhavet | na ca maraṇasukhaṃ parityajya kācitsacetanā duḥkha[56b]bhāvamīdṛśaṃ pratīcchatīti pañcatāṃ sūcayatīti | atra ca vastuni te tava śaṅkyā anyathāsambhāvanayālaṃ nānyathā śaṅkanīyaṃ niyatametata | tasmāt yadi yāsyasi yātavyaṃ gamyatāṃ kiṃ sthīyata iti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

ityuktena vidhinā anujñāmukhena anumatidvāreṇaivaṃ yātavyamiti kānyasya gatiḥ ākṣipyate maraṇamātmanaḥ sūcayantyā bhaṅgyā kathayantyaiva priyayā | idamākṣepanimittam | tasmāt sa tādṛśo 'nujñākṣepa iṣyate tajjñairiti ||

lg.l: dhanaṃ ca bahu labhyaṃ te sukhaṃ kṣemaṃ ca vartmani |
na ca me prāṇasandehastathāpi priya ! mā sma gāḥ || 137 ||

div.p: bahu prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ labhyaṃ te tavāstu | anena yogo darśitaḥ | kṣemaśca labdhadhanarakṣaṇalakṣaṇaḥ | sukhaṃ ca vartmani kleśābhāvāt bhavatu nāma | na ca me tvadviyuktāyāḥ prāṇasandeho maraṇamapyupagatam | tathāpyevaṃ gamanaparipanthinimittābhāve 'pi priya mā sma gāḥ na gantavyam | evaṃ tāvanmayeṣṭamiṃti avyāhatapraṇyaprasarā kācidākṣipati ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

priyasya yātrāṃ vibadhnato viruddhān hetūn ayogakṣemādīn tatpratipakṣaprakāśanena pratyācakṣāṇyā nivārayantyā gantukāmasya kasyacit prabhutvenaiva kāntaviṣayeṇa svātantryeṇa ruddha ākṣiṃpto yatastat tasmādīdṛśa evaṃjātīyaḥ prabhutvākṣepa iṣyata iti ||

lg.l: gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā kānta ! svāvasthā tu niveditā || 139 ||

div.p: jīviṃte prāṇeṣvāśā āsaktiḥ balavatī garīyasī | mama dhaneṣvāśā abhilāṣaḥ punardurbalā tanvī | dhanādapi me jīvitaṃ priyamiṃtyarthaḥ | tato nāhaṃ jīvitavyayena tvadyātrāsādhyaṃ dhanamabhilaṣāmi | tvaṃ punaryathecchasi tathā kuru | gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā | na kiṃcit mama anayā cintayā | tadapi kiṃ tvamīcchasītyāha— svāvasthā tu nivediṃteti | svābhiprāyaḥ punarmayā darśita eva, na me jīvitāddhanaṃ dayitam, yataḥ prāṇamūlyena tadupādāsye | jīvitamevā[bhilaṣāmi] | na kiñcinme tena dhaneneti ||
tadvibhajate—

[yat] yasmādiha prayoge raktayā kayācit priyasya prayāṇaṃ rundhatyā ākṣipantyā anādaravadanādaro 'sminnastīti āsthāśūnyaṃ vaco vacanaṃ gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā iti prayuktam, tasmāt asau īdṛśo 'nādarākṣepaḥ ||

lg.l: gaccha gacchasi cet kānta ! panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ |
mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyād yatra gato bhavān || 141 ||

div.p:
[57a] kānta, gacchasi cet | yadi niścitaṃ gamanam, gaccha | kiṃ sthīyate, [te tava] panthānaḥ śivāḥ sukhāvahāḥ santu idamāśāsmahe | idaṃ cāparam, mamāpi
tadviṃrahagrahāpahṛtajīvitāyāḥ janma prādurbhāvastatraiva bhūyāt, yatra deśe gato bhavān | na kevalaṃ tava tatra gamanamityapi śabdaḥ ||
tatpratipādayati—

yasmādityevamāśīrvādavartmanā iṣṭāśaṃsanamukhena kāntasya [yātrā] gamanaṃ niṣidhyate | svāmavasthāṃ nidhanaprāptiṃ kāntaprayāṇakāraṇāṃ sūcayantyā savyājamāvedyantyā kayācit priyayā | tasmāt āśīrvacanākṣepastādṛśa iti ||

lg.l: yadi satyaiva te yātrā kāpyanyā mṛgyatāṃ tvayā |

div.p: te tava yātrā gamanaṃ satyaiva niyataiva yadi [na] vacanamātraṃ, tadā kāpi kācidanyā priyā mṛgyatām anviṣyatām tvayā strīvadhavallabhena | pūrṇo mamāvadhiḥ | yadāhaadyaiva na kālāntare sāhaṃ ruddhā kroḍa़īkṛtā asmi mṛtyunā randhraṃ tvadvirahādilakṣaṇam avakāśam apekṣamāṇena | tyajyatāmasmatpratyāśā | na cāhaṃ tava kiñciditi ||
tadabhidhatte—
ityevaṃ paruṣaṃ nirapekṣamakṣaraṃ vacanaṃ pūrvaṃ yasmin ākṣepa iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | kāntasya prasthānaṃ yātrā ākṣipyate | premaniṃdhnayā kayācidanurāgaparavaśayā yasmāt tataḥ paruṣākṣepa eṣa iti ||

lg.l: gantā ced gaccha tūrṇaṃ te karṇau yanti purā ravāḥ |

div.p:
gantā gacchasi cet | gaccha tūrṇaṃ śīghraṃ mā vilambiṃṣṭhāḥ, yato 'maṅgalaparihāraḥ syāt | yadāha—ārtānāmetanmaraṇaśokā turāṇāṃ bandhūnāṃ mukhairudgīrṇā muktā ravā
ākrandāḥ prayāṇaṃ pratibadhnantaḥ tava karṇaṃ purā yanti yāsyanti yāvat te nottiṣṭhanti tāvadeva gaccheti ||
tadvibhajate—
yadyasmāt | atra prayāṇe sā[ci]vyaṃ sahāyabhāvaṃ kurvatyaiva kayāciṃt atiṃraktayā priyasya prayāṇaṃ nipuṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate | tataḥ sācivyayogādeṣa īdṛśaḥ sācivyākṣepa eveti ||

lg.l: nirgacchati mukhād vāṇī mā gā iti karomi kim || 147 ||

div.p: mama priya vallabha ! tava priyaṃ prayāṇamicchantī satī gaccheti vaktumicchāmi | tathāpyanicchantyā eva me mukhāt mā gāstvamiti vāṇī [57b] vacanaṃ nirgacchati | kimahaṃ karomi | na me kaścit tāvaddoṣaḥ | tvatpriyaṃ matpriyaiṣiṇīti pāṭhe gacchetyetat tava priyaṃ vaktumicchāmi mama priyamicchantī vāṇī mā gā iti nirgacchatīti vyākhyeyamiti ||
tadvivṛṇotiṃ—

sa tādṛśaḥ yatnākṣepo jñeyaḥ | ataḥ aniṣṭe vastuni priyaprayāṇe tatsiddhaye kṛtasya yatnasya śramasye[ti yāvat] gaccheti vaktumicchāmīti viparītaṃ viruddhaṃ mā gā iti vacanarūpaṃ phalaṃ kāryamutpannam | tasyotpatteḥ kāraṇāt sa yatno 'narthako jātaḥ | tasmādānarthakyopadarśanāt prakāśanād yatnākṣepaḥ sa iti nigamayitavyam ||

lg.l: premṇaḥ prayāṇaṃ te brūhi mayā tasyeṣṭamiṣyate || 149 ||

div.p: te tava prayāṇakṣaṇaṃ darśanasya vighnāya pakṣmāspandāya cakṣuniṃmeṣāya kupyataḥ premṇaḥ snehasya brūhi kathaya | vacanaviṣayasya sambandhitvena vitakṣitatvāt ṣaṣṭhī | kimevamityāha— yat tasya premṇopadiṣṭamanumataṃ kiñcit tanmayeṣyate | nāhaṃ svatantrā kiṃ tavāviditam ? tasmāt premaiva bhāvaya | taccedanumanyate ke vayamanyathākartumiti ||
tadudbhāvayati—
ayamīdṛśaḥ paravaśākṣepaḥ kutaḥ premaparatantrayā snehanighnayā tayā priyayā kayācit yātrā priyasya niṣidhyate iti yadetat tasyedṛśasyārthasya vastuna upasūcanādudbhāvanādiṃti ||

lg.l: yadaktanetrāṃ kandarpaḥ prahartā māṃ na paśyati || 151 ||

div.p: nātha ! tava virahaṃ duḥsahamapyahaṃ sahiṣye yāpayāmi | kiṃ tu a[darśanasādhana]mañjanaṃ kiñcinme dehi | kiṃ tena ? yenādṛśyāñjanenākte spṛṣṭe netre yasyāstāṃ māṃ na paśyati kandarpaḥ kāmaḥ prahartā hantā | apaśyataḥ kathaṃ praharediti ||
tatprakāśayati—

duṣkaraṃ durlabhaṃ jīvitasyopāyaṃ adṛśyāñjanarūpamupanyasya patyuḥ prasthānamuparudhyate iti hetorīdṛśamupāyākṣepamāhustadvida iti ||atra
mugdhā kāntasya yātroktiśravaṇādeva mūrchitā |
budhvā vakti priyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃ cireṇāgato bhavān ||
iti tatkālasaṃbhūtamūrchayāttipyate gatiḥ |
kāntasya kātarākṣyā yanmūrchākṣepaḥ sa īdṛśaḥ ||
iti ślokadvitayaṃ mūle kvacidadhikaṃ dṛśyate |﻿

lg.l: pravṛttaiva prayāmīti vāṇī vallabha ! te mukhāt |

div.p: vallabha ! te tava mukhāt pravṛttā eva tāvatprayāmīti vāṇī vacanam | tadevaṃ mandapremṇā mandaṃ premā asyeti nirapekṣeṇa tvayā kathañcit ayatā agacchatāpi satā[58a] idānīṃ mama kimasti kāryam ? na kiñcit | [manasi śithilādarasya tava] gamanamagamanaṃ cedānīṃ tulyamiti ||
tadvivṛṇoti—

yad yasmāt udriktenādhimātreṇa snehena niryantraṇa uddāmaḥ ātmā cittaṃ yasyāḥ tayā ata eva saṃrabdhayā āviṣkṛtaroṣayā priyeṇārabdhaṃ kartumabhipretaṃ prayāṇaṃ nivāryate | tasmādayamīdṛśo roṣākṣepaḥ, kopāveśena niṣedhāditi ||

lg.l: nāghrātaṃ na kṛtaṃ karṇe strībhirmadhuni nārpitam |

div.p: strībhirnāghrātaṃ na ca karṇe kṛtaṃ śravaṇāvataṃsakṛtye niyuktam | madhuni ca nārpitam | etāvānevotpalasyopayogaḥ | kevalaṃ tava dviṣāmarātīnāṃ hatānāṃ dīrghikāsveva śūnyāsu viśīrṇaṃ parikṣataṃ jīrṇaṃ pariṇataṃ utpalamabhavaditi ||
tadāviṣkaroti—
