asau tādṛśaḥ anukrośākṣepo jñeyaḥ | kutaḥ ? utpale utpalaviṣaye sānukrośamiva sakaruṇamiva | utpale 'cetane sākṣādanukrośābhāvādiva [śabda] prayogaḥ | vyāvartanakriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ caitat | yadāha—tasyotpalasya yogyamuciṃtaṃ karma ghrāṇādi vyāvṛtya nirākṛtya nāghrātamityādinā śocyāyāḥ kriyāpadasyāvasthāyā viśīrṇatvāderupadarśanāditi ||atra amṛtātmanītyādi [2. 159-60] ślokadvayamiti kecit ||

lg.l: artho na sambhṛtaḥ kaścinna vidhā kācidarjitā |
na tapaḥ sañcitaṃ kiñcid gataṃ ca sakalaṃ vayaḥ || 157 ||

div.p: kañcid vivakṣito 'rtho dhanaṃ na sambhṛtaḥ nopārjitaḥ | vidyāpi kācit ānvīkṣikyādirnārjitā | tapaśca dharmaḥ kiñcit abhimataṃ na sañcitam | gatam atītaṃ ca sakalaṃ vayaḥ puruṣāyuṣam apuruṣārthopayogena | kimevamātmaivamātmanā vañcitaḥ ||
tadvibhajate—

yasmāt arthasyārjanamādiryasya vidyārjanādeḥ tasya vyāvṛttiḥ abhāvaḥ [darśitā] katham ? anuśayaḥ paścātāpa uttaro 'dhiko yasmin darśana iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | gatāyuṣā gatavayasā puṃsā kenacit | tasmāt asau īdṛśo 'nuśayākṣepa iti ||

tava mukhe indau sati asmin pratyakṣavartini itareṇa mukhena indunā kimadhikaṃ kāryam ? na kiñcit | amṛtamivātmā svarūpamekāntaprītikaratvāt yasya mukhendoḥ sa tathā | amṛtaṃ sudhaiva [58b] ātmā yasyendoriti śabdaśleṣaḥ | padmānāṃ dveṣṭā mukhenduḥ tatsadṛśatvādinduśca tatsaṃ[ko]cakāritvāt | ayamapi śabdaśleṣaḥ | snigdhe rakte tārake netramadhyabhāge tato vā samudāyopalakṣaṇāccakṣuṣī yasya mukhendoḥ | snigdhāḥ tārakā rohiṇyādayo yasyendoriti śabdaśleṣa eva | evama[kṣī]ṇaguṇe mukheṇe mukhendau sati kimitareṇenduneti pratyāmnāyaḥ ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

iti evaṃ tatsamān mukhendusādhāraṇān guṇān amṛtātmatvādīn gauṇe mukhendau vartamānān darśayitvā pratipādya mukhendurākṣiptaḥ kiminduneti | tasmāt śliṣṭākṣepaḥ tathāvidhaḥ tādṛśo 'vagantavyaḥ śleṣaprayogāditi ||

lg.l: rutaṃ nū purasaṃvādi śrūyate tanna toyadaḥ || 161 ||

div.p: ayaṃ dṛśyamānaḥ kiṃ śaradi śarado vā ammodaḥ, kiṃ vā āhosvit haṃsānāṃ kadambakaṃ vṛndamidam ? bhavatu, viditam | nūpuraninādasadṛśamanurutaṃ śrūyate yataḥ, tat tasmāt nāyaṃ toyadaḥ kiṃ tu haṃsakadambakameveti ||
tat kathayati—

yat yasmāt saṃśayaḥ, śaradambhodo haṃsakadambakaṃ veti sandeho na nivartyate haṃse haṃsena vā sulabhena tatraiva sambhavāt | dharmeṇa guṇena nūpurasaṃvādinā rutenāspṛṣṭā tatrāsambhavāt, ghanajātiḥ megho yena tena hetunā kartṛbhūtena vā | tasmādityayamīdṛśaḥ saṃśayākṣepa iti ||

citramadbhatametat | ākrāntamamibhūtaṃ viśvaṃ jagadyena sa tathābhūto 'pi tava vikramaḥ śauryaṃ na tṛpyati nābhilāṣaparyantamadhigacchati | athavā kiṃ citram ? udīrṇasyādhimātrasya havirbhujo 'gneḥ kadā tṛptirdṛśyate ? na kadācit | tathā vikramastava jagadākramyāpi na tṛpyatīti yojyam |
tad vyācaṣṭe—
yat yasmātprakrāntaḥ prastuto vismayo nivartyate arthāntarasyāgneḥ | tena vikrameṇa sadharmaṇastulyasya darśanādavagamāt | tato 'rthāntarākṣepo 'yam, arthāntareṇa tādṛśena vismayasya niṣedhāditi ||

lg.l: na stūyase narendra ! tvaṃ dadāsīti kadācana |

div.p: narendra, dadāsi tvaṃ dhanamarthibhya iti kathañcana kenāpi prakāreṇa na stūyase | kiṃ kāraṇam ? yataḥ kāraṇāt [59a] tava dhanamarthinaḥ svam ātmīyameva matvā gṛhṇanti | nāsyedaṃ dhanam asmākamevedam, vayamupabhoktāraḥ kevalamasmadarthaṃ rakṣati | yadvā asya dhanaṃ tadasmākamapi sarvasādhāraṇavibhavatvādasyeti ||
tad bravīti—

ityevamanantaroktaḥ prakāraḥ ādiryasyeti evamādirākṣepaḥ hetvākṣepa iti smṛtaḥ tajjaiḥ | hetūpanyāsena niṣedhāt | śeṣānākṣepavikalpānatidiśanti gamayanti | anayaiva anantaradarśitayā diśā ākṣepavikalpagatyā anye 'pyanuktā vikalpā ākṣepaprabhedā ūhitumanugantuṃ śakyam |

nanu vācyaliṅgatvāt tavyādeḥ vikalpo ityapekṣya śakyā iti yuktam | ucyate, iha śakyamiti sāmānyavivakṣayā prayujyate | tataḥ kiṃ śakyamiti viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ vikalpā iti saṃ[bha]nsyate | tatra yadyapi bahutvaṃ puṃstvaṃ ca gamyate, tathāpi padasaṃskārakālāpekṣitamantaraṅgamavyaktapuṃstvam, ekavacanaṃ ca uttarakālabhāvi | tena bahiraṅgaṃ bahuvacanaṃ cana bādhituṃ śaknoti | ayaṃ ca nyāyo 'nyatrāpi yathāsambhavamanusartavya iti ||

te caivamabhyūhyāḥ—
kācideṣā surastrīṇāṃ kathañcidiha dṛśyate |
nākalokāśrayā naiṣā nimeṣābhijñalocanā || viparyāsākṣepaḥ ||
iyamādyā vidheḥ sṛṣṭirmartyastrīṣu vilokyate |
rūpamīdṛk kutastāsāmiyaṃ kācitsurāṅganā || niścayākṣepaḥ ||
na prasīdasi tanvaṅgi ! prāṇairapi mamārpitaiḥ |
kimataḥ paramādeyaṃ yadevamapi niṣṭhurā || prasādākṣepaḥ || evamapare 'pyākṣepavikalpāḥ samunneyāḥ ||
arthāntaranyāsamupanyasyati—

vivakṣitaṃ kiñcidvastu artharūpaṃ prastutyābhidhāya tasya prastutasya vastunaḥ sādhane samarthasya yogyasyānyasya vastunaḥ kasyacit nyāsaḥ prayogo yaḥ, sa evaṃlakṣaṇo 'rthāntaranyāso nāmālaṅkāro jñeyaḥ pratipattavyaḥ | prativastūpamā[yā] asya ca ko bhedaḥ ubhayatrāpyarthāntaropanyāsāt ? mahān bhedaḥ | tatra hi sadṛśasyārthāntarasyopanyāsaḥ kevala[59b]mapekṣate, na sādhanabhūtasya | atra tu sādhanarūpasyaivārthāntarasya | sādṛśyaṃ bhavatu mā [vā] bhūt, na tadapekṣate | ata evoktaṃ tatsādhanasamarthasyeti ||
evaṃlakṣaṇo 'rthāntaranyāsaḥ kiṃprabheda ityāha—

viśvaṃ jagatsarvaṃ vyāpnoti sarvatra sambhavāditi viśvavyāpī | viśeṣe kvacit viṣaye tiṣṭhati na viśvaṃ vyāpnoti viśeṣasthaḥ | śleṣaḥ ekārthatā ekaśabdatā vā tenāviddho 'nugataḥ śleṣāviddhaḥ | virodhaḥ parasparavyāghāto vidyate 'sminniti virodhavān | ayuktam anucitaṃ karotīti ayuktakārī | ayukta ityarthaḥ | yuktaḥ samucitaḥ
ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya sa tathā | yukta iti yāvat | yuktaścāsau kathañcidayuktaśceti yuktāyuktaḥ | viparyayo 'yuktayukta iti ||

ityevam anantarokto vicitro bheda ādiryeṣāṃ yathāsambhavamavirodhādīnāṃ te bhedāḥ vikalpāḥ prayogeṣu kāvyeṣu lakṣitāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ kavibhiḥ asya arthāntaranyāsasya sambandhinaḥ | eṣāṃ bhedānāṃ rūpasya svabhāvasya yuktyai pratyavagamārtham | udāharaṇānāṃ prayogāṇāṃ mālā vargo nidarśyate iti ||

lg.l: paśya gacchata evāstaṃ niyatiḥ kena laṅghyate || 170 ||

div.p: bhagavantau guṇarāśā | jagato lokasya netra cakṣuṣī, prakāśakaratvāt | sūryācandramasāvapi, kimutānyad vastujātam ? astamudayaviparyayamabhāvaṃ gacchata eva | na punastatraiva tiṣṭhataḥ | paśya | kathametat ? kimatra citram ! niyatirbhāvānāmanapāyinī vyavasthā kācit, udayaḥ sarva eva vyayaniṣṭha iti | sā kena nāma vastunā laṅghya vikramituṃ śakyate ? na kenacit | sarvameveha vastūditamavaśyaṃ vyeti | tataḥ sūryācandramasorapi tathābhāvo nādbhuta iti prastutaṃ vastu sādhitam | ayaṃ ca viśvavyāpī, tathābhāvasya sarvatragatvāditi ||

ete payomuco meghāḥ śarīriṇāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ parītāpaṃ jvaraṃ haranti śamayanti | kimetat ? na hi teṣāmamī kiñcitpratyupakurvanti | kimevamucyate ? nanu prasiddhāvanumatau vā | mahatām uttā[nā]nāṃ na kṣudrāṇāṃ teṣāmātmakalyāṇe 'pyakalpatvāt [60a] ātmalābha udayaḥ pareṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva sambhūtānāmasambhūtānāṃ ca duḥkhasya tāpasya upaśāntaye nivartanārthaṃ jāyate | sthitireṣā mahatām | idameva ca teṣāṃ māhātmyam | anyathā svārthapare jagati kasteṣāṃ viśeṣo yadi te 'pi tathaiva syuḥ ? tataḥ payomucaḥ
pratyupakāranirapekṣāḥ jagattāpaṃ nudantīti upapāditam | ayaṃ ca viśeṣastho mahatāmeva tathātvāt [na] viśvavyāpīti ||

malayamāruto dakṣiṇaḥ pavanaḥ lokasya jagataḥ prītimutpādayati | kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ yenāyaṃ sarveṣāṃ priya iti sādhayannāha- nanvityādi | nanvityanumatau | dākṣiṃṇyaṃ paracchandānuvartitvam | sarvaprītijananānuguṇo guṇaḥ pauruṣeyaḥ, dakṣiṇadeśabhavatvaṃ ceti śabdaśleṣaḥ | tena sampannaḥ subhagaḥ sarvasya janasya priyo bhavati | na kasyacidapriyaḥ | kathamanukūlavartī kasyacidapriyo 'prītikaraḥ syāt | tasmānmalayajamāruto dakṣiṇaḥ sarveṣāṃ prītiṃmutpādayatīti samarthitam | ayaṃ ca śleṣāviddho dākṣiṇyasaṃpanna ityasya śliṣṭatvāduktena vidhineti ||

eṣa niśākaraścandro malino 'pi kalaṅkayogāt aśuddho 'pi jagat lokamāhlādayati prīṇayati | viruddhametat, kathaṃ sakalaṅkaḥ prītikaro 'doṣasya tathābhāvāt | tatsādhayatibhavatyevam | hiḥ yasmādarthe | yataḥ sadoṣo 'pi kathañcit kalaṅkavānapi na kevalamadoṣaḥ | dvijeśvaraścandro vipraśceti śleṣaḥ | sa tviha tu na vivakṣitaḥ, virodhasyaivābhidhitsitatvāt | anugṛhṇāti upakaroti hlādayati parān dharmopadeśādinā | tasmānmalino 'pi niśākaro jagadāhlādayatītyupapadyate | ayaṃ ca virodhavān | uktena vidhinā virodhadarśanāditi ||

madhunaḥ kusumāsavasya pānena kalānmadhurāt kaṇṭhānnirgato 'lināṃ madhulihāṃ madhuro 'pi dhvaniḥ kāmināṃ virahiṇā [60b]mapi karṇasya kaṭurudvejanīyo 'tyantotkaṇṭhākaratvād bhavati | etaccāyuktam | kathamīdṛśaḥ prītikaro dhvaniḥ udvejayati tatsādhyate-
kiṃ na yuktam, yataḥ pāpamīdṛśaṃ kāmināṃ rāgiṇām evaṃrūpaṃ karma yato 'yamevaṃvidho madhuro dhvaniḥ anyathā pratibhāti | kimatra kriyatām ! tasmātsambhavatyetaditi sādhitam | ayamayuktakārī madhurasya dhvaneḥ udvegahetutvāyogāditi ||

ambhojānāṃ kamalānāṃ dalāni patrāṇi teṣāṃ tanmayo vā saṃstaraḥ talpam | ayam anubhūyamānaḥ mama aṅgaṃ dehaṃ dahati tāpayati | yuktaṃ caitat | katham ? hutāśanasya agneḥ pratinidhiḥ sadṛśaḥ pāṭalatvāt dāhātmā dāhasvabhāvo raktapadmapatrasaṃstaro yujyate nanviti sādhitam | ayaṃ ca yuktātmā kathitena vidhinā dāhakatvayogāditi ||

lg.l: kṣiṇotu kāmaṃ śītāṃśuḥ kiṃ vasanto dunoti mām |

div.p: kāmaṃ nāmābhyupagame śītāṃśuścandraḥ māṃ kṣiṇotu tāpayatu yuktametat | vasantaḥ kiṃ kasmāt māṃ dunoti tāpayati ? naitad yuktam | idaṃ tvayuktamiti sādhayannāhamalinetyādi | malinena kalaṅkinā śītāṃśunā ācaritam anuṣṭhitaṃ karma kriyā tāpalakṣaṇam asāmpratam ayuktam | nanu kasya ? surabhervasantasya surabheścābhilaṣitasyeti śleṣaḥ | kathaṃ duṣṭānuṣṭhitaṃ karma nirdoṣo juṣati | tasmāt kṣiṇotu śītāṃśuḥ | vasantaḥ kiṃ dunotīti pūrvaṃ samarthitam | ayaṃ yuktāyuktaḥ, śītāṃśunā tāpasya yogāt vasantenāyogāduktena vidhineti ||

tāpāya pīḍa़ārthaṃ kalpante | ayuktametaditi apiśabdenāyogaḥ sūcyate | candrapakṣāṇāṃ tāpakāritvāyogāt | kimaṅga kiṃ punaḥ kamalākaraḥ tāpāya na bhavet | bhavatyeva | yuktametat | kiṃ tadayuktamidaṃ tu yuktamiti sādhayati- nahītyādi | indoḥ ekāntaśītasya gṛhyeṣu pakṣeṣu kumudeṣūgreṣu tāpakāriṣu, sūryasya ekāntataptasya gṛhyaḥ āyattaḥ
kamalākaro mṛduḥ śīto bhavet | kathamevaṃ sambhavāt ? tasmāt kusudānāṃ tāpakaratvam ayuktam | kamalākarasya tu yuktamiti sādhitam | ayaṃ tu viparyayo yuktāyukta iti ||

[61a] ādigrahaṇasaṃgṛhītāḥ kecidbhedā udāhriyante ||
sukhāya sudhiyāṃ lakṣmīrna kadācidaśarmaṇe |
kimuta śrīḥ sukhaprāptye jāyate na vipaścitām || aviruddho 'yam ||
sukhāya vipadaḥ santu sampado 'pi sukhāya te |
durnayaprasthitānāṃ hi sampado 'pi vipattayaḥ || aviruddhaviruddho 'yam ||
apakāro 'pyupātteṣu hitāya kimu satkṛtiḥ |
kṛpādhyāsitacittānāmīdṛśī mahatāṃ sthitiḥ ||
evamanyepyādiśabdasaṃgṛhītāḥ prabhedā ūhitavyā iti ||
vyatirekamāviṣkurvannāha—

lg.l: tatra yad bhedakathanaṃ vyatirekaḥ sa kathyate || 178 ||

div.p:
vivakṣitayoḥ kayościd dvayorvastunorarthayoḥ sādṛśye kathañcit tulyatve śabdena vācakena sākṣādupātte pratipādite sati śabdādvā upātte gṛhīte pratipattipratīte vā | aśabdopātte 'pi śabdopāttārthabalāt prakaraṇādervā jñāne na kevalaṃ śabdopātte | dvayī khalu pratītiḥ sambhavati | śābdī naiyāyikī ca, anyathā pratītyasaṃbhavāt | yaduktam—
nahi pratītiḥ sulabhā śabdanyāyavilaṅghinīiti | [1. 75]
tatra tayorvastunorviṣaye bhedasya kasyacidviśeṣaṇasya tatsambandhinaḥ kathanamabhidhānaṃ yadītyanūdya sa vyatirekaḥ kathyata iti vidhīyate ||
tamudāharannāha—

dhairyaṃ nirvikāratvaṃ lāvaṇyaṃ saundaryaṃ lavaṇarasatvaṃ ca māhātmyaṃ guṇalakṣaṇaṃ vaipulyaṃ ca pramukham ādiryeṣāmevamādīnāṃ tairguṇaiḥ tvaṃ vivakṣitaḥ kaścit | udanvataḥ samudrasya tulyo 'si | sādṛśyamuktam | bhedaṃ darśayannāha- bhedastvityādi | bhedastu viśeṣako vapuṣā īdṛśena dṛśyamāne[na] karacaraṇādimatā rucireṇa vapuṣā śarīreṇaiva nānyathā | tasyedṛśaṃ vapurnāstīti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

ityevaṃprakāro yaḥ so 'yamekavyatireko vijñeyaḥ | kutaḥ ? ekatravartinā puṃsi ekatra vartamānena dharmeṇa svabhāvenedṛśena vapurātmanā śabdopāttena hetunā ubhayavartinaḥ puruṣodanvatoḥ, tasya bhedasya viṃsadṛśatvasya pratīteḥ | [61b] pratītirvā viṣayo gocaraḥ, tasya tatra vā prāpteḥ kāraṇāt | pratīyamānatvāditi yāvat ||

amburāśiḥ sāgaraḥ | bhavānapi tvaṃ cābhinnavelau | abhinnā anatikrāntā velā maryādā yābhyāmiti | gambhīrāvagādhasvabhāvāviti sādṛśyam | bhedamāhaasāvamburāśirañjanasaṃkāśaḥ añjanena tulyaḥ | kṛṣṇa iti yāvat | tvaṃ tu bhavān punaḥ cāmīkarasya suvarṇasyeva cchavirvarṇo 'syeti cāmīkaracchavirgaura iti yāvat ||
tadvivṛṇoti—

lg.l: kārṣṇyaṃ piśaṅgatā cobhau yat pṛthag darśitāviha || 182 ||

div.p: yat yasmātkārṣṇyaṃ śyāmatvaṃ piśa[ṅga]tā gauratvaṃ cetyetau guṇau dharmau ubhayoramburāśipuruṣayorasādhāraṇatvena bhedakau visadṛśatvakarau pṛthag darśitau śabdenopāttau iha prayoge, tasmādayamubhayavyatirekaḥ pratipattavya iti ||

tvaṃ bhavān samudraśca yuvāṃ durvāro | duṣkaraṃ vāḥ pānīyaṃ yasya samudrasya, puruṣastu durvāro 'vyāhataprasaraḥ | śabdaśleṣaḥ | mahāsattvau mahāntaḥ sattvāḥ makarādayaḥ | mahānti vā satvāni yatra samudre | mahātsatvaṃ vīryaṃm yasya puṃsaḥ | śabdaśleṣaḥ | satejasau saha tejasā vahninā vāḍavena vartate samudraḥ | puruṣastu saha tejasā anubhāvena vartate | atrāpi śabdaḥ śliṣyate | sāmyametat bhindannāha | iyatā etāvanmātreṇa yuvayoḥ samudrasya tava ca bhedo vailakṣaṇyaṃ lakṣyate | samudro jalātmā jalamudakamātmā yasya jaḍaścācidrūpa ātmā yasyeti śabdacchalam | bhavān paṭuḥ kuśalaḥ prāpta iti ||
tadvibhajate—

lg.l: sa eṣa śleṣarūpatvāt saśleṣa iti gṛhyatām |

div.p: sa eṣa īdṛśo vyatirekaḥ saha śleṣeṇa vartate saśleṣa ityevaṃ gṛhyatāṃ vyavahriyatām | kutaḥ śleṣo yathoktarūpaḥ svabhāvo yasya tasya bhāvaḥ tasmāt | sahākṣepeṇa saha ca hetunā tiṣṭhatīti sākṣepaśca sahetuśceti dvāvaparau vyatirekau vidyete | tadapyetad dvayaṃ na kevalamanyat | darśyate udāhriyate ||

lg.l: tava kakṣyāṃ na yātyeva malino makarālayaḥ || 185 ||

div.p: bhavāniva sthitimān maryādāvānapi dhīro 'pi nirvikāro 'pi ratnānāṃ muktāprabālānām ākaro nilayo 'pi san tava kakṣyāṃ samatāṃ na yātyeva makarālayaḥ | samudro malinaḥ aśuddhaḥ | tvaṃ tu pariśuddha iti sākṣepo 'yamīdṛśo vyatirekaḥ pratipattavyaḥ | na yātīti niṣedhanāditi ||

śailaiḥ samantakūṭādibhirdvīpaiḥ siṃhalapramukhaiḥ sāgarairdakṣiṇaprabhṛtibhiḥ saha vartamānāṃ kṛtsnām aśeṣāṃ mahīṃ tvamiva vahan bibhraditi śleṣaḥ | [śeṣaḥ] phaṇipatiranantaḥ tvatto nikṛṣyate hīyate, bhavāneva tato 'tiricyate | kutaḥ ? bhujaṅgā nāgā viṭāśceti śabdacchalena doṣoktiḥ | teṣāṃ bhartṛbhāvāt svāmitvāt tasya | tvaṃ tu sādhūnāṃ bhartā iti saheturayaṃ vyatireko bhartṛbhāvāditi hetūpanyāsāt ||
śabdopātte pratīte vā sādṛśya [2. 178] ityuktaṃ tatra kataro 'yaṃ vyatireka ityāha-

śabdenopādānaṃ pratyaya upādīyate 'neneti śabdopādānaṃ yasya tat sādṛśyaṃ vastudvayasya tulyatvaṃ yatra vyatireke sa tathoktaḥ | ayaṃ prakāntaḥ | īdṛśaḥ uktaprakāraḥ pratipattavyaḥ | pratīyamānaḥ śabdopādānamantareṇa arthaprakaraṇādergamyamānaṃ sādṛśyaṃ yatra so 'pyasti vyatireko na kevalaṃ pūrvaḥ | sa pratīyamānasādṛśyo 'nuvidhīyate ||
idānīmudāhriyate—

tava mukhaṃ kamalaṃ ceti [dve samāne hṛdye] vastunī, kāntyādyupacārāt pratīyamānasādṛśye, anayordvayoḥ bhidā bhedaḥ kathyate | kamalaṃ jale saṃrohati jāyate [iti] jalasaṃrohi | tava mukhaṃ tvadupāśrayaṃ tvamupāśrayo 'dhikaraṇaṃ yasyeti āśrayabhedakathanamanayorvaisādṛśyam | kāntyādinā tu sadṛśa iti ||

mṛgasyevekṣaṇaṃ bhruvorvilāso nartanaṃ vidyate 'sminniti bhrūvilāsamaspṛṣṭo 'svīkṛto madasya madakaro rāgo 'neneti | aspṛṣṭamadarāgamidaṃ pratyakṣam | tuśabdo bhedaṃ dyotayati |
tava nayanayordvandvaṃ yugalaṃ tābhyāṃ bhrūvilāsamada[62b]rāgābhyāṃ bhūṣitamalaṃkṛtaṃ mṛgekṣaṇanayanadvandvayośca lohitādisādṛśyaṃ pratīyata iti ||
pūrvasya vyatirekasyāsya ca ko viśeṣa ityāha—

pūrvasmin tvanmukhaṃ kamalaṃ cetyādau bhedo visadṛśatvamātrameva | atiśayaprakāśaśūnyatvāt | tasyoktiḥ kathanaṃ kamalaṃ jalasaṃrohi tvanmukhaṃ tvadupāśrayamiti | asmin prayoge punarādhikyasyātiśayasya darśanaṃ pratipādanaṃ pratipattirvā na pūrvavad bhedamātroktiḥ | bhrūvilāsādilakṣaṇo guṇo nayanadvandvasyāsti na mṛgekṣaṇasyeti ādhikyadarśanam | tasmādanayoḥ prayogayoḥ pratīyamānasādṛśyayorvyatireke samāne 'pi ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ sādṛśye vastudvayasya sāmye śabdopātte sati vyatirekaḥ sadṛśapakṣapātī | cakāraḥ kiñcidityarthe | punaranyaḥ kevalaṃ pūrvoktaḥ | śabdopāttasādṛśyo 'yaṃ cāparo viśiṣṭaḥ pradarśyata iti ||

tava mukhaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ padmaṃ ca dve ime vastunī phulle prabuddhe surabhiriṣṭo gandho 'nayoriti surabhigandhinī | samāsānta ikāraḥ | śabdopāttamīdṛśaṃ sādṛśyaṃ tatpadaprayogāt | ata eva pratītasādṛśye vyatirekādhikāre 'smin kathamakasmādayamuttīrṇaḥ śabdopāttasādṛśyo vyatirekaḥ patita iti śaṅkāparihārārthaṃ punaḥ prastāvaṃ kartuṃ sādṛśyavyatirekaśca punaranyaḥ pradarśyata iti uktaṃ vivariṣyati | imaṃ vyatirekaṃ pūrvatretyādinā bhinatti | bhramantau bhramarau yasmin ambhoje tattathā lole cañcale dṛṣṭī cakṣuṣī yatra tādṛśaṃ mukhaṃ te tava | tuśabdo bhedaṃ dyotayati iti ||

ayaṃ dṛśyamānaścandro 'mbarasya nabhasa uttaṃsaḥ śekharaḥ tatsadṛśatvāt | ayamadhyakṣo haṃsastoyasya bhūṣaṇo bhūṣayatīti nandigrahītyādinā lyuḥ | bhūṣaṇaṃ vā alaṅkāra
vastu karaṇe lyuṭ | nabha idamantarīkṣaṃ nakṣatramāli tārakādhāri | malamalladhāraṇe | nakṣatrāṇāṃ vā mālā vṛndaṃ vidyate asminniti matvarthīyaḥ | idamaparokṣaṃ payaḥ saraḥ udgatāni kumudāni asminnityutkumudamiti ||
[63a] ayaṃ ca pratītasādṛśyo vyatireko na punarvacanopāttasādṛśya iti darśayannāha—

saukṣmyamacchatvamādiryasya nīlatvādeḥ | tena tadeva vā sāmyaṃ sādṛśyam aśabdopāttam ambarādervastunaḥ tadavyabhicārādarthāt pratīyamānaṃ gamyamānaṃ yayostayorviyaccāmbhaśceti | viyadambhasorbhedo viśeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ | nakṣatramāli nabhaḥ payaḥ utkumudamiti sākṣāt pratipāditaḥ | pratītā nyāyalabdhā na vācanikī śuddhiḥ śauklyaṃ yayostayoḥ | haṃsaśca candraśceti tayoḥ haṃsacandrayorbhedaḥ | kutaḥ ? candro 'yamambarottaṃsaḥ haṃso 'yaṃ toyabhūṣaṇaḥ iti śabdopāttaḥ, na nyāyāt iti ||
nanvayamapi sādṛśyavyatireka eva, candrahaṃsayornabhaḥpayasośca śuddhyādinā sadṛśayoryathoktabhedakathanāt | tatkiṃ pūrvaka eva sādṛśyavyatireka ucyate ityāśaṅkyāha—

pūrvatra tvanmukhaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ cetyādau, ubhayatrāpi mukhe puṇḍarīke ca sādṛśyaṃ śabdavat | śabdo vācako 'smin iti śabdopāttamiti yāvat | candro 'yamityādau tu pratītaṃ na vacanalabdham, bhṛṅgaśca netraṃ ca tadādiryasya tallolatvasya tattulyaṃ sadṛśaṃ sat bhedakaṃ mukhapuṇḍarīkayorasāmyanimittamuktam, tattasmāt sadṛśavyatirekatāpūrvaka eva tanmukhamityādiḥ sādṛśyavyatireka ucyate, nānantaraścandro 'yamityādi | tatra śabdavatsādṛśyābhāvāt | śabdavatā ca sādṛśyena sadṛśavyatirekavyavahārasya kartumiṣṭatvāt |

athavā dvayorapi sadṛśavyatirekatā vyākhyāyate | pūrvatretyādi candro 'yamityādau pratītaṃ sādṛśyaṃ na śabdavat yathā vivṛtaṃ pūrvatra | tvanmukhamityādau ca śabdavat | iyatā bhedaḥ | bhedakaṃ bhṛṅganetrādi | nakṣatrakumudāmbaratoyaparigṛhītirādiśabdena | tadetadubhayatrāpi tvanmukhamityādau candra ityādau ca tulyaṃ sadṛśaṃ vartate | tasmāt sadṛśavyatirekatā ubhayatrāpītyapekṣyate | udāharaṇadvayamapīdaṃ sadṛśavyatirekaḥ | sadṛśapadārthakṛto vyatirekaḥ sadṛśavyatireka iti kṛtvā | etadarthaṃ ca sadṛśavyatirekaśca punaranyaḥ pradarśyate iti [2. 190] pādāntaraṃ draṣṭavyam ||

yūnāṃ taruṇānām | prabhavatyasmāditi prabhavaḥ | yauvanaṃ dvitīyaṃ vayaḥ prabhavaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya tattamo 'ndhakāraṃ sadasadvivekavibandhakatvād ajñānam | ratnānāṃ maṇīnāmālokaiḥ dīptibhiḥ saṃhāryaṃ bhedyaṃ na tathā aratnālokasaṃhāryam | sūryasya raśmibhirabhīṣubhiḥ avāryamanapaneyam | dṛṣṭeḥ sadasaddarśanasya rodhaṃ vibandhaṃ karoti [iti] dṛṣṭirodhakaraṃ yūnāṃ viṣamamidaṃ tama iti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

yad yasmāt tamojāteḥ prasiddhāyā bahirdhvāntasya tulyamidamanantaroktaṃ tamaḥ | katham ? dṛṣṭirodhitayā heyopādeyadarśanavibandhakatvena hetunā | anyaiḥ dṛṣṭirodhitāyāḥ sakāśāt bhinnaiḥ aratnālokasaṃhāryatvādibhirdharmaiḥ hetubhūtaiḥ bhinnaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ tamojāterityutprekṣyate | adarśi yad darśitamuktam | tasmāt svajātivyatireko 'yamīdṛśaḥ | tasyāḥ tamojāteḥ prasiddhāyāḥ kathañcid vyatiriktatvād evaṃvidhasya tamasa iti ||
vibhāvanāmudbhāvayannāha—

lg.l: yatra svābhāvikatvaṃ vā vibhāvyaṃ sā vibhāvanā || 197 ||

div.p: yathoktau prasiddhasya lokapratītasya sākṣāddarśanāt kiñcitkāryaṃ prati hetoḥ kāraṇasya kasyacid vyāvṛtyā nirāsenāpakṣepāt | kathaṃ tarhi kāryasambhava ityāhayatkiñcidanurūpaṃtatra kāraṇāntaraṃ prasiddhāt kāraṇādanyannimittaṃ vibhāvyam avagamyate | yatra kāraṇāntaramapi nāpekṣyate tatra kā gatirityāha- svābhāvikatvaṃ veti | svābhāvikaṃ naisargikaṃ vastudharmasiddhaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam | svābhāvikaṃ vā | na kevalaṃ kāraṇāntaraṃ kāryasyotprekṣyate | vibhāvyaṃ [cintanīyaṃ] sā tādṛśī tallakṣaṇā vibhāvanā jñeyā | vibhāvyate prakāśyate kāraṇāntaraṃ svābhāvikatvaṃ vā anayā asyāmiti vā vibhāvanā tathāvidhoktiriti |
tamudāraharannāha—

pītāḥ pītavantaḥ | bahulavacanāt kartari ktaḥ | ārambhe vā | athavā
vanāya pītapratibaddhavatsām [raghuvaṃśe 2. 1] itivat | na tathā apītā akṛtamadhupānāḥ santaḥ kṣībāḥ mattāḥ kādambāḥ kalahaṃsāḥ asaṃmṛṣṭam apariśodhitam sat amalam anāvilam ambaram ākāśam, katakādibhiḥ aprasāditam anapanītakāluṣyaṃ sat sūkṣmam acchama ambu ca yatra jagati tanmanoharaṃ subhagamāsīt abhūditi |

[64a] sundari ! tava dṛṣṭiḥ anañjitā añjanaśalākayā yathāsthānamaspṛṣṭā satī asitā kṛṣṇā | bhrūśca anāvarjitā prayatnena kenacit anāmitā satī natā vakrā | arañjito[ 'pi] lākṣārasarāgādinā aruṇo lohitaḥ adharaścāyaṃ [dṛśyamānaḥ | etat] sarvam alaukikaṃ taveti ||

nanvetanmadādikaṃ madhupānādihetukam, tatkathaṃ tena vibhāvayitumutsahate ? hetuphalabhāvasya sarvatra pratiniyamadarśanāt | tadetad vyāhatamucyate | na ca kāvye 'pi tādṛśātprakaraṇādanyatra viruddhamādriyate | yad vakṣyati doṣaparisaṃkhyāne deśakālakalālokanyāyāgamavirodhe [3. 318] etadāśaṅkya bravīti—

kṣībatvamādiryasyāmalatvādeḥ ślokadvayanirdiṣṭasya kāryasya tattathā yat kṣībatvādikāryaṃ pītāderaparaḥ śaradāgamayauvanodayalakṣaṇo heturyasyetyanyahetukaṃ syād bhavet, ata eva nāsya pītāderjanmotpattirityapītādijanma, tadataddhetutvayorekatra virodhāt | ādiśabdena saṃsṛṣṭādikāraṇaṃ vākyadvayopāttaṃ gṛhyate | ata eva [anya]hetukaṃ ca, prasiddhahetuvyāvṛttena asya heturastīti | na caivaṃ śaṅkanīyam, anyahetukaṃ hi sahetukam | tatkathamahetukaṃ syāt ? sahetukatvāhetukatvayorekatra samāveśāyogāditi | nahi yena sahetukaṃ tainevāhetukamucyate, yato virodhaḥ syāt | prasiddhakāraṇavyāvṛtterahetukam | anyahetukatvāttu sahetukamiti paryāyeṇāvirodhaḥ | yathā pādavānevāpādaśca, kasyacitpādasyābhāvāt | tasya tādṛśasya kāryasyeha prayogavivakṣā pratipādanābhiṃlāṣaḥ | sākṣāttathānuktasyāpi sāmarthyāt prasiddhasyetarasyaivāhetorabhāve 'nupapatteravagamaḥ | svābhāvikatvaṃ tu iha na vivakṣitam | vakṣyamāṇaiva sā vibhāvanā | na ca kāvye sarvatra śābdyeva pratipattiḥ | sāmarthyabhāvinyā api tasyā darśanāditi vistareṇa prathame paricchede pratipāditam | yā punaḥ śabdaṃ nyāyaṃ ca tādṛśaṃ nā[pe]kṣate [sā] sudurlabhā | yaduktaṃ nahi pratītiḥ sulabhā śabdanyāyavilaṅghinīti [1. 75] | yata evamiti tasmādaviruddhatā dṛṣṭivirodhaḥ prāgbhāvito nāsti apītakṣībetyādāviti ||

sundari ! [64b] vaktraṃ tava nisargeṇa svabhāvādeva surabhi sugandhi, na mukhavāsādinā | vapuścāvyāje[na] prayatnena tādṛśena vinā sundaram abhirūpam | akāraṇena vināpakāreṇa kenacit candro ripuḥ vartate, vyathāhetutvād virahiṇām | sa vivakṣitaḥ kaścit pumān nirnimittaṃ suhat mitraṃ vartate, tathāvidhasambhavopakārakabhāvād iti ||
katameyaṃ vibhāvaneti vivṛṇoti—

lg.l: uktaṃ ca surabhitvādiphalaṃ tat sā vibhāvanā || 202 ||

div.p:
nisargādibhiḥ padaiḥ śabdaiḥ kartṛbhūtaiḥ karaṇairvā | ādiśabdenāvyājādiparigrahaḥ | hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ surabhitvādiḥ mukhavāsādilakṣaṇaḥ sākṣādvācakavyāpāreṇa, na sāmarthyāt | nivartito niṣiddhaḥ phalaṃ ca tasya surabhisundaratvādigrahaṇenopādīyate | uktaṃ sākṣādeva | tataḥ kimityāha- tat sā vibhāvaneti | yata evaṃ tatastasmāt svābhāvikaphalā vibhāvanā jñātavyā | yā paraiḥ
hetorniṣedhanāt tasya yat phalasya vibhāvanam |
jñeyā vibhāvanenaivāsāvevaṃ kathyate yathā || [ ] ityuktā | na tu pūrvaṃ kāraṇa vinā vibhāvanaiva sā kathitena vidhinā | nanu sarvathā hetuniṣedhe kathaṃ phalasyodayaḥ ? svabhāvāditi cet- ko 'yaṃ svabhāvaḥ, phalasya tasyānyasya vā ? na tāvadasya svayameva niṣedhāt | svābhāvikaphalābhyudayāt | phalasyāpi svabhāvaḥ sato 'sato vā ? satastāvat svabhāvo na hetuḥ | svabhāvavat tadavyatirekāt phalasyāpi siddhatvāt | svabhāvāt phalaṃ jñāyata iti riktā vācoyuktiḥ | na ca bhāvasvabhāvayorbhedaḥ | tattvagrahaṇānniḥsvabhāvatvaprasaṅgāt | tasyeti sambandhāyogācca | vikalpanirmitastvaparīkṣākṣamo na niṣidhyate | bhedaḥ phalasya svabhāva iti |1 asato 'pi sutarāṃ na hetuḥ | tadavyatirekeṇa tadvatsvabhāvasyāsyāpyasattvāt | kathaṃ svabhāvāt phalaṃ bhavati ? na hyasato janakatvamatiprasaṅgāt | tatkathaṃ svābhāvikavibhāvaneyaṃ
na viruddhyate | kāvye ca tathāvidhaprastāvavyatirekeṇa viruddhaṃ nādriyata iti uktam | ucyate | ihāpyadṛṣṭādikaṃ nimittaṃ tathāvidhamastyeva vastunaḥ | tathāpi lokastadupekṣamāṇaḥ prasiddhaṃ ca kāraṇam tādṛśamapaśyan svābhāvikaṃ phalamiti vyavaharati | lokavyavahārānna virodhi [65a] ca kāvyamiti | tadanusāreṇa svābhāvikaṃ phalaṃ vibhāvyate | śāstrīyo 'pi cāyaṃ svābhāvikaphalavādaḥ yadāhuḥ—

lg.l: patrāṇi ke 'tra racayanti patattriṇāṃ vā svābhāvikaṃ jagadidaṃ niyataṃ tathaiva || iti |

div.p: tasmāllokaśāstrānurodhenaitaduktaṃ tatparāyaṇatvāt kāvyasyeti | alamatigahanena ||
samāsoktiṃ vyaktīkurvannāha—

kiñcidiṣṭaṃ vastvabhipretya manasikṛtya tena abhipretena vastunā tulyasya sadṛśasya anyasya vastunaḥ kasyacinna visadṛśasya | tatastatpratītyasambhavāt | sadṛśenaiva tu tadupalakṣaṇā uktiranyaparā yā anyasyaiva tantrā, a[nya]sya pratīteḥ | sā tallakṣaṇā samāsoktiḥ iṣyate tajjñaiḥ | kutaḥ ? saṃkṣiptaṃ vivakṣitavastvapekṣayā svalpaṃ rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasyāḥ tadbhāvaḥ tattvam tasmāt | tato 'nvartheyaṃ saṃjñā saṃkṣepoktiḥ samāsoktiriti kṛtvā | tasmādiyaṃ guṇībhatā arthāntaraṃ [sphuṭayati] na tu svārthatantrā | iyameva cānyaiḥ dhvaniriti vyavahriyate | yadāhuḥ—
yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā tamarthamupasarjanīkṛtasvāthau |
vyaṅktaḥ kāvyaviśeṣaḥ sa dhvaniriti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ | iti || [dhvanikārikāyām 1. 13]
tāmudāharannāha—

phulle prabuddhe paṅkaje sthitaṃ madhu makarandaṃ yathākāmam icchānurūpaṃ piban bhramaraḥ | asannaddhaṃ saurabhyamasminniti asannaddhasaurabhyam anupajātatādṛśaguṇaṃ kuḍmalaṃ cumbati | paśya yathā asyātilolatā | ityāmukhayati kañcit | śabdārthastāvadayamīdṛśaḥ pratibhāti ||
bhāvārthamatra darśayannāha—

iti iha vākye prayukte prauḍha़āyām ārūḍha़manmathavibhramavimardabhūmau aṅganāyāṃ baddhā niveśitā ratiḥ sambhoga eva līlā vibhramo yena yasya vā tasya rāgiṇaḥ | kasyāñcit bālāyām prathamavayovartinyām aprauḍha़āyāṃ kasyāñcidviṣaye icchāyā rāgasya vṛttiḥ prasaro vibhāvyate pratīyate | na tu sākṣāducyate | tato 'yamevārtho vidheyatvāt pradhānam | śabdārthastūpasarjanībhūtastatparatvābhāvādvākyasyeti ||
samāsokteḥ prabhedaṃ darśayannāha—

[65b] yatkiñcid vastu sāmānyākārapratītamīdṛśamidaṃ nānyatheti kutaścid vyavacchidya kenacid guṇādinā vyavasthāpyate tadviśeṣyam | tadeva tanmātramupādhibhedavyavacchedāt bhinnamatulyaṃ yasyāṃ sā tathā viśeṣyamātreṇa vā bhinnā avayavadharmasya samudāye nyāsāt | vijātīyaviśeṣyāpi satī tulyākāramabhinnaṃ viśeṣaṇamupādhirasyāmiti tulyākāraviśeṣaṇā yā sāpīyaṃ samāsoktirasti | na kevalam anyā | yadāhaaparāpyasti na kevalameṣā | kīdṛśī ? bhinnaṃ kiñcidabhinnaṃ ca viśeṣaṇamupādhirasyāmiti bhinnābhinnaviśeṣaṇā | viśeṣyaṃ tu ubhayatrābhinnamiti ||
tadubhayamudāharati—

yo 'yaṃ mahān vṛkṣaḥ kālamiyantaṃ prārthitaḥ, sa āsāditaḥ prāptaḥ prasannena vidhinopānītaḥ | rūḍhaṃ pariṇataṃ mūlalaṃ jaṭālakṣaṇaṃ yasya mahāvṛkṣasya, rūḍha़mavikalaṃ nijaprakṛtilakṣaṇaṃ balam mūlam [tasya] rājyamūlatvāt | yasya puṃsaḥ | phalānāṃ vṛkṣocitānāṃ ca kālānāṃ ca sampadāṃ bharaiḥ sandohairarthinaḥ phalaṃ kāṅkṣiṇaḥ puṣṇannupakurvana mahāvṛkṣaḥ puruṣaśca yathākramam sāndrā nirantarā chāyā ātapacchedalakṣaṇā yasya sāndrā paryāptā dehaprabhāsvabhāvā aṅgarūpā kīrtilakṣaṇā vā yasya puṃsaḥ so 'yamāsādita iti | iyaṃ viśeṣyamātrabhinnā tulyākāraviśeṣaṇā | viśeṣyavṛkṣasya vivakṣitāt purūṣāt bhinnanvāt rūḍha़mūlatvādeśca viśeṣaṇasyoktena prakāreṇābhinnatvāditi ||

lg.l: sacchāyaḥ sthairyavān daivādeṣa labdho mayā drumaḥ || 208 ||

div.p: eṣo 'bhilaṣi 'to 'rthaḥ | daivāt kutaścit bhāgadheyāt labdhaḥ prāpto mayā | viṭapānāṃ viṭaparupo vā ābhogaḥ prasāro 'nalpo mahān yasya drumasya | phalāni puṣpāṇi ca samṛddhayaḥ śriyaḥ vṛkṣocitāḥ [yasya] | sahācchāyayā candrā rkālokavilokarūpayā vartate sacchāyo drumaḥ | puruṣastu pūrvoktayā kāntyādirūpacchāyayā yukta iti sacchāyaḥ | sthairyavān drumo vātādibhiranutpāṭyatvāt | puruṣastu vipakṣairdurddharṣatvāt | eṣā viśeṣyamātrabhinnā bhinnaviśeṣaṇā, vivakṣitāt puruṣādviśeṣyāt drumasya viśeṣasya bhinnatvāt | analpaviṭapābhogatvasya phalapuṣpasamṛddhimattvasya ca druma eva sambhavāt | sacchāyatāyāḥ sthairyasya cobhayatrāpi bhāvāduktena vidhineti ||
tadubhayaṃ vivṛṇoti—

lg.l: sarve sādhāraṇā dharmāḥ pūrvatrānyatra tu dvayam || 209 ||

div.p: ubhayatra ubhayo rūḍha़mūla ityādau analpaviṭapābhoga ityādau ca prayogayoḥ pumān puruṣaḥ kaścit abhimataḥ vṛkṣatvena vṛkṣaguṇasāmyāt drumarūpeṇopavarṇitaḥ saṃkīrtitaḥ tatparatvāt anapekṣitasvārthavṛttervṛkṣādiśabdasya puruṣaviśeṣapratyāyakatvam | bhedastviyān | pūrvatra rūḍhamūlamityādau sarve ye kecit tatropāttāḥ rūḍha़mūlamityādayaḥ sādhāraṇāstulyā dharmā viśeṣaṇāni ubhayatrāpi sambhavāt | anyatra tu anantarokte analpaviṭapābhoga ityādau punardvayaṃ sādhāraṇamasādhāraṇaṃ sacchāyatvasya sthairyavattāyāśca ubhayatrāpi sambhavāt | analpaviṭapābhogatvasya puṣpaphalasamṛddhimattāyāśca vṛkṣa eva sambhavāditi ||

ayam aparokṣavṛttiḥ ambhonidhiḥ sāgaraḥ kālena saṃvartasamayena pariśoṣyate vilayaṃ nīyate | kaṣṭaṃ bata iti khede | puruṣaḥ kālena mṛtyunā pariśoṣyate parāsuḥ kriyate | ambhonidhiḥ vyālaiḥ sarpaiḥ saṃsṛṣṭaḥ | puruṣastu, nivṛtto vyālaiḥ duṣṭaiḥ saṃsargo 'syeti nivṛttavyālasaṃsargaḥ | ambhonidhiḥ svabhāvalavaṇajalalakṣaṇāśayayuktaḥ | puruṣastu nisargeṇa svabhāvena madhuraḥ surasaḥ prītikaraḥ āśayaḥ cittaṃ yasyeti nisargamadhurāśayaḥ | gāmbhīryādayastu guṇāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ pratīyanta eva | anyathā kathamambhonidhitvena puruṣo varṇyate tataścāpūrvo 'yamambhonidhiriti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

iti īdṛk apūrvasamāsoktiḥ iṣyate | vyāvṛttisūcane 'pariśeṣeṇa pratītau viṣaye | tena samudreṇa samānasya puṃsaḥ ubhayorapi śoṣaṇalakṣaṇasya vināśasya vṛtterupāttāpekṣayā etaduktam | gāmbhīryādāvapi samānasyeti gamyata eva | samudre apūrvasya prasiddhasya dharmasya vyālasaṃsargādeḥ nivartanāt niṣedhāt nivṛttavyāla ityādinā | apūrvasamāsoktiriti prakṛtam ||
atiśayoktimādarśayannāha—

viśeṣasya vastugatasya prakarṣasya atimātrasya [66b] kasyacidvivakṣayā pratipādanābhiprāyeṇa hetunā lokasya jagataḥ sīmā sthitiḥ | tāmativatituṃ laṃghayituṃ śīlaṃ yasyāḥ sā lokasīmātivartinī | yā ityanūdya asau sā tallakṣaṇā atiśayoktiḥ syāditi vidhīyate | vivakṣā yā iti pāṭhe atiśayasya lokasīmātivartinī yā vivakṣā asau atiśayāktiriti yojanīyam | atiśayasya yathāsthitād vastunaḥ avikalasya utkarṣasya pratipādikā iti atiśayoktiḥ | sā ca iyamalaṅkārāṇāmanyeṣām uttamā pradhānā, atyantamanoharatvāt | yathāhi vastuno manojñasya prakṛtyā tato 'pi atiriktā kāpyavasthā pratisaṃskriyate, sā nitarāmanurāgamātanotīti alaṅkārādhirājatvenaiṣā abhiṣicyate kavibhiriti ||
evaṃ lakṣaṇataḥ pradarśya atiśayoktiṃ lakṣyataḥ parisphuṭayannāha—

mallikānāṃ mālāḥ srajo bibhratīti mallikāmālabhāriṇyaḥ | iṣṭaketyādinā hrasvaḥ | anenottamāṅgaśauklyamāhāryaṃ darśayati | sarvam aṅgaṃ vyāpnoti sarvāṅgīṇamārdram aśyānaṃ candanaṃ yāsāṃ tāstathā | kṣaumavatyaḥ sitasūkṣmāmbaradhāriṇyaḥ | etena śeṣāṅgaśvaityamāhṛtam | abhisārikā madanaśaratādadahyamānamanasaḥ svayameva kāntāntikam upayāntyaḥ striyaḥ | tāśca durdinābhisārikāḥ śaradabhisārikā ityādayo hya[nya]troktāḥ | iha śaradabhisārikāḥ vivakṣitāḥ | yathāha— jyotsnāyāṃ na lakṣyanta iti | nepathyaṃ ca tadanurūpaṃ darśitam | jyotsnāyāṃ candrikāyāṃ na lakṣyante, na nirdhāryante, etā abhisārikāścandrikeyamiti | evamatisāndrā candrikā yatastatra vastvantaraṃ tādṛśaṃ na vibhāvyata iti | vastutaḥ tathātvābhāve 'pi viśeṣastādṛśaḥ kalpyate | yathā yathāvasthitavastvativṛttisandaśitedṛśātiśayālokavelāvilaṅghinī iyamatimanoharā jāyate tadvidāmiti ||
kasyātra viśeṣo vivakṣita iti vivṛṇvannāha—

candrasya ātapo jyotsnā tasya bāhulyaṃ ghanatvam tacca utkarṣasyāstīti utkarṣamatimātram uktam udbhāvitam yataḥ tatrābhisārikāḥ kalpitamallikādisitākalpāḥ | kṣīrasāgare tarantyo [67a] haṃsasaṃhatya iva na vibhāvyante | yatheyamatiśayoktiḥ tathā evaṃ saṃśaye saṃśayasya vā atiśayo viśeṣaḥ | saṃśayātiśayoktiḥ ekadeśena samudāyopalakṣaṇādiḥ yasyām | niścayātiśayoktyādīnāṃ tāsām vyaktau viśeṣāvagamanimittaṃ vyaktyai vā vyaktyarthaṃ kiñcit kiyanmātraṃ lakṣyaṃ nidarśyate udāhriyata iti ||

lg.l: asti nāstīti sandeho na me 'dyāpi nivartate || 215 ||

div.p: priye ! tava stanayoḥ payodharadvayasya jaghanasyāpi nitambasya madhye sthāne madhyaṃ mūrtta dehāvayavabhūtamasti kiṃ vā nāstītyubhayapakṣapātī sandehaḥ saṃśayaḥ | tatparaṃ ciramārabhya paśyato me mama adyāpi na nivartate | madhyaṃ tava nitambini ityapi paṭhyate | sugamam | tanīyaso 'pi tatra madhyasya sūpalakṣyatvāt saṃśayo jātu jāyate tathāpyevamatibhūmimatiropitaḥ kavinā, yataḥ tadvidaḥ pramadamayā jāyante | tadīdṛśī saṃśayoktiriti ramaṇīyeti ||

nitambini ! tava madhyaṃ stanajaghanayorantaramastīti nirṇetuṃ niścetuṃ śakyam pāryate | katham ? payodharayoḥ payodharalakṣaṇasya bharasya sthiteravasthānasya tadādhāramadhyavyatirekeṇa anyathā prakārāntareṇa anupapatterayogāt | payodharabharaḥ tāvat avatiṣṭhamāno 'tisthūlatvāt sākṣādapekṣate [madhyarūpamāśrayam | tatra] madhye sandehaḥ | tadapyayameva niścāyayati | vinā tenānupa[padya]mānāvasthāna[tvāt] kāmamatikṣāmam
madhyaṃ tatrāpi [unneyam] eva | atra niścayo jagataḥ | naivamanyathānupapattimṛte labhyateḥ | tathāpīyamatigatirīdṛśī yuktatayā nītā kavineti niścayātiśayoktirīdṛśī prītisarvasvaṃ rasikānāmiti ||

bhuvanānāṃ svargādīnāṃ tritayaṃ trayo 'vayavā asyeti tasyodaraṃ madhyaṃ viśālam ativistīrṇam aho vismayanīyam ! katham ? yat yasmāt bhūpāla ! tava yaśasāṃ rāśiḥ kīrtisandoho mātuṃ paricchetum iyattayā aśakyo 'pi atra bhuvanatritayodare māti paryāptaḥ tiṣṭhati nātiricyate | tasmāt atiprakāṇḍamidamidānīṃ pratīyate sayuktikamevam asmābhiḥ | lokastu prasiddha[67b]mātramanudhāvati | bahuguṇasaṃkīrtanaṃ yaśaḥ | tacca kvacit kiñcit | yadapi sarvatra tadapi na tathā jagattraye māti, yathā [ya]tkiñcinmūrtta[va]stu kvacidavakāśe | tathāpyevaṃ viśālaṃ yaśo vivakṣittaṃ yat tanmānād bhuvanodaraṃ sādhyate iti yaśo 'tiśayoktirevaṃvidhā vidagdheti ||
atiśayoktipraśaṃ[sā]mukhena nigamayannāha—

imāmanantaroktāmuktimatiśaya ityāhvayaḥ saṃjñā yasyā ityatiśayāhvayāmatiśayoktimiti yāvat | vāgīśānāṃ kavīnāmutkarṣayogāt | mahitāṃ pūjitāmatyantavallabhām | alaṅkārāṇāṃ śeṣāṇāmalaṅkārāṇāmapi na kevalaṃ kāvyasya dharmiṇaḥ | atiśaye vāpiśabdaḥ | parāyaṇamāśrayamekaṃ pradhānamāhuḥ kathayanti kavayaḥ | tathāhi svabhāvoktirapi viśeṣoktyanugāminī śobhate yā yathāvasthitavastusvarūpaparidīpanī | anyathā kathañcidapi atiśayāśaṃsanena tanmātrakathane nirjīva[ḥ/?/] kīdṛśaḥ kāvyālaṅkāraḥ ? viśeṣalakṣaṇatvāttasya | kiṃ punarvakroktayastattadviśeṣarūpāḥ upamārūpakādayaḥ ? tasmādalaṅkārāṇāmapīyamalaṃkriyā 'tiśayoktiriti sūktametat alaṅkārā[ntarā]ṇāmapyekaṃ parāyaṇamiti | ādiśabda[1. 214]saṃgṛhītāḥ atiśayoktivikalpāḥ kecidudāhriyante—
parirambheṣu rambhoru ! payodharaparākṛtam |
nāsti madhyaṃ tavetyetat viparyasyati me manaḥ || viparyāsātiśayoktiḥ |
nīlā netradyutiḥ śuddhā sudatyā dantadīdhitiḥ |
tasyāḥ saṃbhinnayordatto gaṅgāyamunayoḥ śriyam || upamānugatātiśayoktiḥ |
mukhenduhasitajyotsnāsaṅgatāstava sundari |
niśāḥ prakāśamāyānti nimagnaśaśimaṇḍalāḥ || rūpakānugatātiśayoktiḥ |
nīlayā tava lolākṣi ! lolayā locanatviṣā |
āpūritā diśo bhānti niśāparigatā iva || utprekṣānugatātiśayoktiḥ |
evamanye 'pyatiśayoktivikalpā anugantavyā iti ||
utprekṣāmālakṣayannāha—

cetanasya sajīvasya acetanasya nirjīvasya vastunaḥ vṛttiḥ avasthā anyathaiva vivakṣitaprakārāpekṣayā anyenaiva rūpeṇa yathā bhavati [tathā] sthitā vartamānā satī yathāvasthānādanyena prakāreṇa anyathā utprekṣyate parikalpyate [68a] yatra uktau tāmevaṃlakṣaṇāmutprekṣāṃ viduḥ vidanti kathayanti kavayaḥ | utprekṣyate anyathākriyate vastusthitiḥ asyām anayā iti vā utprekṣā | yathetyudāharati ||

madhyandine madhyāhne arkaḥ mārtaṇḍaḥ atipracaṇḍaḥ | tena santaptaḥ dagdho gajaḥ tatpratīkārakāṅkṣī sarasīṃ jalāśayaṃ gāhate praviśati iti yathāvasthiteyaṃ cetanasya gajalakṣaṇasya vastuno vṛttiruktā | seyamanyathā sthitasya anyathā utprekṣā | mārttaṇḍasya yena santaptaḥ [tasya] gṛhyāṇi pakṣāṇi tatpādopajīvitvāt padmāni uddhartum unmūlayitum utsukaḥ samīhate gajaḥ | yataḥ sākṣādapakartum aśaktau tadāśritāpakāradvāreṇāpi sa eva pratyapakṛtaḥ syāt | kṛtasaṃtāpasaṃparkaḥ sutarā[ma]rka iti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

snātumamandabahistāgśāntaye | pātum udakam | bisānyattaṃ mṛṇālāni kaṣayitum antastapteḥ kṣuttarṣalakṣaṇāyāḥ parikṣayārtham | kariṇo madhyandinārkasantaptasya jale jalasya vā gāhanaṃ saraḥpraveśo vartate | yathāsthiteyaṃ vastunaścetanasya vṛttiḥ kīrttitā | tat tādṛśaṃ jalagāhanaṃ vairasya sūryasantāpakāriṇyapakārāśayasya niṣkrayāya tatpakṣapadmoddharaṇadvāreṇa pratikaraṇārtham iti evam anyathotprekṣya adhyāropya varṇyate kathyate kavinā yathā rasāvahaṃ bhavatīti ||

āyatākṣi ! tava dṛṣṭyā lolalocanena karṇopāntapātinyā vijṛmbhamāṇakāntidvāreṇa karṇotpalaṃ śravaṇāvataṃsakuvalayaṃ vilaṅghyate tiraskriyate, tatkāntyā laṅghanasambhāvanayā tathetyuktam | yad vakṣyati | dṛṣṭeraṃśubhiḥ spṛśyeta na veti [2. 223] | kimityevaṃ kriyate ? mamāyatiḥ vijṛmbhaṇaṃ tatprasaraṃ nirundhānasya vighnayataḥ karṇasyāpakāriṇo bhūṣaṇaṃ śobhākaramidamutpalaṃ tanmayā laṅghanīyam iti kṛtvā | prāyaḥśabda ityutprekṣāṃ sūcayati | atrācetanasya nayanāṃśulakṣaṇasya vastuno 'nyathāsthitā vṛttiranyathotprekṣya varṇyata iti ||

nanvatra na tava dṛṣṭyā karṇotpalaṃ spṛśyate nāpi tatkāntyā, tathāpyadarśanāt | tatkathamutprekṣyate ? pūrvatra tu tathā jalagāhanadarśanāt [68b]tādṛgutprekṣā sambhavati |
iha tu na kiñcid bījaṃ tathotprekṣāyāḥ, sarvathā dṛṣṭikarṇotpalayoḥ saṃsargābhāvādityāha-

lg.l: spṛśyeta vā na vaivaṃ tu kavinotprekṣya kathyate || 223 ||

div.p:
apāṅgabhāgaḥ locanopāntadeśaḥ tatra patantyā avalokayantyā dṛṣṭeraṃśubhiḥ kiraṇaiḥ utpalaṃ śrutivataṃsaṃ spṛśyeta saṃsṛjyeta | kasyāścidutpalaṃ spṛśyate | nāpi tatkāntyā tathāpyadarśanāt | tatkathamevamutprekṣyate ? pūrvatra tu tathā jalagāhanadarśanāt cādṛgutprekṣāsambhāvanā | aṅganāyāḥ sambhāvyametat | atha kathañcit neti nirbandhaḥ, tadā na vā spṛśyeta | nātrāsmākamabhiniveśaḥ | kathaṃ tarhi tathotprekṣyata ityāha- evaṃ tvityādi | tuśabdo 'rthāntaravivakṣāyām | evamatiśayoktyā nayanāṃśubhiḥ sparśaṃ karṇotpalasiddhaṃ kṛtvā arthāntaraṃ yathoktamutprekṣyamanimittaṃ parikalpya kavinā kathyate prayujyate | tataścātiśayoktiprabhāviteyamutprekṣā kalpyate | ata evoktam—
alaṅkārāntarāṇāmapyāhurekaṃ parāyaṇam |
vāgīśamahitāmuktimimāmatiśayāhvayām || iti || [2.218]

tamaḥ kartṛ aṅgāni vapūṃṣi limpatīva, yathā kaściccandanādinā limpati | nabhaḥ kartṛ añjanaṃ varṣatīva yathā devo jalaṃ varṣati | ityevaṃrūpamidamapi lakṣyaṃ na kevalaṃ pūrvoktam | utprekṣāyā lakṣaṇena anyasthitāyā vastuvṛtteranyathāparikalpanarūpeṇa anvitam upetam bhūyiṣṭhamatyartham | utprekṣaiva iyaṃ na upamā iti yāvat ||atra
pinaṣṭīva taraṅgāgrairudadhiḥ phenacandanam |
tadādāya karairindurlimpatīva digaṅganāḥ || ityārṣarāmāyaṇaślokaṃ [yuddhakā 4. 115] kecidadhika paṭhanti |﻿
anye tūpamātmatāṃ manyante ityudbhāvya nirākurvannāha—

keṣāñcid vādināmihotprekṣāyāmupamā iyamiti upamābhrānti[ḥ] viparyāso janyate | ivaśrutyā ivaśabdena | ivaśabdo 'yamupamāsūcaka iha ucyate | tasmādiyamupameti bhrāmyanti kecit | iyaṃ ca kalpanā tāvadāgamaviruddhetyāha,—netyādi | tiṅntena ākhyātena kriyāpradhānena saha kasyacit upamānaṃ sādṛśyapratītirnāstīti yadāptānāṃ yathā[rtha]darśināṃbhāṣitaṃmahābhāṣye 3.1.7 vacanam āgamaḥ tallakṣaṇatvādāgamasya | āpto[pa]deśaḥ pramāṇamāgama iti | tadatikramyāpramāṇīkṛtya ivaśabdadarśanāt tairāptavacanamatikrāntamupameti ca bhrāntamiti | ivaśabdasya āptavacanātikramaṃ bhrāntijananaṃ [69a]ca prati kartṛtvaṃ vivakṣitamiti ||
nanvāptavacanaṃ nyāyasaṃvādi pramāṇam | na punarāptabhāṣitamiti vibhīṣikāmātreṇa | na cātra kācid yuktiḥ | kevalaṃ śraddhāmātramiti | yuktisaṃvāditāmāptavādasya darśayannāha

idaṃ tāvadavivādāspadamupamānatvaṃ kasyacidupameyatvaṃ cā[nyasya] vastunaḥ tayordvayostulyaḥ sādhāraṇo yo dharmaḥ kriyālakṣaṇo guṇarūpo vā tasya vyapekṣayā samāśrayeṇa hetunā bhavet, nānyathā | yathenduvadanayoḥ kāntyāditulyadharmaparigraheṇa | sā ceyaṃ nītiriha nāstītyāha-limpareriti limpatiriha tridhaiva sambhavati, śabdātmakaḥ kriyāsvabhāvaḥ kartṛrūpaśceti | śabdastāvannopamānaṃ tamasaḥ, tayostulyadharmādarśanāt | na hi limpatiśabdasya tamasaśca kriyārūpo guṇalakṣaṇo vā kaścit tulyo dharmaḥ pratibhāti, yenopamānopameyabhāvaḥ syāt candramukhayoriva | tataḥ kriyārūpo limpatirupamānaṃ bhavatu | tasyāpi tamasā tulyo na kaścid dharmo 'sti yenopamā syāditi paśyan pṛcchati-limpaterupamānasya tamasaścopameyasya asau tulyo dharmaḥ guṇaḥ kaḥ
kīdṛśaḥ samīkṣyate dṛśyate ? na kaścinnirūpyamāṇastādṛśo dharmo labhyata ityarthaḥ | nu iti vitarke, anusamīkṣyata iti vaikaṃ padam ||
atra parābhiprāyamāśaṅkate—

lg.l: sa eva dharmo dharmī cetyanunmatto na bhāṣate || 227 ||

div.p: lepanameva kriyārūpamiṣṭamiṣyate tulyo dharmastayorasmābhiriti yadi manyase tadā lepanavyatirekeṇa limpatirnāma ko 'paro 'vaśiṣyate dharmī, yasyāsau dharmaḥ syāt ? na tāvat śabdasya lepanasyātadāśritatvenātaddharmatvāt tadarthastu syāt | na cārtha eva dharmaḥ vācyavācakabhāvavilakṣaṇatvād dharmadharmibhāvasya sarvavādinām | tadidamāpannaṃ lepanameva dharmo dharmī ceti | tacca vipratiṣiddham asvasthabhāṣitamihāpanayannāha- sa ityādi | sa eva dharma āśrito lepanaṃ nāma yenopamīyate, sa eva dharmī ca āśrayo lepanameva yadupamānīsyāt | ityevaṃ vyāhatamanunmattaḥ svasthacitto [69b] na bhāṣate na vakti | kiṃtu unmatta eva vipratiṣiddhamabhidhatte | tathāhi dharmadharmiṇorāśritāśrayalakṣaṇayorabhede tadvirodhād bhedo lokaśāstraprasiddhaḥ kathamativartitumanusaṃdhatte ? na śakyate | anyo 'pyunmatto lokaśāstraviruddhābhidhāyī bhavanbhavet | nahi tasya śṛṅgamasti | kathaṃ nonmattaḥ | evaṃ tāvallimpatitamasorupamānopameyabhāvo na ghaṭata iti ||
yadi limpatiḥ kriyārūpo nopamānaṃ śabdātmakastu dūrotsārita eva kārakārthaḥ, tarhi kartṛlakṣaṇo limpatirupamānaṃ bhavet | nāyaṃ pakṣo viruddhyata iti paramatamudbhāvya nirasyannāha—

kartā lepanakriyāṃ prati svatantraḥ kārakaviśeṣaḥ upamānaṃ tamasaḥ syāt iti yadi manuṣe, naiṣo 'pi pakṣo 'parihṛtaḥ | yatrāsau kartā ya upamānīkriyate svasyāḥ svasya vā kriyāyā lepanasya sādhane nirvartane vyagro vyāpṛtaḥ tatropakṣīṇasāmarthyaḥ | ata eva kriyāpade limpatītyasmin bhāvapradhāne tiṅnta ityataḥ kriyāṅgatvenāpradhānaṃ kriyāyā eva sādhyatvena prādhānyam | kārakārthastu tadupakaraṇaṃ tatsiddhau heyatvādapradhānam | sarvatraiva hi
phalābhisandhinā pravṛttena puruṣeṇaitadanyathānupapattyā tadaṃśabhāvenādeyaḥ parigṛhyate | phalaniṣpattau tu na kiñcit | tena phalameva'tu upādīyate | taduktam—
upāyādvāpi ye 'heyāstānupāyān pracakṣate |
upeyaṃ tanmataṃ yasya siddhaye tatparigrahaḥ ||
iti | ata eva bhāvākhyātaṃ kārakatiṅntaṃ vā sarvaṃ kriyāpradhānaṃ gīyate | tavyādyantaṃ tu kārakāvācakaṃ bhāvārthaṃ ca sarvameva svabhāvataḥ siddhāvasthāpratīterdravyasya pradhānabhāvaparam | ata eva sarvatra gamyamānatvād etadapi gīyate- yatra kriyāpadaṃ na śrayate tatrāstirbhavatiparaḥ prayujyate iti | etacca vistareṇa śabdārthacintāvivṛtau cintitamiti tato 'vadhāryam | sarvametat samabhisandhāyanyagbhūto 'sau kriyāpada ityuktam | kathamato 'nyathaitat kalpyeta ? yata evaṃ tasmādanyadupameyābhimataṃ tamo vyapekṣitumupamānabhāvenāśrayituṃ nālaṃ śaknoti | kathamekā sthālī pākamekaṃ sādhayantī tadaiva pākāntaraṃ sādhayitumīhate | upamānaṃ ca prasiddhasādharmyeṇa sādhyasādhanamucyate | yathā kāntatvena prasiddhena candreṇa mukhaṃ kāntaṃ sādhyate, candra iva mukhaṃ kāntamiti | tadvadiha lepanakriyāsādhanaparāyaṇaḥ kartā na tamastathā sādhayitumutsahate, asambhavāt | svakriyāparityāgena tu upamānaṃ bhavad bhavet | tadā limpatīva tama iti saṃgacchate | nahi lepanakriyāmakurvan limpati nāma | tannimittatvādasya vyapadeśasya | atiprasaṅgācca | tataśca yadi limpati kathaṃ tamasa upamānam, athopamānaṃ kathaṃ limpati iti vyāhatametat ||
syādetat | yathā svakriyā na viruddhyate, upamānaṃ ca tamasaḥ syāt tathocyateyo lepanaṃ karoti tena tulyaṃ tama iti sarvaṃ sustham | tadetadudbhāvya nirākurvannāha—

lg.l: yo limpatyamunā tulyaṃ tama ityapi śaṃsataḥ |
aṅgānīti na sambaddhaṃ so 'pi mṛgyaḥ samo guṇaḥ || 229 ||

div.p:
yaḥ kaścid devadattādirlimpati lipikriyāmācarati amunā tena lipikriyāviśiṣṭena kartrā tulyaṃ tama ityevamapi yaḥ śaṃsati ghaṭanāṃ manyate, tasyaivaṃ śaṃsato yojayato vādino matena yadetallimpatīvāṅgānītyatrāṅgānīti vyāpyapadaṃ tatsambaddhaṃ na syāt asaṅgataṃ bhavet | tathā hi yadā lepanamātraṃ vyāpyanirapekṣamātmasamavetaṃ bhavanādivat karotīti śasyate, tadāṅgānīti vyāpyaṃ kena sambadhyatām ? lepanena kartṛmātrānu-
bandhinā | alabdhasambandhamarthāntaravadasaṅgatamaṅgaṃ syāditi yāvat | nanu yo 'ṅgāni limpati tena tulyaṃ tamovivakṣāyāṃ kathamasambandhaḥ ? nanvevamapi lepanaviṣayamaṅgamarthāntaram apekṣamāṇaḥ kartā kathamarthāntaraṃ tamo 'pekṣitumīṣṭe ? lepanaṃ tu ātmagataṃ bhavanādivadaṅgavadanarthāntaramavinirbhāgavarti nirvartayannapekṣatāpi tamaḥ amyupagatametat | idamapi vā bhavet kathañcit | tathāpi nopamānopameyabhāvaḥ, sādharmyādarśanāditi | mūlamuddharannāha- so 'pītyādi | pūrvaṃ sādharmyamabhyupagamya sarvamuktaṃ yena guṇenopamā so 'pi samaḥ sādhāraṇo dvayoḥ vṛtteḥ, kāntyādivat | guṇo dharmo mṛgyaḥ anviṣyatām | iha tāvanna dṛśyate | tathāhi lepanaṃ tāvat kartureva dharmaḥ na tamasaḥ, kevalaṃ tatrotprekṣyate nāpi [70b] dharmāntaraṃ sādhāraṇam ihāsti, vivakṣitaṃ vā | yad vakṣyati na tathā limpatau lepādanyadatra pratīya[te] iti ||
kathamiva nāstīti vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntena spaṣṭayannāha—

induriva te vaktramiti prayoge kāntirubhayoḥ samo guṇaḥ pratīyate dṛśyate yathā tathā tadvat | limpatau lepanakartari lepāddharmādanyatra | dharmāntaraṃ tamastulyaṃ na pratīyate, yata upamā syāt | lepastu limpatāveva vartate na tamasīti kimāśrayeyamupamā syāt ||
tadevaṃ pramāṇasaṃvādyāptabhāṣitamatikramya kaiścidivaśrutijanitabhrāntirupamīkṛteyamutprekṣeti nigamayannāha—

yata evaṃ tat tasmādupaśleṣaṇaṃ lepanakriyārūpamartho 'bhidheyam | dhvāntaṃ ca tamaḥ kartṛ aṅgaṃ ca karma vyāpyaṃ yasya sa tādṛśo limpatirdhāturevamuktena prakāreṇa vastuno limpadapi tamo 'tighanatvāt limpatīveti utprekṣyate parikalpyate puṃsā kavinā tadarthasyotprekṣitatvāt | abhedāvyavasāyena śabda utprekṣyate ityuktam | tataścotprekṣaiveyamityevamiṣyatām, nopameti | tasmāditīdamapi bhūyiṣṭham utprekṣālakṣaṇānvitamiti siddham | ayameva nyāyo varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabha ityatrāpyanugantavyaḥ ||
vyavahārārthamutprekṣāsūcakān śabdān darśayannāha—

ityevaṃrūpaḥ śabdarāśirādiryeṣāṃ tarkayāmi kalpayāmi utpaśyāmi yathetyevamādīnāṃ taiḥ śabdairutprekṣā uktalakṣaṇā śabdāntaroktāpyavyaktā satī vyajyate dyotyate | ivaśabdopyuktena vidhinā tādṛśa utprekṣāvyañjakaḥ | na kevalameta iti ||
sūkṣmaleśasādhāraṇaprādhānyakathanena hetuṃ nidarśayannāha—

lg.l: kārakajñāpakau hetū tau ca naikavidhau yathā || 233 ||

div.p:
hetuśca sūkṣmo leśaśceti trayametad vācāṃ kāvyānāmuttamaṃ pradhānaṃ bhūṣaṇam alaṅkāraḥ | uttamabhūṣaṇamevaitattrayam | natvidameva atiśayoktyāderapi tathābhāvāt | evaṃ ca bruvatā [yadbhāmahoktivirodho] bhavati, tannirastam | [tathā ca]—
hetuśca sūkṣmaleśau ca nālaṅkāratayā matāḥ |
samudāyābhidheyasya vakroktyā nābhidhānataḥ || iti | [kāvyālaṅkāre 2.86] iha janako bījādirgamakaśca dhūmādiriti hetudvayaṃ dṛśyate | tatra katamo 'yaṃ hetuḥ ? dvividho 'pyatra gṛhīta ityāha- kāraketyādi | kārako bhāvābhāvarūpasya kāryasya janakaḥ, jñāpakaśca sata eva kasyacit sambandhāt [71a]kutaścitpratipādaka iti kārakajñāpakau hi bhuvi jñeyau | tau ca kārakajñāpakau | naiko vicitro vidhaḥ prakāro yayoriti naikavidhau bhavataḥ | janyakāryavaicitryāt | yathetyudāharati ||

ayamanubhūyamāno malayamāruto dakṣiṇo 'nilaḥ sarvatra lokasya prītiṃ pramodamutpādayati karoti | kiṃviśiṣṭaḥ ? āndolitāni ākampitāni aprauḍha़āni abhinavāni candanadrumāṇāṃ pallavāni yena sa tādṛśaḥ surabhiḥ śiśiro mṛduśca utpādayati iti prakṛtam ||
nanu kimatra bhūṣaṇam ? kevalamanenaitat kriyate iti svarūpakathanamātram | viśeṣastu na kaścit | viśeṣarūpaścālaṅkāra iti viśeṣaṃ yojayannāha—

prīterutpādane karaṇe yogyāsyānurūpasya svabhāvasyāndolitetyādinodbhāvitasya surabhitvāderupabṛṃhaṇaṃ pratisaṃskaraṇaṃ yadetat, tadatra prayoge '[laṃ]kāratayā kāvyabhūṣaṇarūpeṇa uddiṣṭaṃ vivakṣitaṃ viśeṣarūpatvāt | na punaranenaitat kriyate ityarthamātraṃ tasya alaṅkāryatvāt | ayaṃ bhāvakāryaḥ kārakaheturapākṛtaḥ, prītisattākaraṇāt | yadetadbhāvakāri darśitaṃ rūpaṃ tadidaṃ nivattāvabhāve 'pi kārya na kevalaṃ bhāve | samaṃ tulyam, abhāvasyāpi kasyacit tena karaṇāditi ||
tadadāharati—

candanānāmaraṇyaṃ vanamādhūya āndolayitvā saurabhyaṃ māndyaṃ cānena sūcitam | śaityamudbhāvayati- malaye mahīdhare nirbhkarān sānudeśapātinī vāridhārāḥ spaṣṭvā āmṛśya ayaṃ dakṣiṇaḥ pavano manoharaḥ pathikānāṃ virahiṇāmabhāvāya nidhanārthamupasthito vijambhata iti ||
kathamevaṃprītikaro māruto mṛtyave bhavatītyāha—

evaṃbhūta ādhūtacanda[nā]raṇyaḥ spṛṣṭamalayanirbhkaro ramyo mārutaḥ abhāvasya daśamyāḥ daśāyāḥ sādhanāya karaṇārtham alaṃ samarthaḥ | hiśabdo vācoyuktau prasiddhau vā | kasmin viṣaye ? manojñāni ramyāṇi rāgajanakāni vastūni malayamārutādīni teṣu arocakaṃ vidveṣaḥ | virahaḥ priyajanaviyogo jvaraḥ santāparūpatvāt tataḥ saṃbhūtaṃ jātaṃ manojñārocakaṃ yasya janasya tasmin viṣaye tasyā[71b]bhāvaṃ sādhayati | sa hi tādṛśaḥ pavano virahajvaramatitarāṃ varddhayan nidhanaṃ vidhatte virahiṇām | ayamabhāvakāryaḥ kārakahetuḥ pathikābhāvakaraṇāditi ||

iha tāvadbhāvābhāvarūpeṇa dvidhā kāryam | tatrābhāvarūpaṃ kāryaṃ nirvartyavikāryaprāpyabhedena tridhā bhidyate | abhāvarūpaṃ tu prāgabhāvādirūpeṇa caturdhā | tatra bhāvatrividhe kārye hetuvyāpāraṃ nirūpayannāha—

lg.l: nirvartye ca vikārye ca hetutvaṃ tadapekṣayā |
prāpye tu karmaṇi prāyaḥ kriyāpekṣaiva hetutā || 238 ||

div.p: nirvartyaṃ yadasadeva prāgabhāvarūpeṇa vyavasthitaṃ kriyate ghaṭādivat | yasya sata eva avasthāntaraṃ kriyate tadvikāryam | lūyamānakāṇḍādivat | tasmin nirvartye vikārye ca karmaṇi viṣaye hetutvaṃ kārakatvaṃ tayornirvartyavikāryayorapekṣayā samāśrayaṇena hetutvaṃ janakatvaṃ draṣṭavyam, dvayostathotpādyatvāt | vastusvarūpa eva kārakavyāpāro na kriyāmātre | prāpyate kriyayā saṃbadhyate kevalaṃ na nirvatyate nāpi vikriyate vedavadadhyayaneneti prāpyam | tatra karmaṇi vyāpye hetutā kārakatvaṃ kriyāṃ vyāpāraṃ tadviṣayāmapekṣate āśrayatīti | kriyāpekṣaiva na karmasvarūpāpekṣā | atrāpi kriyāsaṃbandhanaṃ rūpāntaraṃ kriyata iti vikāryatvam astīti cedāha—prāya iti | yadyapi vastugatirīdṛśī tathāpi prāyo bāhulyenaiva pratīyata ityarthaḥ ||
kīdṛśo nirvatyaheturiti pūrvoktamanusmārayan āha—

heturnirvartanīyasya karmaṇo bhāvarūpasyābhāvarūpasya ca hetuḥ kārako darśita udāhṛtaḥ | saṃprati śeṣayoranuktayordvayoḥ | vikāryaprāpyayoḥ sambandhi udāharaṇayordvandvaṃ yugalaṃ dattvā pradarśya paścāt jñāpako heturvarṇayiṣyate udāhariṣyata iti ||

udgatāni pravālāni pallavāni yeṣāṃ tānyaraṇyāni vanāni | saṃphullaṃ vikasitaṃ paṅkajaṃ yāsāṃ tāśca vāpyo dīrghikāḥ | candraḥ pūrṇaḥ paryāptaḥ | sarvametanmanojñaṃ vastu pānthānāṃ virahiṇāṃ virahajvarasambhūtamano[vikārayukta]ānāṃ dṛṣṭeścakṣuṣo viṣam aviṣahyatvāt kṛtaṃ viṣarūpeṇa pariṇāmitam kāmena manmathena, tadvaśāt | teṣāṃ taddṛṣṭimūrchākaratvāt | jitamanmathānāṃ tu kiṃ tairitiṃ kāmenetyuktam | ayaṃ vikāryahetuḥ kāmaḥ, tena tādṛśām araṇyādīnāṃ satāmeva pānthadṛṣṭiviṣarūpeṇa vikṛtatvādi[72a]ti ||

mānaḥ prātikūlyaṃ priyaviṣayaṃ bhrūbhedāvyāhārādirūpaṃ tatra yogye dṛṣṭe tasmin mānaṃ nirvāhayāmi na vetyevaṃrūpamīmāṃsābhyāso vā tāṃ karomīti kartṛṃ prāgeva mānanirvāhaṃ parīkṣamāṇā satī bālā kācidaṅganā bhruvorbhaṅgena vikāralīlayā jihmamāropakopakuṭilam akṣi yasyāḥ sā tādṛśī paśyati | sphuritādharam sphuritaḥ kṛtaroṣalolo 'dharo yasmin darśana iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | kiṃ paśyati ? priyasya jīvitanāthasya sthāne bhūmikāyāṃ kṛtāṃ vyavasthāpitām ayamasau me priya iti tadrūpeṇa parikalpitāṃ sakhīṃm kāñcit paśyatīti prakṛtiṃ prāpya heturayaṃ nirvartanavikāravyatirekeṇa sakhīviṣayasya darśanamātrasya bālayā sādhanāditi | evaṃ kārakahetusridhodāhṛtaḥ ||
jñāpakamudāharannāha—

arkaḥ sūryaḥ astam adarśanaṃ gataḥ | bhāti induḥ candra uditaḥ | pakṣiṇaśca vāsāya nilayārthaṃ vāsaṃ vā yānti itastataḥ | ityevaṃvidhamidaṃ lakṣyamanapekṣitatādṛśaviśeṣaṃ svarūpakathanamātramapi prāgeva pratisaṃskṛtamanyat sādhu samīcīnaṃ bhūṣaṇameva nānyathā | kutra ? kālasyāvasthā atra pradoṣalakṣaṇā tasyā nivedanejñāpane sūryāstamayādinā
hi tadavyabhicāriṇā rajanīmukhamākhyāyate | iti jñāpakaheturayaṃ draṣṭavya iti | anena cedaṃ niṣiddham—
gato 'stamarko bhātīnduryānti vāsāya pakṣiṇaḥ |
ityevamādi kiṃ kāvyaṃ vārtāmenāṃ pracakṣate || iti | [kāvyālaṅkāre 2. 87]

lg.l: dehoṣmabhiḥ subodhaṃ te sakhi ! kāmāturaṃ manaḥ || 243 ||

div.p: indoḥ pādānāmatyantaśiśirāṇāṃ kiraṇānām avadhyaistairanapaneyaiḥ candanāmbhasāṃ malayajarasacarcopacārāṇāmasādhyairavadhyaiḥ pratyuta uddīpanaiḥ yairdehasyoṣmabhiḥ santāpairnimittaiḥ tava kāmenāturaṃ manmathamathitam manaḥ subodhaṃ sujñātaṃ vyaktamavagamyate | vyavahitamapi tādṛśāṃ dehoṣmaṇāṃ tathāvidhamanonāntarīyakatvāt | sakhītyāmantryate ||
panthānamevamanusaradbhirayamalaṅkāraḥ kāvyeṣu lakṣaṇīya ityatidiśannāha—

ityevaṃvidhinā jñāpakāśca te hetavaśceti jñāpakahetavo ramyā manoharāḥ prayogeṣu kāvyeṣu lakṣyā jñātavyāḥ svayaṃ ca prayoktavyāḥ | tad yathā—
[72b] nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ vakti vaktraṃ tava nitambini !
svinnamudbhinnamandākṣamāmīlallolalocanam ||
jṛmbhitaṃ śvasitaṃ kampaḥ kārśyaṃ mūrchākulaṃ vacaḥ |
vadanti tava tanvaṅgi ! virahajvaravedanām ||
dṛṣṭirāmantharā tāmrā tāmyattaralatārakā |
rāgābhibhavamācaṣṭe mṛgākṣi ! tava durjayam ||
varāṅgi ! tava durvāramukharastokadūṣaṇaḥ |
suratotsavasaṃkalpamākalpaḥ kathayatyayam || iti | ﻿
evaṃ bhāvasvabhāvaheturudāhṛtaḥ | idānīmabhāvāśca hetavaśceti abhāvahetavaḥ kecit katipaye na sarve, vikalpānāmānantyād, vyākriyante udāhriyante manoramā rasāvahā iti ||

vidyānāṃ guṇadoṣavivekabhūmīnāṃ trayīprabhṛtīnām caturvargaśāstrāṇāṃ vidantyābhiḥ caturvargamiti kṛtvā, anabhyāsena śrutacintābhāvanālakṣaṇasyābhiyogasyābhāvena | anabhyastavidyo 'pi yadi vṛddhopasevī, tāvatārthena mokṣyate | yathoktam—
na sajjanād dūrataraḥ kvacid bhavet, bhajeta sādhūn vinayakramānugaḥ |
spṛśantyayatnena hi tatsamīpa[gaṃ] visarpaṇāstadguṇapuṣpareṇavaḥ ||
iti | tadapi nāstītyāha—dhīmatāṃ śāstrajñānāṃ nayavyavahāriṇāmasaṃsargeṇa saṃsargasya saṃgaterabhāvena dhīmatsaṃsargarahito 'pi yadi pravinītaḥ syāt, na vipadyate | tadapi nāsti | akṣāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ cakṣurādīnāmāpāyikaviṣa[ya]pravṛttirodharūpasya nigrahasya jayasyābhāvena ca hetunā nṛṇāṃ pusāṃ vyasanaṃ vipattirjāyate | nātra saṃśayaḥ | tasmādvidyābhyāsādimatā puṃsā bhāvyam | atra vidyābhyā[sādyai]ranutpādāt vyasanaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ kāryamudbhavatīti bhāvakāryaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ kārakaheturiti ||

lg.l: kṣato mohaścyutā tṛṣṇā kṛtaṃ puṇyāśrame manaḥ || 246 ||

div.p:
kāmo viṣayo bhogaḥ | tasya tatra vā kathā sābhilāṣo 'bhilāpaḥ ceṣṭā ca tādṛśī praśamaparipanthinī | saivonmādo vibhramaḥ, vikāraprapañcalakṣaṇatvāt | sa tāvad gato virataḥ | yauvanaṃ tāruṇyam kāryapakṣapātivinayasthyaviruddhamanyantarāgaparidāhakatvāt jvaraḥ | so 'pi galito vigataḥ | mohaḥ saṃsāre duḥkhātmake sukhamiti viparyāsaḥ | so 'pi kṣataḥ kṣīṇaḥ | tṛṣṇāpi tadanusāriṇī viṣayāśaktilakṣaṇā cyutā naṣṭā | tataśca puṇyāśrame dharmaviṣaye virāgaikarase manaḥ [73a] cittaṃ kṛtaṃ niveśitamiti
kaścitpaścimavayovartī [73a] nirviṇṇaḥ kathayati | atra kāmonmādādīnāmutpannānāmevāstamayād dharmamārge matirjāteti bhāvakāryaḥ pradhvaṃsābhāvaḥ kārakaheturudāhṛta iti ||

lg.l: vanānyamūni na gṛhāṇyetā nadyo na yoṣitaḥ |
mṛgā ime na dāyādāstanme nandati mānasam || 247 ||

div.p: amūni imāni dṛśyamānāni vanānyaraṇyāni śāntāni na gṛhāṇyanekādīnavadīnānyetāśca lakṣyamāṇā nadyo nimnagāḥ bhiṣekādikṣamā na yoṣito viṣayaviṣamūrchābhūmayaḥ | ime ca mṛgā tṛṇodakamātravṛttayaḥ tapasvijanāyamānā na dāyādāḥ tanayā[di]snehabandhānarthahetavaḥ | yata evametatsarvaṃ kalyāṇamupasthitaṃ kutaścid daivāt, tat tasmānme mānasaṃ nandati paraṃ prītyutsavamanubhavati iti kaścit gṛhacārakaviraktamatiḥ vanaprasthaṃ kañcidāsādya abhinandati | atra vanagṛhādīnāmanyonyasmiṃnnabhāvāt uktena vidhinā manonandanamutpadyata iti bhāvakāryo 'yamitaretarābhāvaḥ kārakaheturādarśita iti ||

āryāṇāṃ satāmatyantamekāntenāsannāsti anālocitaṃ sadasadityavicāritaṃ doṣarūpaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ caritam | sarvadā vimṛśyakāriṇa eva te, tallakṣaṇatvādāryāṇām | anyathā tadbhāvahāneḥ | yata evamataḥ kāraṇāt teṣāmāryāṇāṃ satataṃ nityaṃ sarvāḥ sampadaḥ vibhūtayaḥ aihikyaḥ sāmparāyikyaśca varddhante prakarṣaṃ gacchantiṃ | sthitireṣā satām | iha sarvathā anālocitaceṣṭitābhāvātsampaddhanaṃ phalamupajāyate iti bhāvakāryo 'tyantābhāvaḥ kārakaheturnidarśita iti ||

udyāne pramadavane sahakārāṇāṃ cūtānāṃ mañjarī kalikā anudbhinnā uditā na kim ? naiva | tataḥ kimityāha- deya ityādi | pathikanārīṇāṃ virahiṇīnāṃ manojñavastudarśanajvalitavirahānaladagdhānāṃ lokāntaraṃ gatānāmidānīṃ satilastathāsthitestilasaṃyuktaḥ salilasya añjalirdeyo dīyatāṃ, kimadyāpi pratīkṣyate ? ihānudbhedaprāgabhāvaḥ
udbhedarūpaḥ pathikanārīnidhanasya janaka iti abhāvakāryaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ kārakahetuḥ āviṣkṛtaḥ | pradhvaṃsābhāvādayastrayo 'bhāvahetavo 'bhāvakāryā nodāhṛtāsta udāhriyante—
adṛṣṭyā hariṇīdṛṣṭastasyāstatta[danu]staran |
vyarthajīvitasaṃkalpaḥ so 'yamañcati pañcatām ||
[73b]padminīyaṃ na sā tanvī padmametanna tanmukham |
indīvaramidaṃ cakṣurnna tadityasavo gatāḥ ||
na kadācidabhūttanvyāstasyā vinayavibhramaḥ |
iti dhyāyannayaṃ lokaḥ paraiti paralokatām ||

jñāpakahetuśca kaścit abhāvo 'bhāvaviṣa[ya]ḥ pradarśyate—
bhrūbhaṅgavigamastanvi ! tava kopaviparyayam |
asya jīvitamācaṣṭe dṛṣṭeḥ prakṛtimādiśan || iti |
abhāvahetuprastāvamupasaṃharannāha—

prāgabhāva ādiryasya pradhvaṃsābhāvādeḥ tadrūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya vastunaḥ padārthasya | vyāvṛttānuvṛttabuddhigrāhyatvād abhāvasyāpi bhāvavadvastutvaṃ na virudhyate | hetutvaṃ kārakatvamiha prastāve darśitamiti śeṣaḥ | kataratkāryamadhikṛtyetyāha- bhāvetyādi | bhāvo vidhirabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ | tadubhayaṃ svarūpamātmā yasya tasya [bhāvā]bhāvasvarūpasya ceti pratyekaṃ yojyam | natvekamubhayātmakam iti kāryasya phalasya utpādanaṃ pratikriyāmuddiśya iti ||
citrahetūnadhikṛtyāha—

dūraṃ hetuvyāpāraviṣayāntaragatakāryaṃ yasya sa tathā | tena kāryeṇātmīyena saha yugapajjāyate tatsahajaḥ phalasamānakālabhāvītyarthaḥ | kāryaṃ prathamamutpadyate, tasyā[na]ntaraṃ paścāddheturjāyate iti kāryā[na]ntarajaḥ | tathā samuccaye | ayuktamanucitaṃ kāryaṃ karoti yuktamanurūpaṃ karotīti ca rāśidvayam | ayuktakārī yuktakārī cetyarthaḥ | ayuktayuktakāryau cetyapiṃ pāṭhaḥ | tatraivaṃ vyākhyeyam- ayuktaṃ yuktaṃ ca kāryaṃ yayoḥ pratyekaṃ tāvat yuktāyuktakāryau | ayuktakāryo yuktakāryaścetyarthaḥ | ityevaṃprakārāścitrāḥ prasiddhahetuviparītā apūrvarūpā āścaryabhūtāḥ hetavo 'saṃkhyātā anavadhayo vikalpānāmānantyāditi ||
nanvevaṃbhūte na kaścinmukhyo heturupalakṣyate | tatkathametatsambhava ityāha—

te amī anantaroktā dūrakāryādayaścitrā hetavaḥ na mukhyā iṣyante | kiṃ tarhi ? gauṇī guṇanivṛttā prasiddhiviṣayaviparītā samāropitā vṛttirvyavasthā hetubhāvasvabhāvāḥ vyapāśrayo 'dhiṣṭhānaṃ yeṣāṃ tasyāṃ vā ye vyāpāśrayā gauṇā iti yāvat | prayogāḥ kāvyāniṃ mārgāḥ panthānaḥ | atha viśeṣavyāptihetutvāt teṣu sargabandhādiṣu [74a] prayuktā atyantam ekāntena sundarā manoharā dṛṣṭhā lakṣitāḥ | ke punaste ? yeṣāṃ citrahetūnāmudāhṛtayaḥ prayogā udāhriyanta iti kṛtvā | tāḥ kim ? pratipādyanta iti śeṣaḥ | yatheti nidarśayati ||

aṅgane ! aṅgajasya kāmasya astram āyudhaṃ jaitram jagajjayaśīlaṃ tavāpāṅgamapāṅgadarśanamityāhvayo 'bhidhānamasyeti tvadapāṅgāhvyaṃ yadidaṃ tat tvayā muktaṃ kṣiptamanyatoḥ anyasmin jigīṣite puruṣe kvacit tenānyato muktena so 'pyahaṃ yo na lakṣīkṛtaḥ manasi kṛto hataḥ | na kevalaṃ yatra muktaṃ sa evetyapiśabdaḥ | tadetaccitram | prasiddhaṃ hyastraṃ yatra prayujyate taṃ viṣayaṃ kṣiṇoti | idaṃ tvavyāpāragauravaṃ vastu hinasti iti dūrakāryaḥ citraheturīdṛśaḥ pratipattavya iti ||

nārīṇāṃ vayaḥ paryastaṃ kṣiptaṃ tadupamādinodayāt śaiśavaṃ bālyamaneneti paryastaśaiśavaṃ yauvanamiti yāvat | aṅgajaḥ kāma unmādo vikārahetutvāt | tasya vibhramāḥ tadanurūpā daśāviśeṣāstaiḥ kāryabhūtairvividhairnānāprakāraiḥ cakṣuḥprītimanaḥsaṅgasaṃkalpotpattinidrābhaṅgādibhiḥ
dṛṅmanaḥsaḍgasaṃkalpā jāgaraḥ kṛśatāratiḥ |
hnītyāgonmādamūrcchāntā ityanaṅgadaśā daśa || ﻿ puṃsāṃ sambandhibhiḥ saha yugapadevāpūrvācāraḥ samāvirbhavati udetīti citrametat | pratīto hi hetuḥ kāryāt pūrvabhāvī tadutpādayati | ayaṃ tu hetuḥ sahaiva kāryeṇa jāyase iti kāryasahajaścitro heturevaṃvidho boddhavyaḥ ||

hariṇākṣīṇāṃ rāgaḥ puruṣābhilāṣaḥ | sāgaro vaipulpādinā | prāgeva yāvannendurudeti udīrṇo vṛddhimagamat | paścādrāgasāgarodayānantaraṃ kiraṇān paryasya dikṣu vikṣipya udīrṇamuditaṃ candrasya maṇḍalamityapūrvo 'yaṃ hetuḥ | yaḥ kāryādūrdhvamudeti iti kāryāntarajaścitraheturevaṃrūpa iti ||

deva ! tava caraṇayordvandvasya yugalasya rāgo bālaścāsau ātapaśceti bālātapaḥ taruṇataraṇikiraṇasundaraḥ, lohitatvāditi | rājñāṃ hastāravindāni kāntyādinā spṛśan abhisāritvenāmṛśan san kutaḥ kasmāt kuḍmalīkurute mukulayati | añcalipraṇāmatvenāyuktametat | bālātapo hi padmonmīlanahetuḥ | ayaṃ tvapūrvo [74b] bālātapo yaḥ padmāni nimīlayatīti | anucitakāryakaraṇāt ayuktakārī citraheturevaṃvidha iti ||

deva ! tava pādānāṃ nakhāścandrāḥ kāntyādinā teṣāmarcciṣaḥ kiraṇāḥ kundakusumanirmalāḥ śuddhāḥ bhūpānāṃ rājñāṃ pāṇīn padmāni kāntyādinā saṅkocayituṃ praṇatikarasampuṭarūpeṇa mīlayitumīśate kalpante | yuktakārī citraheturevaṃvidhaḥ, candrataḥ paṅkajasaṃkocasyocitatvāditi ||
hetumupasaṃ[harannāha]—
iti kathitena vidhinā hetorvikalpasya prabhedasya sāmānyarūpānugatasya gatiḥ svarūpamīdṛśī kathitarūpā darśitā pratipāditā ||
sūkṣmamālakṣayannāha—

saṃprati sūkṣmo lakṣyate | iṅgitaṃ kasyacidantargasya bhāvasya jñāpanārthaṃ tādṛśi prastāve buddhipūrvakaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ kāyikaṃ ceṣṭitam | ākārastu svayameva bhāvānurūpamāvirbhavan tatsūcakamavasthāntaraṃ śarīrasyetyanayorbhedaḥ | tābhyāṃ lakṣyo gamyo 'rthaḥ kaścidantarmātrādhirūḍhaḥ suratotsavādiḥ sūkṣmaḥ iti smṛto vijñāyate tajjñaiḥ | kutaḥ ? śabdālokātivartino vastunaḥ kāyavijñaptimātreṇa tādṛśena lakṣyatayā saukṣmyāt sūkṣmatvāt tathāvidhaireva grahaṇāditi ||
[iṅgitalakṣya]sūkṣmamudāharati—

ākīrṇe janasaṃbādhe sthāne nau āvayoḥ saṅgamo yogaḥ kadā kasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhāvī bhaviṣyatīti vaktuṃ vācā pratipādayituṃ bhayatrapiṣṇutayā akṣamam aśaktaṃ kāntaṃ ramaṇam ākārāt tathāvidhādavetya jñātvā līlārthaṃ padmaṃ vibhramakamalaṃ karatalagataṃ nyamīlayat abalā kācid vilāsinīti ||
tad vivṛṇoti—

atra prayoge niśi rātrau saṃgamaḥ suratarūpaḥ saṃkalpātmanā sūkṣmo vyavasthitaḥ, padmasya saṃmīlanāt | mukulīkaraṇāt iṅgitaviśeṣānnimittāt | sūcitaḥ prakāśitaḥ | kāntasya kimevaṃ syādityāha- āśvāsayitumityādi | priyaṃ vallabhamaṅgajena kāmena pīḍa़itamākulīkṛtam iṅgitagrahaṇe nipuṇaṃ bhāvasamarpaṇenāśvāsayitumāśāpatrikādānena vyavasthāpayitumicchantyā bālayā [75a] sūcita iti prakṛtam | ayamiṅgita- sūkṣmo darśitaḥ, padmasammīlanāt utpalakṛtasya kāyakarmaṇa iṅgitarūpatvāditi ||
ākārasūkṣmamudāharannāha—

gītalakṣaṇagoṣṭhī vinodastasyāṃ tvayi arpitā vyāpāritā dṛk dṛṣṭiḥ yasyā yayā vā tasyā mukhāmbuje kāntyādinā uddāmena udīrṇena rāgeṇa ratyabhiprāyeṇa taralā ujjvalā raktacchāyā kāntiḥ kāpi viśiṣṭā yā nidhuvanānandotsavamantarvartinamāviṣkaroti | avardhana vyajṛmbhata | ayamākārasūkṣmo nirdiṣṭaḥ, tādṛśo mukhacchāyāyāḥ svayameva tathāvidhābhiprāyavaśādabuddhipūrvamāvirbhāvāditi ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

ityuktena prakāreṇa ratiḥ suratamutsavo mahaḥ prītiviśeṣalakṣaṇatvāt tasmin manoratho 'bhilāṣaḥ | sūkṣmatvaṃ durupalakṣaṇatvamanullaṅghya anatikramyaiva sūkṣma eva vyavasthito bhāvarūpeṇābhūt | kutaḥ ? anudbhinnamaśabdaprakāśitamavyakaṃ rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya ratyutsavamanorathasya tasya bhāvaḥ tattvaṃ tasmāt | atrāpyākārasūkṣmaprayoge na kevalam iṅgitasūkṣmalakṣye kadetyādāviti ||
leśamādarśayannāha- yo lava ityuddiṣṭaḥ—

nirbhinnasyākārāt tādṛśāt kutaścit prakaṭībhūtasya vasturūpasyārthātmanaḥ kasyacidanurāgāderleśena vyājena kenacit nigūhanaṃ kathañcitsaṃvaraṇamityanūdya leśo vidhīyate | evamapyanabhivyaktasvabhāva ityāha- udāharaṇe lakṣya evāsya rūpaṃ svabhāva āvirbhaviṣyati prakaṭatī yāsyati | tatastatraiva parisphuṭamavagamyatāmiti ||
tamudāharannāha—

rājñaḥ kanyāyāṃ kasyāñcidanuraktamudbhūtābhilāṣam māmavagaccheyurjānīyuḥ rakṣakāḥ tatparipālanādhiṃkṛtā varṣavarādayaḥ | katham ? romṇāmudbhedena harṣaṇānurāgakāryatayā tajjñāpakena hetunā | kimidamāsīditi romāñcena nirbhinnamanurāgalakṣaṇaṃ vasturūpamiha tāvaddarśitam, tadidānīṃ kāraṇāntaropanyāsena leśena nigūhyate | āḥ smṛtipratilambhe, jñātaṃ bhavatu dṛṣṭam | aho [75b]atiśaye | śīto 'nilo yasmin tacchītānilam aho yathedaṃ vanam yato romāñco jāyata iti romodbhedasya śiśiramārutasaṃsargādapyupapatteranyathāsiddhyā nirbhinno 'nurāgo nigūḍha़ iti spaṣṭarūpamīdṛśam ||

lg.l: ānandāśru pravṛttaṃ me kathaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva kanyakām |

div.p: kanyakāṃ patimvarāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva darśanasamanantaramevānandajanitamaśru harṣavāṣpaḥ pravṛttaṃ jātaṃ me | kathametadayuktaṃ bata saṃvṛttamiti nirbhinnasya vastuno 'nurāgasya leśena nigūhanamidaṃ kriyate | ā jñātamakṣi me puṣpāṇāṃ rajasā reṇunā vātairuddhūtena preritena dūṣitamupadrutam iti aśrupātasya rajodūṣaṇādapi sambhavāt saṃvṛtto leśena bhāvastādṛśa iti ||
ityaparamudārahaṇam ||
leśaprakāramupasaṃhṛtya prakārāntaramasya darśayannāha—

lg.l: leśameke vidurnindāṃ stutiṃ vā leśataḥ kṛtām || 266 ||

div.p: ityevaṃrūpamanantaroktaṃ rājakanyādarśanādi yasya rāganigūhanādesyasmin sthāne prastāve ayamalaṅkāro leśaḥ atiśobhate, tasyātyantasundaratvāt iti svamatamupasaṃhṛtam | eke anye punarnindāṃ doṣoktiṃ leśato vyājena kathañcit kṛtāṃ tādṛśaviṣayāṃ stutiṃ vā guṇāviṣkriyāmīṣatprayuktāṃ leśaṃ viduḥ smaranti | a[ya]maparo leśaprakāra iti ||
tamudāharannāha—

yuvā taruṇaḥ | viṣayasambhogaikarase vividhā[nandaju]ṣi vayasi vartamāna eva guṇavān vinayasampannaḥ | evambhūto 'pi, na yaḥ kaścit | kiṃ tu rājā madhyamalokapālaḥ | ūrjitastejasvo mahānubhāvaḥ tavāyameva yogyaḥ samucitaḥ patirvaro varārohe ! puṇyena mahatā prāptaḥ | yasya vikramaikarasasya raṇe utsave prītikaratvānmanaḥ saktaṃ nirataṃ kāmosavātsuratasukhādapyadhikam, na tasyātrāsthā yathā samaramahotsave iti ||
nanvatra sarvathā guṇa eva pratīyate natu kaścid doṣo yato leśato nindā syādityata āha—

vīryasya vikramasyotkarṣo 'dhimātrātā tasya stutiḥ varṇanaṃ nindaiva doṣoktireva jāyate | katham ? yataḥ kanyāyā nirantarānavicchedavartino bhogān [76a] suratasukhāni vivikṣoranububhūṣoḥ sambandhino bhāvasya svīkārābhiprāyasyāsmin yathopavarṇite puṃsi tanmanorathapratikūlavartini viṣaye vaimukhyāya kalpate | tato nindaiveyaṃ jātā stutiḥ, anyathā bhāvanivṛtyayogāt | nahi guṇavattayā pratītaḥ parityajyate kiṃ tu doṣavāneva | tathā asau alīkaraṇarāgavyasanī suratasamaramahotsavaparāṅmukhaḥ pratīto yatastaṃ vibhāvayatīti nindaiveyaṃ leśataḥ kṛteti ||
ityaparamudāharaṇam ||

lg.l: capalo nirdayaścāsau janaḥ kiṃ tena me sakhi |

div.p: capalo durvinītaḥ yatkiñcanakārī nirdayaḥ kraraśca | kiṃ tenaivaṃ duḥkhadāyinā janena nirguṇena ? punastādṛśa evāsau yenāgasāmaparādhānāṃ pratikṣaṇabhāvināmātmīyānāṃ pramārjanāya pariśodhanārthameva kevalam, nānugrahāya kasmaicittādṛśāya cāṭavo 'nekavidhā lolanaprakārāḥ śikṣitāḥ svabhyastāḥ | kiṃ tena cāṭucuñcuṭaneti nigamanīyam ||
nanu doṣa evātra sarvathokto na guṇaḥ kvacit yato leśataḥ stutiḥ syāt ityata āha—

sakhi ! tvayā kimatidākṣiṇyena asya dāsyā bhūyate ? aṇubhirapina kadācidañcyase | māninyo hi vayam | kimaparamasmākamastramiti sakhījanenoddiṣṭam upadiṣṭam mānamunnatiṃ cittasya kartumanuṣṭhātumaśaktatayā kayācidaṅganayā | kutaḥ ? rāgāt tadviṃṣayābhiṣaṅgānmānavirodhino hetoścāṭukāritā upacāracāturyaṃ nāma guṇo viśeṣaḥ ko 'pi kaścidupātto nāgarakajanocitaḥ ko 'pi vā kaścidekaḥ sarvadoṣavadābhāsate | aparādhapramārjanaparatvenaiva prakāśanāt doṣābhāso darśitaḥ | tato leśataḥ stuti[ri]yaṃ kalpata iti |
ityaparamudāharaṇam ||
kramaṃ vivarītumupakramate—

uddiṣṭānāṃ pūrvaprayuktānāmarthānāṃ vastūnāṃ keṣāñciṃd yathākramamuddeśakramānatikrameṇa anudeśaḥ pratyāmnāyaḥ punararthāntarāśrayeṇa parāmarśaḥ [76b]yathāsaṃkhyamiti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ proktam | yathāsaṃkhyamityapekṣya napuṃsa[ka]tvam tasya vidheyatvāt | anudeśasyānūdyatayā apradhānatvānna talliṅgaparigrahaḥ | proktam iti saṃkhyātamityapi proktam | krama ityapi prokta iti liṅgapariṇāmena yojyam | krama ityapi upadiśyata iti vā adhyāhāryam iti ||
tadudāharannāha—

tanvi ! te snātumambha [praviṣṭāyāḥ] saraḥpraviṣṭāyāḥ smitaṃ cekṣaṇaṃ ca mukhaṃ ca teṣāṃ dyutirityuddeśaḥ kumudānyutpalāni paṅkajāni ca taiścoritā muṣitā kumudaiḥ smitadyuti-
rutpalairīkṣaṇadyutiḥ paṅkajairmukhadyutiścoriteti yathoddeśamayamanudeśaḥ | vastuto 'tathābhāvād dhruvamityutprekṣyate |

yadyevamutprekṣeyaṃ kathaṃ yathāsaṃkhyamiti cet ? yadyevaṃ nirūpyate, upamāpyatra vidyate, smitādīnāṃ kumudādibhiḥ sādṛśyapratīteḥ | tasmādyatrālaṅkārāntaramapi pratīyate, tatrāpi uddeśānurūpānudeśasaṃkhyātamevālaṅkāro vyavahriyate | tāyaiva mukhyatā, vivakṣitatvāt | yatra tu alaṅkārāntaraṃ na gamyate tatra sutarāmeva krama iti vijñeyam ||
preyorasavadūrjasvītyalaṅkāratrayaṃ lakṣayannāha—

lg.l: ūrjasvi rūḍha़āhaṅkāraṃ yuktotkarṣa ca tat trayam || 273 ||

div.p: priyatarasyātiśayena priyasyārtharūpasya kasyacidākhyānaṃ pratipādanam ākhyāyate anenetyanūdya preya iti jñāpyate | rasena śṛṅgārādinā pratipādyena peśalaṃ manojñaṃ rasavad vākyaṃ vijñeyam | rūḍha़o dīpto 'haṅkāraḥ sauṭīryaṃ yatra tādṛśaṃ vacanamūrjasvi jñeyam | taccaitattrayaṃ preyo rasavat ūrjasvi ca yuktaḥ saṅgataḥ utkarṣo 'dhimātratā yeneti yuktotkarṣamatyantapriyamekāntarasavat bhṛśamūrjasvītyarthaḥ | ayaṃ cārthaḥ- ayamu[pa]mādibhiratiśayavidhibhirukto yuktotkarṣa iti ||
preyastāvadudāharannāha—

lg.l: adya yā mama govinda ! jātā tvayi gṛhāgate |

div.p: govinda viṣṇo ! tvayi gṛhamidamasmadīyamatidhanyamāgate sati yā prītiḥ tuṣṭiḥ adya asmin puṇyāhe mama jātā eṣā iyaṃ prītiḥ kālena punarīdṛśena śubhena samayena kenacit tavaiva nānyasya | kastvādṛśaḥ ? āgamanādupasaṃkramaṇa[77a]mahotsavātkāraṇāt bhavet jāyate | tvadāgamaname[kāraṇa]masyāḥ, jyotsnāyā iva candra iti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

ityetadanantaroktaṃ yuktaṃ prāptakālamāha bravīti viduro narottamaḥ kaścidevamabhidhānaḥ | yato naiva govindāgamanādṛte 'nyataḥ kutaścidapi tādṛśī govindāgamanabhāvinī dhṛtiḥ prītirjāyate | yato yuktamāhetyapīkṣaṇīyaṃ tataḥ īdṛśāt prāptakālāt | suprītoḥ atyantaprasanno harirviṣṇurabhūt | kimetāvatā suprītaḥ syāt ? nakiñcid gṛhāgatāya tasmai tathāvidhāyātithaye tādṛśaṃ vastūpahṛtaṃ yataḥ suprītaḥ syādityāha- bhaktirīdṛśī vacanādirūpā yathābhāvinī sevā saiva tanmātram bahirvastūpahārādyanapekṣaṇāt | tena samārādhyaḥ pratipūjanīyo yatastasmāt tata eva bhakteḥ suprīta iti nigamanīyam ||

lg.l: somaḥ sūryo marud bhūmirvyoma hotānalo jalam |
iti mūrttīratikramya tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ deva ! ke vayam || 276 ||

div.p: hotā yajamānaḥ | ityevaṃbhūtāni rūpāṇi vyaktāni aṣṭau mūrttīstavātikramya mu[ktvā] deva ! tvāmatyantāvyaktaparamatattvaṃ yogibhirapi mahadbhiragamyaṃ draṣṭuṃ sākṣātkartu ke vayamitare prāṇinaḥ ? naivāsmādṛśo 'gocaro devaḥ | somādīni vyaktāni rūpāṇi devasya yadi vayaṃ paśyema iti ||
tadvibhajannāha—

itīdṛśaṃ yat prītiprakāśanaṃ tat preyovacanam prakāśyate 'neneti kṛtvā rātavarmaṇaḥ tannāmno raghuvaṃśajanmano rājñaḥ sambandhi tatprayuktatvāt | deve śaṃkare paramabhaktisamārādhite prasanne kila dattadarśane sākṣātkṛte dṛṣṭe sati | tenetyarthād gamyate | tacca tādṛśaṃ vacanamīśvaraviṣayaṃ rātavarmaprayuktaṃ preya ityevamanugamyatāṃ jñātavyamiti ||
rasavadudāharannāha—

lg.l: mṛteti pretya saṃgantuṃ yayā me maraṇaṃ matam |

div.p: iyaṃ kila preyasī mṛtā svargamagamaditi hetoḥ pretalokāntare kvacit yayānayā saṃgantuṃ yogārthaṃ maraṇaṃ dehavisarjanaṃ matamiṣṭaṃ mama | mṛtvāpyavaśyaṃ tayā saṃgaṃsye iti | saiva yā parāsuḥ kilāsīt nānyā avantī avantirājatanayā mayā [ayātajīvi]tena tathāvyavasitenātraiva janmani na pretya kathaṃ labdhā, kimida[77b]madbhutam | nāsti bhāgyānāṃ duṣkaram | udayanaḥ kila vatsarājaḥ avantirājasutāyāṃ vāsavadattāyāmāsaktaḥ rājyacintāvimukho 'vartata iti mantribhiḥ sā kvacinnigūhya mṛteti khyāpitā | sa ca tadvirahamasahamāno 'tiraktatayā 'numaraṇaṃ tatsaṅgamavartma vyavasasau | tatastaiḥ punarjahre iti kathodāhṛtā ||
nanu prītiriyaṃ pūrvodāhṛtā | tatkimanayeti viśeṣaṃ darśayannāha—

lg.l: prāk prītirdarśitā seyaṃ ratiḥ śṛṅgāratāṃ gatā |

div.p: prāk preyasyalaṅkāre prītistuṣṭiḥ puruṣaviṣayā darśitā | yā punariyamanantaram udāhṛtā sā tviyaṃratiḥ strīviṣayānuraktiḥ bhāvaviśeṣaḥ śṛṅgārarasayonistādṛśavibhāvajanyastathāvidhānubhāvagamyaḥ | yadāha—śṛṅgāratāṃ śṛṅgārākhyarasaviśeṣatvaṃ gatā tadrūpeṇa pariṇatā | kutaḥ ? rūpasya svabhāvāsyātmīyasya saṃkalpaviśeṣalakṣaṇasya bāhulyenodīrṇatayā atyupacayena saha yogena sambandhena hetunā | etaduktaṃ bhavati- ratiriyamavyaktā anupacitā antastattvena vartamānā saṃkalpaviśeṣasvabhāvā bhāva ucyate | ata eva vikāro mānaso bhāva ityamidhīyate | saiva yadā samudīrṇā anubhāvāt kutaścinnāṭikābhinayādilakṣaṇāt vyaktimāyāti tadā śṛṅgāro nāma rasaḥ sampadyata ityata evocyate- abhivyaktā bhāvā eva rasākhyāṃ pratilabhante | vistarastu tacchāstrāt | vakṣyamāṇeṣu raudrādiṣu raseṣu krodhādibhāvapariṇāmaviśeṣarūpeṣvapyayaṃ nyāyo 'nugantavya ityalaṃ vistareṇa | tattasmādidamīdṛśaṃ vacaḥ kāvyaṃ rasavadvijñeyam, śṛṅgāra[ra]sayogāt | yadvedṛśaṃ tadrasavadvacanamiti yojyam ||

lg.l: so 'yaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ pāpo labdhaḥ kiṃ jīvati kṣaṇam || 280 ||

div.p: yena durātmanā mamāgrataḥ purastāt keśeṣu nigṛhya avaṣṭabhya kṛṣṇā draupadī priyā ākṛṣṭā ākṣiptā paribhūtā, so 'yamepa pāpo durātmā duḥśāsano mayā bhīmena labdhaḥ prāptaḥ kiṃ kṣaṇamekaṃ jīvati ? naiva jīvituṃ labhate | eṣa mayā hato vartate kauravāṇāṃ paśyatām | tribhuvanamapi saṃhatametatparitrāṇe na samarthamiti bhīmo garjati ||
ko 'yaṃ rasa iti darśayannāha—

lg.l: ityāruhya parāṃ koṭiṃ krodho raudrātpratāṃ gataḥ |

div.p: iti uktena prakāreṇa parāṃ koṭiṃ prakarṣaniṣṭāmāruhya prāpya anubhāvenābhivyaktimāgamya krodho bhāvaviśeṣo raudrātmatāṃ raudrarasaviśeṣamvabhāvatāṃ gataḥ | kasyāsau krodho ya evamavadat ? bhīmasya śatruṃ duḥśāsanaṃ paśyataḥ | anena tādṛśavastusvabhāvo vibhāvo bhāvayoniḥ sūcita ityevaṃvidhaṃ vacaḥ kāvyaṃ rasavadraudrarasayogāditi |

urvīṃ mahīṃ sārṇavāṃ sahārṇavairvartata iti catuḥsamudraparyantāmajitvā anirjitya anātmasātkṛtvā tajjayalabdhayā ca dhanasampadā vividhaivicitraiḥ śāstroktairaśvamedhaviśvajidvājapeyarājasūyādibhirmakhairyāgaviśeṣaiḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ yāgasāmānye tadviśeṣasya sādhakatamatvāt | aniṣṭvā yajanamakṛtvā arthibhyaśca vanīyakebhyo 'rtha yathārthaṃ yathākāmamadattvā apratipādya ahaṃ rājadharmaśūnyaḥ kathaṃ pārthivaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ bhaveyam ? naiva, pṛthivījayādilakṣaṇatvāt pārthivatāyā iti ||
kataro 'yaṃ rasa iti vivṛṇvannāha—

ityuktena vidhinā utsāho bhāvaviśeṣaḥ prakṛṣṭa ātmā asyeti prakṛṣṭātmā parāṃ koṭimārūḍha़o 'bhivyaktatvāt | vīraścāso rasaśca tasya sa evātmā svabhāvaḥ tena lakṣitaḥ tiṣṭhan vartamāno vīrarasatāmāpannaḥ | tāsāmanantaroktānāṃ girāṃ kāvyarūpāṇāṃ rasavattvaṃ vīrarasayogitāṃ samarthayituṃ kartumīśvaraḥ samartha iti ||

yasyā devyāḥ komalamaṅgamasyā iti komalāṅgyāḥ mārdavaguṇenaiva kevalena nirmitāyā ata eva kusumamayī śayyā kusumaśayyā puṣpatalpamatyantakomalaṃ kimutānyat ? rujākarī pīḍa़āhetuḥ | seyamekāntasukumāradehā devī hutāśanavatīmanalajvālākarālāṃ citāṃ citimantaśayyāṃ kathaṃ nāmādhiśete ? tasya mārdavasya kimidaṃ śayanam ? hā dagdhadaiva ! kimidaṃ vyavasitaṃ tvayā iti ||
katamo 'yaṃ rasa iti prakaṭayati—

iti kathitena [pathā] yathā kāruṇyaṃ śoko bhāvaviśeṣaḥ kāruṇyākhyarasaviśeṣāśrayaḥ udriktamabhivyaktamāgataṃ karuṇarasātmanā vartamānamalaṅkāratayā kāvyabhūṣaṇatvena smṛtam iṣṭaṃ tajjñairiti | tathetyādi | yathā ratikrodhotsāhaśokodrekarūpāśca[78b]tvāro [śṛṅgāra]raudravīrakaruṇā rasā nidarśitāstathā 'pare śeṣāścatvāro jugupsāhāsavismayabhayabhāvodbhāvasvabhāvāḥ, bībhatsaśca hāsyaśca adbhutaśca bhayānakaśceti bībhatsahāsyādbhutabhayānakā rasā nidarśyanta iti śeṣaḥ ||

deva ! tavārīṇāṃ tvatkṛpāṇakṛtāntapītajīvitānāṃ śoṇitaṃ raktaṃ pāṇisampuṭaiḥ añjalibhiḥ pāyaṃ pāyamabhīkṣṇaṃ pītvā mattāḥ kauṇapāḥ rākṣasā antrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni raktakusumadāmāyamānāni yeṣāmityantrabhūṣaṇāḥ kabandhaiḥ viśirobhiḥ śarīraiḥ saha
tavārīṇāmityapekṣaṇīyam | nṛtyanti [iti] utprekṣā, teṣāmapi nṛtyayogāt | atra jugupsākhyo bhāvaḥ tādṛśavibhāvajanitaḥ, anubhāvena tadrūpeṇābhivyaktaḥ | vikṛtarūpabībhatsarasasvabhāvatāmanubhavannalaṅkāratveneṣṭa iti draṣṭavyam ||

sakhi ! tavādyāpi amlānā pratyagrā pariṇayotsavaniveśitā mālā kusumadāmāni yasyā ityamlānamālāyāḥ | anye tu puruṣāyitapariśrameṇa mlānamālatve 'pi amlānamālāyā iti viśeṣaṇamupahāsaparam iti vyācakṣate | stanasya taṭe pradeśe lagnaṃ vyavasthitaṃ nakhapadamidaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ mayūrapadakaśaśaplutakādirūpaṃvātsyāyanīye kāmasūtre 2. 4. 19-20 navamabhinavamārdraṃ chādyatāṃ saṃvriyatāmuttarīyeṇa saṃvyānena | kimevamatitvaritam | ānanditāḥ sakhi ! vayam | sādhu kutam | atrānucitārthadarśanavibhāvāt kṛto hāsākhyo bhāvaḥ samudriktarūpo hāsyarasatāmāgataḥ | kāvyaśobhākaramidaṃ vijñeyam ||

eṣāṃ nandane udyāna śākhinām aṃśukāni vastrāṇi pravālāni pallavāni hārādi ca bhūṣaṇamalaṅkāraḥ puṣpam | ādiśabdenāṅgadakuṇḍalādiparigrahaḥ | śākhāśca vicitrasaṃniveśaviśeṣāḥ | mandirāṇi prāsādāḥ | [a]ho citramidamapūrvamidaṃ dṛṣṭam ! iha vismayo nāma bhāvaḥ parisphuṭībhūto 'dbhutarasatāmāsevata iti veditavyam ||

maghonaḥ śakrasya kuliśaṃ vajramidaṃ dṛśyate | dhārāsu koṭiṣu sannihito vyavasthito 'nalo 'gnirasyeti dhārāsanni[79a]hitānalam | yasya kuliśasya smaraṇaṃ kimu darśanam ? daityānāmasurāṇāmantarvatnyo yāḥ striyastāsāmatibhayagrastānāṃ garbhāṇāṃ pātāya nāśārthaṃ kalpate sampadyate | yasya smaraṇādapyasurastrīṇāṃ garbhāḥ patanti tadidaṃ kuliśamiti
prakṛtam | atra bhayākhyo bhāvaḥ samudbhūto bhayānakarasarūpeṇa tiṣṭhannalaṅkāraḥ smṛta ityavaseyam ||
nanviyaṃ rasavattā prāgeva mādhuryaprastāve darśitā | tat kiṃ punarucyata iti cedāha—

vācyasya kāvyādheyavastunaḥ sambadhinī sā grāmyatā asabhyatā yoniḥ prabhavaḥ asyeti agrāmyatāyoniḥ | gamakatvādvācyasyeti sāpekṣatve 'pi samasyate | raso 'rtharasaḥ | mādhurye śabdārthasādhāraṇe vibhajyamāne darśitaḥ kāmaṃ sarvo 'pyalaṅkāra [1.62] ityādinā | iha tu rasavadalaṅkāre 'ṣṭau yathoktā rasāsteṣvāyattā pratibaddhā rasavattā rasayogitā aṣṭarasā iti yāvat | girāṃ kāvyānāṃ sambandhinaḥ smṛtā abhimatā iti |
iti bhāvarasasaṃgrahaślokāviti ||
ūrjasvi nidarśayannāha—

lg.l: apakartāhamasmīti hṛdi te mā sma bhūdbhayam |
vimukheṣu na me khaṅgaḥ grahartuṃ jātu vāñchati || 291 ||

div.p:
ahamasyāpakartā pratikūlavartī prāptaścedānīmanenāsmi bhavāmīti hetoste tava hṛdi citte bhayaṃ trāso mṛto 'smīti mā sma bhūt mā bhaiṣīḥ | na tvāṃ hanmi | nahi jātu
kadācidapi me mama khaḍgo vimukheṣu samaranirāstheṣu apratipraharatsu aprahartṛṣu kramituṃ vāñchati | nāstyasyedṛśī sthitiḥ yadvimukheṣu praharatīti ||
tadvivṛṇoti—

lg.l: iti muktaḥ paro yuddhe niruddho darpaśālinā |

div.p:
ityanantaroktena krameṇa puṃsā kenāpi kenacit anirdiṣṭagotranāmadheyena darpaśālinā sauṭīryasambandhitena yuddhe niruddhaḥ prāptaḥ paraḥ śatruḥ muktastyakto na hataḥ | yadīdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ tadevamādikamanyadapi tādṛśam—
prāṇā[n] juhaumi yuddhāgnau yadyarātirmamorjitaḥ |
na sītārpaṇakārpaṇyamlānaḥ prāṇimi rāvaṇaḥ || [79b] ityādyūrjasvītyavajñeyamavagantavyamiti ||

iṣṭamabhimatamarthaṃ kañcitpriyasamāgamādilakṣaṇaṃ sākṣādañjasā vācakavyāpāreṇa anākhyāya apratipādya tasyaiveṣṭasyārthasya siddhaye niṣpattyarthaṃ prakārāntarasya tatmiddhyanuguṇasya anyasyārthasyākhyānam ākhyāyate 'neneti vākyaṃ tādṛśam iti anūdya tadīdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ paryāyoktamiṣṭaṃ manīṣibhiriti vidhiḥ ||
tadudāharati—

parabhṛtaḥ kokilo 'sāvayaṃ sahakārasya sambandhinīṃ mañjarīṃ kalikāṃ daśati bhinatti | tamahaṃ parabhṛtaṃ vārayiṣyāmi gatvā, yuvābhyāṃ dampatībhyāṃ svairaṃ svatantram
āsyatāṃ sthīyatām | alaṃ madapekṣayeti ||
tad vyācaṣṭe—

saṅkete kṛtasaṃvidi kasmiṃścit sthāne sakhīmātmano yūnā kenacit saha saṅgamayya saṅgatāṃ kṛtvā tayo ratotsavaṃ raho nirvartayituṃ sādhayitumīcchantyā kayāpi kayācid vidagdhayā saṃkhyā tathā anantaroktena prakāreṇa parabhṛtavāraṇavyapadeśenāpasṛtaṃ tataḥ saṅketāditi ||
samāhitamālakṣayannāha—

kiñcitkāryaṃ prasādanādikamārabhamāṇasya sādhayituṃ sajjībhūtasya puṃso daivavaśāt vidhibalāt kāraṇāt na tu svasāmarthyāt | tasya siṣādhayiṣitasya kāryasya sādhanaṃ sādhyate aneneti tasya punaraparasya pratyayasya kasyacitsamāpattiḥ sannidhānaṃ yā tadevaṃlakṣaṇaṃ samāhitamāhuḥ bruvate kavaya iti ||
tadudāharati—

asyāḥ priyāyā mānaṃ pratikūlavartitāṃ nirākartuṃ pādayorenāmasyā vā namasyataḥ namato me mamopakārāya ārabdhakāryānugrahārthaṃ ghanasya meghasya garjitaṃ manmathanirbhartsitamiva māninīmānaduḥsahamudīrṇam uditaṃ diṣṭyetyānandanivedanamiṣṭasiddheḥ | iha māna-
nirākaraṇaṃ kāryamārabdham, tatra vidhivaśād ghanagarjitamaparaṃ sādhanaṃ ca samāpannamiti lakṣaṇaṃ yojyam ||
udāttamādarśayannāha—

āśayasyābhiprāyasya kasyacidvibhūteḥ sampado vā yanmahatvamaudāryamanuttaraṃ nāsmāduttaramadhikamasti prakarṣa[80a]niṣṭhādhiṣṭhānatvāditi | tamalaṅkāraṃ niratiśayodāttatvaprakāśanarūpamudāttaṃ nāma prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ kavaya iti ||

lg.l: guroḥ śāsamatyetuṃ na śaśāka sa rāghavaḥ |
