div.p: guroḥ piturdaśarathasya śāsanaṃ rājyamidaṃ mayā bharatāya dattaṃ tvayā vanamāvastavyamityājñāmatyetuṃ laṅghituṃ na śaśāka na samartho 'bhūt vinayaparavaśatayā sa rāghavo rāmaḥ | kimasāvitthamakiñcitkaro yat svabhāvyaṃ rājyamanyasmai dīyamānamātmānaṃ ca vane kṣipyamāṇamapekṣate ? naivam | gurubhaktiḥ kāpi sā tasyetyāha- ya ityādi | yo rāghavaḥ rāvaṇasya daśakandharasya rākṣasarājasya dāsīkṛtatrailokyasya śirasāṃ chedaḥ kārya trailokyārthamanuṣṭheyatvāt tadeva bhāro 'tidurvahatvāt | tatrāpi kim ? punarātmavipakṣanigrahamātre 'viklavaḥ śaktaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ gurorājñāṃ nāticakrāmetyāśayamāhātmyaṃ vinayotkarṣarājyalobhānabhibhavādilakṣaṇamālakṣyata iti ||

padmarāgādiratnavikārā bhittayaḥ kuḍyāni ratnabhittayastāsu saṃkrāntairuditaiḥ pratibimbānāṃ pratiśarīrāṇāṃ śatairvṛtaḥ parikṣipto laṅkeśvaro [rā]vaṇaḥ āñjaneyena hanūmatā sītānveṣaṇārtha tatra gatenāyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ, pratibimbānyetānīti tattvataḥ samyag jñāto
nirdhāritaḥ kṛcchrādyatnena nipuṇaṃ nirūpayatā na jhaṭityeveti bhūtimahattvamanatiśayamuktaṃ gṛhāṇyapi ratnamayāni iti ||
tadubhayaṃ vivṛṇvannāha—

pūrvatra gurorityādau prayoge āśayasya cittasya māhātmyamatyudāttatvamuktarūpam | atrā[na]ntare ratnabhittiṣvityādau abhyudayasya vibhūtergauravaṃ māhātmyamuktarūpaṃ suvyañjitamākhyātamitīdṛśamiti vā hetoradastadudāttayordvayamapi naikam | āśayopāttaṃ ca vyaktaṃ parisphuṭamabhavaditi ||
apahnutimadhikṛtyāha—

kiñcidvasturūpamapahnutya nirākṛtya nedamiti, anyasyārthasya dharmarūpasya vā darśanaṃ vidhānaṃ yadityanūdya sāpahnutirityabhidhīyate | tāmudāharati- [80b] smaraḥ kāmaḥ pañceṣavo 'syeti pañceṣurna bhavatīti | iṣūṇāṃ pañcatvaṃ dharmo 'trāpahnūyate | na smara iṣavo vā | yadāha—tasya smarasya patriṇāmiṣūṇāṃ sambandhi sahasraṃ sahasrasaṃkhyatā | anyathā kathaṃ bhuvanatrayaṃ jayediti | anyasya sahasrasaṃkhyālakṣaṇasyārthasya dharmāntarasya darśanamitīdṛśī dharmāpahnatiravaseyeti ||

lg.l: candanaṃ candrikā mando gandhavāhī ca dakṣiṇaḥ |
seyamagnimayī sṛṣṭiḥ śītā kila parān prati || 303 ||

div.p:
candanaṃ malayajaṃ candrikā jyotsnā mando mṛdurgandhavāhī pavano dakṣiṇa iti yadetat seyamīdṛśī sṛṣṭiḥ sraṣṭuragnimayī dahanasvabhāvā asmākam [kṛte] | parān prati
anyeṣāṃ kileyaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ śītāhlādakarī | kilaśabdenamayi śīteti mudritapustakeṣu | śītā kileti ratnaśriyaḥ | eṣa eva vādijaṅghālādyabhimataḥ pāṭhaḥ | śrutagamyatāṃ śītatāyāḥ sūcayati | duṣṭatāyā evānubhavagamyatvāt | virahaviplutacittaḥ kaścitkāmukaḥ kathayatīti ||
keyamapahnutirityāha—

tasya candanādervastunaḥ pareṣvanyeṣu svastheṣu viṣaye śaiśiryaṃ śaityamabhyupetyāgnikṛtyāpahnutyā evātmani viṣaye kenacit kāminā viyuktena auṣṇyasya candanādigatasya pradarśanādudbhāvanātkāraṇāt saiṣā tādṛśī viṣayāpahnutiḥ | viṣaye kvacidvasturūpāpahnuteḥ, na sarvatreti ||

amṛtaṃ sudhā syandante sravantītyamṛtasyandinaḥ kiraṇāḥ asyeti amṛtasyandikiraṇaḥ padārthaviśeṣaścandramā nāma no 'smākaṃ mataḥ prasiddhaḥ | ayaṃ tu anya evārthātmā padārthaḥ | kutaḥ ? viṣamamṛtaviruddhaṃ niṣyandamānāḥ kṣarantyo dīdhitayaḥ kiraṇā asyeti viṣaniṣyandino dīdhitayo yatastasmātkathamayaṃ candrastadviruddhalakṣaṇa iti kaścidvirahī viplavata iti ||
iyaṃ katamāpahnutirityāha—

ityuktena vidhinā indoścandratvamamṛtamayatvaṃ svarūpaṃ nivartyāpahnutyārthāntarātmanā viṣarūpeṇoktaḥ udbhāvita induḥ | uktamityapi pāṭhaḥ | tatra candratvamuktaṃ svarūpeṇa nivartya rūpāntareṇoktamiti yojyam | smarārtena kāmātureṇa virahiṇā kenaciditi hetoḥ svarūpāpahnutireṣā [matā] jñeyā, candrasvarūpasyā[81a]pahnuteriti ||

nanūpamāpahnutiriha saṃgṛhītā | sā hi kathañcidantarbhūtopameṣyate | yadāhuḥ—
apahnutirabhīṣṭā ca kiñcidantargatopamā |
bhūtārthāpahnavādeṣā kriyate sāmidhā yathā || [kāvyālaṅkāre 3. 21]

lakṣyaṃ cedaṃ dattam |
neyaṃ virauti bhṛṅgālī madena mukharā muhuḥ |
ayamākṛṣyamāṇasya kāmasya dhanuṣo dhvaniḥ || iti | [ kāvyālaṅkāre 3. 22]
idaṃ tvanīdṛśamapahnutilakṣaṇamityāśaṅkyāha—

upamāpahnutirīdṛśī pūrvamupamāvikalpeṣveva darśitā antarbhāvitā |
na jātu śaktirindoste mukhena pratigarjitum |
kalaṅkino jaḍasyeti pratiṣedhopamaiva sā || [ 2. 34 ] iti saṃgṛhītā | tannāsyāḥ pṛthaglakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ cocyate | iti kathitapathānusāreṇa apahnuterbhedānāṃ vikalpānāṃ vistaraḥ prapañco lakṣyo draṣṭavyaḥ | lakṣyeṣu prayogeṣu sargabandhādiṣu svayaṃ caite prayoktavyāḥ | tadyathā—
jagadetat priyāsarvaṃ na jagannāma kiñcina |
tathāpi cittasantoṣaṃ nāsādayasi na priyām || sarvāpahnutiḥ |
priyā naiveyamanyaiva kācidābhāti bhāminī |
na hi sā niranukrośamevaṃ niranuṣevate || hetvapahnutiḥ |
na stanadvayametatte bhāraḥ ko 'pyeṣa durvahaḥ |
kathaṃ prāṇimi tanvaṅgi ! bhṛśametena tāmyasi || caṭupradhānāpahnutiḥ |
evamanye 'pyapahnutibhedāḥ kalpanīyā iti ||
kramaprāptaṃ śliṣṭaṃ lakṣayati—

yad vaco vacanamaneko bhinno 'rtho 'bhidheyaṃ yasyetyanekārtham | ekena samānena rūpeṇa śabdasvabhāvena anvitaṃ yuktaṃ sarūpam ityanūdya śliṣṭaṃ tadiṣṭaṃ smaryata iti vidhīyate | taccaivaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śliṣṭaṃ dvidhā prakāradvayena bhidyate | katham ? abhinnamekaṃ padaṃ subantatiṅantarūpaṃ yatra tadabhinnapadamavikṛtaśabdaṃ bhinnamanekam, padaṃ bhaṅgena yojanāt, prāyamadhikaṃ yatra tad bhinnapadaprāyam | tena vā prāyamadhikaṃ kiñcidabhinnamiti prāyograhaṇena sūcayati | anena rūpeṇa dvidheti prakṛtam ||
udāharannāha—

lg.l: rājā harati lokasya hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ || 309 ||

div.p: asāvayaṃ rājā candro nṛpatiśca | tatra candrastāvadudayaṃ parvatamārūḍha़ḥ | nṛpatistūdayamabhyudayaṃ rājyarūpamārūḍha़ḥ prāptaḥ | candraḥ kāntimān saumyaḥ | nṛpatiḥ kāntimānabhirūpaḥ | candro raktamaruṇamuda[81b]yāvasthābhāvitvānmaṇḍalaṃ bimbamasyeti raktamaṇḍalaḥ | nṛpatistu raktamanuraktaṃ snigdhaṃ maṇḍalamamātyādiprakṛtivṛndaṃ yasyeti raktamaṇḍalaḥ | lokasya hṛdayaṃ janasya manaḥ prītiyogena harati rañjayati | candro mṛdubhiḥ śītaiḥ karaiḥ kiraṇairharati | nṛpatistu mṛdubhiranudvejanīyaiḥ karairucitaṣaḍbhāgādisvabhāvaiḥ harati | iti śliṣṭamabhinnapadaṃ bhaṅgena vinā yathāvasthānamubhayatra padayojanāditi ||

lg.l: rājñā pradoṣo māmityamapriyaṃ kiṃ na bādhate || 310 ||

div.p: pradoṣo rajanīmukham, prakṛṣṭo 'dhiko doṣo lobhādirasyeti pradoṣaśca kaścit puruṣo vivakṣitaḥ | doṣā rātrirākara āśrayastatra darśanāt | yasya doṣākara iti tatsannidhau dṛṣṭeḥ, doṣākareṇa candreṇa, doṣāṇāṃ krauryādīnāmākaraḥ sthānaṃ tena nṛpeṇa | nakṣatrapathe vyomni vatate nakṣatrapathavartinā candreṇa, kṣatrasya panthāḥ kṣatrapathaḥ kṣātro dharmaḥ śiṣṭapālanaduṣṭanigrahādirūpaḥ, na tathā 'kṣatrapathastadvartinā rājadharmātikramiṇā nṛpeṇa saṃbadhnan saṅgacchamānaḥ | māmitthamanena prakāreṇa apriyaṃ na vidyate priyā 'syeti virahiṇaṃ pradoṣaḥ kṣaṇadāvatāraḥ | kiṃ kasmāt na bādhate na tāpayati ? bādhata eva | apriyaṃ na priyamapriyaṃ dveṣyaṃ kiṃ na bādhate nāpakaroti ? nigṛhṇātyeva pradoṣaḥ prakṛṣṭadoṣaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścit | idaṃ bhinnapadaprāyaṃ śliṣṭamuktena vidhinā pradoṣa ityādīnāṃ bhinnatvād rājñā ityasyābhedāditi ||
alaṅkārāntaragocaraḥ śleṣo 'pi | sa prāgukta iti darśayannāha—

upamā rūpakamākṣepaḥ vyatirekaścādiryasya dīpakārthāntaranyāsādeḥ sa gocaro viṣayo yeṣāṃ te śleṣāḥ prāgevopamāprastāvādiṣu darśitāḥ | tataḥ samprati nocyante | tatropamāgocaraḥ śleṣaḥ śiśirāṃśupratidvandvītyādinā [2.28] darśitaḥ | rūpakopaghnaḥ rājahaṃsopabhogārhamityādinā [2.87] | ākṣepaviṣayaḥ amṛtātmani padmānāmityādinā [2.159] | vyatirekāśrayaḥ tvaṃ samudraśca durvārāvityādinā [2.183] | dīpakādhikaraṇo hṛdyagandhavahā ityādinā[2.113] | evamanye 'pyarthāntaranyāsādigocarā draṣṭavyāḥ | ye tu pūrvaṃ noktāste apare 'nye kecana kiyanto nidarśyante pratipādyanta iti ||
ke punasta iti darśayannāha—

abhinnā ekā kriyā yatra sa tādṛśaḥ kaścidasti śleṣaḥ | aviruddhe sahabhāvinyau kriye yasmin sa tadrūpo 'paro 'nyaḥ kaścidasti | viruddhe karmaṇī kriye yatra sa cānyaḥ kaścidasti | śleṣa iti sarvatra sambadhyate | niyamo 'vadhāraṇamasminnastīti niyamavānapi vidyate kaścit ||

niyamasyākṣepo niṣedho rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasyāṃ tathāvidhoktirabhidhānaṃ yatra tādṛśo 'pyasti kaścit | nātra virodho 'stītyavirodhī | so 'pyasti | virodho 'saṅgatiratra vidyata iti virodhī | so 'pyasti | nāmasaṅkīrtanamātreṇa na jñāyanta ityāha—teṣāṃ śleṣāṇāmabhinnakriyādīnāṃ nidarśaneṣu lakṣyeṣveva nābhidhānamātreṇa rūpasya pratiniyatasya lakṣaṇasya vyaktiḥ pratyavagamo bhaviṣyati | tato yathākramaṃ nidarśyanta iti ||

lg.l: dṛśo dūtyaśca karṣanti kāntābhiḥ preṣitāḥ priyam || 314 ||

div.p: kāntābhirnāyikābhiḥ vāsakaśayyābhiḥ preṣitāḥ prayuktā dṛśo dṛṣṭayo dūtyaśca nisṛṣṭārthādaya[ḥ] svabhāvenaiva madhurāḥ subhagā ubhayyo 'pi snigdhāḥ | premarasabhāvitā dṛśaḥ dūtyastvaparuṣāḥ | rāgaṃ bhāvamulbaṇamudīrṇamantargatamākāraviśeṣeṇa śaṃsantyaḥ sūcayantyo dṛśaḥ | dūtyastu rāgamulbaṇaṃ nāyikānuraktimadhikāṃ caturamācakṣāṇāḥ karṣanti vaśīkurvanti priyaṃ vallabham, yatra preṣitāḥ | ayamabhinnakriyaḥ śleṣaḥ, karṣaṇalakṣaṇayaikayā kriyayā dṛśāṃ dūtīnāṃ ca sambandhāditi ||

asitekṣaṇāḥ striyaḥ kokilānāṃ giraśca vācaḥ | madhurāḥ manoharāḥ dvayyo 'pi | rāgaṃ raktibhāvaṃ vardhayanti rāgavardhinyaḥ ubhayyo 'pi | komalāḥ kokilāgiraḥ śravaṇānudvejanīyatvāt, asitekṣaṇāstu sukhasparśatvāt | kokilāgiro madena samayakṛtena harṣaviśeṣeṇa kalāḥ puṣṭāḥ | asitekṣaṇāstu madena madhupānajanitena kalāḥ vihvalāḥ |
kokilāgira ākarṇyante śrūyante | asitekṣaṇāstu śliṣyante āliṅgyante | [82b] ayamaviruddhakriyaḥ śleṣaḥ, ākarṇanaśleṣaṇayoḥ sahabhāvāditi ||

eṣa gharmāṃśurādityaḥ parābhavatyastameti | aṅgajastu kāmo vijṛmbhate samudbhavati | vāruṇyā pratīcyā diśā yogena saṅgamena vardhitamupabṛṃhitaṃ rāgamaruṇimānam ādarśayan dharmāṃśuḥ parābhavatīti prakṛtam | aṅgajastu vāruṇyā madirayā yogena pānalakṣaṇena vardhitaṃ rāgaṃ ratibhāvamādarśayan vibhramairāviṣkurvan vijṛmbhata iti prakrāntam | ayaṃ viruddhakriyaḥ śleṣaḥ, parābhavavijṛmbhaṇayorastamayodayarūpayoḥ parasparavirodhāt iti ||

asya narendrasya kasyacinnistriṃśatvam asau khaṅga eva vartate na ma[na]si nistriṃśatvam | asitvaṃ krauryaṃ ceti śliṣṭam | dhanuṣyeva vakratā | na cetasi vakratā | natatvaṃ śāṭhyaṃ ceti śliṣṭiḥ | śareṣu bāṇeṣveva mārgaṇatvaṃ nātmani | mārgaṇatvaṃ śaratvaṃ yācakatvaṃ ceti śliṣyate | ayaṃ niyamavān śleṣaḥ | asāvevetyavadhāraṇaprayogāditi ||

deva ! tvayi rakṣati jagatīṃ padmānāṃ [eva] daṇḍeṣu nāleṣu kaṇṭako dṛśyate, na rājye | kaṇṭakaḥ kārkaśyalakṣaṇaḥ, padmadaṇḍeṣu rājavipakṣaśceti śliṣṭatvāt | ayaṃ niyama ākṣipyate | athavā katham niyamyate ? yato rāgiṇāṃ vā mithunāni strīpuṃsayugmalakṣaṇāni teṣāmanyonyāliṅganeṣvapi viṣaye[ṣu] kaṇṭakaḥ rāgajanitapulakarūpo dṛśyate | tatkathamevamavadhāryata iti niyamākṣeparūpoktirayaṃ śleṣa iti ||

sa vivakṣitaḥ kaścinmahībhṛtparvataḥ rājā ca, bhūrayo mahāntaḥ kaṭakāḥ sānavo yasya parvatasya | bhūrirviśālaḥ kaṭakaḥ skandhāvāraḥ hastābharaṇaviśeṣo vā yasya sa bhūrikaṭako rājā | tejasvī raviḥ prabhāvaviśeṣayuktaśca niyataḥ pratidinamudayaḥ prabhāvalakṣaṇo yasya sa niyatodayo raviḥ, niyataḥ sthiraḥ udayo rājyarūpo yasya sa niyatodayo rājā | dakṣo nāma prajāpatirvidhātā kaścit | rājā ca dakṣaḥ śūraḥ prajānāṃ lokānāṃ ca [83a] patiḥ adhipaḥ svāmī kārttikeyaḥ prabhuśca, śaktiḥ āyudhaviśeṣaḥ tāṃ dhārayatīti śaktidharaḥ skandaḥ | śaktimutsāhamantraprabhāvarūpāṃ dhārayatīti śaktidharo rājā | āsīdabhūt | ayamavirodhī śleṣaḥ | mahībhṛdbhūrikaṭakatvādīnāmubhayatrāpyavyāhateriti ||

acyuto viṣṇuḥ, nyāyabhraṃśābhāvāt | sthiraśca | tatra yadā 'cyuto viṣṇustadā vṛṣasya vṛṣabhasya ariṣṭanāmnastenocchedād avṛṣoccheditvaṃ viruddham | pakṣāntare tu aviruddham, vṛṣasya dharmasya rājñā anucchedāt | rājā candraḥ, nṛpaśca | tatra candrasya aviditaḥ kṣayo 'nenetyaviditakṣayatvaṃ viruddham, dakṣaśāpena kṛṣṇapakṣe kṣīyamāṇatvāt | pakṣāntare tu rājyāpacayābhāvādavyāghātaḥ | devo gatidevo vibudhaḥ | sammatidevaśca rājā | tatra gatidevaḥ kathamavibudhaḥ, asura iti virudhyate | sammatidevastu rājā, vibudhāḥ paṇḍitā vigatā yataḥ | na tathā avibudhaḥ budhayuktaḥ paṇḍitamaṇḍalamaṇḍitāsthānamaṇḍapaḥ | śaṅkarastrilocanaḥ, śāntikaraśca | tatra trinetraḥ phaṇidharanaddhajaṭājūṭaḥ sārasanīkṛtanāgaḥ kuṇḍalīkṛtapannagaḥ kathamabhujaṅgavān iti virodhaḥ | rājā tu dhūrtasaṃsargābhāvād abhujaṅgavāniti yujyate | jajñe viditaḥ kriyāvidita iti sarvatra sambandhanīyam | ayaṃ virodhī śleṣa udāhṛtaḥ ||
viśeṣoktimāviṣkurvannāha—

guṇaśca jātiśca kriyā ca ādiśabdena dravyaparigrahaḥ | teṣāṃ vaikalyasyābhāvasya darśanaṃ vacanaṃ yattat | kimartham ? viśeṣasyātiśayasya kasyacitkāryaviṣayasya darśanāya pratipādanārthameva | ata eva viśeṣaparatvāt sā tallakṣaṇā viśeṣoktiriṣyate manīṣibhiriti ||
tāmudāharannāha—

lg.l: na kaṭhoraṃ na vā tīkṣṇamāyudhaṃ puṣpadhanvanaḥ |

div.p: puṣpadhanvanaḥ kāmasyāyudhaṃ kusuma[ma]nyadvā tādṛśaṃ na kaṭhoraṃ na kaṭhinam na ca atitīkṣṇaṃ na ca niśātaṃ yathānyat, āyudhamayomayaṃ tejitaṃ khaḍgādi tathāpyevamapīti viśeṣavivakṣāyām | yadāha—amunā puṣyadhanvanā āyudhena vā bhuvanānāṃ svargādīnāṃ trayaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagat jitamākrāntameva nājitamapi āsīdabhavat | [83b] aho citram ! iha kāṭhinyataikṣṇyalakṣaṇasyāyudhatvena prasiddhasya niṣedhenānaṅgāstrasya jagajjaitrasya viśeṣaḥ ko 'pyāviṣkṛto jagajjayakāryaviṣayaḥ | tādṛśamapīdaṃ jagadvijayasamarthamaho yathedaṃ prativiśiṣṭamiti ||

iyaṃ devānāṃ kanyakā yoṣinna bhavati | sambhavatyasmāditi sambhavaḥ | gandharvāṇāṃ devaviśeṣāṇāṃ kulaṃ vaṃśaḥ sambhavaḥ, tatra vā sambhūtirasyā iti gandharvakulasambhavā na bhavati | sā hi strījātiratyantābhirūpā | tathāpi pūrvavat viśeṣavivakṣāyām | yadāha—eṣā strī yā na tajjātiḥ | vedhaso 'pi yena sṛṣṭā, yo vā vītarāgaḥ prāgevānyasya | tapaso viṣayasaṃyamasya bhaṅgaṃ nivṛttiṃ vidhātuṃ kartṛmalaṃ samarthā | kimidaṃ rūpa cāturyam | iha devajātyāde rūpotkarṣavattvanivṛttyā viśeṣaḥ, mānuṣyapyevaṃvidhā yā prajāpatimapi rāgaparavaśaṃ karotīti darśitaḥ ||

lg.l: na ca raktābhavad dṛṣṭirjitaṃ ca dviṣatāṃ kulam || 324 ||

div.p: kenacid dhīreṇa bhrūkuṭirbhrūbhaṅgaḥ kopajanmā na baddhā na racitā | daśanacchadaśca adharo na sphuritaḥ kopānna kampi | dṛṣṭiśca raktā roṣāruṇā nābhavat | tathāpi ca dviṣatāṃ kulam arivargaḥ jitaṃ bhagnam | citrametat | atra bhrukuṭībaddhadaśanacchadasphuraṇādeḥ kriyāyā vigamena nirvikāraripuvijayalakṣaṇo viśeṣo darśita iti ||

lg.l: na rathā na ca mātaṅgā na hayā na ca pattayaḥ |

div.p: rathāḥ syandanā na santi | na mātaṅgā hastinaḥ santi | na ca hayā aśvāḥ | nāpi pattayaḥ padātayaḥ | caturaṅgamanīkamidaṃ jayopakaraṇam | tathāpi strīṇāmapāṅgadṛṣṭyā kaṭākṣeṇaiva kevalaṃ jagatāṃ trayaṃ tribhuvanaṃ jīyate vaśīkriyate | atra rathādilakṣaṇadravyābhāvena jagattrayavijayalakṣaṇo viśeṣaḥ strīkaṭākṣasyāviṣkṛta iti ||
viśeṣoktervikalpāntaraṃ darśayannāha—

lg.l: ekacakro ratho yantā vikalo viṣamā hayāḥ |

div.p: ekaṃ cakramasyetyekacakro rathaḥ | kathaṃ vahati ? yantā sārathiścāruṇalakṣaṇaḥ aṅgavikalaḥ | kathaṃ karmaṇya ? hayā rathyāśca viṣamāḥ sapta | kathaṃ dhaureyāḥ ? tathāpyarkaḥ tejasvī pratāpaviśeṣayukto yatastasmāt jagatāṃ trayamākrāmatyabhibhavati | tejastatranimittamiti ||
[keyaṃ] viśeṣoktirityāha—

saiṣā anantaroktā tādṛśī hetuviśeṣoktirnāma vijñāyate | kutaḥ ? tejasvītyarka [84a]sya viśeṣaṇāddheturūpāt | tejasvitvāt jagattrayamākrāmatīti | imāmavāntarabhedavikalpanādiśamatidiśannāha- ayamityādi | ayamevānantaroktaḥ kramo nyāyaḥ hetvapekṣayā hetuviśeṣoktirityevaṃjātīyaḥ anyeṣāmapi bhedānāṃ viśeṣoktivikalpānāṃ kalpane prayoge 'nugantavyaḥ | te caivaṃ kalpanīyāḥ—
na viṣaṃ viṣamaṃ kiñciṃnna ca pāśo 'sti tādṛśaḥ |
mūrcchayantiṃ mṛgākṣīṇāṃ badhnanti [ca] dṛśo jagat || aviruddhakriyāviśeṣoktiḥ ||
na śastraṃ niśitaṃ kiñcittādṛśaṃ nāpi cāmṛtam |
strīṇāṃ kopaḥ prasādaśca hanti jīvayati kṣaṇam || viruddhakriyāviśeṣoktiḥ ||
na kiñcinmārdavaṃ tanvi ! stanayorna ca namratā |
tathāpi ca tathaitābhyāṃ jano 'yamatirajyate || cāṭuviśeṣoktiḥ ||
diśā anayā anyepyūhanīyā vikalpā iti ||
tulyayogitāṃ yojayannāha—

vivakṣitaḥ pratipādayitumiṣṭaḥ kaścidnuṇo dharmaḥ sādhurasādhurvā tenotkṛṣṭairadhimātraiḥ prasiddhaiḥ kaiścidvastubhiḥ saha samīkṛtya vastuto 'sāmye 'pi tathābhāvamāropya kasyacidarthasya puruṣādeḥ kīrtanamākhyānam | kimartham ? stutiḥ praśaṃsā nindā jugupsā cārthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasmin kīrtane tattathā samīkṛtasya stutyarthaṃ nindārthaṃ vā, sā tallakṣaṇā tulyayogitā smṛtā | tena guṇena tādṛśāṃ tulyayogitāpratipādanāt, tādarthyena tulyayogitā tathāvidhoktiriti ||
tāmudāharannāha—

yamo dakṣiṇasyā diśaḥ patiḥ | kuvera utarasyāḥ | [varuṇaḥ paścimāyāḥ] sahasrākṣaḥ śakraḥ prācyāḥ | bhavānapi tvaṃ ca | ete[bhyo 'nye] nāsyā viṣayaḥ | ityananyaviṣayāṃ lokapāla ityevaṃrūpāṃ śrutiṃ śabdaṃ bibhrati vahanti, sarvaistairlokarakṣaṇāt | atra lokapālatvena vivakṣitena guṇena utkṛṣṭairyamādibhiḥ samīkṛtya rājñaḥ kasyacit kīrtanasmṛtyarthamiti yojanīyam ||

mṛgākṣīṇāṃ saṅgatāni premāṇi ta[ḍi]tāṃ vidyutāṃ vilasitāni ca yathāyogaṃ ghanairmeghairārabdhāni ghanaṃ nirantaramārabdhānyapi | kiṃ punaranyāni ? svayamātmanā prakṛticāpalyāt, na tu kāraṇavaiguṇyena ghanārabdhatvāt kṣaṇadvayamapi dvāva[84b]pi kṣaṇau na tiṣṭhanti | kiṃ punaściram ? yadi paramekaṃ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti | iha vivakṣitena guṇena kṣaṇamātrāsthāyitvenotkṛṣṭaiḥ pratītaistaḍa़idvilasitaiḥ samīkṛtya strīpremṇāmaticapalatayā nindārthaṃ kīrtanamiti lakṣaṇaṃ yojanīyam ||
virodhaṃ nidarśayannāha—

viruddhānāmanyonyapratidrandvināṃ padārthānāṃ kriyāguṇādīnāṃ saṃsargasya sannidheḥ darśanamavagamo yatroktiprakāre | kimartham ? virodhasya vipratiṣedhasya sādhanāya saviśeṣaṃ pratyāyanārthameva | ata eva virodhapradhānatvāt sa uktiviśeṣaḥ virodha iti smṛtaḥ kathyate kavibhiḥ | yathetyudāharati ||

aruṇacaraṇacañcavo haṃsaviśeṣā rājahaṃsāḥ | teṣāṃ kūjitam ninadaḥ madena sāmayikena harṣotkarṣeṇa mañjulaṃ madhuraṃ vardhate vijṛmbhate | mayūrāṇāṃ ca rutaṃ kūjitaṃ punarutkrāntamapagataṃ sauṣṭhavamutkarṣo yataḥ, tat kṣīyate nivartate | vṛddhikṣayayoḥ kriyāpadārthayoḥ viruddhayormithaḥ saṃsargasyaikatra sannidherdarśanamiti lakṣaṇaṃ yojyam ||

jaladharaiḥ prāvṛṣi bhavaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ ambaramākāśaṃ durdināyate bhinnāṅgaṃ jāyate | jagatāṃ manaḥ punastai reva rāgeṇa ratibhāvenākrāntaṃ viṣayīkṛtaṃ raktaṃ jāyate | atra durdinatvaraktatvayorvirāgarāgarūpayoḥ guṇapadārthayoḥ virodhapratipattiriti lakṣaṇaṃ yojyam ||

lg.l: natanābhi vapuḥ strīṇāṃ kaṃ na hantyunnatastanam || 334 ||

div.p: tanu kṛśaṃ madhyam | pṛthurmahīyasī śroṇiḥ nitambo raktaścauṣṭho 'dharaḥ | asitaṃ kṛṣṇamīkṣaṇamakṣi | natā nimnā nābhiḥ | unnatau stanau yatra tādṛśaṃ strīṇāṃ vapuḥ śarīraṃ kaṃ nāma naraṃ [na] hanti cakṣuḥprītimanaḥsaṅgādikrameṇa daśamīṃ daśāṃ kaṃ na nayati ? sarvametādṛśaṃ janaṃ hanti | atra tanumadhyapṛthuśroṇiprabhṛtīnāṃ śarīrāvayavadravyāṇāṃ parasparavirodhināṃ saṃsargadarśanamiti lakṣaṇaṃ yojanīyam ||

lg.l: api te rūpamasmākaṃ tanvi ! tāpāya kalpate || 335 ||

div.p: mṛṇālavadbāhū rambhā kadalī tadvadūrū padmamiva mukhamutpalavadīkṣaṇe yatra tattādṛśamatyantaśītavastusarūpamapi rūpaṃ te tava sambandhi tanvi ! tāpāya taptyarthamasmākaṃ kalpate [85a] bhavati | kimidaṃ viruddham ? atra śītaguṇasya tadvato vā dravyasya bāhuprabhṛteḥ tatsamudāyasya vā rūpasya śarīradravyasya tāpenoṣṇatākārikarmaṇā saha virodha iti draṣṭavyam ||

udyāneṣu mārutairuddhūtāścūtānāṃ campakānāṃ ca reṇavaḥ pauṣpāḥ parāgāḥ | pānthānāṃ virahiṇāṃ locanamaspṛśanto 'pi dūra eva dṛśyamānā udaśrayanti | udasravantītyapi paṭhyate | ubhayatrāpi rodayantītyarthaḥ | tacca viruddham | spṛśatāmeva reṇūnāṃ nayanajalodgamanimittatvāt | kathamaspṛśanta udaśrayanti ? atra sparśaniṣedhodaśrayaṇayoḥ kriyayorvirodha iti draṣṭavyam | kūjitamityādeḥ [2.332] asya ca ko viśeṣaḥ | ubhayatrāpi kriyāvirodhāt | tatra bhinnādhikaraṇayoḥ kriyayorvirodhaḥ | iha tvabhinnādhikaraṇyoriti mahān viśeṣaḥ | anyatrāpyevaṃprakāratvādviśeṣasthiteriti ||

kalabhāṣiṇi ! te dṛṣṭiḥ kasya nāma viśvasanīyatvam visrabdhatāṃ yāti ? na kasyacit | kutaḥ ? yataḥ kṛṣṇe nārāyaṇe kṛṣṇāyāṃ draupadyāṃ vā arjune dhanañjaye cānuraktā satī karṇaṃ tadvipakṣamaṅgarājamavalambate bhajate, tasmādviruddhapakṣapātinī kathamiyaṃ viśvāsvā khaleti śabdacchalena virodhaḥ pratīyate | vastutastu dṛṣṭiḥ kṛṣṇā śyāmā kvacidarjunā dhavalā anuraktā tāmrā ca snigdhā vā karṇaṃ ca śrutipathamāyātatvādavalambata ityavirodhaḥ | śleṣānuviddho 'yamīdṛśo virodhaḥ pratipattavya iti ||
virodhamupasaṃ[harati]—
iti kathitena krameṇāyaṃ virodho 'laṅkāro 'neko vicitraḥ prakāro vikalpo 'syeti anekaprakāraḥ pratāyate prasarati pratīyate lakṣyate vā |

aparo 'pi prakāraḥ kaścidudāhriyate—
sadvayo 'pyadvayaḥ so 'yamunmukho 'pyanatānanaḥ |
karkaśo 'pi mṛdusparśaḥ stanabhāro mṛgīdṛśām || iti |
aprastutastotramādarśayannāha—

aprakrānte tu aprakṛta eva bahistattvena kasmiṃścidvastuni buddhisthe viṣaye yā stutiḥ saṃrādhanamityanūdya sā aprastutapraśaṃsā syāditi vidhīyate, yaduddeśe 'prastutastotramuktam | aprakrāntepsitastutiriti pāṭhe 'prakrāntasyepsitasyeṣṭasya vastunaḥ kasyacidaprakrāntā vā tadviṣayatvāt | stutiriti [85b] vyākhyeyaṃ śeṣaṃ samānam ||
tāmudāharannāha—

jalairdarbhāṅkuraistṛṇodgamaiḥ | ādiśabdena tarupallavādibhirarthairupakaraṇairvā ayatnena sevāparikleśādi[rāhityena] sulabhaiḥ [sukha]prāpyairakṛcchrādhigatairamṛtāyamānairaparamanyaṃ kañcidasevamānāḥ paracittārādhanaduḥkhānabhijñāḥ svādhīnavṛttayaḥ sukhaṃ nirākulaṃ [hariṇāḥ] vaneṣu jīvanti | api nāma tādṛśī vṛttirasmākamapi syāt ? pratipakṣapātaḥ khalu prajāyate | tādṛśīṃ kalyāṇīṃ vṛttiṃ kalpayato hariṇeṣu īrṣyā lakṣyata iti ||

seyamanantaroktā mṛgāṇāṃ vṛttirayatnasulabhajaladarbhāṅkurarūpā jīvikā, vartante jīvantyanayeti kṛtvā | aprastutā aprakrāntaiva, na prastutāpi tādṛśaprakaraṇābhāvāt | praśasyate saṃrādhyate atra prayoge kenacid rājño 'nuvartanam sevā tadeva kleśaḥ duḥkharūpatvāt | tato nirviṇṇenātiviraktena manasvinodāttena kenacittato 'prastutāpīyamīdṛgviṣayā [stutiḥ] kāvyaśobhākaratvādalaṅkāraḥ | ayamaparo 'tra udāhniyate—
sukhinaste mahātmānaḥ saṃtoṣaparibhāvitāḥ |
sukhābhāsaiḥ parikleśairvarjitātmaparigrahaiḥ ||
itthamaprakrameṇaivamanivṛttiḥ praśasyate |
dhanārjanādisaṃkleśanirvedavaśavartinā ||
samāsokteriyaṃ kathaṃ bhedyate, ubhayatrāpyanyadabhipretyāvāntarābhidhānāt ? tatra sadṛśama evārthāntaramabhidhīyate | iha tu visadṛśamiti mahān bhedaḥ | visadṛśāt kathamarthāntara-
pratītiriti cet ? sadṛśādapi katham ? arthaprakaraṇāderititula saṃyogo viprayogaśca sāhacaryaṃ virodhitā | arthaḥ prakaraṇaṃ liṅgaṃ śabdasyānyasya sannidhiḥ || sāmarthyamaucitī deśaḥ kālo vyaktiḥ svarādayaḥ | śabdārthasyānavacchede viśeṣasmṛtihetavaḥ || —vākyapadīye cedihāpyevamastu | tatra tādṛśī pratītirihedṛśīti na kiñcidvirudhyate | anye tviha praśasyamevābhidhīyate | tatra tu nindyamapīti viśeṣaṃ vyācakṣate | tathaikāntiko bhedo 'nayornidaśitaḥ syāditi ||
vyājastutimādhakṛtyāha—

lg.l: doṣābhāsā guṇā eva labhante hyatra sannidhim || 341 ||

div.p:
nindanniva doṣamācakṣāṇa iva stauti guṇaṃ bhāṣate yadi cet, asāvevaṃlakṣaṇā vyājastutirmatā iṣṭā | kathamatra guṇāḥ pratīyante ? yatastutiriyaṃ guṇāviṣkriyālakṣaṇā syāditi bravīti | hiryasmādarthe | yadatroktiviśeṣe doṣavadābhāsante pratibhānti tādṛśapadopādānāderdoṣābhāsā guṇā eva śauryādayo na doṣo 'pi kaścit | ata eva leśa[86a]stuteriyaṃ bhidyate | tatra hi doṣe guṇaḥ kaścideva pratī[ya]te | yaduktam—
doṣābhāso guṇaḥ ko 'pi darśitaścāṭukāritā | [2. 200] iti | sannidhimavasthānaṃ labhante pratīyanta iti yāvat | atra vyājastutau | tataḥ stutireveyam sarvathā [na] nindā kācidapītiatra ślokavyākhyāyāṃ kimapi traṭitamiti pratibhāti | ||
tāmudāharannāha—

lg.l: tvayā rājñāpi saiveyaṃ jitā mā bhūnmadastava || 342 ||

div.p: rāmeṇa dāśarathinā bhārgaveṇa vā tāpasena caturaṅgabalahīnena tapasvināpi | a[nādaraṃ] sūcayatyapiśabdaḥ | kathañcidanugṛhītamunirūpeṇa janmāntaropāttatapaḥprabhāvayogādvā | tāpaseneti śliṣṭam | atra eveyaṃ śleṣānugataiva pravartate | yadvakṣyatiiti śleṣānuviddhānāmityādi[2.345] | iyaṃ bhūtadhāriṇī pṛthivī jitā ākrāntā | tvayā tu caturaṅgabalaparivāriṇā rājñā narāvipenāpi satā | nātaḥparamihādhikaṃ padam astītyapiśabdena sūcayati | saiveyaṃ jitā tāpasena jitā eva | nānyā tadahamajayaṃ pṛthivīmiti mado 'haṅkārastava mā bhūt | ko 'tra viśeṣa iti cet-nindanena ca | mahānubhāvena jitasamastamahīmaṇḍalena sakalanarendracūḍa़āmaṇinā guṇārāmeṇa rāmeṇa samīkṛtya parayā stutyā saṃyojito rājā kaściditi vyājastutirīdṛśī sutarāṃ ramaṇīyeti ||

purāṇājjīrṇādakiṃñcitkarāt puṃsaḥ puruṣāt kutaścit, purāṇācca puṃso viṣṇoriti śliṣṭam | ācchidyāvahṛtya śrīrabhyudayo rājyaśrīśca devateti śliṣṭam | tvayā paribhujyate niṣevyate | tadidamīdṛśaṃ karma paradārācchedarūpaṃ tavekṣvākuvaṃśyasya tadbhavasya manukulajanmanaḥ | ikṣvākuvaṃśaptyetyapi paṭhyate | tatrekṣvākūṇāṃ te vā vaṃśo 'syetyanyapadārthaḥ | yadupajñeyaṃ varṇāśramācārasthitilakṣaṇā lokayātrā pravartate | kiṃ yujyate ? naivedaṃ yuktaṃ tavedṛśavaṃśasambhavasyetyarthaḥ | rājannityāmantryate | iha purāṇādakiñcitkarātpuṃsaḥ śrīḥ sampat ācchidyate iti nindyata eva | purāṇāt puṃso viṣṇoḥ śrīḥ vibhūtirdevateti ca śliṣṭā | ācchidyate | tāmapi puruṣottamā[dā]kramyākṛṣyata iti vīryotkarṣāviṣkṛteḥ stūyata eva kaścinnṛpatiḥ | tadiyaṃ sarvathā śleṣamupajīvatīti ||

tava kalatraṃ bhāryāṃ [86b] kalatramiva kalatraṃ medinī, pālanādinā | medinī pṛthivī jaghanyajātīyā ca strī | bhujaṅgaśabdenātra śleṣaḥ, phaṇadharo dhūrtaśca vivakṣita iti śliṣṭam | tasya bhogaḥ yathākramaṃ kāmaḥ saṃbhogaśceti punaḥ śliṣṭam | tatra saṃsaktā vyavasthitā tena sā dhriyate iti śruteḥ | niratā cetyubhayatra yojyam | yata evaṃ tat kutaḥ
kasmādutkarṣādahaṃkāraḥ ahamatrādhika ityabhimānaḥ tava parāṃ koṭimadhimātratāmārohati ? na yuktamityamahaṅkartuṃ taveti | nindeva stutiriyamakhilamahītalādhi[patya]varṇanalakṣaṇā atra lakṣyata iti ||
apare apyevaṃ śleṣānugatā vikalpā draṣṭavyā iti nigamayannāha—

iti kathitena pathā śleṣeṇokta[rū]peṇānuviddhānāṃ yuktānāṃ vyājastuteḥ prakārāṇāṃ vikalpānāmanyeṣāṃ ca śeṣāṇāmapi pravistaraḥ prapañco 'paryantaḥ aparimitaḥ prayogeṣu lakṣyatāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ | iha tu diṅmātraṃ darśitam | vikalpāḥ kecidapare nidarśyante—
bibharti sakalāmurvīmuragaḥ svapadacyutaḥ |
bhavānāsādya sāmrājyaṃ rājan kimabhimanyase ||
māyāvaśena loko 'yamāvarjitamatistvayā |
tvadyaśomukharaḥ kṛṣṇacaritaḥ kiṃ cikitsase ||
śrutiḥ kuvalayaṃ dhatte līlayā hariṇīdṛśaṃm |
vikrameṇa bhavānetanmahatā kiṃ tava smayaḥ || iti |
nidarśanamupadarśayannāha—

arthāntare nidarśyāpekṣayā anyasmin kvaciducite kārye pravṛttena tatsādhayatā kenacidvastunā hetubhūtena kartṛbhūtena tenārthāntareṇa sadṛśaṃ tulyaṃ phalaṃ kiñcit sadiṣṭamasad aniṣṭaṃ vā nidarśyeta pratipādyeta yadi, tadevaṃlakṣaṇaṃ nidarśanaṃ syāditi vidhīyate | arthāntarasya vṛttenetyapi pāṭhaḥ | tatrārthāntarasya kasyācidvṛttena karmaṇā sadṛśamiti vyākhyeyam | śeṣaṃ samānam ||
udāharannāha—

savitā ravirudayannevodayamāsādayanneva padmeṣu śriyaṃ vikāśarūpāmarpayati nidhatte | udayapūrvakeṇa padmavikāśenārthāntareṇa sadṛśaṃ phalaṃ nidarśayati-suhṛdāmāśritāna manugrahamupakāraṃ nāma phala[87a]kāryamṛddhīnāmabhyudayānāṃ vibhāvayituṃ darśayitumiti satphalamidaṃ nidarśitaṃ suhṛdanugrahamyābhīkṣṇatvādi[ti] ||
asatphalaṃ nidarśayannāha—

candrasyāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭā bhinnā dhvāntasya tamaso rājiḥ saṃghātaḥ parābhavaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti parābhūyata iti yāvat | sadyastatkṣaṇam | kiṃ kurvatī ? rājā candro nṛpatiśceti śliṣṭam | tena viruddhānāṃ keṣāñcit duṣṭo vipadrūpo '[nto ']vasānaṃ yasya tadbhāvastattām anarthaniṣṭhatāṃ sūcayantīti | rājavirodhahetukamasatphalametad darśitam parābhavasyāniṣṭatvāt ||
sahoktiṃ parivṛttiṃ ca pratipādayannāha—

lg.l: arthānāṃ yo vinimayaḥ parivṛttistu sā yathā || 349 ||

div.p: guṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca sambandhinaḥ sahabhāvasya yugapat sattāyāḥ kathanaṃ pratipādanaṃ yadityanūdya sahoktiḥ sā vijñeyeti vidhīyate | arthānāṃ guṇakriyādīnāṃ vinimayo vyatyayaḥ ityanūdya parivṛttividhīyate | yathetyudāharati ||

lg.l: saha dīrghā mama śvāsairimāḥ saṃprati rātrayaḥ |

div.p: saṃprati virahāturasya mama śvāsairniśvasitaiḥ saha dīrghā āyatā imā rātrayo vartante | mamaivāṅgairavayavairvirahavidhuraiḥ saha pāṇḍurāścandro bhūṣaṇamāsāmiti candrabhūṣaṇāḥ | pāṇḍuratve nimittamidamuktam | atra dai[rghya]sya pāṇḍuratvasya cobhayasambandhinaḥ sahabhāva uktaḥ | niśvāsā rātrayaśca dīrghā aṅgāni rātrayaśca pāṇḍurā yugapadbhavantīti ||

pānthānāṃ viyogināṃ mūrcchayā mohanatayā saha[cūtasya] mañjarī sahakārakalikā vardhate | teṣāṃ pānthānāmasubhiḥ prāṇaiḥ samaṃ saha malayānilāḥ dakṣiṇamarutaḥ patanti ca | atra vardhanayoḥ patanayośca ubhayādhārayoḥ kriyayoḥ sahabhāvo 'mihitaḥ | sahajacitrahetugarbhā ceyaṃ sahoktiriti ||

kokilānāmālāpaiḥ subhagā manoharāḥ sugandhayo vanavāyavo yeṣāmiti sugandhivanavāyavaḥ surabhervasantasya vāsarā divasā janānāmānandaiḥ prītibhiḥ sārdhaṃ saha vṛddhiṃ yānti | vardhanta iti yāvat | atrobhayādhikaraṇayorvardhanakriyayoḥ sahabhāvo darśitaḥ | iyamabhinna[kriyā] | kriyāntarāttu bhinnakriyā ityanayorbhedaḥ pratipattavya iti ||
sahoktimupa[saṃharati]—
ityuktena vidhinā [87b] sahokterudāhṛtayaḥ prayogāḥ kāścana katipaye na sarvā, dattā darśitāḥ atra śāstre | śeṣāḥ prayogāḥ sulakṣaṇīyāḥ ||
parivṛttiṃ nidarśayannāha—
saṃprati parivṛtteśca parivṛtterapi rūpasya nirūpaṇaṃ kiñcit saṃkṣiptaṃ kriyata iti ||

tava bhujena bhujagarājabhogāyamānena śastraiḥ kṛpāṇādibhiḥ prahāraṃ dadatā prayacchatā bhūbhujāṃ rājñām | pūjānugrahanindā[ghāta]dānasya dānatvābhāvāt na caturthī | ciraṃ dīrghamarjitaṃ sañcitaṃ kumudavat pāṇḍuraṃ yaśasteṣāṃ bhūbhujāṃ sambandhi hṛtaṃ gṛhītam | atra prahāreṇa karmaṇā yaśorūpo guṇo vinirmitaḥ | itīdṛśī parivṛttiranugantavyā |
ityaparamudāharaṇam |
āśiṣamāviṣkurvannāha—

abhilaṣite vāñchite vastuni kvacit kriyāviśeṣe āśaṃsanaṃ prārthanamityanūdya āśīrnāma vijñāyata iti vidhīyate | yathetyudāharati— paramaṃ pāramārthikaṃ sakalakalpanāmalavikalaṃ jyotiḥ saṃvedanaṃ sarvapadārthatattvaprakāśakatvāt vāco manasaścāvikalpatvāt na gocaro na viṣaya ityavāṅmanasagocaraḥ | avāṅmanasagocaramityapi paṭhyate | tatra na vidyate vāṅmanasayorgocaro viṣayabhāvo grāhakatvamasyeti vyākhyeyam | vo yuṣmān pātu rakṣatu | atrābhilaṣitaṃ rakṣaṇamāśasyata iti |
ityaparamudāharaṇam

yatra tenaiva tadupamīyate sa taddharmaḥ tasyānyatra kvacidavṛtterananvayanāma alaṅkāraḥ | yadāhuḥ—
yatra tenaiva tasya syādupamānopameyatā |
asādṛśyavivakṣātastamityāhurananvayam ||
tāmbūlarāgavalayaṃ sphuraddaśanadīdhiti |
indīvarābhanayanaṃ taveva vadanaṃ tava || [kāvyālaṅkāre 3. 45-6]

yatropamānena sahābhedaḥ, bhedaśca stutiparaḥ paridīpyate sasaṃdeho nāmāsāvalaṅkāraḥ kalpitaḥ | yathoktam—
upamānena tattvaṃ ca bhedaṃ ca vadataḥ punaḥ |
sasaṃdehaṃ vacaḥ stutyai sasaṃdehaṃ vidurbudhāḥ ||
kimayaṃ śaśī na sa divāpi rājate kusumāyudho na dhanurasya kausumam |
iti vismayād vimṛśato 'pi me matistvayi vīkṣite na labhate 'rthaniścayam || [kāvyālaṅkāre 3. 43-4]

aparaścopamārūpakaṃ nāmālaṅkāraḥ | taduktam—
upamānena tadbhāvamupameyasya sādhayan |
yāṃ vadatyupamāmetadupamārūpakaṃ yathā ||
samagragaganāyāmamānadaṇḍo rathāṅginaḥ |
pādo jayati siddhastrīmukhendunakhadarpaṇaḥ || iti | [kāvyālaṅkāre 3. 35-6]
trayamapyetanna saṃgṛhītamityāśaṅkya saṃgrahaṃ darśayannāha—

ananvayaśca [sa]saṃdehaśca dvāvapyetau upamāsu upamāvikalpeṣu eva darśito antarbhāvitau tallakṣaṇayogāt | tathāhi, ananvayastāva[t—
ca]ndrāravindayoḥ kakṣyāmatikramya mukhaṃ tava |
ātmanaivābhavattulyam [2. 37] ityātmanopamitatvāt, mukhasyopamaiva | na cābhede kathamupamānopameyabhāva iti śaṅkanīyam, ananvaye 'tiprasaṅgāt | na hyananvaya iti vyapadeśāntaramātreṇopamānopameyabhāvastatra nivartate, pratītivirodhāt | athābhede 'pi bhedakalpanayā tadbhāvaḥ, ihāpyevamastu | ata evāsādhāraṇopameyamātmanaivopamiteranyasyānapekṣaṇādanyatvapradarśanavyājena candrāravindābhyāṃ vadanamupamitamiti vyācakṣate | tathā kathamasādhāraṇopameti cintyam | sasaṃdeho 'pi—
kiṃ padmamantarbhrāntāli kiṃ te lolekṣaṇaṃ mukham |
mama dolāyate cittam [2. 26] iti saṃśayamukhena vyaktaṃ sādṛśyapratīteḥ sasaṃśayopamaiva | na ca mantavyam—
kimayaṃ śaśī na sa divāpi rājate [kāvyālaṅkāre 3.44] iti [stuti]paro bhedo na darśita iti | evaṃ nāma kāntisaṃpannaṃ mukhaṃ yat padmaṃ tadvyavasīyata iti stuterapi pratīteḥ | prāyaścāparā apyupamāḥ stutigarbhāḥ, candrādiprativiśiṣṭavastusādṛśyodbhāvanāt | na cāyaṃ tatra[āvaśyaṃ] stutiparo bhedaḥ kathyate, anyathāpi prayogadarśanāt | tad yathā—
eṣā kiṃśukarājī rājati dāvānalo jvalan kimayam |
virahavināśotpāte yātā kimakālasandhyeyam || iti ||
ayamālohitacchāyo madena mukhacandramāḥ |
sannaddhodayarāgasya candrasya prati garjati || [2. 89] iti mukhasya candratvena rūpaṇāt | sāmyapratītigarbhāt rūpakeṣu rūpakavikalpeṣveva darśitamantarbhāvitam | rūpakavikalpa [88b] eva kaścidupamārūpakākhyaḥ | yathā vyatirekagarmī rūpakavikalpo vyatirekarūpakamākhyāyate | tadetattrayaṃ yathālakṣaṇamupamārūpakasaṃgṛhītamiti na kiñcit [tira]ṣkriyate ||

utprekṣāvayavo nāma pṛthagalaṅkāraḥ parairiṣyate | yaduktam—
śliṣṭasyārthena saṃyuktaḥ kiñcidutprekṣāyānvitaḥ |
rūpakārthena ca punarutprekṣāvayavo yathā ||
tulyodayo 'vasānatvādgate 'staṃ prati bhāsvati |
vāsāya vāsaraḥ lkānto viśatīva tamoguhām || iti | [kāvyālaṅkāre 3.47-48]
so 'pyutprekṣāviśeṣatvāt utprekṣāsaṃgṛhīta iti darśayannāha—
yaḥ parairutprekṣāvayavaḥ pṛthaguktaḥ asau so 'pi cāyamutprekṣāyā bhedo viśeṣaḥ kaścit | tatastatsaṃgṛhīta eveti nāsaṃgrahaḥ kaścit |
saṃsṛṣṭiṃ vyācaṣṭe—

nānā anekasyālaṅkārasya saṃsṛṣṭiḥ saṃsargaḥ ekatroktau sannidhānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭistu nigadyate vidhīyate, yaduddeśaṃ saṃkīrṇamuktam | tuśabdenaitadāha—jātyādīnāmiva nāsyāḥ pṛthaglakṣaṇam | teṣāmeva tu dvayorbahūnāṃ vā saṃsargalakṣaṇeyamiti ||
kathamanekasyālaṅkārasya ekatroktau avasthānamiti sāpekṣatvanirapekṣatvarūpaṃ prakāradvayaṃ darśayannāha—

aṅgamupakārakam | aṅgi ca upakāryam | tayorbhāvo 'ṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ sādhyasādhanatvam | tenāvasthānaṃ sannidhānam | sarveṣāṃ ye tatropāttāḥ | samo kakṣā balaṃ yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ samakakṣatā aṅgāṅgibhāvamantareṇa svātantryeṇāvasthānaṃ ceti—evaṃrūpā dvayī dvividhā gativyavasthā [lakṣaṇīyā] draṣṭavyā | kutrālaṅkāre ? saṃsṛṣṭyalaṅkāre viṣaya iti ||

mugdhe ! tava mukhasya śriyaṃ śobhāmaravindāni padmānyākṣipanti | tvanmukhasadṛśāni iti yāvat | iyamupamā | kathametaditi sādhyate—kośaḥ padmagarbho dhanasambhāraśca, daṇḍo nālaṃ caturaṅgabalamiti ca śliṣṭam | tābhyāṃ samagrāṇāṃ paryāptānāmeṣāmaravindānāṃ duṣkaram asādhyaṃ kāryaṃ kimasti kiñcit ? sarvameva sādhyaṃ yattvanmukhaśriyamapyākṣipanti ityaṅgāṅgibhāva[ā]vasthānavatyāḥ saṃsṛṣṭerudāharaṇametat, upamāyāḥ sādhyatvenāṅgitayāvasthānāt | [89a] kośetyādeścārthāntaranyāsasya śleṣānuviddhasya sādhanatvenāṅgatayā sthiterityalaṅkāratrayaṃ saṃsṛṣṭamaṅgāṅgibhūtaṃ varṇitam | upamā arthāntaranyāsa ityalaṅkāradvayaṃ vā | śleṣastvarthāntaranyāsātmanaiva avasthitaḥ, na pṛthak saṃkhyāyata iti |
samakakṣā tu saṃsṛṣṭiḥ nodāhṛtā | sā tvevaṃ draṣṭavyā—

lg.l: vacāṃsi ca madhūnīva kathayanti na vikriyām || iti |

div.p: iyaṃ jātyupamāsaṃsṛṣṭiḥ samakakṣeti ||atra kecana mūla eva
iti bhāsaśūdrakasvīkṛtaṃ ślokaṃ samakakṣāyā udāharaṇatvena paṭhanti |

kośadaṇḍetyādinā yadyarthāntaranyāso 'ṅgatayopanyastaḥ kiṃ tatra śleṣeṇa ? atha śleṣaḥ, sa evāstu kimarthāntaranyāsena ? tadayaṃ na śleṣo nārthāntaranyāsaḥ śuddhaḥ | na caitaddvayarūpā saṃsṛṣṭiraṅgāṅgibhāvāpratīteranayostadudāharaṇaṃ cedamupamāyā eva | [tamyāḥ] tvaṅgitvenāvasāyādasya tvaṅgatāpratīterityata āha—

lg.l: śleṣaḥ sarvāsu puṣṇāti prāyo vakroktiṣu śriyam |

div.p: śleṣo 'yamuktalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvokti jātyaparaparyāyāṃ muktvā sarvāsūpamādiṣu na kasyāñcideva, padārthasvabhāvasya yathāvasthānāt | anyathā tathā tathā parikalpanarūpāsu vakrāsūktiṣu śriyaṃ śobhāṃ puṣṇātyāvahati prāyo bāhulyena | kvacidaprayogādasya prāya ityāha | tathā cālaṅkārā jātivarjyāḥ sarve śleṣānugatā eva prāyaḥ prāgudāhṛtā | jātau vā kvacit prayogāt prāya ityuktam | tadayamapyarthāntaranyāsaḥ vakroktisvabhāvaḥ śleṣagarbho 'ṅgatayopanyasta iti | śleṣaikadeśe eko 'laṅkāraḥ | bhedavivakṣayā vā alaṅkāradvayamiti draṣṭavyam, yathoktaṃ prāk | sarvamidamalaṅkārajātam anenaiva rāśidvayena vyavahāra lāghavārthaṃ saṃgṛhṇannāha- vāṅmayaṃ sarvametadalaṅkārajātaṃ dvidhā, nānyaprakārāvasthāmavatiṣṭhate | katham ? svabhāvoktirjātiḥ pūrvoktalakṣaṇā yathāvasthitavicitrapadārthaparidīpanarūpā, vakroktiśca vastusvabhāvasya tathātathānyathābhidhānasvabhāvā pūrvoktavicitraprabhedā upamādiruktiścetyanena rūpeṇa dvidheti prakṛtam ||
bhāvikatvamudbhāvayannāha—

prabandhaḥ padyagadyamiśrātmakastrividhaḥ santānaḥ prabadhyate viracyate 'sāviti | sa viṣayo yasya sa prabandhaviṣayaḥ kāvyasamudāyagocaraḥ | naikadeśādhikaraṇaṃ taṃ prabandhaviṣayaṃ guṇaṃ vi[89b]śeṣam | anuvādo 'yaṃ bhāvikatvamiti | bhāvikaṃ nāma svārthikatvādasya vidheḥ | prāhurāmananti sūraya iti vidhiḥ | so 'pi na jñāyate kīdṛśo 'pau prabandhaviṣayo
guṇaḥ yadanuvādena bhāvikatvaṃ vihitamiti taṃ prabhavataḥ svarūpataśca darśayannāha- bhāva ityādi | kaveḥ prabandhakarturabhiprāyaḥ prabandhanirvāhakaḥ prayatnaviśeṣo vikalpātmakaḥ | yadāha—kāvyeṣu prabandheṣu sādhyeṣu sādhanarūpeṇa āsiddhi prathamataḥ prabhṛti prabandhaviṣayāṃ siddhiṃ samāptimadhikṛtya yaḥ sthitaḥ tattvavyāpakaḥ sa tādṛśo bhāvastāvat prabhavastasya guṇasya | ata evāsau prabandhaviṣayaḥ | prabandhasādhakabhāvasantā[nā]nuvartitvāt, na prādeśikaḥ | tataśca sarvālaṅkāra[ā/?/śraya]bhūto 'sāvādimadhyānteṣu prabandhamanuvartate | evaṃ prabhavatastāvaduktaḥ asau guṇa iti ||
samprati svarūpatastaṃ vibhajannāha—

vastunaḥ prabandhārthasya samudāyasya parvāṇyeva yathā nagaravarṇanādayaḥ | vastuni ca tāni parvāṇīti vā | vastuparvaṇāṃ kāvyārthasaṃghātasandhīnām aṅgāni samudāyaparvaṇāmiva parasparasyopakāritvamanyonyāṅgāṅgibhāvena sāpekṣāṇāmavasthānam | na tu svatantrāṇāmayaḥśalākānāmiva parasparāsaṃghaṭṭanam | tathābhāvātireke prabandho nārabhyeta | tataśca kathamasya prabandhaviṣayatā guṇasya ? prabandhaviṣayaṃ ca yāvata kiñcid viśeṣyaṃ sambhavati tatra yāni viśeṣaṇāni teṣāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmupādhīnāṃ vyarthānāṃ ***vigato 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ prastute kvacidupayogo yeṣāṃ yato vā teṣāṃ prakṛtānupayogināṃ kārye vivakṣite kvacidaṅgabhāvamabhajatām akriyā tādṛśaṃ kañcidarthamanapekṣya viśeṣaṇamityevāprayogaḥ | kiṃ tu sārthakānāṃ prakṛte kvacid kathañcit upayogināmeva kriyā kasyacidvastuno yātrādeḥ [?] sthāne samupanate 'vasare prāptakālaṃ varṇanam | tādṛśaṃ hi varṇanamatiśobhate | yadāha bhāraviḥ—
mukharatāvasare hi virājate [kirātārjunīye 5. 16]
iti | na tvaprāptāvasaraṃ varṇayitavyamityevaṃ jñeyam | atra kvacidasthāne varṇanaṃ tasya saubhāgyopahatatvād gambhīrasyāpi durbodhasya na kevalamaviṣayasya vastunaḥ dharmādirūpasyārthasya prastāvopanatasya vyaktiḥ sukhapratipattiḥ | kṛtāyā ukteḥ pratipādanasya kramaḥ prakārastādṛśaḥ karatalāma[50a]lakavat arthaprakāśanakauśalasvabhāvaḥ tasya vaśāt sāmarthyāt | atra ca sarvatra bhāva eva satkavīnāṃ pramāṇam | sa hi sarvamīdṛśamucitaṃ vicinoti, tadviparyayaṃ tu durbhagaṃ na spṛśati, yadāha—bhāvāyattamidaṃ sarvam | itīdamanantaroktaṃ sarvaṃ vastu pūrva[va]dupakārādilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣacatuṣṭayaṃ bhāve prabandhavyāpini ucitānucitavivekavedhasi manasi kaverāyattaṃ pratibaddham, tatkāryatvāditi hetoḥ | tatsarvamanantaroktaṃ vidurvidanti tadvidaḥ kavayaḥ |

nanu jātyādikamapi bhāviṃkameva, na hi tasyāpi vinā bhāvena abhinivṛttiḥ | tatkimidameva bhāvikam ? ucyate- padye 'pyevam | tathāpi yo bhāva[ḥ] prābandhiko viśiṣṭaḥ, tadāyattamiha bhāvikamabhipretam | ata evoktam—kāvyeṣvāsiddhi yaḥ sthitaḥ [2.361] itiṃ, jātyādikaṃ tu prādeśikabhāvādhīnam | na hi prabandhānuvartinā ekena bhāvena jātyādikaṃ janyate pratideśamanyonyabhāvābhinivartyatvāt tasya | tasmāt tadanvarthaistaistairabhidhānairyathoktena vidhinā vyavahriyate na bhāvikamiti ||
ye kāvyadharmāḥ śāstrāntare sa[ndhya]ṅgādi[śabda]vyavahṛtāḥ ta iha tallakṣaṇayogādalaṅkāreṣu saṃgṛhītā itiṃ darśayannāha—

vaktṝṇāṃ[?] vaktavyāntarasamuccaye sandhayo—mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ garbho 'vamarśo nirvahaṇamiti pañcoktāḥtula bhāratīyanāṭyaśāstraṃ 19. 37-67 | tatra upakṣepaḥ parikaraḥ parinyāso vilobhanaṃ yuktiḥ prāptiḥ samādhānaṃ vidhānaṃ paribhāvanā udbhedaḥ karaṇaṃ bheda iti mukhāṅgāni | vilāsaḥ parisarpo vidhūtaṃ tāpanaṃ narma narbhadyutiḥ pragamanaṃ virodhaḥ paryupāsanaṃ puṣpaṃ vajrabhupanyāso
varṇasaṃhāra iti pratimukhāṅgāni | a[bhū]tāharaṇaṃ mārgo rūpamudāharaṇaṃ kramaḥ saṃgraho 'numānaṃ [prārthanā]iyaṃ mātṛkāyāṃ nāsti | ākṣiptakaṃ toṭakamadhibalamu[dve]gaḥ saṃbhrama iti garbhāṅgāni | avapāta utpātaḥayaṃ nāṭyaśāstre nāsti | sampheṭaḥ vidravaḥ śaktiḥ vyavasāyaḥ prasādo dyutiḥ khedo niṣedho virodha ādānaṃ chalanaṃ prarocanetyavamarśāṅgāni | sandhirnirodho grathanaṃ nirṇayaḥ paribhāṣaṇaṃ dyutiḥ prasāda ānandaḥ samaya upagūhanaṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ pūrvabhāvaḥ kāvyasaṃhāraḥ praśastiriti nirvahaṇāṅgāni |

vṛttayo—bhāratī sāttvatī kaiśikī ārabhaṭī ceti catasraḥbhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre 20. 1-73 | | tāsāṃ pratyekaṃ catvāryaṅgāni | tatra bhāratyāḥ prarocanā āṃmukhaṃ vīthī śilpakaṃ cetyaṅgacatuṣṭayam | sātvatyā utthāpakaḥ parivartakaḥ saṃlāpakaḥ saṃghātyaśceti | kaiśikyā [narma] narmasphiñjo narmasphoṭo narmagarbhaśceti | ārabhaṭyāḥ saṃkṣiptako 'vapāto vastūtthāpanaṃ saṃpheṭaścetyaṅgacatuṣṭayam |

lakṣaṇāni—bhūṣaṇamakṣarasaṃghātaḥ śobhā udāharaṇaṃ hetuḥ saṃśayaḥ dṛṣṭhāntaḥ prāptiḥ [abhi] prāyo nidarśanaṃ niruktakaṃ siddhiḥ viśeṣaṇaṃ guṇātipāto 'tiśayaḥ tulyatarkaḥ padoccayo dṛṣṭāntamupadiṣṭaṃ vicāro viparyayo bhraṃśo 'nunayo mālā dākṣiṇyaṃ garhaṇamarthāpattiḥ prasiddhiḥ pṛcchā sārūpyaṃ manoratho leśaḥ saṃkṣobho guṇakīrtanamanuktasiddhiḥ priyavacanamiti ṣaṭtriṃśaduktānitatraiva 16.1-42 |﻿ |

eṣāṃ tu svarūpamiha vistarabhayādanadhikārācca na nirdiśyate | tadāgamāntarādevānugantavyam | tadetadādiryasyānyasyāpi tādṛśasya lāsyāṅgavīthyaṅgādestattathā [vyā]varṇitamadhikāre vistareṇa anekadhā carcitam | āgamāntare 'nyasmin śāstre bharatādau | idaṃ ca sarvaṃ na kevalaṃ pūrvoktam | kāvyaśobhākaratvena tallakṣaṇayogādalaṅkaraṇād vā alaṅkāra ityeva | na sandhyaṅgāditvena kāvyārthatvena vā pṛthagalaṅkārāt | kāvyaśobhākaraṃ hi tathā tādṛśaṃ kathamalaṅkāratāmatikrāmet ? iṣṭamanugatamasmākaṃ kriyākalpa [etaditi svī]kriyatām | atastādṛśaṃ sarvamalaṅkārasaṃgṛhītamiti | nāsasaṃgrahaḥ kaścidiheti bhāvaḥ | ata eva vakṣyati—
saṃkṣipya vistaramanantamalaṃkriyāṇām [2.365]
iti | na ca kāvyaśarīrālaṅkāravyatiriktaḥ kaścit kāvyadharmaḥ sambhavati yastābhyām asaṃgṛhītaḥ syāt | tadiha yathālakṣaṇamābhyāṃ saṃgṛhītamiti na kiñcit kṣīyate ||
evaṃ yathāpratijñātamalaṅkāra[bāhulya]varjaṃ pūrvācāryopadarśitaparimitālaṅkāravikalpabījapratisaṃskaraṇaṃ sampādya nigayamayannāha—

lg.l: panthāḥ sa eṣa vivṛtaḥ parimāṇavṛttyā saṃkṣipya vistaramanantamalaṃkriyāṇām |
vācāmatītya viṣayaṃ parivartamānānabhyāsa eva vivarītumalaṃ viśeṣān || 365 ||

div.p:
sa iti prakrāntaḥ eṣo 'yaṃ nigamyamānaḥ | sa iti vā pūrvaṃ pratijñātaḥ eṣa prasādhitaḥ | sa eṣa panthā lakṣyalakṣaṇavikalparūpo mārgaḥ | kasya ? alaṃkriyāṇām | alaṅkārāṇāṃ jātyādīnāṃ sambandhī vivṛtaḥ pratisaṃskṛtaḥ | asmābhiriti gamyate | gamyamānārthasya ca śabdasya prayogaṃ prati kāmacāra [91a] ityuktam | jātyādayo 'laṅkārāḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣyalakṣaṇaprabhedataḥ pratipāditā iti yāvat | kathaṃ punaranantā alaṅkārāḥ pratipādayituṃ śakyā ityāśaṅkā | yaduktam—
te cādyāpi vikalpyante kastān kārtsnyena vakṣyati |
kiṃ tu bījaṃ vikalpānāṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ pradarśitam |
tadeva pratisaṃskartumayamasmatpariśramaḥ || [2.1-2] tadevānusarannāha—parimāṇetyādi | alaṃkriyāṇāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ vistaraṃ prapañcaṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇavikalpātmakam, anantamaparimitaṃ saṃkṣipya saṃgṛhya
kāvyaśobhākarān dharmānalaṅkārān pracakṣate [2.1] iti sakalavikalpavyāpakena sāmānyalakṣaṇena sāsnādimattvenevānantaṃ goprabhedaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ saṃgṛhya | parimāṇasya parimitervṛttyā sadbhāvena pañcatriṃśadalaṅkārarūpeṇa parimāṇīkṛtya pari[māpya] iti yāvat | vivṛta iti prakṛtam | na caitad vyāhatamāśaṅkanīyam | yadyaparimito 'laṅkāravistaraḥ kathamiha parimita ukta iti ? yo 'sāvaparimito 'laṅkāra-
vistaro 'nukto vartate sa evālaṅkāravistaraḥ parimita uktastajjātīyatvādityavirodhaḥ | vastutastu yo 'nukto 'laṅkāravistaro 'parimitaḥ so 'nya eva | yastvayamuktaḥ parimito vistaraḥ so 'pyanya eva | yadi punaretāvānalaṅkāravistaraḥ, tadā anantā alaṅkārā iti viruddhyeta, parimitatvādasya vistarasya | [atro]ktālaṅkāravistarasyābhyāsānusāreṇa tasyāpya[nuktā]laṅkāravistarasyāvagamasambhavādananto 'laṅkāravistaro 'yaṃ parimāṇavṛttyā vivṛta ityuktam | yadāha—vācāmityādi | ye viśeṣālaṅkārā vācāṃ girāṃ viṣayaṃ gocaramatītyātikramya vartante, tān vācāṃ viṣayamatītya parivartamānān vastuto vidyamānān iha cānuktāniti yāvat | abhyāsaḥ yathoktālaṅkārānusārī svayaṃ kāvyaprayogaviṣayo 'bhiyoga eva yathāvat kavīnām, nānyat kiñcit vivarītuṃ prayogadvāreṇa prakāśayitumalaṃ samarthaḥ | etanmārgānusāreṇa hi prayogābhyāsavatāṃ kavīnāṃ svayamevoktiviśeṣalakṣaṇāste 'laṅkārāḥ prayogapathamupa[padya]nte | tataścāyameva mārgasteṣām apyavagamopāya ityanenaiva te saṃgṛhītāḥ | atra evoktam- saṃkṣipya vistaramanantamalaṃkriyāṇāṃ sa eṣa panthāḥ prakāśita iti | tasmādaśeṣālaṅkāraviṣayaṃ parijñānamiccha[dbhira]ya panthā yathāvadabhyasanīya iti ||
[92b] tadevamarthālaṅkāraṃ paricchidyānuprāsa[prasa]ṅgoktalakṣaṇānuvādena yamakaprapañcapuraḥsaraṃ duṣkaraparicchedamāripsurāha—

varṇānāṃ svaravyañjanānāṃ saṃhateḥ samudāyasya vyāvṛttirāvṛttiḥ punaruccāraṇam | naikasya varṇasya, tasyā anuprāsatvāt | yathoktam— varṇāvṛttiranuprāsaḥ [1. 55] iti | tatprasaṅgena āvṛttimeva saṅghātagocarāṃ yamakaṃ viduḥ [1. 61] iti kṛtalakṣaṇaṃ yamakam | tadevamanūdya yamakaṃ vidhīyate | sā ca vyāvṛttiḥ [kīdṛśī ?] varṇāntareṇāvyapeto 'vyavahitaḥ vyapeto vyavahitaścātmā svarūpaṃ yasyā ityavyapetavyapetātmā | tathā varṇāntarāvyavahitā varṇasaṃhaterāvṛttiravyapetayamakam | yā tu vyavahitā tad vyapetayamakamiti dvidhā yamakaṃ tāvad vikalpyate | taccaitad dvividhaṃ yamakaṃ viṣayanirūpaṇāyāmādiśca madhyaścāntaśca gocaro viṣayo 'syetyādimadhyāntagocaraṃ vijñeyam | kasya ? pādānāṃ pratyekaṃ caturṇāṃ ślokāvayavānām | sāpekṣārthe gamakatvāt samāsaḥ ||
pādacatuṣṭayasyādimadhyāntabhāvino yāvantaḥ prakārāḥ sambhavanti tān darśayati—

ekapādayamakasya dvipādayamakasya tripādayamakasya catuṣpādayamakasya [ca] vikalpanā vikalpāḥ prabhedāḥ kathyante bhavantīti vā śeṣaḥ | pādasyaikasya pādadvayasya pādatrayasya pādacatuṣṭayasya vā ādito vā madhyato vāntato vā | ādau madhye 'nte veti trayo vikalpāstāvat | madhyato 'ntataścādimaṃ varjayitveti caturtho vikalpaḥ | madhyata āditaścāntyaṃ vihāyeti pañcamaḥ | ādito 'ntataśca madhyaṃ tyaktveti ṣaṣṭhaḥ |
sarvata ādau madhye 'nte ceti saptamo vikalpaḥ | sarvata ityasyānte śrutasya tasaḥ pratyekaṃ sambandhāt | saptamyarthaścāyam | tathā ca prathamaṃ vivṛtamādau madhye 'nte veti | anyatrāpyevaṃ yojyam | yadā ca sarvato yamakaṃ tadā pādābhyāsādayo vikalpā jāyante ||
ete sapta vikalpā maulāḥ parasparasaṅkarabhājo 'nekadhā prasarantīti darśayannāha—

teṣāṃ saptānāṃ [93a] vikalpānāṃ sambhedaḥ saṅkaro miśratvamuccāvacaprakāraḥ yoniḥ prabhavo yeṣāṃ te sambhedayonayaḥ | bhedāḥ prakārāḥ atyantabahavo bhūyāṃso bhavanti | ekatra śloke kvacidādiyamakaṃ kvacinmadhyayamakaṃ kvacidantayamakaṃ kvacinmadhyāntayamakaṃ kvacinmadhyādiyamakaṃ kvacidādyantayamakaṃ kvacit sarvatra ityevamete 'nekadhā prasaranti | te caite sukhena kriyante prayujyanta iti sukarāḥ, tadviparītāśca duṣkarā iti dvidhā punaḥ saṃgṛhyante | tatra te sukareṣu duṣkareṣu ca kecana kecid bhedā na sarve 'tiprasaṅgād dṛśyante udāhriyante ||

lg.l: mānena mānena sakhi praṇayo 'bhūt priye jane |

div.p: sakhi ! priye jane viṣaye 'nena saṅgamasukhavirodhinā mānena prātikūlyena saha praṇayaparicayo mā bhūt | tava māno na kārya iti yāvat | yadi na mānaḥ kartavyaḥ kimidānīṃ kriyatām ? yena khaṇḍitā vañcitāsi tasya kaṇṭhamāśliṣya tameva priyaṃ kṛtavyalīkaṃ satrapaṃ salajjaṃ kuru vinayavartmanā tameva vilakṣaṃ vidhehi | kiṃ māneneti ? śabdārthapradhānametad yamakavyākhyānaṃ kriyate, bhāvārthacarcāyāmativistaraprasaṅgāt | idaṃ prathamapādādiyamakam ||

lg.l: nunnamānaṃ manaḥ strīṇāṃ saha ratyā vigāhate || 5 ||

div.p: madanaḥ kāmaḥ ratyā kalatreṇa saha strīṇāṃ mano vigāhate praviśati | kiviśiṣṭam ? haṃsānāṃ madaṃ nudatāṃ meghānāṃ nādena nunno nirasto māno 'syeti nunnamānaṃ mānasaṃ vā avehi | tasminnavakāśamasau labhate | idaṃ dvitīyapādādiyamakam ||

lg.l: rājanvatyaḥ prajā jātā bhavantaṃ prāpya sāmpratam |

div.p: catvāraḥ pūrvādayo 'mbhodhayaḥ parikhe[vopa]yogādisādharmyeṇa rasanā mekhalā yasyāḥ tasyā urvyā bhuvaḥ karo hasto baliśceti śliṣṭam | tasya grahe upādāne caturaṃ bha[vantaṃ] prāpya prajā janā rājanvatyaḥ saurājyayogāt jātā abhūvan sāmpratamadyeti tṛtīyapādādiyamakam ||

tavāhitaiḥ śatrabhiḥ kaiścitpalāyamānairaraṇyamākrāntam | utsṛṣṭagṛhai[rvanaṃ] praviṣṭa[mityarthaḥ] | [93b] anyaistvatkṛpāṇabhramojbhkataprāṇaidivaukasāṃ sadma svargamākrāntamārūḍham | kiṃbhūtaiḥ ? padātibhiḥ rathairnāgairaśvaiśca rahitaistyaktaiḥ | [atrāraṇyagamanaṃ svargagamanaṃ vā bhuvi niḥsa]hāyatvāt | tena vā [bhavatta]steṣāmācchādanāt | idaṃ caturthapādādiyamakam ||

ambhojamiva vadanamasyā ityambhojavadanā [tasyāḥ sambuddhiḥ] | tava netrayorvibhramaṃ cañcalatvaṃ madhuraṃ ramyaṃ bhramarā[ṇāṃ bhrāntyā cā]palena viḍambayati anukaroti madhurvasantaḥ kiṃ nvidaṃ vada brūhi iti kaściccāṭukāraḥ priyāmupalālayati | prathamadvitīyapādādiyamakam ||

lg.l: vāraṇo vā raṇoddāmo haso vā smara ! durdharaḥ |

div.p:
[he smara !] yato yasmā[t naḥ asmān] antaṃ nāśaṃ nayataḥ prāpayatastava raṇe uddāmaḥ kṣamo vāraṇo vā hastī vā, hayo 'śvo vā durdharaḥ sāṃgrāmiko nāsti |
tattasmādaho vicitrīyate vikramastava yad vinā raṇopakaraṇe[nāsmadvidhāḥ] āsāditāḥ tvayeti prathamatṛtīyapādādiyamakam ||

tvādṛśaiḥ śaktisampannairnṛpairājau raṇe taikṣṇyena śauryeṇa rājitairdīptairvasudhā pṛthivī jīyate | punastadanu vasuno dhanasya dhārayā santānena dīyamānayā karaṇena hetunā vā tṛptimabhilāṣaparyantaṃ nīyate ca | na kevalaṃ jīyata eva vasudhetyatrāpyuktam | prathamacaturthapādādiyamakamidam ||

sahakārasya kalikā mañjarī utkalikā utkaṇṭhā uttarā prabalā yasya [tathā utkali]kottaraṃ [tad]bahulaṃ mama mana karoti | paryutsukayatīti yāvat | mattasya kokilasya nisvanaḥ śabdo 'pyeṣo[ 'tyanta]madhuraḥ manmanaḥ utkalikottaraṃ karotīti prakṛtam | atra dvitīyatṛtīyapādādiyamakam ||

tavopalambhe samāgame āśā manorathaḥ tasya vihatau vighāte iha asyāṃ satyāṃ tādṛśī abhilāṣacintanānusmṛtiguṇakīrtanodvegavilāponmāda[mūrcchā]vyādhijaḍatākrameṇa pravṛddhāvasthā aṅgaṃ nāśayatītyaṅganāśinī daśamī | tādṛśīmityapi paṭhyate | tatrāṅganāṃ tādṛśīṃ tva[da]nurāgaparavaśāmiti vyākhyeyam | [aṅganām] ārọdhumāsādayituṃ kathaṃ nālaṃ na samarthā ? ārohatyeva | nātra sandehaḥ | tadanukampyatāmaṅga ! varākī | kiṃ strīvadhapātakadohadeneti [94a] dvatīyacaturthapādādiyamakam ||

taruṇā vṛkṣeṇa bālaiḥ pallavaiḥ śobhamānena netre nigṛhya kṛṣṭān vikṣiptamanasaḥ taruṇān yūnaḥ alino bhramarā nalineṣūnmukhāḥ pravṛttāḥ | netre cakṣuṣī nigṛhya darśanasubhagatayā gṛhītvā karṣayanti abhimukhīkurvanti | ubhayadarśanavaśavyākulāstaruṇā iti yāvat | atra tṛtīyacaturthapādādiyamakam ||

sarasa idaṃ [sārasaṃ tatra] sārase jale, kiṃbhūte ? viśato vigāhamānā āmattāḥ sārasāḥ pakṣiṇo yasmin [tatra] viśadāmattasārase vyavasthitā viśadā śuklā haṃsīyaṃ virahijanodvejanīyatvāt madhureṇāpi kutsitenāviṣahyena rutena śabdena hetunā karaṇena [vā] antakasya mṛtyorāmiṣaṃ grāsaṃ māṃ kurute, māṃ hantīti yāvat | prathamadvitīyatṛtīyapādādiyamakaṃ vikalpitamidam ||

malayānilo mamānandana pīḍāhetuḥ apoḍham apagataṃ malam ata iti apoḍhamalayā viśadayā indoḥ kalayā saha madanaṃ kāmaṃ nāma viṣamaṃ viṣam āśunāśakatvāt | anveti anusarati upanayatī[?]tyarthaḥ | anvetyanukarotīti vā vyākhyeyam, malayānilaścandrakalā ca tādṛgatyantatāpakaratvāt madanāyattau ityarthaḥ | prathamadvitīyacaturthapādādiyamakamidam ||

lg.l: hāriṇī hāriṇī śarma tanutāṃ tanutāṃ vataḥ || 16 ||

div.p: anaṅga ! tava niṣaṅgatvaṃ tūṇīratvaṃ śaranikarapūrayogena mā māṃ ninīṣurnetum icchantī māninī kācid vivakṣitāstrī hāriṇī muktālatālaṃkṛtā, anenā[hā]ryaṃ rūpamuktam | svabhāvarūpaguṇayogācca manoharā me mama tanutāṃ kṛśatvaṃ prāṇasandehaṃ yataḥ gacchataḥ śarma samāgamasukhaṃ jīvitaṃ tanutāṃ karotu | prasīda, ājñāpayainām | deva ! tvamevāsyāḥ prabhavasīti prathamatṛtīya vaturthapādādiyamakaṃ vikalpitam ||

mama priye matpriye ! tava mukhenāsmānevaṃ mukharān jayatā vaśīkurvatā akathaṃ na vidyate kathāsyetyavacanam, vikāsayogena dalāni praśastāni patrāṇyasmiṃn iti dali | prabuddhamiti yāvat, ataśca makarandalolupamadhupa[94b]yogāt, alayo 'smin vidyante iti alimat | evaṃ ca guṇayogāt kamudakamāśrayamalaṅkurvat bhūṣayat kamalaṃ padmaparyāyamapi kathamavacanaṃ [sat] na jitaṃ jitameveti kamalena mukhamupamitam | atra dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthapādādiyamakamāviṣkṛtam ||

ramaṇī strī kācit abhimatā ramaṇīyā manojñā me mama | kiṃbhūtā ? pāṭalapuṣpavadāpāṭalamaruṇamaṃśukaṃ yasyāḥ sā | tathā saurabhasya sugandhitāyāḥ kṛtrimasya sahajasya cāspadaṃ bhūmiḥ | kathamiva tādṛśī dṛśyate ? aruṇībhūtā saurī sūryasambandhinī bhā dīptiryasyāḥ sā tathābhūtā vāruṇī paścimā digiva ramaṇīyeti prakṛtam | pādacatuṣṭayādiyamakamuktam ||

ādiyamakamavyapetaṃ vikalpyopasaṃharati- ityuktena prakāreṇa pādānāmekaśaḥ dviśaḥ triśaḥ caturṇāṃ ca, ādau ādirvā yamakamavyapetamavyavahitaṃ vikalpitamanekadhā vibhaktam | tasya yamakasya vyapetasya vyavahitasyāpi, na kevalamavyapetasya vikalpāḥ prabhedāḥ kecit katipaye, na sarve, varṇyanta udāhriyanta iti ||

eṇadṛśāṃ strīṇāṃ nānāpriyajanavaimukhyaṃ śabda upamānetyādivācakaḥ śeṣo 'vaśiṣṭaḥ, arthasya vigamāt yasya taṃ śeṣamasantaṃ kariṣyati madhurvasantaḥ | kena ? madhureṇa
manojñena sugandhinā surabhiṇā sahakārasyodgamenāṅkureṇaiva | kuṃ bahunā ? sa hi tādṛśo mānaviruddharāgamupanayan mānasya śeṣīkaraṇe karaṇatvaṃ pratipadyate | prathamadvitīyapādādivartivyapetayamakam ||

rāmāṇāmatitāmraḥ karaḥ pāṇiḥ tantrīṇāṃ vīṇāguṇānāṃ tāḍanaṃ vādanameva vibhramaṃ līlāṃ karoti vidhatte, kānte patyau viṣaye śravaṇotpalenāvataṃsakuvalayena tāḍanaṃ prahāraṃ vā serṣyamīrṣyayā saha vartamānaṃ sāsūyaṃ karoti iti prakṛtam, tādṛśameva hi karma tasya yogyam | prathamatṛtīyapādādiviṣayaṃ yamakamidam ||

vātairnartitā mandamandamāndolitā [95a] meghānāmālī mālā sakalāḥ sarvāḥ na kāścideva | apo jalāni vimuñcati varṣati, kalāpasya barhabhārasyollasanaṃ vistāraḥ | tena saha vartate sakalāpollasanayā kalāpinyā mayūrāṅganayā pramuditayā anunṛtyate vṛṣṭyanantaraṃ naṭyate | prathamacaturthapādādigocaraṃ vyapetayamakametat ||

lg.l: kalikāmadya nīpasya dṛṣṭvā kāṃ nu spṛśed daśām || 23 ||

div.p: he kāmini ! te tava manaścittaṃ svayamātmanaiva tādṛśa[drāvaka]vastuno darśanam antareṇa galati vartamāno māna eva kalirvartate arthāntaram | adya prāvṛṣi nīpasya taroḥ kalikāṃ sākṣādivotkalikāṃ dṛṣṭvā kāṃ kīdṛśīṃ daśāmavasthāṃ spṛśed gacched iti na vidmaḥ | sutarāṃ rāgavaktavyatāṃ yāsyatīti bhāvaḥ | nu vitarke | dvitīyatṛtīyapādādivyapetayamakam ||

eṣa śikhāvalo mayūraḥ candrakasya barhasyānto 'grabhāgaḥ lasannākampamānaścāru śobhanaḥ candrakānto 'syeti lasaccārucandrakāntaḥ ākrīḍaśailasya krīḍāparvatasya sambandhinīmimāṃ sannihitacandrakāntasya maṇestadrūpāṃ vā sthalīṃ bhūmimāruhya nṛtyati | dvitīyacaturthapādādivyapetayamakam ||

varāheṇa kroḍavapuṣā viṣṇunā uddhṛtā jaladhervarasyottamasyāheḥ śeṣasyoparisthitā ca yā asau sarvā urvī pṛthivī rājakād rājasamūhād uddhṛtā vijitya gṛhītā, adya samprati te bhujena bāhunā sarvābhisāriṇā dhriyate yathānyāyaṃ paripālyate | tṛtīyacaturthapādādivyapetayamakam ||

te tava kareṇa bhujena [raṇeṣu] dviṣatāṃ śatrūṇāmantaṃ nāśaṃ karotyantakareṇa hatā [janita]kṣatāḥ kareṇavo dviṣatāṃ hastinaḥ kṣaradraktaṃ rudhirameṣāmiti kṣaradraktāḥ tathā santaḥ sandhyānuraktā ghanāḥ sāndhyaghanā iva sarāgadharāpayodharā iva bhānti | prathamadvitīyatṛtīyapādādivyapetayamakam ||

parā śatrubhūtā camūḥ senā bhaṭaiḥ śūrairdhvastā bhagnā | kathamiva ? age parvate [sthitānāṃ] tarūṇāṃ rājiḥ saṃghāto vātairiva | atra ca vya[ti]kare [kvāpi] kvacit sthāne 'nirdiṣṭe parāgaiḥ pāṃśubhiḥ samarasaṃkṣobhaprabhavaistataṃ vyāptamambaramākāśamidaṃ parāgataṃ vidrutaṃ līnamivābhūt | evamatitumulaṃ [95b] raṇamabhavat | prathamatṛtīyacaturthapādādivyapetayamakam ||

sa trailokyavikhyātaḥ viṣṇurbhagavāniti pūjāvacanam | vo yuṣmān pātu apāyād rakṣatu sadā nityam | navasya nūtanasya jalagarbhasya ghanasya meghasyeva dyutirdīptiḥ asyeti navaghanadyutiḥ | śyāma iti yāvat | dānavānāmasurāṇāṃ kulaṃ dhvaṃsayati iti dānavakuladhvaṃsī | saha dānena madena vartate sadāno mattaḥ | varaścāsau dantī ca sadānaścāsau varadantī ca kuvalayāpīḍādiḥ taṃ hatavān sadānavaradantihā | dvitīyatṛtīyacaturthapādādivyapetayamakam ||

te tava kaṃ śiraḥ | samāḥ keśā asyeti samakeśam | kasya ? alerbhramarasya alina ityarthaḥ | bhṛṅgasyeva śyāmaśiroruhaṃ tava śobhatetarām | mukhaṃ ca te kamalena padmena saherṣyākaram | tatsāmyāt kamalamiva mukhaṃ virājata ityarthaḥ | evaṃ varāṅgī tvaṃ kamalā lakṣmīrivonmadiṣṇuṣu ye kecit kāmonmādaśīlāsteṣu madhye kaṃ nāma puruṣam alekhyamagaṇanīyamunmadiṣṇutayā karoṣi ? yastajjāṃ śobhāmīdṛśīṃ paśyati taṃ sarvamevonmādayasi na kiñcinmuñcasītyarthaḥ | pādacatuṣṭyādivyapetayamakamekajātīyam ||

adabhrajaghanāḥ striyo madena yauvanamadhupānādisambhūtena | bhramantyo dṛśo netrāṇyāsāmiti madabhramadṛśaḥ | udārā mahārhā maṇayaḥ padmarāgendranīlādayaḥ ratnamekhalādisvabhāvā bhūṣaṇamalaṅkāro yāsāmiti udāramaṇibhūṣaṇāḥ satyaḥ | mudā prītyā anvitaṃ yuktaṃ ramaṇaṃ vallabhaṃ kartṛṃ kṣamāḥ śaknuvanti | ramaṇamatitarāṃ modayantīti yāvat | pādacatuṣṭaye pādādivyapetayamakamekajātīyam ||

he dūti ! anyapuṣṭānāṃ kokilānāṃ sambandhibhirārutaiḥ śabdairuditaiḥ sampannaiḥ me mama mano hṛtaṃ gṛhītam | na kevalamebhiḥ | te tavoditairālāpaiḥ peśalaidakṣiṇairmārutairapi
pavanaiśca hṛtamiti prakṛtam | prathamatṛtīyayordvitīyacaturthayośca pādayorādito vyapetayamakama ||

striyo yūnāṃ tanumaṅgamadhyāsate adhiśerate puruṣāyitayogena | kiṃbhūtāḥ ? surayā madirayā jitā utsā[96a]ritā hrīstraṣā asyāmiti surājitahriyo 'tyantamattāḥ | tanu kṣāmaṃ madhyamudaramāsāmiti tanumadhyāḥ, kṣaratā svedena śramajalena muktājālakenaiva suṣṭhu rājitamalaṃkṛtaṃ mukhamindukāntyādinā āsāmiti kṣaratsvedasurājitamukhendavaḥ | dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ prathamacaturthayośca pādayorādito vyatetayamakam ||

evaṃ vikalpya nigamayati—ityuktena vidhinā vyapetasya yamakasya prabhedo 'pi vikalpaścaiva prakṛto darśita udāhritaḥ | na kevalamavyapetamayamakavikalpa iti apiśabdenācaṣṭe | avyapetavyapetaścātmā svabhāvo vyāmiśro yasya vikalpasya, prakaraṇād yamakasambandhinaḥ, so 'pyasti, na kevalamuktaḥ śuddhaḥ | asyeti pāṭhe asya yamakasya sambandhī vidyata iti gamyate | kīdṛśo 'sau ? tadyathetyudāharati ||

sā ālī sakhī kācid vivakṣitā virahāturā vīkṣituṃ na alaṃ [na] śaknoti, kim ? ālambanamālambaḥ saha tena vartate sālambā ālambamānāḥ samantato 'varụ̄dhā ityarthaḥ | sālambāḥ kalikā yāsāṃ sālānāṃ śākhānāṃ tāḥ sālambakalikāsālā yasya sālasya taruviśeṣasya sarjasya tamīkṣituṃ virahajvarasambhūtāmanorocakatvā[nnā]lam | sālambāḥ kalikā eva parikṣepasādharmyeṇa sālaḥ prākāro yamyetyapi vyākhyāyate | na kevalamevam | ālīnāḥ śliṣṭā vakulāḥ kesarataravaḥ puṣpasamṛddhiyogād yairityālīnavakulān alīn bhramarānapi pūrvavadvīkṣituṃ nālamiti prakṛtam | nālamasyāstīti
nālīkaṃ padmam | anyeṣāṃ dṛśyata iti dīrghatvam | tadvidyate āsāmiti nālīkinīḥ padminīrapi vīkṣituṃ nālamiti prakṛtam | duṣkaraṃ varākī jīviṣyatīti kācid virahiṇīṃ sakhīmuddiśya kañcidevaṃ vaktīti prathamadvitīyayostṛtīyacaturthayośca pādayorādito 'vyapetavyapetaṃ yamakam ||

kālaṃ samayaṃ kālā mahānto ghanā asminniti kālamahāghanam | vipulanīlajaladam | tārasya bhāvastāratā uccaistaratvam | tayā gāmbhīryayogena ramyaṃ kāntaṃ rasitaṃ garhitaṃ meghasambandhi yasminniti [96b] tāratāramyarasitaṃ gambhīraghanagarjitagarbham | anālakṣyāstirohitāḥ, meghapihitatvāt | tārā ujjvalāstārakā nakṣatrāṇi asminniti anālakṣyatāratārakaṃ kālaṃ virahiṇi jane kṛtānta[sadṛśa]matiduḥsahatvād vīkṣituṃ kā nāma strī saṃyuktā 'pi prāgeva viyuktā | alaṃ śaknoti ? naiva kācit | iti prāvṛṣa utkaṇṭhākāritvamudbhāvitam | prathamacaturthayordvitīyatṛtīyayorādito 'vyapetavyapetayamakaṃ naikajātīyam ||

yāmānāṃ trayaṃ trayoḥ praharāḥ | tatrādhīna āyatta āyāmo dairghyaṃ yasyāstayā niśā rātryā varṣāyamāṇayā hetubhūtayā maraṇamanuyāmo gacchāmo vayaṃ bhavadarthe | tannedamasmān dunoti | kiṃ tvidamatikaṣṭam- yāmaṅganāmahaṃ gatavānasmi sedānīmasūnāmārtiṃ pīḍāmāyātītyasvārtyāyā prāṇārtiduḥkhanirveśānirveśastu pumān bhoge vetane mūrcchane 'pi ca iti medinī ||﻿ | mayā adhiyā tatparityāgāt durbuddhinedṛśena mayā sā mathitaiva hataiva | nātra sandehaḥ | na hi sā madvirahitā jīvati varākī | svavirahaduḥkhanimittatvāt tanmaraṇasya mayā mathitaivatyuktam | evaṃ vipadyamānena mayā saha sāpi varākī mathitā 'nayā niśeti vā yojyam | evaṃ viyuktaḥ kaścit kāmī priyāmanuśocati | pādacatuṣṭayādiyamakaṃ vyapetamavyapeta[meka]rūpam ||
pādādiyamakavikalpamupasaṃharati—

ityuktena prakāreṇa ādiścāsau pādaśca, avayave samudāyopacārāt | tatra yamakaṃ pādādiyamakamityarthaḥ | tasya vikalpaḥ prabhedaḥ | tasyāvyapetasya vyapetasya ca gatiḥ svarūpamīdṛśyevaṃvidhā darśiteti śeṣaḥ | ādipādayamakavat madhyāntapādayamakamanugantavyamityatidiśati- evamādipādayamakavikalpanyāyenaiva itarāṇi madhyāntavartīnyapi, na kevalaṃ pūrvāṇi | yamakāni sukarāṇi prabhedyāni, svayamanugantavyāni, diśastādṛśo darśitatvāt |
tāni caivaṃ vikalpanīyānīti—

lg.l: ānaya tvaritaṃ kurmaḥ karma bhūyo na tādṛśām ||
priye vinā vināśaṃ tvāmasavo yānti me dhruvam ||

div.p: evaṃ dvicatuppādamadhyāntayamakaṃ vikalpanīyam ||
tānyapi kiṃ na vikalpyante iti cedāha—

bhedā yamakavikalpāḥ sukarāḥ kārtsnena sākalyena [na] lakṣitāḥ [yataḥ] pādamadhyāntabhāvino 'pi ākhyātuṃ darśayituṃ [na] īpsitā neṣṭā asmābhiḥ | kutaḥ ? prapañceti granthavistarabhayād hetoḥ | mā bhūdativistara iti saṃkṣiptakāvyalakṣaṇapraṇayanapratijñānāt | tasmāt kecideva bhedāḥ prakārāḥ darśitāḥ | idānīṃ tu tatra yamakeṣu duṣkaratvena duṣkarā ityevābhimatā iṣṭā duṣkarā eva na sukarā api bhedā madhyayamakādivikalpāḥ kecana kiyanto, na sarve prapañcabhayāt nidarśyante ||

sthirā anapāyinyaḥ, tatkāraṇānuṣṭhānāvicchedāt | āyatirubhayalokābhyudayarūpā asyeti sthirāyate ityāmantraṇametat kasyacit | anyakāryānniruddhāni saṃvṛtāni idriyāṇi buddhīndriyāṇi cakṣurādīni karmendriyāṇi pādādīni vā yeneti yatendriyo bhavān yatermunerna hīyate nāvakṛṣyate yatendriyatvādeva | na kevalametat | na vidyate māyā paravañcanā yasya amāyastasya bhāvo 'māyatā [niḥśāṭhyaṃ] paropakāritā ca, tava iyate etāvate mahate kṣayaṃ nāśam ayate agacchate sthirāya sukhāya kāmāyeti cittānugrahāya nityasukhārthamabhūt | sarvatra sampanno bhavān | na kvacidapi vipanna ityarthaḥ | [97b] pādacatuṣṭayamadhyayamakamekarūpamavyapetātmakamata evedṛśaṃ duṣkaram |

l.seg: na bhāsurā yānti surānna te guṇāḥ

div.p: he rājan, sabhāsu pariṣatsu mahīsurāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ mukhaiḥ kibhūtaiḥ ? surayā hateti, na tathā asurāhatāsteramadyadūṣitaiḥ pavitraiḥ | vasunā dhanena yathākāmaṃ pratipāditena rājitaiḥ prītiyogāt vikasitaiḥ kartṛbhūtaiḥ stutā varṇitāste tava tyāgasattvaśauryādayo bhāsurāḥ, dopāsaṅkarādujjvalāḥ pariśuddhāḥ prajāsu iha lokeṣu rāgo 'nuraktirnṛpaviṣaya ātmā svabhāvastatpradhānatvād yāsāmiti rāgātmasu mantrānuraktāsu viṣaye rāśitāṃ pracayatāmabhivyāptiyogena gatā martyalokaṃ sakala vyāpya kīrtidvāreṇa surān devān na na yānti ki tu yānteva | svarge 'pi prasiddhāste ityarthaḥ | catuṣpādamadhyayamakamekarūpaṃ vyapetamiti ||

he saccaritāpramatta iti saroṣaṃ viruddhalakṣaṇamāmantraṇam | durvṛttapramatteti gamyate | sahasrākṣo 'ndha iti yathā | asaccarite vipriye vā apramattā avahitā asaccaritāpramatta vyalīkaśīla iti saṃbodhyate | yā tava priyā ballabhā tayā ratamevotsavastatra sa eva vā āmodaviśeṣaḥ prītyatiśayaḥ tena mattayā garvitayā | aṃśavo 'smin santītyaṃśumad bhāsuraṃ [vi]bhūṣaṇaṃ mekhalādikaṃ dhāryamaṅge niveśyam | tasyāḥ prasādhanaṃ saphalaṃ kimasmākaṃ tena viphalena bhāramātreṇa ! kāntimattayā vibhūṣa[ṇotthayā] me mama na kiñcit phalaṃ prayojanamasti | evamapyahaṃ tava dveṣyeva | tava paravaśasya | iheti vācoyuktau | iha vā prastāve, kācidaṅganā priyaṃ prastāve kvacit prasādhane niyuñjānaṃ evamīrṣyati | pādacatuṣṭayāntayamakamekarūpavyapetamiti ||

l.seg: ya eva dīnāḥ śirasā natena te

div.p: he nātha svāmin ! bhavādṛśāstvadvidhā mahātmānaḥ nateḥ parapraṇāmasya rasaṃ svādaṃ kīdṛśo 'sāviti na jānate na vidanti | na namantīti yāvat | kiṃ kāraṇam ? khalu yasmāt sanno 'vasanno durgatastasya bhāvaḥ sannatā | inasya bhāva inatā | santatenate daurgatyaiśvarye nāma viruddhe parasparavyāhate | [98a] yadi sannaḥ kathaminaḥ ? athenaḥ kathaṃ sannaḥ ? tādṛśaśce[no] nātirasajñaḥ [sannatāyāḥ] iti bhāvaḥ | tvaṃ cenaḥ tasmād bhavādṛśā nate rasaṃ na jānata iti nigamanīyam | ke tarhi natirasajñā ityāha—ya ityādi | ya eva kecid dīnā durgatāsta eva te tavenasya [savidha iti śeṣaḥ] natena sapraṇipātena śirasā pūrvoktena dainyena kārpaṇyena tadvidhāsvādyatvād rasena lakṣitāḥ santo 'la ma[tya]rthaṃ caranti pravartante | aiśvaryaṃ na kvacinnamati | dāridrayameva sarvatra praṇipatati iti piṇḍārthaḥ | catuṣpādāntayamakamekarūpamavyapetātmakamiti ||

l.seg: sā hanti tena galitaṃ mama jīvitena || 43 ||

div.p: līlāsmitena vilāsahasitena śucinā viśadena mṛdunā komalenoditenālāpena laghunā lolena ca vyalokitena vīkṣitena guruṇā manthareṇa gatena gamanena vyājṛmbhitena vistīrṇena jaghanena nitambena ca darśitena sarveṇaitena manmathaśastraprakarāyamāṇena sā kācidaṅganā hanti | pradattena ghātena marmāvedhahetunā galitaṃ vigataṃ mama jīvitena | nānyadiha kiñcit kāraṇamiti kaścit kāmāturo virauti | catuṣpādamadhyāntayamakamekarūpaṃ vyapetam ||

śrīmān nityaṃ lakṣmyā yuktaḥ | na kvacidekatra[sthaḥ] sarvamayatvādityamān vibhuriti yāvat | sthitimān sadā sthityanugataḥ nitya [ityarthaḥ] | evaṃbhūto ya ātmānaṃ
svabhāvaṃ bhūmānaṃ bahutāṃ viśvarūpatvāt | ānayati prāpayati | kiṃbhūtam ? amaravartmanā ākāśena samānaṃ tulyaṃ mānaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasyetyamaravartmasamānamānam ākāśavadapramāṇam | ānate bhaktimati jagati janeṣu pra[tha]māno vijṛmbhamāṇo mānaḥ pūjā yasyetyānatajagatprathamānamānaṃ jagatpūjyam | ānate jagati [prathamānaḥ] prādurbhavan māno 'nugraho ya[sya] iti [vā] yojyam | tamevaṃvidhaṃ viṣṇumānamata he janāḥviṣṇu mānamaṃ je janamityādarśe | [iti śeṣaḥ] | punaḥ kiṃviśiṣṭam ? amānānyaparimitāni nāmāni yasye[tya]mānanāmānaṃ sarvamayatvādanantābhidhānam | apratimāno 'nupamaḥ māno 'bhyunnatirasyetyapratimānamānam | [98b] kvacidānamateti pāṭhaḥ | tatra balibandhane bhuvaṃ mitavantaṃ bhūmānaṃm ānānāṃ prāṇināṃ [mataṃ] śaraṇatayā iṣṭamātmānaṃ parapuruṣaṃ viṣṇum | tamityarthād ya ityupāttatvāt | ānamat he janā iti vyākhyeyam | śeṣaṃ samānam | catuṣpādamadhyāntayamakamekarūpamavyapetavyapetātmakam ||

sā kācidabhimatā strī sārabhūtamutkṛṣṭamurusāraṃ suvarṇaṃ bhūṣaṇīkṛtaṃ dhārayatīti murusāradharā | urusāradhareti pāṭhe- urusāraṃ strījanocitaṃ guṇotkarṣaṃ dhārayatīti vyākhyeyam | sahārasena raṇitena vartanta iti sārasā pakṣiṇaḥsaṃñjinetyādarśe |﻿ | sārasai rasadbhiranukṛtā tulyā tatsamānaśabdatvāt sārasakāñcī mekhalā yasyā iti sārasānukṛtasārasakāñcī tamiṣṭaṃ kañcit | pāṭhāntare- sārabhūtaṃ nāgarakavṛttasampannam | sārayantaṃ rasāduparamayantam | urasā payodharabhāreṇa parirambheṇa ramayantī rantuṃ prayuñjānā ātmanā sukhayantī vā, rasāyanamajaratvādisukhayogamapi asāramalpameveti manyate | suratasukhameva bhṛśaṃ bahu manyate | tathāvidho hi tadābhimāno [jā]yate | catuṣpādādimadhyayamakamekarūpaṃ vyavahitam ||

anayā na vidyate 'yo vigamo yasyā iti | anayā 'nayā sthirā āyatirabhyudayo yasyetyanayāyate ! ānayane prāptauitaḥ paraṃ —kaścana vākyabhāgo bhraṣṭa ivābhāti |﻿ | andhāna[valokanā]śaktān | vinaya nayābhijñān nayānayasamarthān vidhehi | kathaṃ ? nayasya trivargopāyasyānayasya tadviparyayasya cālocana[ā/?/] vivecanā | tayā nayānayālocanayā | anayā aparokṣayā hetubhūtayā karaṇena vā | api ca yānayānahitopāyān na ayāsīḥ na prāptavānasi tānnayān | ānayanamānayaḥ prāptistamāśritān prāptiyuktān prāptān janaya kuru | ānayeti yāvat | katham ? jinasya tathāgatasya yānaṃ yānti prāpnuvanti smarantyanena hitamiti āgamaḥ | taṃ yāti yathāvad vettīti jinayānayāstvam | ataśca prajñābalādeva hitaprāpterna kvacid yānaṃ yātrāparikleśaṃ yāti gacchatyācaratīti ayānayāstvaṃ kvaci[99a]dagacchan vyavahita eva sarvanayanirantaraṃ tathāgatasamayama[bhya]san sarvānnayān prāpnuhītyarthaḥ | prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pādayorādyantayamakamekarūpamavyapetavyapetaṃ, dvitīyacaturthayorādimadhyayamakamekarūpamavyapetavyapetātmakamiti ||

bhūmerapatyaṃ bhaumo narakāsuraḥ aveji vidrutaḥ | kena ? raveṇa nādena | kasya ? dhvaje vartamānasya vīrasya vikrāntasya veḥ pakṣiṇaḥ | garutmata iti yāvat | kutra ? atulamasamam astrāṇāṃ gauravaṃ bhāro yatretyatulāstragaurave saṃyati yuddhe | ata eva bhairave bhīme yasya dhvajacihnasyedṛśo vikramastasyaitasya tu rociṣṇo raveḥ sūryasyevograsya
tejasvinaḥ puro 'grato ripuṃ bhaumamanyaṃ vā avermeṣasyatulyamaveta jānīteti catuṣpādādyantayorekarūpaṃ vyapetayamakamavyapetaṃ ca ||

amūṃ tāmiṣṭāṃ kāñcid rūpasampattyādiyogāt aya iṣṭaphalaṃ daivamasyāstīti ayām | arśa āditvādac | guṇavatīm, kiṃbhūtām ? mayāmayārtiṃ ḍumiñ prakṣepaṇe yena mayaḥ prakṣepaḥ parityāgo viraha iti yāvat | maya evāmayo vikārastasya sa eva vā ārtiḥ vyathā yasyā iti mayāmayārtiṃ virahavyādhipīḍitām | ataśca mayāmayālambyakalāmayāmayāḥ avikāro dakṣastasyāpakṛtastenālambyo gṛhīta iti vyathākaratvāt saroṣamadhikṣiptaḥ kalāmayaścandra eva pīḍākaratvādāmayo rogo yasya iti mayāmayā- lambyakalāmayāmayā | kena ? tena niśā rātryā hetunā ayātavyo virāmo 'nto yamityayātavyavirāmayā 'navasānayā virahavaśāt | ataśca[na]mānaṃ mā bhidādiṣitoṅiticāndravyākaraṇe 1. 3. 86 bhidādidarśanādaṅ [?] vidyate yeṣāmityamā aparimitā yāmāḥ praharā [a]syā ityamayāmayā | tataścātiduḥkhahetutvādadhikṣipyate amayeti, niśrīkayā mā śrīrna vidyate 'syā iti kṛtvā amayā [amaṃ] tadvirahavikāraṃ yātītyamayā virahaduḥkhapīḍitena saha amaya saṃgamayaāgamasaṃgaya ityādarśe﻿ [99b] he karuṇāmaya ! sānukrośamaye mitreti kaścit suhṛdāmantryate | catuṣpādādyantayamakamekarūpamavyapetavyapetamiti ||

te tava atāmyato duścaritābhāvāt prajñākauśalād vārthasiddhiṃ [āpnuvataḥ] sambandhinyāṃ matau buddhau viṣaye samatā rāgadveṣādivaiṣamyābhāvādekāntocitā
dakṣiṇataiva pravartate | yadāha- na vāmateti, na duṣṭatā kācit | kiṃviśiṣṭā ? uttamatāyā pradhāna[tva]sya vilomatāṃ prātikūlyamadhamatām ayatī agacchantī, kiṃtu atāpenākṛcchreṇa labdhā prāptā agrimatāyā anulomatā ānuguṇyaṃ yayetyatāpalabdhāgrimatānulomatā a[kleśena sarvarājapurovartitvaṃ ta]veti yāvat | āramatāṃ tapasvināmakāmatāmalubdhatāṃ matāṃ praśastāṃ dhunānā jayantī tadupamiteti yāvat | samatā pravartata iti nigamanīyam | catuṣpādādimadhyāntayamakaṃ vyapetamekarūpamiti ||

kālakālo mahākālaḥ śaṅkaraḥ tamya galaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ kalireva kālaḥ | kālamukho golāṅgalaḥ | kālakālagalaśca kālaśca kālamukhaśca teṣāṃ kālakaṃ kṛṣṇatvam | tadālāti gṛhṇātīti mūlavibhujādidarśanāt kaḥ | kālakālagalakālakālamukhakālakālaḥ | kālaṃ kāyanti śabdāyante iti kālakā mayūrāḥ teṣāmidaṃ kālakaṃ, kālakaṃ ca tadālapanaṃ kaṃ rutaṃ ceti kālakālapanakam | alīnāṃ samūha ālaḥ | ālavat kālāḥ kṛṣṇā ghanā meghā yasmin kāle sa ālakālaghanakālaḥ | sa cāsau kālakālapanakālakālaghanakālakālaśceti viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ | tadvat kālaḥ kṛṣṇa iti viṣṇorāmantraṇamidam | kamudakamālavantīti [? ālāntīti] kālāḥ | pūrvavat kaḥ | kāla eva kālakāḥ svārthe kaḥ | kālakairmeghaiḥ | tadupajīvibhiḥ parivārabhūtairālasati bhātīti kālakālasi samudre, kvivantasya saptamyantasya rūpam | tatra takā[? utkā] viṣṇuvirahāt kṛcchrajīvitāt lakālokā[?] lalanikā strīḥ lakṣmīriti yāvat | kiṃviśiṣṭā ? alakānāmāliḥitaḥ paraṃ ṣaṭpañcāśattamaślokasyāntimabhāgaparyantaṃ ṭīkā lipikarapramādād bhraṣṭā |﻿
[sandaṣṭayamakalakṣaṇaṃ uktārgatamapi viśiṣyocyate—]
[tadudāharati—]
[samudgayamakalakṣaṇamāha—]
[vyavahitaṃ samudgamudāharati—]
[avyavahitaṃ samudgamudāharati—]
[vyavahitāvyavahitaṃ samudgamudāharati—]
[99b 10] yamiti | vṛndānilāpoḍhaghanāgamānāṃ haṃsānāmiti yāvat | ārutayo ninadā apayanti viramanti ceti samudgasya trayo bhedā nidarśitāḥ ||
pādābhyāsa[100a]madhikṛtyāha—

dayayā anugraheṇa varjitaṃ virahitaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yasya tādṛśa ātmā āvarjitaḥ svīkṛtaśca māno garvaḥ tena sātmā svabhāvībhūto 'bhyāsād yasyāḥ tayaivaṃbhūtayā mayā mandayā jaḍayā[naman] praṇipatan jīviteśvaraḥ priyaḥ na samāliṅgyata na pariṣvakta ityanuśocati kācit | katham ? upāstīrṇaṃ niveśitaṃ bharanyastapayodharadvayaṃ yasmin samāliṅgana iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | kutretyapekṣāyāmurasīti yojyam, asamastatvāditi ||

tava guṇairmṛṇālavannirmalaiḥ pariśuddhaiḥ surāṇāṃ sabhā devaparṣadārohi kīrtidvāreṇa prāptā | kiṃbhūtā ? [abalā] balanāmno 'surasya śakranirastasya tatrāsambhavāt, na vidyate balo 'syāmiti kṛtvā | vasatyasyāmityuṣitā gatyarthānāpyādādhāre(?) ca ityādhāre ktaḥ | vibhoḥ śakrasya uṣitā vāsādhāraḥ vibhūṣitā śakrādhyāsitā | dharmārthakāmamayairguṇairvyāptabhuvanaḥ sa tvamidānīṃ purāṃ varabhavanayujāṃ nagarāṇāṃ bhāsurāṇāṃ vibhūtibhirbhrājiṣṇūnāṃ sampado 'bhyudayān sukhāni nirviśa anubhava | abalāḥ striyaḥ vibhūṣitāḥ vihārayan bhramayan [ramaya]nniti | kṛtakṛtyasya kāmopabhogo darśita iti ||

kalaṃ madhuram | uktaṃ vacanam | stanadvayī payodharayugalaṃ ca tanoḥ śarīrasya sambandhino madhyasya nāmikā āvartikā strīṇāmityarthāt | kaṃ nāma naraṃ na hanti ? kiṃ tu sarvameva hanti | abhilāṣādikāmāvasthāḥ krameṇa daśamīṃ nayantīti kṛtvā hantītyucyate | tvadṛte tvāmantareṇa | tvameva kevalamanena [na] hanyase jitendriyatvāt | tanumaddhyanāmiketyatra tanutvamāne hiśabdo yasmādarthe | yata evam, ataḥ kāraṇāt bhavān mukhamādiḥ guṇairagranītatvātetān sukhādiguṇān praṇītvāt ityādarśe |, yasmin gaṇane satpurūṣasaṃkhyāyāṃ tasmin bhavanmukhe gaṇane kriyamāṇe kalaṅkamuktaṃ nirdoṣaṃ tanumat, bhūtaṃnṛtyāmityādarśe |﻿ sakalaniṣkalaparimāṇavyatiriktaṃ bhūtaṃ puruṣaṃ vyāpyabhūtam | anāmikā kaniṣṭhānantarāṅgulirna yāti na gacchati | [tvāṃ prathamaṃ kaniṣṭhikāyāṃ guṇavattvayā gaṇayitvā [sthitasya] tvamiva niṣkalaṅko dvitīyāyāmanāṃmikāyāṃ gaṇayitavyo [100b] nāstītyarthaḥ ||

ajopama viṣṇutulya ! te tava sainikāḥ senācarā narāḥ śitamāyudhameṣāmiti śitāyudhāḥ tīkṣṇahetayaḥ | daṃśitā varmitāḥ | tarasvinaḥ śūrāḥ santaḥ yaśaśca kīrti ca te rajaśca pārthivaṃ dikṣu vitanvate vistārayanti | yudhā raṇena tumulena | dviṣāṃ ca kulaṃ [vi]tanu prahāraśatajarjaratvād vigataśarīram | na vidyate tejo 'syetyatejaḥ niṣprabhāvam | vigato mado 'smādityapamadaṃ vītagarvaṃ kurvantīti ||

l.seg: bhujaṅgamo mā sma rato madaṃ citam || 61 ||

div.p: te tava bhujena amā saha bhūmervalayaṃ mahīmaṇḍalaṃ bibharti dhārayati bhujaṅgamaḥ śeṣo nāgarājaḥ | naka eva te bhujaḥ | [ataḥ] svamātmīyaṃ bhujaṃ bāhuṃ bhuvaṃ pṛthivīṃ dhārayati vahatīti bhūdharamavetya jñātvā mama bhujo svayaṃ dhārayatīti madamahaṅkāraṃ citamupacitamudīrṇaṃ [rataḥ] abhiniviṣṭaḥ san mā sma gamastvaṃ mā gacchatu bhavān | itīdamekaṃ pradhānamuktaṃ vacanam | añcitaṃ hitaṃ śṛṇu gṛhāṇa | mat mattaḥ sakāśāt smarataḥ jānataḥ | prāptajñānaḥ evamudāste bhavān yadi na viruddhaṃ [vyavaharati], tadā sutarāṃ śobhate vinayālaṅkataguṇatvāditīdamekaṃ madvacanaṃ sarvaguṇabhūṣaṇaṃ grāhyamiti ||

he tāmarasekṣaṇe padmākṣi ! na vidyate rasaḥ kāmādaro yasyā ityarase 'rasike ! priyasaṅgamasukhavaimukhyādevamāmantritā saroṣam | smaraḥ kāma eva analaḥ tāpakāritvāt | smarānalo yo mānena priyasaṅgamavirodhena garveṇa vardhito dīpitaḥ, so 'yaṃ kṣaṇenaikena samaṃ saha nādhikena kālena tato vistṛtaḥ kṣaṇamātreṇa vijṛmbhitaḥ te tava nirvṛtiṃ sukhatāṃ prati viśiṣṭāyāsaṃ prayogasambhavaṃ samantataḥ sarvathā kiṃ nāpākaroti na hanti ? apākarotyeva | tasmāt saṃgamyatāṃ priyam | kimanena dagdhamāneneti ||

prabhā asyāstīti prabhāvato dīptimataḥ guṇotkarṣāt | vāsavasya śakrasya | nāmayatīti he nāmana jetaḥ ! prabhāvataḥ prabhāvāt śaktiviśeṣaprabhāveṇa śakratulyeti yāvat | namanaṃ nāmaḥ sa na vidyate 'syeti he anāma ! parapraṇipātānabhijña ! sarvātirekāt | yata evaṃ [101a] guṇayukto bhavān, ataḥ kāraṇāt tvayi piṣṭapasya jagataḥ prabhau svāmini sati savasya yāgasya navaḥ pratyagra āsavaḥ somo vilakṣaṇaḥ pānaviśeṣaḥ asminniti navāsavasya somayāgasyeti yāvat | vicchittirvighātaḥ | nāma sarvathā vācoyuktau vā | na vā naivāsīdabhūt | sarvadā dharmakriyā pravartata iti kaścinnarapatiḥ stūyate ||

paramutkṛṣṭam | guṇayogāt paraṃ śakra parāyāḥ tvaṃ yuddharasenātigatavānasi | kiṃbhūtam ? balaṃ sāmarthyaṃ vārayatīti balavāḥ | vārayateḥ kvibantasya rūpam | kasya ? raṇānāṃ parasamarāṇāṃ parayuddhābhibhāvīti (?) kurvan | balavāraṇānāṃ senāgajānāṃ balaṃ prāṇaṃ vāti gacchatīti balavaḥ | āto 'prādeḥ kaḥ | saprāṇaḥ āraṇaḥ śabdo yeṣāmiti balavāraṇānāṃ gambhīrodīrṇagarjitānāṃ sambandhinyāḥ paramparāyāḥ paripāṭyā ghaṭāyāḥ sattvādiyogāt prakṛṣṭāyāḥ sakāśāt dhūlīḥ sthalīḥ pāṃśuprakarān tatpreraṇāya vidhāya kṛtvā parāyā iti paramparāyā iti bāhyadhūlī sthalīvikāreti | luglopalakṣaṇā pañcamī | vyomākāśaṃ rundhannāvṛṇvan parāyā iti prakṛtam ||atra śloke bhoṭapāṭhakramo vādijaṅghālasamarthitaḥ svīkṛtaḥ |﻿

he alajja ! bhavadvidhānāṃ yuṣmādṛśānām | asamāhitānāṃ vikṣiptacetasāṃ bhave saṃsāre dvau prakārau ahaṅkāramamakārau rāgadveṣau vā yeṣāmiti bhavadvidhānām | ata eva yathā ātmā na vañcanīya[ḥ/?/] tathā paro 'pīti samapravṛttyabhāvādasamāhitānām | asamāśca te 'hitāśceti vigrahaḥ | ata eva na vidyate hitaṃ śreyo dharmo yeṣāmiti ahitānāṃ vācaṃ mithyā bhavat vitathaṃ jāyamānaṃ vidhānamanuṣṭhānamanyathā vidhāyānyathākaraṇād yasyāmiti mithyābhavadvidhānām | ata evāsamasyātulasya mahataḥ aheḥ sarpasyeva tāno gatiḥ kauṭilyādiyogāt yamyāmityasamāhitānāṃ giro na śraddadhe na [101b] pratyemīti kenacit kaścit saroṣamadhikṣipyata iti ||

ahitānāmumābhikhyā ahitomā | sannā ni[ra]stā ahitomā yata iti he sannāhitoma nirastaśatruśobha ! ānamatītyānamaḥ kartaryaca | rājñaḥ senā rājasenā | ānamā ānatā rājasenā yasminniti he ānamarājasena ! na namatītyanamaḥ he anama ! rajaso vikāro rājaso duṣṭaḥ | na rājaso 'rājasaḥ sāttvikaḥ | he arājasa ! ina svāmin ! hitā umā gaurī yasya sa hitomaḥ | na vidyate mā śrīrasyetyamaḥ | na amo 'namaḥ saśrīkaḥ | rājā candraḥ | sa [lalāṭabhūṣā] yasyeti anamarājā, hitomaścāsau anamarājā ca hitomānamarājā śaṅkaraḥ | tena senaḥ sanāthaḥ tadyukto 'hitamānamarājasenaḥ | [tasya sambuddhiḥ] | sannāhito daṃśitaḥ mānamāhitaḥ āgataḥ prāptaḥ sannā satpuruṣaḥ sa na bhavan tvaṃ mā na rājase, evaṃ cānekaguṇayuktastvamatitarāṃ rājasa ityarthaḥ | atra hetuphalabhāvo yathāyathaṃ yojanīyaḥ | yataḥ sannāhitaḥ, tasmādānamarāja
senaḥ sannāhitomaśca, yataśca mānamāhitaḥ, tasmādanamaḥ | yataśca hitomānamarājasenaḥ, tasmādasannā arājasaśca | yataścaitadevaṃ ato rājase vā neti ||

lg.l: ślokadvayaṃ tu yuktārthaṃ ślokābhyāsaḥ smṛto yathā || 67 ||

div.p: sakṛdekavāraṃ dviḥ vāradvayaṃ triḥ vāratrayaṃ ca pādasya sambandhī yo 'myāsaḥ sa evam uktena prakāreṇa darśitaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ | ślokayordvayaṃ dvau ślokau yukto 'rtho 'bhidheyaṃ yeneti yuktārthamapṛthagarthayuktam, ityanūdya ślokābhyāsaḥ smṛto vijñāyate iti vidhīyate yathetyudāharati ||

bhavatā tvayā, vinayati jagat sanātane mārge niveśayatīti [tena] vināyakena vinetrā | vṛtto vartula upacitaḥ pīno bāhu[102a]rasyeti vṛttopacitabāhunā | suṣṭhu amitrāṇyuddharatīti svamitroddhāriṇā iyaṃ pṛthvī bhūmirabhītā svaparacakropadravābhāvāt nirbhayā, atulā vipakṣaistulayitumaśakyatvād aparopamā, āśritā adhiṣṭhitā vartata iti kaścid rājā stūyata ityanenārthena tāvadekaḥ ślokaḥ ||
tava tāvadīdṛśo 'bhyudayaḥ, tvadvipakṣasya kā gatirityayameva śloko 'rthāntareṇābhyasyate—

vigato nāyako 'smāditi vināyakena netṛśūnyena tvayi ruṣṭe paritrāyakasyābhāvāt | bhavatā satā | citāyāḥ samīpa upacitam | vṛtta uparato nirjīvaḥ [svapakṣa]samudāyoparamāt upacito bāhurasyeti vṛttopacitabāhunā | ata eva suhṛtparityāgāt svāni mitrāṇi ujjahātīti svamitroddhā, [utpūrvakasya ohāk tyāge ityasya] kvibantasya tṛtīyaikavacanāntasya rūpam | ariṇā tvayā vipakṣeṇa | abhītā abhimukhamāgatā | pṛthvī mahatī yamasya tulāṃ upamālakṣaṇām | āśritā prāptā |
tvadarāteḥ punarīdṛśī gatiḥ | anenārthāntareṇa sa eva śloka abhyasta iti ślokābhyāso 'yamīdṛśaḥ ||

ekaḥ samāna ākāraḥ svarūpaṃ yeṣāmityekākāraḥ, sarvato yamakayogāt catvāraḥ pādā yasya yatreti vā | ekākāracatuṣpādaṃ yat, tadīdṛśaṃ mahacca yat tad yamakaṃ ca, sarvayamakapradhānatvāt, mahāyamakamityāhvayaḥ saṃjñā asyeti mahāyamakāhvayaṃ veditavyam | ekākāracatuṣpādatvaṃ pratyekaṃ sarvato yamakayogād vinābhyāsādapi sambhavatītyāha—tasyāpītyādi | tasyāpi mahāyamakasyāpi na kevalaṃ samūhāderabhyāsaḥ tripādāvṛttirdṛśyate | ata eveyamīdṛśī parā sarvayamakakriyāpradhānatvāt | yamakasya kriyā prayogaḥ | ata evedaṃ [102b] tripādābhyāsād bhidyate | tatra pratyekaṃ pādeṣu sarvato yamakābhāvāt kevalaṃ pādayamakamātraṃ trirabhyasyate ||
tadudāharannāha—

yāsaḥ prayāsaḥ khedaḥ | mānaśca priyaviṣayaṃ prātikūlyam | yāsamānau tulyau, yadā samānā, tadāyāso 'pīti samakālatvāt | yathā cāyāsastāpayati tathā māno 'pi priyasaṅgamasukhavirahāditi | yasyāḥ tayā samānayāsamānayā | saha mānenārhaṇena guṇayogād vartata iti samānayā mānyayā anayā kayācidiṣṭayā | sa tvam | asama guṇotkarṣādanupama ! [mā] māṃ samānaya saṃgamayeti kañcit suhṛdamabhyarthayati kaścit kāmī | punaḥ sā viśiṣyate—yā praṇayinī saha mayā śriyā vartata iti samā kāntimatī | anayasyākāryasyāsau niṣedhaḥ tasya mānaṃ pramāṇamanubhavaṃ yātīti anayāsamānayā | akāryaparihārajñatayā anayāsamānayeti nigamanīyam ||

yaduktam—
atyantabahavasteṣāṃ bhedāḥ saṃbhedayonayaḥ [3.3]
tatra diṅmātraṃ sukararūpaṃ darśayannāha—

dharāṃ dhārayatīti dharādharaḥ śeṣo bhujagarājaḥ, tasyākāraṃ sādṛśyaṃ dhārayantīti dharādharākāradharāḥ | dharābhujāṃ rājñāṃ bhujā bāhavaḥ | ahīnaḥ paryāpto vikramaḥ śauryam eṣāmityahīnavikramāḥ | sahasā tvaritamakālakṣepeṇa hatā arayo 'mībhiriti hatārayaḥ | rayeṇa vegena raṃhasā uddhurā durdharāḥ | māna eva dhūḥ kṛtyam | mānadhurāmavalambata iti mānadhurāvalambinaḥ | mahīṃ pṛthivīṃ pātuṃ rakṣituṃ sahante kalpante tādṛśaguṇayogāt | kramāta śāstravihitena krameṇa nyāyeneti yāvat | iha saṃdaṣṭayamakamādimadhyayamakavyapetaṃ madhyayamakaṃ vyapetamiti saṃbhinnamudāhṛtama ||
