[103a] āvṛttirabhyāsaḥ | kathaṃ ? prātilomyena pratīpatayā lakṣitā, nānulomyena, kiṃviṣayā ? pādaścārdhaśca prakaraṇāt ślokasya, ślokaśca [teṣāṃ] samudāyaḥ gocaro viṣayo yasyā iti pādārdhaślokagocarā | pādagocarā, ardhaviṣayā, ślokāśrayā ceti trividhamanūdya pratilomaṃ nāma yamakaṃ smṛtamiti vidhīyate | kutaḥ ? pratilomatvāt tasyā iti gamyate | pratilometi kṛtvā | yat tvanulomnā sa pādābhyāsādiriti bhāvaḥ ||
tadudāharannāha—

lg.l: yāmatāśa kṛtāyāsā sā yātā kṛśatā mayā |

div.p:
kṛśasya bhāvaḥ kṛśatā | kṛto janita āyāsaḥ śramo yayeti kṛtāyāsā | yā kṛśatā daurbalyam | sā yātā prāptā mayā amatā pratikūlatāṃ [gatā] āśā, arthāt
suratamanoratho yasyeti he amatāśa matsaṅgamāsahiṣṇo ! he ramaṇa ! akaraṇenākṛtimattvena amara ! akaraṇāmara satyadeva ! yadvā akaraṇe avihite pramatta ! amara deva ! tava stutam | taditaḥ prāptaḥ he stuteta varṇanena prāpta ! te tava arakatā gamanamevāstu | kimāgamanena, iyarti gacchatītyarako [gantā] tato bhāvapratyayastal vidhīyate | samayamatikramyāgataḥ kaścit priyaḥ kayācittu saroṣamitthamadhikṣipyate | idaṃ pādapratilomayamakam | prathamasya tṛtīyasya ca pādasya [kramaśaḥ] prātilomyena pāṭhe ślokaniṣpattiḥ ||

lg.l: nādino 'madanādhīḥ svā na me kācana kāmitā |
tāmikā na ca kāmena svādhīnā damanodinā || 75 ||

div.p: nādo nāma tattvaviśeṣaḥ śaivasamayaprasiddhaḥ sa vidyate 'syeti nādino me mama svā svakīyā dhīḥ | na vidyate madanaḥ kāmo 'syāmiti amadanā tataśca svādhīnā sadṛśavartinī bhavatu | evaṃ kimataḥ ? tataśca me mama na kācana na kācit kāmitā viṣayābhilāṣaḥ | kāmena damaṃ nudatīti tena damanodinā praśamapratyanīkena hetunā te tadabhāvādeva tāmikā na bhavitumarhati | kāmanimittaḥ santāpo nāstītyarthaḥ | idamardhapratilomayamakam | atrārdhāntaramārabhya prātilomyena pāṭhe ślokaniṣpattiriti ||

mānamavalepaṃ yātīti mānayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ trailokyaṃ vijagrāha | mānayaścāsau māraśceti mānayamāraḥ | tamavituṃ rakṣituṃ sādhanabhāvena tatsāmarthyānugrahāt, śīlaṃ yasyā iti mānayamārāvī | sa cāsau kaśā pratodaśceti mānayamārāvikaśā yā kācid bhavet tasyā ūnā hīnā asamānā yā na bhavati kiṃ tu samānaiva tadvat kāmasādhanatvāt | yadāha— ānetyādi | ana.........satyānāḥ kartaryat samarthā indriyajayādiyogāt | janāḥ, teṣāmasanaṃ kṣepo 'titarāṃ yatreti anājanāsanā | munīnāmapi rāgajananī ata evodārāṇāṃ mahatāṃ śate bahutvopalakṣaṇam | adhīnā yasmāt sevanāt yāmāyāma jitavānasmi | sā anādi naditā bhaṇitā | nānyā | kim ? āyam āgamanam | āgacchati, āhuteti yāvat | kaściditivṛttamātmanaḥ kañcit kathayati | ānulomyena tāvadayaṃ ślokaḥ ||
prātilomyenāyamevāvartate—

sā kācidabhimatā strī dinamevāmayo vikāro 'tyantarukṣatvāt dināmayam adhītā adhīgatā prāptā na na bhavati kiṃ tu adhītaivātyantasaukumāryāt | ata evāyaḥ āgataḥ anubhāvyaḥ āmaḥ pīḍā yayeti āyāmā | kena ? amuyā pratyakṣavartinyā śaradā atidīpradivākarayā hetunā, ata eva ca na jananamajananam | āsanasyāvasthānasyājananamakaraṇaṃ yayā iti āsanājananā sukhāsikāmalabhamānā śokasya tvadvirahasambhavasya virāmāya vinodāya śokābhibhavārthaṃ mānamahaṅkāraṃ śokamabhibhavāmi ityevaṃ rūpaṃ yātīti mānayā bhavati | tvadviyogasambhavaṃ śokamabhibhavituṃ na śaknoti ityarthaḥ | ślokapratilomayamakam ||

ardhayoḥ ślokasambandhinorabhivyaktyarthaḥ uparyadhobhāvena likhitayoḥ sambandhināṃ varṇānāṃ nirantarāṇāmekarūpatvaṃ sārūpyaṃ teṣāmeva varṇānāṃ samutthānāt | ekaikamakṣaramantaraṃ vyavadhānamasminnityekāntaram ekaikavarṇavyavadhānaṃ yadi bhavati nirantarapāṭhavadardhayorauttarādharyeṇa ekaikavarṇāntarapāṭhe sa eva śloko yadi [104a] niṣpadyata ityarthaḥ | tadīdṛśaṃ duṣkaraṃ gomūtriketi abhidhānena prāhuḥ vyavaharanti tadvido gomūtrikābandhavādinaḥ | yathetyudāharati ||

madirākṣīṇāṃ strīṇām | apāṅgaṃ kaṭākṣa evāstramāyudhaṃ rāgasādhanatvād yasyeti apāṅgāstraḥ devadattasya gurukulamiti yathā | madanaḥ kāmaḥ | ayaṃ lokavikhyātaḥ |
jayed jagadvaśīkuryāt | na kvacitpratihataśaktirya[di] yasmāt iṣṭaviṣayaprāpaṇāt | mama enaḥ pāpam arthāt tatprāptivighnabhūtam | kṣīṇam astaṃgatam tataḥ pūrṇamanorathatvāt ahamanaṅgāya tasmai kṛpādyapapattaye | tādarthye kriyāsambandhe vā caturthī | añjaliṃ praṇāmakarasampuṭaṃ dadheḥ racayāmi tamārādhayāmīti kaścit kāmī [kācit] kāminī vā bravīti ||

auttarādharyeṇa caturṣu pādeṣvabhivyaktyarthaṃ likhiteṣu prathamamakṣaramārabhya auttarādharyeṇa dvirādyantataḥ krameṇa pāṭhe ardha niṣpadyate, punastathaiva pariśiṣṭasya pāṭhe aparārdhaniṣpattiriti ślokasya dvābhyāṃ bhramaṇaṃ ślokārdhabhramaṇaṃ yadi bhavet tādṛśamardhabhramaṃ nāma duṣkaramāhurāmananti tadvidaḥ |
sarvato 'nulomapratilomataḥ pūrvavadauttarādharyeṇa ca yadi bhramaṇaṃ ślokasya bhavet tādṛśaṃ sarvatobhadraṃ nāma duṣkaramiṣṭaṃ tajjñairiti ||
tadubhayamudāharati—

he manobhava ! ata eva sarveṣāṃ cittādhiṣṭhānatayā he nata ! pratyāsanna ! devāntaravad yo [na] parokṣaḥ, māninī kācidiṣṭā tava anīkaṃ senā jagadvijayaprayuktatvāt | [anyā] senā kutaścit sabhayāpi | iyaṃ tvakutobhayā kācit senā ityāha—bhayādityādi | [sā] amaḥ pīḍā | ameyo 'pramāṇo 'mo yasyā iti ameyāmā [bhavatu] mā vā [bhūt | kutaḥ ?] bhayāt [tvadutthāt] kāraṇāntarāt mā vā na bhavati | seyamīdṛśī tavodayāya jagadvi[jaya]lakṣaṇāya na na bhavati, kiṃ tu bhavatyeva | kecana vayamatra enomayāḥ pāpasvabhāvāḥ | anudayabhājastiṣṭhāmaḥ, tatprasādāpratilambhāt, pratyuta nirdayabhāvanāt | tadiyaṃ prasīdatu tava seneti ardhabhramam ||

[104b] sā kācidiṣṭā rāmā strī māsā candreṇa amā saha mārāya nāśārtham asmākamupasthiteti śeṣaḥ | kīdṛśīti sā viśeṣyate | yā rāmā amasya pīḍāyā āyāmo dīrghatā yasya ityamāyāmā pīḍāvatī mā na bhavati | aduḥkhanimittaṃ tapyata ityarthaḥ | tadeva kutaḥ ? mārasyā kāmasya ānāyo jālaṃ jagadbandhanaṃ kimapi tat | ayānamagamanamapatanaṃ yasyā iti mārānāyāyānā | yato 'syāḥ sumando rāgaḥ, tasmād asmad duḥkhena [na] tapyata ityarthaḥ | sā kīdṛśīti punarviśiṣyate [yānaṃ pādayugam āvṛṇotīti yānāvāraḥ, tasya ārāvaḥ śabdo vartate yatra sā] yānāvārārāvā, ata eva ānaṃ prāṇamāyātīti ānāyā balīyasī māyā paravyāmoho phalopāyaśca ārāmaḥ krīḍābhūmirasyā iti māyārāmā yā īdṛśī sā mārāya asmākamiti [yoja]nīyam | idaṃ sarvatobhadram ||
svarasthānavarṇapratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ duṣkaraṃ darśayannāha—

svaraḥ akārādiḥ | sthānaṃ ca yadbhavo varṇaḥ kaṇṭhādiḥ | varṇaśca vyañjanaṃ kakārādiḥ [teṣāṃ] svarasthānavarṇānāṃ niyamaḥ vyavasthā iyattā, yo 'sau niyamo duṣkareṣu varṇeṣu madhye iṣṭastajjñaiḥ so 'pi duṣkara ityarthaḥ | eṣa ca niyamaḥ caturbhyaḥ pratyekasvarasthānavarṇebhyaḥ prabhṛti ārabhya caturṣūpādāya [kramaśo nyūnatayā] ekaṃ svaraṃ sthānaṃ varṇaṃ vā yāvad darśyate udāhriyate | tādṛśasya duṣkaratvāt | na pañcaprabhṛti, tasya sukaratvāt | yadāha paraḥ,—pañcaprabhṛtiniyamaḥ svarasthānavarṇakṛtaḥ sukaramukhena kriyate | tasmānnāsau nirdiśyate duṣkara iti ||

āmnāyānāṃ vedānām, ante bhavā antyā vāgupaniṣaditi yāvat | sā gītīrgānāni vilāsināṃ sukhābhimatā ītīrupadravān mṛgāṇāmiva duḥkhānubandhitvād āhopādiśaditi | prītīśca saṃsāre prākṛtajanasulabhāḥ cittoddharṣāt | bhītīḥ trāsād bhayānubandhitvāccāha | bhogaśca rūpādiviṣayānubhavaḥ | rogo vyādhirvividhaduḥkhātmakaḥ [105a] saṃsārākṣepakatvāt | [tatra] ca vadhabandhanādivyasanahetutvāt | tatraivaṃ rogabhūte viṣayabhoge modaḥ sukhito 'haṃ sarvatheti harṣo moho 'jñānam, duḥkhasukhaviparyāsapravṛttatvādityapyāha sā | yata evaṃ sarvamupadrutaṃ saṃsāracakram, tasmād deśe sthāne kṣeme sarvopadravarahite śānte mokṣa iti yāvat | dhānaṃ dhā bhidādidarśanādāha [?] dhāraṇe cittasya icchā ca chandaśca iccheatrecchāyā ddhaividhyaṃ svīkṛtya dvivacanamiti ṭīkākarturabhiprāyaḥ pratibhāti |﻿ dhe ye dhātavye kārye | śreyo 'rthibhirmokṣa evaṃ śaraṇyatayā cittena dhārayitavyaḥ | tatraiva ca chando 'bhidhātavyaḥ na saṃsāra ityapyāha sā vāgiti | ākārasya īkārasya okārasya ekārasyaiva ca prayogāt catuḥsvaro 'yaṃ śloka iti ||

kṣiteḥ pṛthivyā vijitirvijayayogaḥ, sthiteśca tadvyavasthāyā yathāvat paripālanarūpāyāḥ kṣemasya ca vihitirvidhānaṃ sampādanam | etadubhayamavaśyakartavyatayā vrataṃ niyamaḥ, tatra ratistatparatā yeṣāmiti kṣitivijiti[sthiti]vihitivrataratayaḥ | kurava iti vakṣyati | etacca prajñāmantareṇa na bhavatītyāha— parā śobhāparā guṇadoṣavivekasamarthā gatiḥ prajñā yeṣāmiti paragatayaḥ | evaṃ ca śaktisampannaripuvijayacaturā ityā
caṣṭe, kuravo rājāno yathoktaguṇā yudhi samare svamātmīyam arīṇāṃ kulam | uru bhṛśaṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇam | rurudhurāvṛtavantaḥ............vaśamānayan | dudhuvuśca abhibhavādakampayan | guru balavat | idamapi kriyāviśeṣaṇam | guru vā arikulaṃ śaktiyogāt | ayamikārākārokāramātraprayogāt trisvaraḥ śloka iti ||

lg.l: edhete dve dve te ye neme deveśe || 86 ||

div.p: ye dve devānāmīśe deveśe surapatāvapi na sta ime te dve dve ca vastunī edhete vṛddhiṃ gacchataḥ | ke te iti viśeṣeṇa darśayati— śrīśca vibhūtiḥ dīptiśca tadbhāvinī dyutirājñā vā śrīdīptī | hrīśca trapā [ākāra]saṃkocalakṣaṇā tataḥ kīrtiśca yaśaḥ sarvatra guṇakhyātirūpā hrīkīrtī | dhīśca prajñā heyopādeyavivekasvabhāvā tadanusāriṇī ca nītiḥ samyakprayogarūpā trivargānubandhinī dhīnītī, gīśca vāk madhurā loka[105b]saṃgrāhikā prītiśca tadanuvṛttā gīḥprītī, itīme dve dve sambandhinyau edhete | nānye ye kecit | itīkārasyaikārasya ca prayukterdvisvaro 'yaṃ ślokaḥ ||

sarvatobhadraṃ pūrvoktamekasvarodāharaṇamapi kalpate iti punarudāhṛtam | ekasvarodāharaṇamātramiha vivakṣitam | tacca pūrvasiddhameva sambhavatīti kimapūrveṇedṛśenāhopuruṣikāmātraṇeti bhāvaḥ | pūrvatryākhyāta evārtho 'nusartavyaḥ | evaṃ svaraniyamaścaturvidho darśitaḥ |
sthānaniyamaṃ darśayannāha—

nakṣatrāṇāṃ gaṇaiḥ śālini sambandhite virājamāne vā nakṣatragaṇaśālini, na vidyante [ghanā a]sminnityaghane meghamalavikale ata eva nayanānāmānandaṃ prītiṃ janayatīti nayanānandajanane gagane 'ntarīkṣe dṛṣṭirdīyatāṃ prayujyatām | sakṛt ekavāramapi | tāvataiva madanaparavaśāyāstasyāḥ prāpteḥ | nādhikaṃ prārthyate, sakṛd vā darśanena gaganamanugṛhyatām | anyathai viphalā asya śobheti kaściccāṭukāraḥ kāmī kāntāmupalālayati | aṅganeti priyāmantraṇam | kaṇṭyatālavyadantyamūrdhanyamātraprayogāt catusthāno 'yaṃ śloka iti ||

alakaḥ keśavinyāsaviśeṣa eva cañcalatvādinā latā | alivannīlā alakalatā yasminniti alinīlālakalatam | nalinasyeva cchāyā śobhā anayoriti nalinacchāye sarojatulye nayane asminniti nalinacchāyanayanaṃ śaśina iva kāntirasyeti tadīdṛśamiti manoharaṃ te tavānanaṃ kaṃ na hanti kaṃ nāma kāminaṃ daśamīṃ daśāṃ na nayati ? sarvameva rāgiṇaṃ hantītyarthaḥ | ghanastanīti priyāmantraṇam | kaṇṭhyatālavyadantyamātraprayogāt tristhāno 'yaṃ śloka iti ||

he sadānagha ! sarvadā niṣpāpa ! ata eva vipratīsārābhāvāt san vidyamānaḥ śobhano vā ānandaḥ pramodo 'syeti sadānanda ! natāṅgānāṃ strīṇāṃ saṅgaḥ saṃbhogalakṣaṇaḥ, tena saṅgataḥ anyastrīsaṃbhogaprasaktaḥ | he natāṅgāsaṅgasaṃgata ! satī cāsāvaṅganā [106a] ceti sadaṅganā tavetyarthāt | anaṅgena kāmena laṅghanamabhibhavaḥ tato lagnaḥ saktaḥ utpannaḥ nānānekaprakāraḥ ātaṅkaḥ pīḍā yasyā iti anaṅgalaṅghanālagnanānātaṅkā vartate | anaṅgena vā laṅghanaṃ tata ālagno nānātaṅko yasyāḥ seyamanukampyatāmiti kañcit kāminaṃ viṣayāntaraprasaktaṃ nijabadhūnimittaṃ sānunayaṃ kācidevamāha | kaścid vā | kaṇṭhyadantyamātraprayukto dvisthāno 'yaṃ śloka iti ||

akati kuṭilaṃ gacchatītyakam | kartaryac | aka kuṭilāyāṃ gatāviti dhātuḥ | ā samantāt kāyati śabdāyate iti ākam | ātaḥ prādibhya iti kaḥ | akaṃ ca tadākaṃ ceti akākam | gaṅgāyā idaṃ gāṅgam | gāṅgaṃ ca tat kamudakaṃ ca gāṅgakam | gāṅgakaṃ ca tat akākaṃ ceti gāṅgakākākam | tatra tasya vā gāhakaḥ praveṣṭā he gāṅgakākākagāhaka ! ata eva aghānyevāghakāni kutsitatvāt tāni malinatvādinā kākāḥ tān hantīti aghakakākahā kṛtagaṅgāsnānatvāt niṣpāpastvam | tataśca gāṃ svargam agāḥ prāptavānasi na sandehaḥ | evaṃvidhasya svargagamanamavaśyambhāvīti bhaviṣyatyati bhūtamupacarya agāstvamiti bhūtaprayogaḥ kṛtaḥ, yathā ajite 'pi bale jayakāraṇasākalyāt jitavyapadeśaḥ jitamidaṃ mayā balam | kiyadetaditi pratipattavyam | evaṃ puṇyamayasya tava śoko 'pi na saṃbhavati ityāmantraṇadvāreṇa sūcayati hāhetyevaṃrūpaḥ pralāpaḥ śokasaṃbhavaḥ | hāhā tamaṅgati......yātīti hāhāṅgaḥ | agi gatyartho dhātuḥ | na hāhāṅgo 'hāhāṅgaḥ | he 'hāhāṅga viśoka ! evaṃ guṇayogāt ā mvargaṃ prasiddhastvamiti saṃbodhanamukhenābhidhatte | khaga ādityaḥ | so 'ṅkaścihnaṃ tatra gaterasyeti khagāṅkaḥ sa cāsāvagaḥ parvataśceti khagāṅkāgaḥ sumeruriti yāvat, sa ca svarga eva, devānāṃ [tatra] avasthānāt ! taṃ kaṅkati kīrtidvāreṇa dacchati iti vyāpyādaṇcāndravyākaraṇe 1. 2. 1.﻿ | he khagāṅkāgakaṅka ! evaṃ kalyāṇāśayatvāt durjanasasargo 'pi [106b] tava nāstīti kathayati aganti kuṭilaṃ gacchanti adāntatvāditi agāni | kataryac | agāni ca tāni khāni indriyāṇi ca ityagakhāni tāni gacchanti iti agakhagāḥ adāntendriyāḥ khalā iti yāvat | ta eva kutsitatvādagakhagakāḥ | teṣu akakaḥ alolaḥ alubdhaḥ nirapekṣaḥ, tatsaṃsargadveṣāt | he agakhagakākāka iti kaścit puruṣaḥ stutaḥ | kaṇṭhyamātraprayogādekasthāno 'yaṃ ślokaḥ || 91 ||
evaṃ sthānaniyamaścaturdhā darśitaḥ | saṃprati varṇaniyamaṃ darśayannāha—

lg.l: kiṃ kekākākukaḥ kāko māmā gāmā mamāmama || 92 ||

div.p:
re re ityanādare bhartsane vā | trāsā[dipara]vaśatayā bhṛśamabhīkṣṇaṃ vā rautīti roruḥ | rauteryaṅantāt kvipi rūpam, roruścāsau ruruśca mṛgaviśeṣaḥ rorururuḥ | tasya
ūruḥ kroḍadeśaḥ tasya rug vidāraṇamevāgaḥ pāpaṃ tad gacchatīti rorururūgāgogaḥ | parvatadeśavartanāt tarumūlagatagopanaghātukena kenacit gopena duritamidamācaritamiti saviśeṣaṃ darśayati— agasya parvatasyāṅgamekadeśaḥ | tadgataḥ tatrāvasthānāt agāṅgagaḥ | ageṣu taruṣu vyavasthitā gāvo 'sya ityagaguḥ | tvamevaṃ pratyakṣapāpaḥ | mā mā sāvege vāraṇe āmreḍitaprayogaḥ | māgāḥ mā āgaccha | [mama mādṛśasya puṇyātmanaḥ savidha iti śeṣaḥ |] nedṛśaḥ pāpījano 'smadantikamāgantumarhati | amamo niṣparigrahaḥ | mā amama parigrahakleśopahata iti tasyāmantraṇam | anena mṛgavadhapātakanimittaṃ sūcitam, parigrahopahatānāmevedṛśaduścaritasambhavāt | niṣparigrahāṇāṃ tu niṣpāpatvāt | yadi nāma evaṃ tathāpi kiṃ na yuṣmatsamīpamupagaccheyamityāśaṅkya tadasambhavaṃ prativastunā darśayati | kekā mayūradhvanirmadhuraḥ | tasya saiva vā kākuḥ bhaṅgaḥ | tatraiva sahajatayā pratiniyamāt | tayā kāyati śabdāyata iti kekākākukaḥ | kāko vāyasaḥ kiṃ sambhavati ? naiva | tadvat tvadvidhapāpajanasaṃsargo 'smadvidhānāṃ śreyo 'rthināṃ na sambhavatīti kaścinmuniḥ kṛtamṛgavadhapātakaṃ gopālakamaraṇyacaramātmasamīpasarpantamitthamabhidhatte | [107a] rephagakārakakāramakāramātraprayogāt caturvarṇo 'yaṃ śloka iti ||

devānāṃ nandanaḥ prītikaraḥ tadyogakṣemācaraṇaparatvāt | vedanindinaḥ dharmādhikṣepakasya lokasya nodano niṣeddhā [trayī]pravartanāt | devo viṣṇuḥ | tasyaiva tādṛśatvāt, vakṣyamāṇaviśeṣayogācca | dānavānasurān nandayati vardhayati tadyogakṣemācaraṇāditi dānavanandino 'sureśvarasya hiraṇyakaśipoḥ, anyasya vā kaiṭabhādeḥ dāne 'vakhaṇḍane vidāraṇe nādena darponmuktena siṃhanādena [stambha]bhaṅgasambhavena vā nādena śabdena tumulena hetunā divaṃ svargalokaṃ dudāva | kimidamityupajātaśaṅkamakarodityarthaḥ | dakāravakāranakāramātrātmatvāt trivarṇo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ ||

lg.l: sasāra sarasīḥ sīrī sasūrūḥ sa surārasī || 94 ||

div.p: sa prasiddhaḥ sīrī balabhadraḥ sūriḥ sarvavidyākovidaḥ surāścāsurāśca tānāsartuṃ vyāptumapratihatatvāt śīlamasyeti surāsurāsārī | [tādṛśaḥ] sāraḥ sāmarthyamasyeti surāsurāsārisāraḥ | nayasampanno vikramasampannaścetyuktaṃ bhavati | śobhanābhyāmūrubhyāṃ vartata iti sasūrūḥ | saurūpyamanenopalakṣitam | surārasī madirāsvādī | tathā [ca balabhadraḥ] prasiddhaḥ | sarasīḥ krīḍādīrghikāḥ sasāra vārivihārayogena nirviveśa | kiṃviśiṣṭāḥ ? ārasibhirmukharaiḥ sārasaiḥ pakṣiviśeṣaiḥ saha vartata iti sārasisārasāḥ | anena vilāsitvamasyodbhāvitam | rephasakāramātrasvabhāvatayā dvivarṇo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ |

nūnaṃ niścitametat | kiṃ tat ? no 'smākamānanāni mukhāni na [na] nunnāni kiṃ tu nunnānyabhibhūtānyeva | kena ? anena puruṣeṇa, yena sārdhaṃ yoddhavyam | kena ? anenātmīyena mukhena māteṇḍamaṇḍaleneva tejasvinā mukhena | āstāṃ tāvad yuddham, mukhamapyasyāvalokayitumasmanmukhāni na śaknuvanti | kā 'pyayamatimānuṣaḥ puruṣaḥ | tādṛśena saha [yo] yoddhumasmān niyuṅkte 'sau prabhuraparīkṣako 'smākamiti kathayati | etena pūrvoktenānūnenāpi [107b] kenā[pya]tibalīyasā yoddhumityarthāt | ninīḥ.......... niyoktumicchuḥ | anān prāṇinaḥ prāṇo 'nujīvino 'smān nayateḥ sannantāt kvipi rūpam | ino 'smākaṃ prabhuḥ | nā puruṣo 'yaṃ nānenāḥ enaḥ pāpaṃ na vidyate 'syetyanenāḥ na bhavatīti kiṃ tu sapāpa eva | nanu vitarka niścaye vā, yadenenātimānuṣaprabhāveṇāsmān dhātayitumicchati | svayamapyatra yoddhuṃ prāptaḥ | iti kenacit atibalīyasā yoddhuṃ niyuktāḥ prabhunā anujīvino vitarkayanti | ayaṃ nakāramātranibandhatvādekavarṇaḥ ślokaḥ ||
duṣkaramārgamupasaṃharati—

ityuktena vidhinā duṣkaramārgo duṣkaro 'pi kāvyaprakāraḥ | na kevalaṃ sukara ityapi śabdaḥ | kiñcid īṣat saṃkṣepataḥ, tathā pratijñānāt | kriyāviśeṣaṇametat | ādarśita uktaḥ kramaḥ svabhāvo 'syetyādarśitakramaḥ pratipādita iti duṣkaramārge 'pi
kaścidādarśitaḥ krama ityapi pāṭhaḥ | tatra duṣkaramārga viṣaye 'pi kramaḥ prakāraḥ kaścit ko 'pi saṃkṣiptaḥ ādarśita iti yojyam |
prahelikā anubadhnannāha—
punaḥ atha prahelikānāṃ tadrūpāṇāṃ vā prakārāṇāṃ vikalpānāṃ gatiḥ svarūpaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ ca, uddiśyate pratipādyate ||
kva punastadupayoga iti cedāha—

goṣṭhīnāmanekavidhatvāt krīḍārūpāḥ prītisvabhāvā rasavatyo yā goṣṭhyaḥ samavāyāḥ kāvyālāparūpā vidagdhānāṃ tā eva sukhena kālapreraṇārūpatvād vinodāḥ teṣu krīḍāgoṣṭhīvinodeṣu | tajjñaiḥ prahelikāvedibhiḥ saha ākīrṇe janasaṃbādhe sthāne kvacinmantraṇe guptabhāṣaṇe tadvidāmeva tatra gụ̄dhārthānāṃ prahelikānāṃ rahasyabhūtārthapratipattiḥ | itareṣāṃ tatra sannihitānāmapi kimidamucyata iti tadanavagamāt ākīrṇe 'pi mantraṇaṃ prahelikābhiḥ sādhyate | [sāmarthyaṃ ced] jñāyatāṃ kimasmābhirucyata iti vyāmohane tattvāniścayādākulīkaraṇe, narmarūpe vāpi viṣaye | caivetyapi pāṭhaḥ | sahopayogena prayojanena vartata iti sopayogā upakāriṇyaḥ | tatastā apyalaṅkāravat [108a] kāvyalakṣaṇe cintanīyāḥ | tataśca yaduktaṃ bhāmahena—
nānādhātvarthagambhīrā yamakavyapadeśinī |
prahelikā sā hyuditā rāmaśarmācyutottare ||
kāvyānyapi yadīmāni vyākhyāgamyāni śāstravat |
utsavaḥ sudhiyāmeva hanta durmedhaso hatāḥ ||
[kāvyālaṅkāre 2. 29-30]
iti tadapahastitam | upayogavattayā avaśyavaktavyatvāt prahelikānāmalaṅkāravaditi ||
lakṣaṇaṃ tāsāṃ kurvannāha—

padayoḥ suptiṅantayoḥ sandhinā padaghaṭanena tādṛśena hetunā gụ̄dho durbodhaḥ [kṛcchragamyo] 'rtho vivakṣitamabhidheyaṃ yasyā iti gụ̄dhārthaprahelikāṃ samāgatāmāhustadvidaḥ | gopitārthasamāgatapadapradhānatvāt samāgateti tādṛśī vyavahriyate yatra prahelikāyām anyatra vā arthāntare ||
rụ̄dhena prasiddhenārthāntaraprayuktena śabdena vācakena vañcanā vañcanaṃ vā | vivakṣiṃtād arthādanyatra buddhyutpādāt vipralambho jāyate yatra sā tatparatvād vañcitā nāma vijñāyate ||

lg.l: sā syāt pramuṣitā yasyāṃ durbodhārthā padāvalī || 99 ||

div.p: ativyavahitānāmatyantaviprakṛṣṭānām | yathā moho jāyate | padānāṃ prayogo 'bhidhānamativyavahito vā | ativyavahitaḥ prayogataḥ syāt | atyantavyavahitapadayojanāhetormohaḥ | so 'rthāniścayaṃ viparītārthapratipattiṃ [ca] karoti janayatīti mohakāriṇī yā sā vyavahitapadapradhānatvād vyutkrāntā nāma prahelikā veditavyā ||
yasyāḥ prahelikāyāḥ sambandhinī padānāmāvalī samudāyaḥ durbodhaḥ kṛcchragamyaḥ artho 'bhidheyaṃ yasyā iti durbodhārthā sā prahelikā apahṛtārthatvāt pramuṣiṃtā nāma syāt ||
yā gauṇārthā mukhyādabhidheyādanyasminnabhiṃdheye āropitairavyāptaiḥ padaiḥ śabdaiḥ grathitā viracitā sā tādṛśārthāntarapratipādanaparatvāt samānarūpā nāma smaryate ||
lakṣaṇasya śabdānuśāsanasyāstitvaṃ sadbhāvamātraṃ prayogaprabhṛtivyavacchedāt | tena vyutpāditāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ śrutayaḥ padāni aprahatāḥ yasyāṃ sā prayogapratītī rasavirahāt paruṣā nāma syāt ||

lg.l: anyathā bhāsate yatra vākyārthaḥ sā prakalpitā || 101 ||

div.p: yatra prahelikāyāṃ saṃkhyānamekatvādikam | vyāmohasyārthatattvāpratipatteḥ [108b] kāraṇaṃ sākṣādanuktasya vivakṣitasyārthasya saṃkhyāmukhena samunnayanāt, saṃkhyātā nāma sā bhavet ||
yatra prahelikāyāṃ vācyasya padasamudāyasyārtho 'bhidheyamanyathā avasthitaḥ, anyathā tadviparyayeṇāvabhāsate pratibhāti sā prahelikā prakalpitā nāma, anyathārthakalpanaparatvāditi ||
yasyāḥ prahelikāyāḥ sambandhino nānārthasyānekasyābhidheyasya kalpanā udbhāvanaṃ bhavati | kutra ? nāmni kvacit saṃjñāyāṃ viṣaye [sā] prahelikā nāmnā vyavahitārthatvāt nāmāntaritā nāma syāt ||

yā darśitānyārthā | [nibhṛto nigūḍhaḥ] nibhṛto vyavasthito vānyārtho 'bhidheyaṃ yasyāmiti nibhṛtānyārthā abhidheyāntarāt | katham ? tulyaṃ samānamubhayatra vṛtteḥ, dharmamartharūpaṃ tannimittīkṛtya pravṛtteḥ, spṛśatīti tulyadharmaspṛk | tulyo vā vivakṣitenārthena sadṛśo dharmo guṇo 'syeti tulyadharmāṇamarthaṃ spṛśatīti tulyadharmaspṛk | tayā tulyadharmaspṛśā girā śabdena hetunā tādṛśī gīḥ prayujyate yā vivakṣitasadṛśamarthāntaramabhidadhānā | tatraiva vivakṣite 'rthe niṣṭhā asyeti | yadvā tulyadharmaspṛśā girā kāraṇena nibhṛtaḥ aprakaṭo 'nyo gṛhītārthāpekṣayā artho 'bhidheyaṃ yasyāmitiṃ yojyam | sā tādṛśī prahelikā nibhṛtā ākhyāyate ||

upanyastena tadarthānusāreṇa kalpitena śabdasya vivakṣitatvāvācakatvena prasiddhasya tadarthaprakāśanāt paryāyeṇa śabdāntareṇa sādhitā upanyastaśabdaparyāyasādhitā | upanyastaparyāyārthaprasādhitetyapi pāṭhaḥ | tatra upanyastārthānugamakalpitasya tadarthaprakāśanāt paryāyasya śabdāntarasyārthe prasādhitā upanyastaparyāyārthaprasādhitā iti vyākhyeyam | sā tādṛśī samānaśabdā nāma prahelikā |

sākṣāt vācakavyāpāreṇa artho nirdiṣṭaḥ pratipādito 'syām iti nirdiṣṭārthāpi | atiśaye apiśabdaḥ | mūḍhaye tattvārthāpratipattaye syāt | sādhyasaṃmohakaratvāt saṃmụ̄dhā nāma prahelikā jñeyā ||atra ślokavyākhyāyāṃ dvedhā gūḍhaye iti pāṭha udāharaṇavirodhāt tyaktaḥ |﻿

yogānāṃ sambandhānāṃ mālā bāhulyaṃ sā ātmā tannimittatvād yasya tad yogamālātmakaṃ nāma saṃjñānaṃ prasiddhaṃ yasyāḥ [109a] sambandhi tatsamayatvāt sā prahelikā prasiddhanāmaparihārayogāt pārihārikī nāma syāt |
yasyā[māśrita]mādheyaṃ vyajya prakāśya sākṣādabhidhānāt āśrayasya ādhārasya gopanaṃ nigūhanaṃ tadvācakasya prayogāt sā bhavedekacchannā nāma prahelikā, ekasyāśritasyaiva channatvāt ||
yasyāmubhayasyāśritasya [āśrayasya] ca gopanamāvaraṇam, ubhayacchannā nāma sā prahelikā syāt |
yasyāṃ nānālakṣaṇasya samāgatādirūpasyānekasya saṃkaraḥ saṃbhedaḥ syāt, sā saṅkīrṇā nāma prahelikā bhavet ||

etā yathoktalakṣaṇāḥ ṣoḍaśa prahelikā nirdiṣṭā uktāḥ pūrvairācāryai rāmaśarmādibhiḥ | tallakṣaṇavirodhāt duṣṭāḥ heyāśca tāḥ prahelikāśceti duṣṭaprahelikāḥ | na kevalamaduṣṭāḥ | ata eva samāgatādivilakṣaṇatvād anyāścaturdaśa taiḥ pūrvācāryairadhītā nirdiṣṭā iti ||
tāḥ kimiha nocyanta iti cedāha—

vayaṃ punaḥ | viśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ punaḥ śabdaḥ | doṣāḥ prahelikāsambhavinaḥ heyāḥ prahelikā[śca] aparisaṃkhyeyāḥ | na lakṣaṇato na lakṣyataśca guṇavadādareṇāpratipādyān manyamānāḥ paśyantaḥ sādhvīreva prahelikā abhidhāsyāmaḥ |

nanvevamapārthādayo 'pi doṣā aparisaṃkhyeyāḥ syuḥ, viśeṣahetvabhāvāt ? naitadevam | apārthādayo hi doṣāḥ kvacid guṇā api | yadvakṣyati—
tanmattonmattabālānāmukteranyatra duṣyati | [3.128] ityādi | tataste cintanīyāḥ | prahelikādoṣāstu na kvacid guṇā api, yato 'pārthādivannirūpaṇīyāḥ syuḥ | ataśca apārthādayo vaktavyā yataḥ sarvakāvyasambhavinaste doṣāḥ | prahelikādoṣāstu prādeśikā ityāśayavatā uktam— doṣānityādi | yadvā, prahelikādoṣā aparāparadoṣasambhavena caturdaśeti iyattayā aparisaṃkhyeyāḥ | tataścātiprasaṅgānnocyante ityabhiprāyeṇoktam— doṣānityādi | apārthādayastu sarvakāvyadoṣāḥ parisaṃkhyā[tāḥ] | tathaiva na tadvacane 'tiprasaṅga iti cākūtam | ata evābhidhāsyati—

iti | kathaṃ tarhi duṣṭaprahelikā jñāyante yathā [109b] varjyeran | na hi duṣṭatayā ajñātānāṃ parihāraḥ saṃbhavatītyāśaṅkya tatpratyupāyamāha— yāḥ prahelikāḥ | tuśabdaḥ
arthāntaravivakṣāyām | yathoktalakṣaṇavirahāt na vidyate lakṣaṇamāsāmityalakṣaṇāḥ, tāḥ svayameva duṣṭā jñāyante | pratiniyatalakṣaṇavyutpatteḥ, atallakṣaṇānāṃ tadābhāsatāpratipatteḥ | kiṃ tāsāṃ prapañcaprayāseneti ?

he mama cetaḥ, āgaso 'parādhasya vyalīkasya rasaṃ svādamācaraṇarūpam abhijānātītyāgorasābhijñaṃ kṛtadoṣaṃ na bhavati | tato nirāgase mahyaṃ kasmāt kāraṇāt prakṛpyasi ? na kiñcit kāraṇam | tataścāyamakāraṇaḥ kopo na kārya iti vārayati | vyalīkalakṣaṇakopasthānābhāvādasthāne akāṇḍe ruditairaśrupātai kopamayaiḥ etairiti pratyakṣanirdeśaḥ | alaṃ vāraṇe | mā rodīrityarthaḥ | ālohitekṣaṇe iti priyāmantraṇam | me āgorasābhijñamityanayoḥ pādayoḥ mayāgorasābhijñamiti ayādeśena sandhinā vivakṣitārthasya gụ̄dhārthatvāt samāgateyamudāhṛteti ||

kubjā striyamāsevamānasya nirviśataḥ te tava ratiḥ pramodo varddhate | yathā evaṃ tathā amarastrīviḍambinīrdivyāṅganāsamānā nārīnirviśataḥ sevamānasya ratirna vardhate | tatraiva tavādhikārādityarthaḥ | atra kubjā [ityanena] kanyākubjā vivakṣitā yathā satyabhāmā bhāmeti | tadnatistadgatau vā | puruṣaḥ kubjāśabdena bhagnapṛṣṭhadeśāyāṃ yoṣiti rụ̄dhena tatra pratītijananāt vañcyata iti vañciteyaṃ nidarśitā ||

atra padminyā mukhaṃ kamalarūpaṃ tuṇḍena cañcvā cumbati haṃsaḥ, valgu manoharaṃ yathā bhavati tathā ravaṃ rutaṃ kurvan karkaśaḥ kaṇṭako 'sminniti karkaśakaṇṭake padminyā daṇḍe nāle aṅgāni avayavān ghadṛyan kaṇḍūyamāna ityayamatrārtho vivakṣitaḥ | tatra ca daṇḍe cumbatītyādivyavahitapadaprayogānmoho jāyata iti vyutkrāntā iyamudāhṛtā ||

lg.l: khātayaḥ kani kāle te sphātayaḥ sphītavalgavaḥ |

div.p: he kani kanye ! te tava kāle pāde candre manojñe candre vā he kamanīye priyā[110a]mantraṇametat | khātayaḥ kiṃṅkiṇikāḥ nū purādirūpā sphātayaḥ sphītāḥ paryāptaśobhāḥ sphītavalgavaḥ madhuraghanārasāḥ sākṣādbhavanti | pratyakṣatāmupayānti | tanninadagrahaṇādākarṇāntacakṣuṣā vā gṛhyanta ityarthaḥ | atredṛśamanojñavastusākṣātkaraṇe mama vāyavaḥ prāṇāḥ | rāgābhibhavāt cāriṇo 'navasthāyinaḥ | yāntītyarthaḥ | evaṃ durbodhārthapadaprayogāt pramuṣiteyaṃ lakṣiteti ||

vallarīti strītvasādharmyeṇa kācid yoṣid vivakṣitā | pallavaśabdena ca tatsāmyādaṅgulayaḥ kusumamañjarīti ca tatsādṛśyāt nakhāḥ | śeṣaṃ sugamam | evaṃ gauṇārthaprayuktairvallarītyādi śabdaiḥ sādhiteyaṃ samānarūpā nirūpiteti ||

lg.l: majjanta iva mattāste saure sarasi saṃprati || 113 ||

div.p: surāṃ kurvantīti tatkaroti tadācaṣṭa iti ṇijantāt surayatīti kartaryaci vihite surāḥ śauṇḍikāḥ | mattāste kecit vivakṣitāḥ | surāyā ālaye madirāmandire samprati svairaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ bhramanti | daśanārciṣā dantaprabhayā paritaḥ sphurantyā lakṣitāḥ | surāyā idaṃ saure madyasarasi hrade majjanta iva lakṣyamāṇāḥ | surā ityasya śauṇḍikeṣu surāsambandhini ca saura ityasyāprasiddheḥ | lakṣaṇasya ca tādṛśasya sambhavāt paruṣeyam āviṣkṛteti ||

nāsikyo varṇo ñakāro 'tra vivakṣitaḥ | madhye madhyo vā yasyāḥ sā nāsikyamadhyā | parita ādyantataḥ | caturbhirvarṇaiḥ vibhūṣitā asti vartate purī kācit |
yasyāṃ puryāmaṣṭau varṇā āhvayaḥ saṃjñā yeṣāmityaṣṭavarṇāhvayā nṛpā rājānaḥ santi | atra kāñcī purī pallavāśca tasyāṃ nṛpā iti paramārthaḥ | caturādisaṃkhyopādānaṃ tu tadvivakṣitārthavyāmohakaramiti saṃkhyāteyamākhyāteti ||

lg.l: girā skhalantyā namreṇa śirasā dīnayā dṛśā |

div.p: skhalantyā daurgatyopahatasyeśvareṣu pratibhākṣayagṛhītasya vyākulavacanatvād, rāgādeśācceti dvaidham | namreṇa śirasā durvidhasya parārādhanaparatvāt rāgarasācceti aparaṃ dvaidham | dīnayā dṛśā daridreṇa nirānandatvāt [110b] abhimatarāgaviṣayāsiddheścetyaparaṃ dvaidham | sotkampamatyantaṃ kṣīṇatvāt kāmāveśācceti idamapi dvidhā | vṛddhā śabdasya jaratīvācinaḥ saṃbodhane vṛddhe iti | [tathaiva] vṛddhāśabdasya lakṣmīvacanasya ityaparaṃ dvaidham | evaṃ tiṣṭhantamanukampābhājanamapi kiṃ māṃ nānukampase ? atra kaścid daridro lakṣmīṃ labhatām iti vivakṣito vākyārthaḥ | vṛddhāṃ kāñcit yoṣitamābhāṣate kaścit kāmīti anyastvarthaḥ pratibhāti | tadiyaṃ prakalpitā nidarśiteti ||

he adhīrākṣi ! ko 'pi kaścidanirdhāritarūpaviśeṣaḥ pārthivaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ vṛkṣaśca iti śliṣṭam | ādau prathamato rājetyevaṃ gīyate kīrttyate | sanātanaśca gīyate | sanātanaśca śāśvataḥ, viṣṇurvā | na vidyate 'tanaḥ śabdo 'sminniti atanaḥ sa pārthivaḥ | ādau rājeti yo gīyate, na atanaḥ kiṃ tu tanaḥ śabdasahita evetiṃ traividhyam | yadvā na tana atanaḥ | na tathā nātanaḥ | saha tena vartata iti sanātanaśca ko 'pi pārthivo gīyate | sa evārthaḥ | vyuttpattimātreṇa bhidyate | asau pūrvoktaḥ | ādau rājā sanātanaśca naiva rājā mahīpatirādyaḥ | nāpi sanātanaḥ śāśvato viṣṇurvā bhavati | rājātana iti vṛkṣaviśeṣasya nāma, yasya kṣīrīti prasiddhiḥ | tatreyaṃ nānārthakalpaneti nāmāntariteyamudīritā ||

lg.l: hṛtadravyaṃ janaṃ tyaktvā dhanavantaṃ vrajanti kāḥ |

div.p: hṛtaṃ dravyamasmāditi hṛtadravyaṃ nirdhanaṃ naraṃ tyaktvā dhanavantaṃ naraṃ kā vrajanti ? nānā anekaprakārāṇāṃ bhaṅgīnāṃ śrṛṅgāraceṣṭālakṣaṇānāṃ śataiḥ | bahutvopalakṣaṇame[tat] | ākṛṣṭā vaśīkṛtā lokāḥ puruṣā yābhiriti nānābhaṅgi[śatā]kṛṣṭalokāḥ durdharā durvārā anāya[tta]tvāt | veśyā gaṇikā evaṃvidhā bhaveyuriti uttaramāśaṅkya niṣedhati—evaṃvidhāḥ satyo 'pi na veśyāḥ kiṃ tu śriya ityatrottaram | ato nānābhaṅgiśatākṛṣṭalokā ityādeḥ tulyadharmaspṛśo giraḥ śriya ityasminnarthe nibhṛtatvād vyavasthānāt tayā vā śriya ityasyārthasya nibhṛtatvānnigūḍhatvāt nibhṛteyamudāhṛtā ||

kalabhāṣiṇi ! jitastadupamitaḥ prakṛṣṭasya [111a] keśasyākhyā saṃjñā yasya sa prakṛṣṭakeśākhyaḥ pravālaḥ yeneti jitaprakṛṣṭakeśākhyaḥ pravālopama [ityarthaḥ] | na vidyate bhūmirasyeti abhūmiḥ | tena arthataḥ samānaḥ āhvayaḥ saṃjñā yasyā asau abhūmisāhvayaḥ adharaḥ tava yaḥ | asau ayaṃ māmutkamunmanasamadhikamatyarthaṃ karoti | evaṃ kalpitaprasiddhaśabdaparyāyasādhiteyaṃ samānaśabdā nidarśiteti ||

kāmī ca kāminī ca kāminau strīpuṃsau ruṣā praṇyakalahena hetunā parāvṛtya parāṅmukhībhūḥ[ya] śayanīye talpe śayitau | tathaiva parāvṛttyaiva mukhamanyonyasya svairaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ rāgādacumbatām cumbitavantau iti moho jāyate | kathaṃ nāma parāvṛtya śayitau svairaṃ mukhaṃ cumbata iti ? yathā pūrvaṃ saṃmukhaṃ śayitau tathaiva punaḥ saṃviṣṭau rāgaparavaśatayā svairaṃ mukhamacumbatāmiti tu paramārthaḥ | iyameva sākṣānnirdiṣṭārthāpi saṃmohakāriṇīti saṃmụ̄dhā darśitā ||

vinā pakṣiṇā garuḍena | sāmarthyāt tena kila devarājamabhibhūya kadācida—mṛtamāhṛtam | [jitam] vijitam ātmasāt kṛtam [annamāhāro] yasya sa vijitānnaḥ abhṛtabhojī | sa cārthādindraḥ | bhavatyasmāditi bhavaḥ | vijitānno bhavo janmaheturjanakaḥ | yasya yasmād vā bhavo bhavanaṃ janma yasya sa vijitānnabhava arjunaḥ taṃ dveṣṭī[ti] vijitānnabhavadveṣī karṇaḥ | tasya gururādityaḥ | tasya pādaiḥ kiraṇaiḥ hatastataḥ | tādṛśī jano vyoma gaganamabhinandati | prītinirbha reṇāntaḥkaraṇena gṛhṇāti | kiṃviśiṣṭam ? himamapahantīti himāpahaḥ agniḥ | tasyāmitram udakam | tad dhārayantīti himāpahāmitradharā meghāḥ | tairvyāptam | atra vijayasambandhād vijitamityamṛtasya bhānaṃ nivṛttam | tatsambandhācca vijitānna itīndrasya | tasmād janmayogād vijitānnabhava ityarjunasya | tadvairayogācca vijitānnabhavadveṣīti karṇasya | tajjanmayogācca vijitānnabhavadveṣigururityā[ditya]sya | [111b] himopaghātayogena himāpaha ityagneḥ | tadamitratāyogācca himāpahāmitramityudakasya | taddhāraṇasambandhācca himāpahāmitradharā iti meghānām | evaṃ sambandhapārihārikīyamudāhṛtā ||

lg.l: na spṛśatyāyudhaṃ jātu na strīṇāṃ stanamaṇḍalam |

div.p: amanuṣyasya kasyāpyanirdhāritarūpaviśeṣasya hastaḥ jātu kadācidapi āyudhaṃ na spṛśati gṛhṇāti | na ca strīṇāṃ stanamaṇḍalaṃ payodharabhāraṃ spṛśati | ayamevaṃ phalabhūtakarmarahito hasto nāphalaḥ saphalaḥ kila | nānyādṛśaṃ sāphalyamasyāsmabhyaṃ rocata iti kilaśabdena sūcayati | atrāśrito hastaḥ abhivyakto vācakaprayogāt | āśrayastu gopitaḥ, gandharvahasta iti sākṣādanabhidhānāt | gandharvahasta iti cābhidhānameraṇḍasya | tadiyamekacchannā darśiteti ||

lg.l: kena kaḥ saha sambhūya sarvakāryeṣu sannidhim |
labdhvā bhojanakāle tu yadi dṛṣṭo nirasyate || 122 ||

div.p:
kena śirasā saha sambhūya saṃgatya sarveṣu kāryādiṣu snānā[dhi]vāsanādiṣu sannidhimupasthānaṃ labdhvā prāpya bhojanakāle annagato yadi kathañcid dṛṣṭaḥ syāt, tadā kaḥ tādṛśo ni[ra]syate ? keśaḥ | tasya tādṛśatvāt | atra kena ka iti sāmānyapada
prayogādāśrayaḥ śirolakṣaṇaḥ āśritaśca keśaḥ | tau cchannau ityubhayacchanneyamudāhṛtā | keneśa iti [pāṭhe] kena kakāreṇa īśaśabdaḥ sambhūya, śeṣaṃ pūrvavat | kena brahmaṇā īśaḥ śaṅkara iti cārthāntaraṃ vācyam | tanmahāprayogādubhaya[go]panaṃ prāgiveti vyākhyeyam ||

lg.l: sahayā sagajā senā sabhaṭeyaṃ na cejjitā |

div.p: saha hayairaśvai saha gajairbhaṭaiśca saha [112a] vartata iti sahayā sagajā sabhaṭeyaṃ ced yā na jitā nākrāntā tadā no 'smākaṃ sutaḥ amātṛkaḥ ajananīkaḥ | a[na]kṣarajñaśca mūḍhaḥ syāditi [āpātato] 'yamarthaḥ | tattvārthastu haśca yaśca tābhyāṃ varṇābhyāṃ saha vartata iti | saha yo gaśca jaśca varṇaḥ, tābhyāṃ saha sagajā | iśca naśca varṇaḥ | tābhyāṃ yuktā senā, bhakāraṭakārābhyāṃ yogāt sabhaṭā | evaṃvidhā ca siddhā mātṛkā sā iyaṃ cenna jitā samyagadhyayanayogena yadi na vaśīkṛtā syāt, tadā ayaṃ naḥ sutaḥ | na vidyate mātṛkā varṇasamāmnāyaḥ | anadhītatvādasyeti amātṛkaḥ ata eva śāstrāparijñānāt mụ̄dho mūrkhaḥ heyopādeyajñānavikalaḥ syāt | na kṣarati na naśyatītyakṣaraṃ vedaṃ jānātītyakṣarajñastu vedamātrapāṭhakastu syāt | na mātṛkādhyayanenāpi vedapāṭhasambhavāt | akṣarajñaścetyapi pāṭhaḥ | tatra mūrkhatayā naśvarapadārthasvabhāvāparijñānādakṣaraṃ sarvaṃ nityaṃ jānīyādityakṣarajñaśca nityagrahaguptaśca bhavet ||
kataro 'yaṃ saṃkara iti darśayati—

seyaṃ prakrāntā prahelikā tallakṣaṇayogānnāmāntaritayā miśreṇa saṃsṛṣṭena vañcitāyā rūpeṇa yogaḥ sambandho 'syāstīti nāmāntaritāmiśravañcitārūpayoginī | mātṛketyasminnāmni sahayetyādinānekārthakalpanādamātṛkāśabdenājananī, mụ̄dhenānadhītasiddhamātṛkāpratītivipralambhāt, akṣarajñaśabdena ca varṇajñaprasiddhena vedavedinyavinaśvarajñevāniścayavañcanāt |

saṃkaraśeṣamatidiśan prastāvamimaṃ nigamayati— evameva yathoktasaṃkarānusāreṇa itarāsāmapi [112b] nāmāntaritāvañcitāvyatiriktānāṃ ca | na kevalamanayoḥ |
saṃkarasya saṃsargasya kramaḥ prakāra unneyo 'bhyūhyaḥ | sa caiva munnīyatām—
samāgatā [vyutkrāntayoḥ] saṃkaraḥ |
samānarūpāsamānaśabdayorayaṃ saṃkaraḥ |
pārihārikīprakalpitayoḥ saṃkaraḥ |
evaṃ śabdālaṅkārasvabhāvāḥ kāvyaguṇā yathāvat pratipādi[tāḥ] | doṣā api kecidasādhāraṇavaidarbhamārgasambhavinaḥ śleṣādayaḥ | saṃprati sarvamārgasādhāraṇānupadarśayannāha—

lg.l: iti doṣā daśaivaite varjyāḥ kāvyeṣu sūribhiḥ || 126 ||

div.p:
apagato 'rthaḥ abhidheyo vākyasambandhi yata ityapārtham | viruddhaḥ pūrvāparāhataḥ artho 'bhidheyo yasminniti vyartham | ekaḥ sa eva pratipādito 'rtho 'bhidheyaḥ punaryasmin pratipādyate tadekārtham | saṃśayo 'rthaviṣayaḥ, kimayamartho 'yaṃ vetyubhayārthāvalambī pratyayaḥ, tena [sa]ha vartate tajjanakatvāditi sasaṃśayam | apagataḥ kramo yathoddeśaṃ pratyāmnāyata ityapakramam | śabdena śabdavidyāprasiddhena padena hīnaṃ rahitaṃ tadvipakṣayogāditi śabdahīnam | yateḥ chandaḥśāstravihitāt vigamāt bhraṣṭamapagatamiti yatibhraṣṭam | bhinnaṃ
chandovicitividyārūḍhaṃ vṛttaṃ padyaṃ jāterapi virodhasambhavāt yasminniti bhinnavṛttam | vigataḥ sandhiḥ śabdaśāstraprasiddho yaṇādeśādiryasminnitiṃ visandhikam ||

deśaḥ parvatādiḥ | kālo divasādiḥ | kalā nṛtyagītādividyāḥ | lokaśca sattvaloko bhājanaloko vā citrapracāraḥ | nyāyaścānvīkṣikī | āgamaśca vedādiḥ | deśakālakalālokanyāyāgamāḥ | tairvirodho bādhā vidyate 'sminniti deśakālakalālokanyāyāgamavirodhi ca tattadvyavasthātikramāt | virodhītyetaddeśādibhiḥ pratyekaṃ sambandhanīyam | cakāra uktasamuccaye | ityete anantaroddiṣṭā daśaiva | anyūnānatiriktā doṣā guṇavipakṣatvād varjyāḥ śāstracakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā parihartavyāḥ | sūribhiḥ pratipattṛbhiḥ | kutra ? kāvyeṣu pūrvoktarūpeṣu | kāvyaviśeṣadoṣāṇāmapi kvacit keṣāñcit pratiniyamāt | tatsambhavitvāt kāvyadoṣāste, yathā hetusambha[vi]no[113a] 'siddhādayo hetudoṣāḥ | yathā cārāñjikādayo dhānyasambhavino dhānyadoṣā ucyante loke | atrāpārthādayo yadā bhāvapradhānāḥ, tadā apārthatvādayo dūṣaṇānīti bhāvasādhanena doṣāḥ | dūṣayanti vā kāvyavyapadeśamātreṇa kvacid vā apavādaviṣaye kāvyameveti tattvāt anyatreti doṣāḥ | yadvakṣati—
tanmattonmattabālānāmukteranyatra duṣyati | [3. 128] ityādi | tadyogāt kāvyaṃ duṣṭamiti jñeyam | yadā tu dharmapradhānāḥ, tadā apārthādayo duṣyanti heyā bhavantīti doṣāḥ | tadābhāsatvācca kāvyeṣu doṣāḥ | yathā dṛṣṭāntābhāsā dṛṣṭānteṣu, śabdābhāsāḥ śabdeṣviti sarvathā kāvyadoṣāste varjanīyā smṛtimateti ||

atha
pratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntahīnaṃ duṣṭaṃ ca varṇyate |
samāsena yathānyāyaṃ tanmātrārthapratītaye ||
[kāvyālaṅkāre 5. 1] ityādinā vistareṇa pratijñāhānyādayo doṣāḥ kāvyalakṣaṇāntare darśitāḥ | te kimiha nocyanta iti cedāha—

pratijñā sādhyanirdeśaḥ, vidhirūpo niṣedhalakṣaṇo vā | sādhyasya sarvasya sadasattvābhyāṃ vyāpteḥ | sa ca pramāṇāntarāvyāhataḥ | pramāṇāntaranirastasyāhetugocaratvāt | yathoktam—
sandigdhe hetuvacanād vyasto heturanāśrayaḥ | [pramāṇavārttike 4. 91] iti | tathā
hetubhistrāṇamupetaṃ naiva yo hataḥ | [ ] ityādiḥ | anyatra tadvistaraḥ | hetuḥ, tasyā evaṃrūpāyāḥ pratijñāyā sādhanabhūto 'rthaḥ trirūpo 'nyo vā | tasyāpi tallakṣaṇaśāstre vistaraḥ | dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyasādhanayoḥ sambandhapratipattiviṣayabhūto 'rthaḥ kaścit | sa ca sādharmyadṛṣṭānto vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaścetyādinā anyatra nirṇītaḥ | teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ hāniryathā[kramaṃ] pratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntahāniḥ | [dvandvāt paraṃ śrūyamāṇasya] pratyekamabhisambandhāt pratijñāhāniḥ hetuhāniḥ dṛṣṭāntahāniśceti trividho bhavati | tatra pratijñāhāniḥ- tayaiva pratijñayā hetunā siddhāntena sarvāgamaiḥ prasiddhadharmatayā pratyakṣeṇa ca bādhetyanekadhā | yathoktaṃ bhāmahena—
tadarthahetusiddhāntasarvāgamavirodhinī |
[113b] prasiddhadharmā pratyakṣabādhinī ceti duṣyati ||
[kāvyālaṅkāre 5. 13] iti | hetuhānirasiddhatvādilakṣaṇaḥ | yathoktam—
hetustrilakṣaṇo jñeyo hetvābhāso viparyayāt | [kāvyālaṅkāre 5. 21] iti | tasyānyatra vistaraḥ | dṛṣṭāntahāniḥ sādhyadharmavirahādirūpāt | taduktam—
sādhyasādhanadharmābhyāṃ siddho dṛṣṭānta ucyate |
tadviparyayato vāpi tadābhastadavṛttitaḥ ||
[kāvyālaṅkāre 5. 26]
iti | tadvistaro 'pyanyatraiva | seyaṃ trividhā hāniḥ pratyekamanekaśo nānā kāvyeṣu doṣaḥ | vaiguṇyaṃ vā doṣo veti sadasatpakṣavikalpanam | vicāro 'yaṃ [vi]gṛhya parīkṣā[yā] iha kathañcit prastutatve 'pi [mukhyatastasyāḥ] tarkaśāstra[gocara]tvāt karkaśaprāyaḥ karkaśabhāgaḥ atigambhīratvādihānadhikārācca, prāyo bhūyān yasminniti kṛtvā | tena vā prāyo bahulaḥ | prāyeṇa bhūmnā vā karkaśaḥ karkaśaprāyaḥ | rājadantādiṣu darśanāt pūrvanipātaḥ | karkaśaprāyaḥ kaṭhinabhūyiṣṭhaḥ arañjaka iti yāvat | iha ca komalaprāyaḥ kāvyapratiniyataḥ guṇadoṣaviṣayo vicāro 'dhikṛtaḥ | tasmāt tena karkaśaprāyeṇa vicāreṇa ālị̄dhena anuṣṭhānamukhenādṛtena kiṃ phalam ? kāvyapratiniyataguṇadoṣanirṇayarūpaṃ prayojanaṃ kimasti ? naivetyāśaya | tathā cāha—

kāvyalakṣaṇe kāvyapratiniyatā doṣā guṇāśca vicāryante | na śāstrāntarasādhāraṇā api, sarvaśāstrasamuccayaprasaṅgāt | tataśca atraiva sarvaguṇadoṣavyutpattau śāstrāntarāṇi vyarthāni syuḥ, tāvanmātraphalatvād vidyāsthānānām | tatraitatpratiniyatavyutpatteranyataḥ siddheridamapi vyarthaṃ syāt, sarvatra pratiniyamābhāvāt | na caivam, guṇadoṣavyutpattīnāṃ pratiśāstraṃ niyamadarśanāt | atha kāvyāṅgatvāt pratijñābhedādikaṃ vidyāntaramapi saṃkṣiptamihābhidhānīyam | tat kiṃ chandovicityādikaṃ tatra nābhimatam ? tasyāpi kāvyāṅgatvena nimittasya samānatvāt | na ca yatkiñcidiha darśitam ityetāvatā śāstrāntare samyagjñānaṃ sampadyate, punastacchāstrādeva yathāvadavagamavyapekṣaṇāt jñānānāṃ [ca] pratiśāstraṃ niyatatvāt | tatastata eva tattajjñānamapekṣaṇīyam | yat punaḥ kāvyalakṣaṇasyāsya pramāṇalakṣaṇīkaraṇam, tadāhopuruṣikāmātramiti sūktamidaṃ tenālị̄dhena kiṃ phalamiti ||
[114a] eṣāṃ yathoddeśaṃ sanirdeśaṃ sāpavādaṃ [vivaraṇaṃ] kartuṃ prakramate—

samudāyārtha ityārabhya ślokatritayaṭākāyāṃ mātṛkāsthakramaḥ asaṃlagna iti kṛtvā arthaparyālocanena śobhanataraḥ kramaḥ svīkṛtaḥ ||﻿samudāyasya prakaraṇāt padasambandhino vākyasya artho 'bhidheyam aṅgāṅgibhūtakriyākārakasambandhaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ sāṃvyavahārikam | tena śūnyaṃ rahitam | na padārtha
mātreṇa, tasya kvacidapyavyabhicārāt | daśadāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpā ityādāvapi padārthapratyayodayāt | yat ityanūdya tat samudāyārthaśūnyam apārtham | iha doṣaprastāve | apārthamiti vā apārthaṃ nāma iṣyate smaryata iti vidhiḥ | tadapārthaṃ duṣyati kāvyadoṣo bhavati ityutsargaḥ | tasyāpavādamāha- mattetyādi | mattā madirāmadādiyogāt | unmattā vāyukṣobhādicittavikṣepāt | bālāḥ heyopādeyajñānavikalāḥ avyutpannāḥ tathā bālakalpāḥ śaktivikalā vṛddhā asaṃbaddhabhāṣiṇaḥ | teṣāṃ tathāvidhāyā evokterucitatvāt | saiva teṣāṃ sūktiriti | [ataḥ] teṣāmukteranyatra subhāṣitaviṣaye [tadidamapārthaṃ] duṣyati duṣṭaṃ jāyate ||
tadudāharati—
na hyatra samudraḥ pīyata ityādeḥ padasamudāyasya kaścideko 'rtho gṛhyate yaḥ kāvyārthaḥ syāt | avayavārthā evāna[nvitāḥ] śalākākalpāḥ pratibhānti | tadīdṛśamapārthaṃ vijñeyam ||
utsarga[ta]stvasambhavamidamiti apavādamukhena nigamayannāha—

idamanantaroktamapārthamabhidhānaṃ vacanam asvasthaṃ cittamantaḥ[karaṇaṃ] yeṣāmityasvasthacittānāṃ mattonmattādīnāṃ [abhidhānamaninditaṃ] syāt | anyatra tu ninditam | athavā itara[tra] svastheṣu viṣaye tatkartṛtvakalpanāt | evamidamanantaroktamapārthamādiryasya daśadāḍimādestadevamādikamasambaddhaṃ [vākyajātaṃ] ko nāma kavirakuśalo 'pi, prāgeva nipuṇaḥ | prayuñjīta racayet ? naiva [kaścit prayuṅkte ] | mūlahāneratisthūlatvācca nātra bhrāntiḥ sambhāvya[ta] iti bhāvaḥ | vākyavikāratvāt tu idamapi kathañcit kāvye sambhavediti sambhavamātrakalpanayā svastheṣvapi darśitamiti ||

ekaṃ ca tad vākyaṃ ca ityekaṃ vākyaṃ padyātmakaṃ gadya[mayaṃ] vā [tatra] prabandhe vā sargabandhādike yatra kvacidādau madhye ante vā pūrvāparābhyāṃ parāhataṃ pūrvāparaviruddhaṃ vacanaṃ vyarthamiti vyarthaṃ nāma paṭhyate jñāyate atra doṣeṣu prakaraṇāt kāvyasambaddheṣu madhye | ayamapi kāvyadoṣa iti yāvat | kutaḥ ? viruddhaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ artho 'bhidheyam yasmin tasya bhāvaḥ | tayā hetubhūtayā | na tu vigatārthatayā, apārthamityeva tasya saṃgrahāditi ||

lg.l: na hi te ko 'pi vidveṣṭā sarvabhūtānukampinaḥ || 132 ||

div.p: śatrūṇāṃ kulaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sarvaṃ jahi nāśaya rājan ! tato niḥsapatnaṃ viśvambharāṃ mahīmimāṃ jaya ātmasāt kuru | te tava ko 'pi kaścid vidveṣṭā śatrurna vidyate | kutaḥ sarvabhūtānukampinaḥ sarvabhūtahitaiṣitvāt | antarbhāvitahetvarthaṃ viśeṣaṇamidam | atra śatruḥ pūrvaṃ vihita eva paścāt tatparyāyeṇa niṣiddhaḥ | pūrvāparāhatamīdṛśaṃ vyarthamekavākyaviṣayamavagantavyam | prabandhaviṣayaṃ tu tatra saṃbhavediti ||
asyāpavādaṃ darśayannāha—

yasyāmavasthāyāṃ vaktuḥ sambandhinyāṃ viṣaye | viruddho 'rtho yasyāmiti viruddhārthā pūrvāparāhatābhidheyā api, na kevalamitarā | bhāratī vacanam abhimatā aduṣṭā | tadā tathocitatvāt | cetasaḥ tādṛśī kvacit samavasthā daśā astiṃ vidyate | kasya ? sahābhiṣaṅgeṇa [āsaktyā] kvacid viṣaye stryādau vartate iti sābhiṣaṅgasya atiraktacetasaḥ sambandhinī kutaścit manovasthāviśeṣād vyarthamapyanindyamityarthaḥ ||
tadudāharati—

lg.l: pibāmi taralaṃ tasyāḥ kadā nu daśanacchadam || 134 ||

div.p: paramya dāreṣu kalatre | abhilāṣaḥ saṅgamecchā | lokaśā[straviruddho] 'yaṃ [115a] me mamāryasya nyāyavya[va]hāriṇaḥ sataḥ kathaṃ nāma yujyate saṃgacchate ? naivāyaṃ mama yujyata ityarthaḥ | itthaṃ kathañcit pratisaṃkhyānāt labdhasya vivekasya viparyayaḥ punarabhiṣaṅgaparavaśo 'nupatitaḥ | tasyāḥ parayoṣitaḥ kasyā[śa]cidiṣṭāyā daśanacchadamadharaṃ taralamujjvalaṃ kadā nu pibāmi ? katarat tādṛśaṃ puṇyadinaṃ bhavet ! nu prārthanāyām | īdṛśaṃ pūrvāparāhatamapiṃ atyāsaktyādyavasthānugṛhītaṃ na duṣyati, tādṛśasyaiva tadocitatvāditi ||

lg.l: arthataḥ śabdato vāpi tadekārthaṃ mataṃ yathā || 135 ||

div.p: pūrvoktaṃ prathamaṃ prayuktaṃ śabdārtharūpaṃ kiñcit bhūyaḥ punarapi yadi kathañcit pramādāt kīrtyate prayujyate | katham ? aviśeṣeṇa pūrvoktamapyarthaviśeṣamanapekṣya tāvatyevārthe | yadi tu viśeṣāpekṣā syāt, tadā naikārthamiti bhāvaḥ | tadīdṛśamekārtham | ataḥ ekaḥ pūrvāparakālabhāvyarthaḥ aviśiṣṭaḥ asminniti kṛtvā | katham ? arthataḥ abhidheyena pūrvapratipāditasyaivārthasya aviśeṣeṇa punaḥ pratipādanāt | śabdato vācakena vā hetunā tāvatyeva cārthe punaḥ śabdaprayogāt | na punararthapaunaruktyamanapekṣya śabdapaunaruktyaṃ svatantraṃ darśayituṃ śakyam, artha[to bhinnasya] eva śabdasya yamakādau apunarukteḥ | yatra tvarthābhedaḥ tatra taddvārakaṃ śabdapaunaruktyam | apītyubhayathā darśitam | yathetyudāharati ||

bālāṃ striyaṃ kāñcit | utkām utkaṇṭhitām | unmanayanti utkaṇṭhayanti | utkaṇṭhatāmātrāpekṣāyām idamekārtham, viśeṣāpekṣā[rāhitye]neti draṣṭavyam | ete pratyakṣa
vātanaḥ | tasyā bālāyā alakānāmiva tviṭ prabhā yeṣāmiti tadalakatviṣaḥ | ambhodharāstaḍitvanta iti anyatareṇa meghamātrapratipādanādekārtham | rūpaviśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ tu anekārthatvaṃ syāt | yathāha bhāraviḥ—
bibhrāṇamānīlarucaṃ piśaṅgī— rjaṭāstaḍittvantamivāmbuvāham |
[kirātārjunīye 3. 1] iti | gambhīrāḥ stanayitnava ityekenaiva stananayogyasya pratipādanādubhayamevārthamaviśeṣavivakṣāyāmiti ||
atrāpyapavādaṃ vyutpādayannāha—

anukampā anukrośa ādiryasya vismayaharṣādestasya tadrūpo vā atiśayo viśeṣaḥ anukampādyatiśayaḥ, [115b] nānukampādimātram | kaścid anyatamo yadi vivakṣyate prakā[śayitumi]ṣyate tadā punarukto 'pi vākye 'rthataḥ śabdato 'pi vā na doṣaḥ | ekārthalakṣaṇe 'bhihite vikāro nāsti | guṇo 'pi na tādṛśaḥ kaściditi cedāha—pratyuteti | viśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ nipātasamudāya eko vā nipātaḥ | yadāha—iyaṃ punaruktiralaṃkṛtiḥ kāvyaśobhākaratvājjāyate tādṛśi viṣaye iti ||
tadudāharati—

sā kācidiṣṭā varāroha strī mukhyā hanyate pīḍyate | cāru sarvamaṅgamasyā iti cārusarvāṅgī | hanyate mañjubhāṣiṇī madhurālāpinī hanyate smareṇa kāmena akāṇḍavairiṇā nirnimittaśatruṇeti | īdṛśaṃ punaruktamapi kāvyabhūṣaṇamavasthāviśeṣayogāt | āha ca—
vismaye ca viṣāde ca kope dainye ca vāraṇe |
prasāde caiva harṣe ca padamekaṃ dvirucyate ||
[ ] iti ||

lg.l: vacāṃsi doṣa evāsau sasaṃśaya iti smṛtaḥ || 139 ||

div.p: vacāṃsi śabdāḥ prayuktāni prakāśitāni | kimartham ? nirṇayārtham | nirṇayo niścayaḥ, prakaraṇāt kāvyārthaviṣayaḥ saṃśayaviparyāsavirodhī pratyayaḥ | arthaḥ prajojanam, sādhyatvād yasmin prayoge iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam | tacca svabhāvato napuṃsakam dvitīyaikavacanāntaṃ ca smaryate | na tu saṃśayārtham, tadānīṃ doṣāt | yad vakṣyati—īdṛśaṃ saṃśayāya [3. 141] ityādi | saṃśayaniścayaviparyayamarthadvayāvagāhi jñānaṃ yadi janayanti, asau tādṛśaḥ saṃśaya iti sasaṃśayo nāma doṣa eva kāvye | na guṇo 'pi tatra viṣaye | anyatra tu bhavet | smṛto vijñāyate ||

manorathasya hṛdayābhilāṣasya priyo dayitaḥ kaścit | tadekālambanatvāt tasya ālokanamālokaḥ | tatra rasaḥ | tena līle capale īkṣaṇe netre yasyā iti manorathapriyālokarasalīlekṣaṇe sakhīti sambodhanam | yad vā manorathapriya iṣṭaḥ | ālokaḥ prakāśo bāhyaḥ | tadvadarasalolekṣaṇatvaṃ na saṃvṛttam [?] ātmānamantastiṣṭhantaṃ necchasi | kiṃ tu yatheṣṭaṃ bahirāloke bhramituṃ vācchasīti abhiprāyeṇa [116a] evamāmantryate | ata eva atrāpi saṃśayaḥ, katamo 'rtho 'trābhipreta ityaniścayāt | yadi nāmaivam, tataḥ kiṃmityāha—ārāditi | īdṛśamevaṃvidhaṃ tava svātantryaṃ manorathapriyālokarasalolatvam | asau tava mātā ārād vṛttirasyā ityārādvṛttiḥ | draṣṭuṃ na kṣamā | atrāpyārācchabdasya dūrāntikavṛttitvāt, asāvityasya ca parokṣāparokṣayorvṛtteḥ saṃśayyate | kimasau mātā dūravṛttirīdṛśaṃ draṣṭuṃ na kṣamā na śaknoti parokṣatvāt, kiṃ vā asau iyaṃ mātā ārādvṛttirāsannavartinī īdṛśaṃ draṣṭuṃ na kṣamā na sahate | īdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā sutarāṃ kupyatīti
[a]niścayaḥ kaściṃt | tadīdṛśaṃ [sa] saṃśayaṃ draṣṭavyamiti ||
atrāpyapavādamāha—

īdṛśamevaṃvidhaṃ sasaṃśayaṃ vacanaṃ yanniścayārtha[nigūhanena] saṃśayāyaiva kāvyārthasande[hotpādanā]rthameva, tatheṣṭatvāt | jātu kadācit, na sarvathā | tādṛśe prastāve yadi prayujyate tadā asau saṃśayaḥ adoṣo jātaḥ alaṅkāro guṇa eva syāt kāvyasya | na doṣaḥ syāt | tatra tādṛśi saṃśaye viṣaye tasyaiva tatra vidheyatvāt | yathetyudāharati ||

tāṃ kāñcidiṣṭām aninditāṃ striyam | anaṅgāt kāmāt jātaḥ anaṅgajaḥ sa ca sā vā ātaṅkaḥ pīḍā | aṅgāt śarīrāt jātaḥ bāhyabhūtasaṃbhūtatvāt anaṅgajaḥ sa ca sā vā ātaṅka santāpaścetiṃ dvaidham | madanena laṅghitāmabhibhūtāṃ satīṃ kālena mṛtyunaiva kaṭhoreṇa asthānaprahāritvāt | kālenaiva kaṭhoreṇa grīṣmeṇa kālāvarṣikāgrastāṃ mṛṇālikāmiva kavalitām, paśyāmi avaimi | nātra sandehaḥ ityaparaṃ dvaidham | tataśca tvayi āśayā abhilāṣeṇa no 'smākaṃ kiṃ prayojanam ? na kiñcit | yadi sā astiṃ tadatheṃ tvāmabhilaṣāmi kimidānīṃ tvayeti | kiṃ nastadāśayeti pāṭhe—tatra kimiṃdānīṃ naḥ asmākaṃ tasyāmāśayā pratyāśayā ? gatā dūramasmākamasāviti vyākhyeyam ||
tad vivṛṇoti—

uktena prakāreṇa kāmena ārtā gharmeṇa taptā kṣapitā vā [116b] ityevamaniścayakaraṃ saṃśayajanakaṃ vā vākyaṃ dūtī kācit āha bravīti | narmaṇā parihāsena hetunā ityuktena vidhinā | kimasau madviyogāt kāmārtā gharmataptā vā kevalamityaniścayalābhāt
yuvānaṃ kañcit kāmena ākulīkartuṃ vidhurayitum | tataśca saṃśaya evātrābhidheyatvādalaṅkāraḥ ||

arthānāṃ yathoddiṣṭānāṃ keṣāñciduddeśaḥ prathamopakṣepaḥ tasyānuguṇastatra kramānusāritvāt anudeśaḥanudiśyata ityanudeśaḥ | paścāduccāryata ityaryaḥ | pāṇinīyakāśikāyām 1.3.10﻿ pratyāmnāyaścet na kṛtaḥ syāt pramādāt, tādṛśaṃ viśeṣamantareṇeti bhāvaḥ | apakrama iti abhidhānaṃ saṃjñā yasyetyapakramābhidhānam | apakramaṃ nāma doṣaṃ taṃ yathoktamācakṣate kathayanti kavayaḥ | yathetyudāharati ||

jagatāṃ lokānāṃ sthitiḥ prabandhānuvṛttiḥ | nirmāṇamutpādaḥ | saṃhāro nāśasteṣāṃ hetavaḥ, tatkartṛtvāt na jātā akṛtakā ityajāḥ nityāḥ | ke te ? śambhuśca śaṅkaraḥ, nārāyaṇaśca viṣṇuḥ | ambhojayoniśca brahmā | śambhunārāyaṇāmbhojayonayaḥ | vo yuṣmān pālayantu rakṣantu | atra jagatāṃ sthitiheturnārāyaṇaḥ, nirmāṇaheturambhojayoniḥ saṃhārahetuḥ śambhurityāgamāt na yathoddeśamanudeśaḥ kṛta ityapakramanāmāyaṃ kāvyadoṣa iti ||
atrāpyapavādamabhidhatte—

yatnena pratiyatnena yathāvasthānātikrameṇānyathā sambandhayojanamanudeśaḥ tasya vijñānamavagamaḥ | tasya hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ ko 'pi kaścit tādṛśaḥ yena tatra sambandho vijñāyate | na yathoddeśam | yadi kṛtaḥ syād yatnaḥ | sambandhanirjñānaheturityapi paṭhyate | tatra sambandhasyāyathoddeśamanudeśasya nirjñāne hetuḥ kāraṇabhūto yadi yatnaḥ ko 'pi
kṛtaḥ syāditi vyākhyeyam | tadā kramasya yathoddeśamanudeśasya laṅghanamatikramamapi na kevalamalaṅghanam | na doṣamāhuḥ smaranti sūrayaḥ kavayaḥ | yathetyudāharati ||

bandhūnāṃ tyāgo viraho viraho bandhutyāgaḥ | tanoḥ śarīrasya tyāgo maraṇam | deśasya ātmīyasya tyāgo deśatyāga iti triṣu eteṣu bandhutyāgādiṣu duḥkheṣu | ādiścāntaśca ityādyantau [117a] bandhutyāgadeśatyāgau āyatau dīrghau ca tau kleśau saṃbādhau | āyato kleśo duḥkhamanayorityāyatakleśau yāvajjīvamanubandhāt | madhyamastanutyāgaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ kṣaṇamātrabhāvī cāsau jvarastāpaśceti kṣaṇikajvaraḥ śarīrābhāve nānubandhāt | atrāyatakleśatvaṃ bandhutyāgadeśatyāgayoḥ | evaṃ na tanutyāgasya | kṣaṇikajvaratvaṃ ca tanutyāgasyaiva netarayoriti yatnasambandhaḥ | sambandhanirjñātaheturīdṛśo draṣṭavyaḥ | yadi punaḥ trayāṇāmapyekarūpatvaṃ tadā kramalaṅghanaṃ doṣa eva syāt, viśeṣasya tādṛśasyābhāvāditi ||

padasya subantasya tiṅantasya vā prayogo vyavahāraḥ padaprayogaḥ, lakṣyate [yat] taditi lakṣyamudāharaṇam | lakṣaṇaṃ śabdaśāsanam, lakṣyate anena śabdarūpamiti kṛtvā | tayoḥ te eva vā paddhatiḥ mārgaḥ, tato vyavahārapravṛtteḥ | anālakṣyā adṛśyā, abhāvāt | lakṣyalakṣaṇapaddhatiryasmin sa tādṛśa aśiṣṭairanāptaiḥ svīkṛtaḥ | ityanūdya śabdahīnaṃ tadvijñeyamiti vidhīyate | yaḥ punarevaṃbhūto 'pi padaprayogaḥ śiṣṭairiṣyate śāstre kāvye vā, kvacit prayuktatvāt | sa śiṣṭaiḥ śāstrakāraistatprajñairvā iṣṭastu āptaprayuktaḥ punaḥ na duṣyati, teṣāṃ sarvatheha pramāṇatvāt | ananto hi śabdarāśiḥ | tatra kaścicchabdaḥ śabdānuśāsanād gṛhyate | kaścidāptaprayogāt tatkalpāt | śabdānuśāsanamapi āptopadeśa iti na kaścidanayorviśeṣaḥ ata evoktam — śiṣṭeṣṭastu na duṣyatīti ||
tadudāharati—

avatirataṅānaḥ taṅā prayuktaḥ | bāhubhirityapekṣā bhavata iti ṣaṣṭhīsthāne caturthī prayuttā | arṇavaśakvarī mekhalā ratnayogādinā yasyā ityarṇavaśkvarī nadṛtaḥcāndrasūtram—tula nadṛtaśca—pāṇiniḥ 5. 4. 153 iti kapā bhavitavyam | mahārājannityatrāpi sakhyahorājñāṃ ṭactadeva tula rājāhaḥsakhibhyaṣṭac—pāṇiniḥ 5. 4. 91﻿ [117b] iti ṭacā bhāvyam | tadidaṃ sarvaṃ śāstraśiṣṭaprayogapratikūlamiti śabdahīnam | nanvanuprāsādiḥ śabdaraso 'tra vidyate kāvyaguṇaḥ | tannedamekāntaheyamiti cedāha— ityevaṃ duṣṭānāṃ śabdānāṃ na ca raso 'nuprāsādirapi jijñāsitāveva sthito grāhyaḥ | aśraddhāśrayatayā tasyā vyupahatatvāt | śuddhāyāṃ hi bhūmau nyastaḥ puṣpaprakaraḥ śobhate | yaḥ punarapūtāyāṃ bhuvi nikṣipyate kusumanikaraḥ sa niṣphala eva | tathā śuddhāyāṃ śabdapaddhatau rasaḥ anuprāsādiḥ śobhate nānyathā | yatra punarayaṃ raso darśitaḥ, tad rasaprayoge 'pi śabdahīnatvāt heyamiti khyāpayitum | mahārājan na jijñāsā nāstītyāsāṃ girāṃ rasaḥ ityapi pāṭhaḥ | tatrāsāṃ girāṃ raso nāstīti īdṛśī jijñāsā na vidyate, heyatvādīdṛśasya rasasyeti vyākhyeyam | śeṣaṃ samānamiti ||
kvacidaśabdahīne 'pi śabdahīnabhrāntiriti vyutpādayannāha—

dakṣiṇādrermalayaparvatādupasarana āgacchana mārutaḥ cūtapādapān sahakāratarūn lalitaṃ salīlamādhūtairākampitaiḥ pravālairaṅkuraiḥ pallavodgamaiḥ śobhante iti lalitādhūtapravālāṅkuraśobhinaḥ | sa tat kurute vidhatte | atra kila dakṣiṇādrerupasaraṇe bhāvāt pañcamī na yujyate, apāyalakṣaṇatvāt tasyāḥ | upasaraṇāpekṣayā tvādhāreṇa vyāpyena vā dakṣiṇānilena bhāvyam | tataśca saptamī dvitīyā vā yujyate | naivaṃ kṛtam | ataḥ śabdahīnamevaṃvidhamiti kudhiyo manyante | na caitadevam | upasaraṇaṃ hi tata āgamanamiti viśleṣayogād dakṣiṇādrimāmṛśyopasara[tyayami]ti lyablopalakṣaṇā pañcamyeva yujyate ||
tadetanmanasi [118a] kṛtyāha—

ityevaṃvidhaṃ lakṣyam | apabhāṣaṇavat śabda[hīna]mivābhāti pratibhāsate | keṣām ? śāstraṃ śabdalakṣaṇādikam | tasya māhātmyaṃ prabhāvaḥ | evaṃvidhalakṣyasaṃgrāhakatvam | tasya darśanamabhyāsaḥ tatrālasaṃ mandaṃ ceto yeṣāmiti [śāstramāhātmyadarśanālasaceta]sām śāstramāhātmyadarśanena nedṛśī bhrāntirupajāyate, tasyājña[tvā]panoditvāt | yathoktam—
śāstraṃ mohanivartanam [ pramāṇavārttike 1. 7 ] iti | na cedṛśaṃ saubhāgyaṃ sādhutāmujjhati tyajati | subhagenevedṛśaṃ sadṛśaḥ | yathoktaṃ prāgasmābhiriti ||

ślokeṣu padyeṣu viṣaye padasya supatiṅantasya chedo virāmaḥ chandaḥśāstraprasiddhaḥ padacchedaḥ | niyataṃ taddhi vyavasthānaṃ caturthavarṇādilakṣaṇaṃ yasminniti niyatasthānam | tanniyatasthānaṃ padacchedam | anuvādo 'yam | yati viduḥ smaranti tadvida iti vidhiḥ | tasyā yaterapetamapagataṃ tadapetaṃ yatibhraṣṭam | śravaṇaṃ karṇamudvejayatīti śravaṇodvejanam | anaśca heyam | śrutisubhagaṃ hi lakṣaṇānugataṃ kāvyamupādīyate | yatheti [yatibhraṣṭam] udāharati ||

śiṣṭairamā saha | saṃgītavidhiṃ prekṣaṇakam | akliṣṭā yathāgamaṃ prayuktā rasāḥ śṛṅgāravīrādayo 'sminniti akliṣṭarasaṃ strīṇāṃ sambandhinam, tatprayuktatvāt | ayaṃ vivakṣitaḥ kaścidādityavaṃśyaḥ sūryānvayasambhūtaḥ | narendraḥ paśyatīha prastāve | iha vācoyuktau [vā] | atra mandākrāntāyāṃ samudrartulokaiḥ [4|6|7] yatividhānam |
tadvyatikramāt ityādi īdṛśaṃ duṣṭaṃ heyam || atrāpavādamāha—kāryetyādi | kāryāṇi trivargānubandhīni karmāṇi svasvakāryāṇi | tadviparītāni [akāryāṇi] āgamenaiva utpatyādinā tatpratipādakena paśyan yathārhamanutiṣṭhan | vaśyāṃ vidheyāmurvīmavati rakṣati nṛpa iti, evaṃvidhaprayogaḥ śiṣṭānāmasti | na ca nāstyeva | tasmādīdṛśaḥ sādhureva ||
nanu niyatasthānapadacchedo yatiriti hetupadaikadeśacchedaḥ | tat kathaṃ na yatibhraṣṭamityata āha—

lg.l: lupte yadānte śiṣṭasya padatvaṃ niścitaṃ yathā |

div.p: padasyānte yathāsambhavaṃ vibhaktyādirūpe lupte sati śiṣṭasya vyavasthitasya bhāgasya padatvaṃ niścitam | [118b] paṭhatyādeḥ śabdavidyāyām | tathā tadvat | sandhiḥ saṃhitā | [tatra] yaṇādeḥ vikāro 'nyathātvamanto 'vasānaṃ yasya tatsambandhi[vi]kārāntamatadnuṇasaṃvijñānāt sandhivikāramapahṛtya śiṣṭaṃ prakṛtirūpaṃ padameveti varṇyate smaryate śiṣṭaiḥ | tataḥ kāryākāryetyādau caturthādinā varṇeṇa padacchedo yatirna virudhyata iti ||
īdṛśamapi yadi śravaṇānudvejanaṃ tadā grāhyamanyathā heyamiti punarviśeṣaṃ darśayannāha-

lg.l: tathāpi kaṭu karṇānāṃ kavayo na prayuñjate |

div.p: yadyapi sa[ndhivi]kārāntaṃ padaṃ smṛtam, tathāpi evamapi karṇānāṃ kaṭu śravaṇodvejanaṃ na prayuñjate kavayo rasajñāḥ | tādṛśaṃ varjanīyamityarthaḥ | katarat tadityudāharatitasya rājñaḥ kasyacit | dhvajinī senā ketubhirdhvajairucchritaiḥ udastā utkṣiptā jaladā yathā iti ketūdastajaladā ityadaḥ īdṛśaṃ karṇakaṭu varjyamatra | yadyapi tuśabde ako 'ki dīrgheṇa pareṇāpākṛte ke itya[tra] padatvaṃ syāt, tathāpi śravaṇodvejanamīdṛśamiti na prayoktavyam | atra ca śrutireva kavīnāṃ pramāṇamiti ||

varṇānāṃ śāstrataḥ pratiniyatānāṃ ślokabhāvināṃ nyūnatā hīnatvamādhikyamatireko vā | nyūnatādhikye dve | guroḥ saṃyogaparasya dīrghasya laghośca hrasvasyākṣarasyāyathāsthitiḥ tadvidyāvyavasthātikrameṇa vṛtteryatra padye syāt kavipramādāt tat tādṛśam | bhinnaṃ ca tadvṛttaṃ ceti bhinnavṛttam | bhinnaṃ vā vṛttaṃ yasmin kāvye iti bhedavivakṣayā bhinnavṛttam | eṣa bhinnavṛttalakṣaṇo doṣaḥ suninditaḥ suṣṭhu garhitaḥ kavibhiḥ kāvyaśarīrasyaivaṃvidhatve kuta eva tatra viśeṣavittā [kaveḥ] iti ||
[119a] catuṣṭayamadhye tad yathākramamudāharati—

indupādāḥ śiśirāḥ spṛśanti ityatra prathamapāda ūnavarṇatā | ūno nyūno varṇo yatra tadbhāva ūnavarṇateti kṛtvā | anuṣṭuppādo hyaṣṭākṣaraḥ | ayaṃ tu saptākṣara iti varṇahāniḥ | sahakārasya kisalayānyārdrāṇī[ti] atrāpi pūrvapāde adhikamakṣara[ma]sminniti adhikākṣaram | adhikākṣaramiti bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ | yadvā adhikākṣaraṃ pādaṃ rūpaṃ vṛttamiti vā yojyam, anuṣṭuppādasyāṣṭākṣarasya navākṣarīkaraṇāditi ||

ayathā śāstraviruddho gururyasmin tasya bhāvaḥ ayathāgurutvam | upendravajrāyāṃ prathamalaghuvidhānāt tadapekṣayeti draṣṭavyam | upajātyapekṣayā tvadoṣa iti | madanetyādi | ayathālaghutvamiti pūrva[vacca] vyutpattiḥ | upendravajrāyāṃ dvitīyamakṣaraṃ guru vihitamiti | idaṃ tu laghviti tadvidyāvirodhādayathālaghutvamiti ||

saṃhitāṃ sandhimekapade bhinnapade vā prāptāmapi na vivakṣāmi | asaṃhitaiva mayātra vivakṣiteti buddhyā padeṣu yadasandhānamasaṃhitā tat tādṛśaṃ vigataḥ sandhirasmāditi visandhīti nirdiṣṭamuktaṃ kāvyadūṣaṇam | yat punarasandhānaṃ pragṛhyamādiryasya yalopādeḥ sa hetuḥ kāraṇamasyeti pragṛhyādihetukam, na tad visandhīti nirdiṣṭaṃ tādṛśamasandhānaṃ yuktaṃ śāstrīyatvāt | anena ca yat pragṛhyādihetukamapi visandhānaṃ bhāmahena varjitam, tannirastam | yadāha—
kānte induśiroratne ādadhāne udaṃśunī |
pātāṃ vaḥ śambhuśarvāṇyāviti prāhurvisandhyadaḥ ||
[ kāvyālaṅkāre 4. 28 ] iti | lakṣaṇānugataṃ hīdṛśaṃ kathamapramāṇayituṃ śakyate svasthacetaseti bhāvaḥ ||
tadudāharati—

lg.l: āsu rātriṣviti prājñairajñātanyaṅgamīdṛśam || 161 ||etasmāt pūrvaṃ mānerṣye iha śīryete strīṇāṃ himaṛtau priye iti ślokārdha bahutra paṭhitamapi na ratnaśrīsammatam, na vā bhoṭapāṭhānugatamiti parityaktam ||﻿

div.p:
mandānilena nabhasi | asmākaṃ manasyapi cetasi ca [119a] manoharatayā caratā aṅganāgaṇḍamaṇḍale udbhedi udnataṃ gharmāmbhaḥ svedajalaṃ luptam āsu rātriṣviti | arthasaṃgatiriyam | udāharaṇaṃ tu visandheḥ- anilena caratā aṅganāgaṇḍamaṇḍale ityetat | atra hi caratā aṅganetyatra ako 'ki dīrghaḥ [ityanena prāpto 'pi] sandhiḥ na kṛta iti visandhyetad draṣṭavyam | dvayorantādiviṣayaṃ tu asandhānamiṣṭam, [mahājanapra]siddheriti darśayati luptamudbhedi gharmāmbho nabhasyasmanmanasyapi āsu rātriṣviti |
īdṛśamardhāntādigocaramasandhānam ajñātaṃ nyaṅgamasminniti ajñātanyaṅgamaviditadoṣam aduṣṭaṃ jñātaṃ prājñaiḥ śiṣṭairiti yāvat |
sarasijamanuviddhaṃ śaivalenāpi ramyaṃ malinamapi himāṃśorlakṣma lakṣmīṃatra śobhāmiti mātṛkāpāṭhaḥ | sa tu na daṇḍidhṛtapāṭhānusārī | tula 1. 15﻿ tanoti |
iyamadhikamanojñā valkalenāpi tanvī kimiva hi madhurāṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām ||
[abhijñānaśākuntale 1. 17] tasmādīdṛśamasandhānaṃ prayujyate śi[ṣṭairi]ṣṭatvāt | prathamadvitīyayoḥ tṛtīyacaturthayośca pādayostu antādiviṣayamanyatra cāpi [pādābhyantare] sandhānamiṣṭamiti pratipattavyam ||

adriḥ malayaparvatādiḥ | vanaṃ kāliṅgādi | rāṣṭraṃ dakṣiṇāpathādikam | ādiśabdena nadīdhanvādiparigrahaḥ | sa tādṛśo deśo vijñāyate | rātrirdivā ca rātriṃdivam | ṛtavaśca prāvṛḍādayaḥ ṣaḍiti rātriṃdivartavaḥ kālaviśeṣatvāt kālaḥ sāmānyena vijñāyate | nṛtyaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ lāsyaṃ ca | nānārasabhāvābhinayāṅgahārādirūpaṃ gītaṃ jñeyam | tacca
gāndharvaṃ trividhaṃ vidyāt svaratālapadātmakam | [nāṭyaśāstre 28. 11] iti tridhā,
tasya yonirbhavet kaṇṭho vīṇā vaṃśastathaiva ca || [tatraiva 28.10] iti triyonikam | vistaratayā tacchāstra evādhikṛtam | tādarthyāt tatpratipādakaṃ śāstraṃ nṛttaṃ gītaṃ prabhṛti pramukhaṃ yāsāṃ vādyādividyānāṃ tā nṛttagītaprabhṛtayaḥ kalāvidyāḥ | kāmo viśiṣṭo viṣayopabhogaḥ | arthaśca vicitropakaraṇarūpaḥ | saṃśrayaḥ adhiṣṭhānam,
tadbhāvabhāvitvād yāsāṃ [kalānāṃ]miti kāmārthayoḥ saṃśrayāḥ | sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa tu dharmo 'pyāsāmāśrayaḥ syāt, tanmūlatvādarthakāmayoḥ ||

carācarāṇāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ bhūtānāṃ pravṛttiḥ yathāsthiti loka iti saṃjñitā samākhyā[tā] lokasaṃjñitā [120a]loke vijñāyate | hetuvidyā tarkaśāstram ātmā yasya sa hetuvidyātmako nyāyo 'tra gṛhyate | śrutiḥ vedaḥ saha smṛtyā manvādipraṇītayā vartate iti sasmṛtirāgamo veditavyaḥ ||

teṣu teṣu yathokteṣu deśādiṣvāgamaparyanteṣu ayathārūḍhaṃ tattadvidhipratiṣedhātikramād vaiparī[tyena] yadi kiñcidartharūpaṃ pravartate prayogeṣu kaveḥ prayoktuḥ pramādād vismaraṇahetoḥ yathārūḍhaṃ yadi kiñcinna vartata ityapi pāṭhaḥ | arthastu sa eva | tadevaṃ tadyathā ārūḍhaṃ pravṛttaṃ deśavirodhīti ucyate | ādiśabdena kalādiparigrahaḥ | deśādibhirvirodho bādhā astīti kṛtvā, deśādayo 'nyathā vyavasthitāḥ, anyathā ca kalpyanta iti tādṛśī tairbādhyate ||

karpūrapādapānāmāmarśe[na saṃsa]rgeṇa surabhiḥ sugandhirmalayānilaḥ | [ida]madrilakṣaṇadeśaviruddhamudāhṛtam, malayaparvate karpūrasambhūterayathārūḍhatvāt | kaliṅgo nāma vanamaraṇyaṃ tatra tasmād vā saṃbhūtā mataṅgajā hastinaḥ mṛgaprāyā mṛgalakṣaṇā hastijātiḥ prāyā bhūyasī ye[ṣu] tayā vā prāyāḥ samadhikā mṛgaprāyāḥ | etad vanarūpadeśavyāhatam | kaliṅgavanajanmanāṃ hastināṃ bhadrajāti prāyatvāt ||

kāverī nāma nadī | tasyāstīre tadrūpā vā bhūmayaḥ | colāścolajanapadarūpāḥ kālaiḥ kṛṣṇairagarubhiḥ śyāmā nīlā | idaṃ rāṣṭrarūpaṃ deśaviruddham | colarāṣṭrasvabhāvānāṃ kāverītīrabhūmīnāṃ kālāgaruśūnyatvāt |
deśavirodhaṃ nigamayati | deśo 'drivanādi[nā] yathoktena virodho bādhā yasyāmiti deśavirodhinyā [vācaḥ] vākyasya īdṛśamevaṃvidhaṃ prasthānaṃ svarūpaṃ veditavyamiti ||
kālavirodhamudāharannāha—

[120b]naktaṃ rātrau unnidrā vikasitā padminī, rātrirūpakālaviruddhametat | padminyā naktaṃ prabodhāsambhavāt | kumudvatī kumudinī sphuṭati vikasati ahni dine | etad divasarūpasamayaviruddham, divā kumudvatīvikāsābhāvāt ||

madhurvasanta utphullaḥ kusumito niculo vañjulo 'sminniti utphullaniculaḥ | nidāgho grīṣmaḥ meghairdurdino malinaḥ | śravyā madhurā haṃsānāṃ giraḥ śabdā yāsu iti śravyahaṃsagiro varṣāḥ prāvṛṭ | āmattā varhiṇyo mayūryo yasyāmiti āmattabarhiṇī śarat | nirmala ādityo yasminniti nirmalādityo hemantaḥ | śiśiraḥ ślāghyaṃ sevyaṃ candanam asminniti ślāghyacandanaḥ | sarvametad ṛtuṣaṭkalakṣaṇaṃ kālaviruddhaṃ madhvādiṣu ṛtuṣu utphullaniculādīnāmasambhavāt ||
kālavirodhamupasaṃharati—

kālena rātryādinā yathoktena virodhasya vyāghātasya bhāratīviṣayasya īdṛśī gatiḥ prasthānaṃ darśitā | kalayā nṛtyagītādividyayā virodhasya vacanagocarasya mārgaḥ prasthānaṃ manāk kiñcid uddiśyate udāhriyate yatheti darśayati ||

vīraśca śṛṅgāraśca [tayorvīra]śṛṅgārayo rasayoḥ prabhavau bhāvau manovasthāviśeṣalakṣaṇau krodhaśca vismayaśca krodhavismayau sthāyinau yāvadrasamavasthānāt | na tu vyabhicāribhāvavadasthāyinau | pūrṇāḥ samagrāḥ sapta ṛṣabhamadhyamagāndhāraṣaḍjadhaivatpañcamaniṣādākhyāḥ svarā yasminniti pūrṇasaptasvarāḥ | [te santi] yasminniti pūrṇasaptasvaraḥ so 'yaṃ bhinnamārgo gāndharvaprakāraḥ kaścit pravartate | etat kalāviruddham | krodhavismayayoḥ sthāyinorbhāvayoḥ śṛṅgāravīrayorayonitvena kalāyāṃ vyavasthānāt | raudrādbhutayoreva hi krodhavismayau sthāyinau bhāvau tatra vyavasthāpyete | vīraśṛṅgārayostu utsāharatī eva sthāyinau bhāvau | anyatarasvarahīnasyaiva ca bhinnamārgatayā vyavasthānāditi ||
kalāvirodhamatidiśannāha—

itthamanena prakāreṇa kalānāṃ kalārūpāṇāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭau dvividhāyāmapi virodhaḥ tadvyavasthātikrama[(121a)rūpo vi]ṣayaḥ sādhu samyak nīyatām anugamyatām | kva punariyaṃ kalācatuḥṣaṣṭiḥ parijñāyate, yatastadvirodhagatiranākulā syādityāha— tasyā ityādi | tasyāḥ kalācatuḥṣaṣṭyā rūpam svabhāvo 'rthataḥ [śabdataścā]virbhaviṣyati | yathāvadavagamyate | kalāparicchede caturthakalāparicchedo 'sya daṇḍino 'sti sa tviha na pravartate | yad vā kalānāṃ paricchede 'bhyāse sati tasyāḥ kalācatuḥṣaṣṭe rūpamāvirbhaviṣyati | tasmāt kalābhyāsaḥ karaṇīyaḥ, yatastadvirodhaḥ sarvo yathāvadavagamyate iti ||
lokavirodhamudāharannāha—
sugamam | hastyādeḥ turaṅgamāderiva keśarādyasambhavādīdṛśaṃ lokavirodhi vacanamiti uktarūpo 'yaṃ virodhaḥ ||
laukiko lokavidita eva ata eva sarvaiḥ śiṣṭai[ranyai]śca garhito ninditaḥ | naivedṛśaṃ kaścit svastha[ḥ/?/] prayuṅkte | kevalaṃ lokaviruddho bhavannevaṃ bhavediti itthaṃ sambhavamātreṇa darśitaḥ ||
hetuvidyāsu ānvīkṣikīṣu nyāya [itya]ā/?/khyā[yuktā]su iti nyāyākhyāsu uddeśe nyāyaśabdopādānāt | evamanusṛto viro[dho] nirdiśyate ||

lg.l: tathā hi sā cakorākṣī sthitaivādyāpi me hṛdi || 174 ||

div.p: sugatastathāgataḥ saṃskārān sambhavahetupratyayaiḥ kriyanta iti padārthānavinaśvarān nityānakṣaṇikān satyamāhābravīt | satyamiti vacanaviśeṣaṇam | kathaṃ satyamiti ? tadeva samarthyate | tathāhi samarthane | sā kācidiṣṭā cakorākṣī strī me mama hṛdi manasi adyāpi cira[kālādā]rabhya sthitā iti | yadi tu saṃskārā naśvarāḥ, kathamevaṃ ghaṭate ? tadetat nyāyaviruddham | saṃskārāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ saugate nyāyaśāstre pratikṣaṇaṃ viśarāru [ta]yā vyavasthāpanāditi ||

kāpilaiḥ sāṃkhyairasatāṃ śaktirūpeṇāpyavidyamānānāṃ udbhūtirutpādaḥ sthāna eva satyameva | sthāna ityekārānto nipāto yuktārthasūcakaḥ | upavarṇyate vivṛtaḥ | yasmād asatāmevārthānām udbhavā janmānyasmābhirdṛśyante | etadapi hetuvidyāvyāhatam | sāṃkhyamate satāmeva bhāvānāṃ kathañcidāvirbhāvasya vyavasthāpanāt ||
nyāyavirodhaṃ nigamayati—

[121b] nyāyavirodhasya hetuvidyāvyāhateḥ kāvye yasya yasya gatiḥ saiṣā yathoktaprakārā sarvatra anyatrāpi yathāsambhavaṃ dṛśyatāmavagamyatām | athānantaramāgamena dharmaśāstrasahitena vedena virodhasya bādhāyā bhāratībhūmeḥ prasthānaṃ nītiḥ darśayiṣyate udāhriyate ||

āhito vaidikena vidhinā parigṛhīto 'gniḥ pariṇayakālabhāvī yairiti āhitāgnayaḥ | na tathā anāhitāgnayo ye [te] api | apiśabdo yogaṃ sūcayati | ete viprāḥ | jātāḥ putrā eṣāmiti jātaputrāḥ | viśvānaro devatā asyāmiti vaiśvānarīmiṣṭimijyām | āgneya[yajñaṃ] vitanvate kurvanti | akliṣṭaḥ pariśuddhaḥ ācāraścāritraṃ śāstravihitaṃ bhūṣaṇamalaṅkāro yeṣāmityakliṣṭācārabhūṣaṇāḥ | idamāgamaviruddham | ye hi [sāgnikā] utpannatanayāśca [ta eva] vaiśvānaraṃ yāgamanutiṣṭhantīti śruteḥ | kathamanyathā akliṣṭācārā iti ||

asau vivakṣitaḥ kaścit | anupanīto 'prayuktavaidikasaṃskāraviśeṣo 'pi guroḥ sakāśād vedā[n] sāmādīn adhijage 'dhītavān | tathāhi, svabhāvena prakṛtyaiva na saṃskārataḥ | śuddho nirmalaḥ sphaṭiko maṇiḥ saṃskāramutkarṣādhānaṃ nāpekṣate | idamapi āgamavyāhatam | upanīto vedānadhīyīteti śruteḥ | kathamanyathā śuddhiriti ||

sakalo 'pyeṣa virodho deśādikṛtaḥ.........eva kaścid doṣarūpeṇa gaṇanāṃ saṃkhyānaṃ doṣātmatāmutkramya parityajya guṇānāṃ vīthīṃ padavīṃ guṇasvabhāvatāṃ vigāhate svīkaroti kadācit | na sarvadā | kutaḥ ? kaveḥ prayo[gasya] kauśalāt tādṛgviṣayaparigrahalakṣaṇāt naipuṇāt kāraṇāt | na tu yathā tathā veti ||

tasyābhimatasya rājñaḥ kasyacit prabhāveṇa puṇyānubhāvāt atimānuṣāt tasyo[122a]dyānāni | ārdrāṇi snigdhāni aṃśukāni vastrāṇyeva pravālāni kisalayāni yeṣāmityārdrāṃśukapravālānāṃ suraśākhiṃnāṃ kalpavṛkṣāṇāmāmpadaṃ sadma | āspadārthasya ekārthyena vivakṣitatvāt udyānādibahutvasamānādhikaraṇye 'pi ekavacanam | jajñire jātāni | puṇyaprabhāvasyācintyatvāt manuṣyaloke 'pi suraśākhinaḥ sambhavaḥ | evamuktamācāryaśūreṇa—
puṇyānubhāvādatha tasya tasmi- nnapaṅkajaṃ paṅkajamudbabhūva |
avajñayevāvajahāsa māraṃ yacchuklayā keśaradantapaṃktyā ||
[jātakamālāyām 4. 19] iti tatra deśāvirodhaḥ ||

kharo rūkṣo mārutaḥ kadambarajasā kadambapuṣpareṇunā saha saptacchadodgamān saptaparṇakusumāni dhunvan vikiran rājñāṃ vināśasya piśunaḥ pañcatāṃ sūcayan cacāra pravavau | yadyapi ekadā kadambasaptaparṇakusumāsambhavaḥ kadambakusumasya prāvṛṣeṇyatvāt saptacchadapuṣpasya ca śāradatvāt, tathāpi rājavināśanimittamīdṛśamautpātikaṃ sambhavatīti na kālavirodhaḥ ||

dolā preṅkhā tasyā atipreraṇādatikampanād | [ana]timātratatpreraṇato hi na bhavedapi layavaiṣamyam | tasmāt trastasya bhītavadhūjanasya strīṇāṃ mukhādudbhavaṃ geyaṃ gītaṃ kāmināṃ rāgamavardhayat uddīpitavat | kutaḥ ? layasya kriyāmānakālalakṣaṇasya drutamadhyādiprabhedasya tatkālaparidṛṣṭasya vaiṣamyādayathākālaṃ pravṛtteḥ | etacca viruddham | kathaṃ hi layaviṣamamalakṣaṇaduṣṭaṃ geyaṃ rañjakaṃ bhavati ? tathāpi īdṛśaṃ sthūlaṃ gītaṃ śītkārāyamāṇaṃ kāmināṃ sutarāṃ rañjakam | ki mava hi teṣāmarañjakamiti na kālavirodhaḥ ||

aindavādindoḥ sambandhino 'rciṣo raśmerapyadhikaśiśiraṃ śītaṃ havyavāhamagniṃ gaṇayati | [kaḥ ?] adhairyo 'yaṃ vivakṣitaḥ kaścit kāmī | [katham ?] abalāyāḥ priyāyā viraho duḥkhaṃ sa eva vā kleśaḥ | tena viklavo viplutaḥ san | virahavikāraviplutasya hi tathā pratibhāsa iti na lokavirodhaḥ ||

prameyaḥ paricchedyo 'pi vyaktakṣityādimūrttyapekṣayā aprameyo 'si avyaktaḥ paramarūpataḥ | prameyo 'pi vā [122b] anumānapramāṇagamyatvādaprameyo 'si [indriyā]viṣayatvāt | sakalaḥ sāvayavo 'pi [ā]rabdhakṣityādimūrtatvāt, niṣkalo niravayavaḥ asi paramātmarūpataḥ | eko 'pi tvaṃ śāśvatabrahmarūpeṇa, aneko 'si pariṇāmavaicitrād ityevaṃ viśvamūrtaye sarvamayāya [te] tubhyaṃ namaḥ | itīdṛśaṃ na nyāyaviruddham, evaṃvidhatvād brahmaṇaḥ paramasyeti ||

pañcānāṃ yu[dhi]ṣṭhirādīnāṃ pāṇḍoḥ putrāṇāṃ patnī pañcālakanyakā draupadī babhūva | hanta na tarhi dṛṣṭapañcapuruṣā sā kulastrī syāditi cedāha— satīnāṃ pativratānāṃ madhye agraṇīḥ pradhānabhūtā cāsīt | kathamevam ? daivo devasambandhī hi vidhiḥ prabhāva īdṛśaḥ evaṃbhūto yadevaṃvidhamapi ghaṭate | kimatra kriyatām ? ko hi daivaṃ vidhānamapramāṇayituṃ śaknoti | hiśabdenedameva prasiddhaṃ dyotyate | tataśca nāgamavirodhaḥ |
kāvyalakṣaṇaṃ yathāpratijñātaṃ nigamannayāha—

kāvyānāṃ śabdaścārthaśca śabdārthau śarīram | tayoścālaṃkriyā śabdālaṅkārā arthālaṅkārāśca | citrā nānāprakārā sukarāḥ duṣkarāśca mārgā yamakādirūpāḥ, citrā guṇāḥ samudāyārthasampattyādayaḥ | doṣāśca tadvipakṣāḥ sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇāśca śleṣaviparyayādayaḥ | uktena vidhinā [etat sarvaṃ] saṃkṣipya samāsato darśitāḥ pratipāditāḥ ||
darśitā nāma | kimataḥ iti sarvārambhasya tanniṣṭhatvāt prayojanadarśanadvāreṇa samāpayannāha—

l.seg: rdhanyo yuveva ramate labhate ca kīrtim || 187 ||

div.p:
amunā anena mārgeṇa kāvyalakṣaṇavidhinā yathāvad darśitena prakāśitena hetunā, doṣaśca heyo bhāgaḥ, guṇaścopādeyaḥ | yathoktayostayoḥ kāryasambandhinoḥ vyutpannā vivekinī hānopādānasamarthā buddhi[ryasya tādṛśaḥ] kāvyadoṣaguṇajñaḥ pumān | ata eva vaśavartinī[bhirā]yattābhirvāgbhiḥ kāvyarūpābhiranavadyābhiḥ kṛtamabhisaraṇaṃ svarasata evopasarpaṇamasminniti vākkṛtābhisaraṇaḥ abhisṛto ramate prītimanuttarāmanubhavati | kīrtiṃ ca
satpuruṣatanumanaśvarīṃ guṇamaryo bhuva[nātiśā]yinīmatimanoharāṃ labhate prāpnoti | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | caturvargasiddhimapi cādhigacchati | yathoktaṃ prathame paricchede [1.3] | kathamiva ? vaśavartinībhirmadirekṣaṇābhiḥ kṛtābhisaraṇo dhanyaḥ [123a].......subhago yuvā taruṇa i[va] | yathāyaṃ ramate prītyutmavaṃ nirviśati, labhate ca kīrtiṃ subhaga iti khyātiṃ tathā [vyutpanna]buddhirayamityupaneyam ||

l.seg: didamiti kila kāvyaṃ paṭhyate śrūyate ca ||
doṣeṣveva niveśayanti hṛdayaṃ sarvaṃ khalāste kathaṃ
kalpante guṇavairiṇo guṇavatāṃ jñātvā guṇānāṃ rasam |
doṣā[neva hi] tatra kevalamamī paśyanti [nityaṃ satāṃ]
lipsante kila durjanāḥ samatayā saṃbhāvanāṃ tādṛśīm |
nāyaṃ heturavāptaye guṇabhuvaḥ kīrteḥ satāṃ saṃsadi
vyāmohādapi vā guṇeṣu patanaṃ teṣāṃ yadetadbahu ||
na ca vihatiḥ prakṛtistu tasya saiṣā |
prītiṃ parāṃ sujanavat kimayaṃ na bhuṅkte

div.p: anyastvāha—

body.trailer:
|| śrīrājyapālasya rājñastrayoviṃśasaṃvatsare viraciteyaṃ ṭīkā ||
granthasyaitasya sambandhi sahasrāṇāṃ catuṣṭayam |
sahasramaparaṃ caiva pramāṇaṃ parikīrtitam ||
kṛtyavyaktadyutayaśceto haranti lokānām |
udyotanaiśca śāṇaiḥ śuktermuktā ivoddhatāḥ || ﻿
